data.source_sentence: 데이터 센터의 전기 부하는 수전 전력과 삼중 열병합 시스템에서 생산되는 전기의 합과 같은 전기 에너지 밸런스를 만족해야 하며 다음 식과 같이 정의된다.
data.mt_sentence: The electrical load of the data center must satisfy the electrical energy balance equal to the sum of the received power and the electricity generated by the triple heat and power system, and is defined as the following equation.
data.target_sentence: The electrical load of the data center must satisfy the electrical energy balance equal to the sum of the received power and the power generated by the triple cogeneration system and is defined as:

data.source_sentence: 여기서, x는 해당 시간의 전기 부하, y는 수전 전력 중 전기 부하에 공급되는 전력, m은 삼중 열병합에서 생산되는 전기를 각각 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, x means the electric load at the corresponding time, y means the electric power supplied to the electric load among the received power, and m means the electricity produced by the triple cogeneration.
data.target_sentence: Here, x is the electrical load at the time, y is the power supplied to the electrical load among the received power, and m is the power produced by the Trigeneration system.

data.source_sentence: 수전 전력은 데이터 센터 전기 부하, 기존 전기 냉동기와 냉각탑의 소비 전력의 합과 같아야 하며 다음 식과 같이 정의된다.
data.mt_sentence: Received power must be equal to the sum of the data center electrical load and the power consumption of the existing electric chiller and cooling tower, and is defined as the following equation.
data.target_sentence: The received power must be equal to the sum of the electrical load of the data center and the power consumption of the conventional electric chillers and cooling towers, and is defined by the following equation:

data.source_sentence: 해당 사업 연도의 각 시간별 수전 전력은 최대 수요 전력과 같거나 작아야 한다는 부등식 조건이 요구된다.
data.mt_sentence: The inequality condition is required that the received power for each hour of the business year must be equal to or smaller than the maximum demanded power.
data.target_sentence: The inequality condition requires that the received power for each hour of the project year is less than or equal to the maximum required power.

data.source_sentence: 데이터 센터의 냉방 부하는 기존 전기냉동기에서 생산되는 냉열과 삼중 열병합 시스템의 흡수식 냉동기에서 생산되는 냉열의 합과 같아야 하며 다음 식과 같이 정의된다.
data.mt_sentence: The cooling load of the data center should be equal to the sum of the cold heat produced by the existing electric chiller and the cold heat produced by the absorption chiller of the triple heat and power system, and is defined as the following equation.
data.target_sentence: The cooling load of the data center should be equal to the sum of the cooling heat generated by the existing electric chiller and the cooling heat generated by the absorption chiller of the Trigeneration system, and it is defined by the following equation.

data.source_sentence: 삼중 열병합 시스템에서 생산되는 전기와 냉열은 고온 PEMFC 시스템의 정격 출력, 발전 효율, 열효율과 흡수식 냉동기의 냉방 COP를 이용하여 다음 식과 같이 계산될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Electricity and cold heat produced in a triple cogeneration system can be calculated using the rated power, power generation efficiency, thermal efficiency, and cooling COP of the absorption refrigerator as shown in the following equation.
data.target_sentence: The power and cooling heat produced by the Trigeneration system can be calculated using the rated power, power generation efficiency, thermal efficiency and cooling COP of the absorption refrigerator as follows:

data.source_sentence: 기존 전기 냉동기에서 생산되는 냉열과 냉각탑에서 소비되는 동력은 다음 식과 같이 각각 정의된다.
data.mt_sentence: The cooling heat produced by the existing electric refrigerator and the power consumed by the cooling tower are respectively defined as follows.
data.target_sentence: The cooling heat generated by the conventional electric refrigerator and the power consumed by the cooling tower are respectively defined as follows.

data.source_sentence: 여기서, x는 기존 전기 냉동기의 단위 냉방 출력당 냉각탑 소비 전력 계수, m은 삼중 열병합 시스템 단위 냉방 출력당 냉각탑 소비 전력 계수를 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, x is the cooling tower power consumption coefficient per unit cooling output of the conventional electric chiller, and m is the cooling tower power consumption coefficient per unit cooling output of the triple cogeneration system.
data.target_sentence: where x is the cooling tower power consumption factor per unit cooling output of the conventional electric chiller, and m is the cooling tower power consumption factor per unit cooling output of the Trigenerations system.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 제안하는 허용 R&D 투자 비용은 R&D 투자 후 내부 수익률이 R&D 투자 전 내부 수익률보다 큰 최대 R&D 투자 비용으로 정의된다.
data.mt_sentence: The allowable R&D investment cost proposed in this study is defined as the maximum R&D investment cost in which the internal rate of return after R&D investment is greater than the internal rate of return before R&D investment.
data.target_sentence: The allowable R&D investment cost proposed in this study was defined as the maximum R&D investment cost when the internal rate of return after R&D investment is greater than the internal rate of return before R&D investment.

data.source_sentence: 즉, 연구 결과품이 적용되는 수요처에 대한 총 부하가 산정되어야 하며, 그 부하를 담당하는 구성품 간의 부분 부하가 추정되어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In other words, the total load for the source of demand to which the research result is applied should be calculated, and the partial load between the components responsible for the load should be estimated.
data.target_sentence: In other words, it is necessary to calculate the total load for the personnel to which the research result is applied, and to estimate the partial load between the components responsible for the load.

data.source_sentence: 전체 시스템 구성에서 에너지 밸런스가 유지되어야 하고, 비용이 최소화되는 조건이 만족되어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Energy balance must be maintained in the overall system configuration, and the condition for minimizing cost must be satisfied.
data.target_sentence: Energy balance must be maintained in the overall system configuration and conditions must be met to minimize costs.

data.source_sentence: Table 1은 총 부하에 해당하는 데이터 센터의 월별 전력 사용량, 냉방 부하를 제외한 전력 사용량, 냉방 부하에 사용된 전력사용량 및 PUE(Power Usage Effectiveness) 정보를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 1 shows the monthly power usage of the data center corresponding to the total load, the power usage excluding the cooling load, the power usage used for the cooling load, and the power usage effectiveness (PUE) information.
data.target_sentence: Table 1 shows the monthly power consumption of the data center corresponding to the total load, the power consumption excluding the cooling load, the power used for the cooling load, and PUE (Power Usage Effectiveness) information.

data.source_sentence: PUE는 데이터 센터의 효율성과 생산성을 나타내는 지표로써 얼마나 효율적으로 전력을 사용하는지를 측정하는 기준으로 다음 식과 같이 정의된다.
data.mt_sentence: PUE is an index indicating the efficiency and productivity of a data center, and is defined as a standard for measuring how efficiently power is used.
data.target_sentence: PUE is an indicator of data center efficiency and productivity, and is defined as a standard for measuring how efficiently power is used.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에 활용한 데이터센터의 정보는 연간 실제 부하정보에 기초하여 삼중열병합시스템이 운전되는 기간 20년에 대한 정보는 매년 동일하다는 가정으로 반영하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The data center information used in this study was reflected on the assumption that the information on the 20 years of operation of the triple heat and power system is the same every year based on the annual actual load information.
data.target_sentence: The data center information used in this study was reflected on the assumption that the information for 20 years of operation of the Trigenerations system is the same every year based on the annual actual load information.

data.source_sentence: Table 2는 1년 중 전기 및 냉방 부하가 최대 및 최소가 되는 시간을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 2 shows the times of the year when the electric and cooling loads are the maximum and the minimum.
data.target_sentence: Table 2 shows the maximum and minimum hours of electricity and cooling loads throughout the year.

data.source_sentence: 여기에서 전기 및 냉방부하 값은 2.2절에서 설명한 데이터센터에 도입되는 삼중열병합시스템의 최적용량을 결정하는데 사용되므로 중요한 지표로서 의 미가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, the electric and cooling load values are meaningful as important indicators because they are used to determine the optimal capacity of the triple and heat system introduced in the data center described in Section 2.2.
data.target_sentence: Here, the electrical load and cooling load values are significant as important indicators because they are used to determine the optimal capacity of the Trigeneration system introduced in the data center described in Section 2.2.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1의 시스템 구성에서 보면, 냉방 부하에 소요되는 전력 중에서 15%는 냉각탑 소비 전력으로, 나머지 85%는 기존 전기 냉동기 소비 전력으로 사용되며, 기존 전기 냉동기 냉방 COP를 4.4로 가정하여 산출하였다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the system configuration of Fig. 1, 15% of the power required for cooling loads is used as cooling tower power, and the remaining 85% is used as existing electric refrigerator power consumption, and the existing electric refrigerator cooling COP is assumed to be 4.4.
data.target_sentence: In the system configuration of Fig. 1, 15% of the power consumed for the cooling load is the cooling tower power consumption. The remaining 85% is used as the power consumption of the existing electric refrigerator, and it was calculated by assuming the cooling COP of the existing electric refrigerator as 4.4.

data.source_sentence: 본 사례 연구에서는 R&D 대상인 삼중 열병합 시스템의 정격 발전 출력을 25 kWe로 고려하였고, R&D 변수 조건은 연구 개발품의 효율 개선과 수명 개선으로 보았다.
data.mt_sentence: In this case study, the rated power generation output of the triple cogeneration system, which is the subject of R&D, was considered as 25 kWe, and the R&D variable condition was regarded as the efficiency improvement and lifespan improvement of the R&D product.
data.target_sentence: In this case study, the rated power generation output of the Trigeneration system, which is the subject of R&D, was considered as 25kWe, and the efficiency improvement and lifespan improvement of R&D products were considered as R&D variable conditions.

data.source_sentence: 효율 개선은 삼중 열병합 시스템에 탑재된 고온 PEMFC의 발전 효율과 열효율 변화를 고려하였고, 흡수식 냉동기의 냉방 효율 변화를 조건(CASE)으로 고려하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For the efficiency improvement, the power generation efficiency and thermal efficiency change of the high-temperature PEMFC mounted on the triple cogeneration system were considered, and the cooling efficiency change of the absorption chiller was considered as the condition (CASE).
data.target_sentence: To improve efficiency, the power generation efficiency and thermal efficiency change of the high-temperature PEMFC mounted on the Trigeneration system were considered, and the cooling efficiency change of the absorption chiller was considered as a condition (CASE).

data.source_sentence: 수명 개선 조건은 고온 PEMFC의 연료 전지 스택의 내구성 개선으로 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The life improvement condition was to improve the durability of the fuel cell stack of the high-temperature PEMFC.
data.target_sentence: The condition for life improvement was to improve the durability of the high-temperature PEMFC fuel cell stack.

data.source_sentence: 본 사례 연구 결과의 효과를 비교하기 위하여, 현재 수준의 삼중 열병합 시스템에 대한 정보를 비교 기준으로 삼았다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to compare the effects of the results of this case study, information on the current level of triple cogeneration system was used as a comparison criterion.
data.target_sentence: In order to compare the effects of this case study result, information on the level of the current Trigeneration system was used as a comparison standard.

data.source_sentence: 연구 개선 변수로 설정한 발전 효율의 개선에 따라 정격 연료 유량이 감소하고 냉방 효율의 개선에 따라 정격 냉방 출력이 증가하는 것을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was confirmed that the rated fuel flow rate decreased according to the improvement of the power generation efficiency set as the research improvement variable, and the rated cooling output increased according to the improvement of the cooling efficiency.
data.target_sentence: It was confirmed that the rated fuel flow decreased according to the improvement of the power generation efficiency set as the research improvement variable, and the rated cooling output increased according to the improvement of the cooling efficiency.

data.source_sentence: 위 계산 결과는 흡수식 냉동기의 초기 투자비, 유지 보수 비용 및 냉각탑에서 소비되는 동력을 산출하는 데 사용되는 지표를 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: The above calculation results refer to the indicators used to calculate the initial investment cost, maintenance cost, and power consumed by the cooling tower of the absorption chiller.
data.target_sentence: The above calculation results refer to the indicators for calculating the initial investment cost, maintenance cost, and cooling tower power consumption of the absorption cooling tower.

data.source_sentence: 본 사례 연구를 포함한 R&D 프로젝트의 분석에 있어 비용에 포함되는 조건값을 얼마나 합리적으로 산정하여 반영하는지가 사례 연구 결과의 신뢰도 측면에서 매우 중요한 요인이 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the analysis of R&D projects including this case study, how reasonably the condition values included in the cost are calculated and reflected is a very important factor in terms of the reliability of the case study results.
data.target_sentence: In the analysis of the R&D project including this case, how rationally calculating and reflecting the condition value included in the cost is a very important factor in terms of the reliability of the case study results.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 경제성 분석에 필요한 비용으로 고정 비용과 변동 비용을 고려하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, fixed costs and variable costs were considered as costs required for economic analysis.
data.target_sentence: In this study, fixed cost and variable cost were considered as costs required for economic analysis.

data.source_sentence: 고정 비용은 삼중 열병합 시스템 도입비용을 초기 투자비로 고려하고, 변동 비용은 유지 보수비, 부품 교체비, 전기 및 수소의 연료 요금을 고려하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The fixed cost considers the triple cogeneration system introduction cost as the initial investment cost, and the variable cost considers the maintenance cost, parts replacement cost, and fuel charges for electricity and hydrogen.
data.target_sentence: The fixed cost considers the Trigeneration system introduction cost as the initial investment cost, and the variable cost considers the maintenance cost, parts replacement cost, electricity and hydrogen fuel cost, etc.

data.source_sentence: 고정비용으로는 삼중열병합시스템의 도입 비용을 고려하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a fixed cost, the cost of introducing the triple thermocouple system was considered.
data.target_sentence: The cost of introducing the Trigeneration system was considered as a fixed cost.

data.source_sentence: 연료 전지 시스템 가격은 LBNL에서 제안한 연간 1만 대 양산 기준의 연료 처리 장치를 제외한 10 kW와 50 kW급의 연료 전지 시스템 가격을 기준으로 지수(log) 선형 보간법을 이용하여 25 kW급 연료 전지 시스템의 가격을 추정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The fuel cell system price is based on the 10 kW and 50 kW fuel cell system prices, excluding the fuel processing unit for the annual mass production of 10,000 units proposed by LBNL, and is based on the logarithmic linear interpolation method of the 25 kW fuel cell system. price was estimated.
data.target_sentence: The fuel cell system price is calculated based on the 10kW and 50kW fuel cell system prices, excluding the 10,000 mass-produced fuel processing units proposed by LBNL per year, using logarithmic linear interpolation of the 25kW fuel cell system.

data.source_sentence: 정기 유지 보수비는 삼중 열병합 시스템의 1대 당 초기 투자비(54.989 백만 원)의 2.6%를 고려하여 1.430 백만 원으로 적용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Regular maintenance costs were applied at KRW 1.430 million, taking into account 2.6% of the initial investment cost per unit of the triple cogeneration system (KRW 54.989 million).
data.target_sentence: The regular maintenance cost was 1.43 million won, considering 2.6% of the initial investment cost (54.989 million won) per unit of the triple power generation system.

data.source_sentence: 비정기적 유지 보수비는 스택 교체 비용과 흡수식 냉동기의 부품 교체 비용을 고려하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As for the irregular maintenance cost, the cost of replacing the stack and the cost of replacing the parts of the absorption refrigerator were considered.
data.target_sentence: The irregular maintenance cost considers the stack replacement cost and the absorption refrigerator part replacement cost.

data.source_sentence: 스택 교체 비용은 첫 번째 교체에서는 삼중 열병합 시스템의 초기 투자비의 약 50%로 가정하여 27.5 백만 원을 적용하였으며, 두 번째 교체에서는 첫 번째 스택 교체 비용의 70% 수준, 세 번째는 두 번째 스택 교체 비용의 70% 수준으로 가정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As for the stack replacement cost, 27.5 million won was applied assuming 50% of the initial investment cost of the triple heat and power system in the first replacement, 70% of the first stack replacement cost in the second replacement, and the second stack replacement cost in the third was assumed to be 70% of
data.target_sentence: As for the stack replacement cost, KRW 27.5 million was applied, assuming about 50% of the initial investment cost of the triple cogeneration system in the first replacement. The second stack replacement cost is assumed to be 70% of the first stack replacement cost, and the third stack replacement cost is assumed to be 70% of the second stack replacement cost.

data.source_sentence: 여기에, 스택 교체 주기에 따라 5년 주기 변경 조건에서는 매 5년마다 반영하였고, 10년 주기 변경 조건에서는 10년 차에 이를 반영하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, according to the stack replacement cycle, it was reflected every 5 years under the condition of changing the five-year cycle, and it was reflected in the 10th year under the condition of the change of the 10-year cycle.
data.target_sentence: Here, according to the stack replacement cycle, it was reflected every 5 years under the 5-year cycle change condition, and reflected in the 10th year under the 10-year cycle change condition.

data.source_sentence: 사용 기간에 따른 스택 성능 감소는 본 연구에서는 고려하지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: The decrease in stack performance according to the period of use was not considered in this study.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the stack performance degradation according to the period of use was not considered.

data.source_sentence: 본 사례 연구에서 발생하는 연료비는 크게 전기 요금과 수소 연료 요금으로 구분된다.
data.mt_sentence: Fuel costs generated in this case study are largely divided into electricity bills and hydrogen fuel costs.
data.target_sentence: The fuel cost generated in this case study is largely divided into electricity cost and hydrogen fuel cost.

data.source_sentence: 전기 요금은 한전으로부터 수전되는 전기로써 데이터 센터의 전기 부하에 사용된 전기와 전기 냉동기, 냉각탑의 구동에 사용되는 전기 사용료를 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Electricity charges are electricity received from KEPCO, and it means electricity used for electrical loads in data centers and electricity used to drive electric refrigerators and cooling towers.
data.target_sentence: Electricity rates refer to electricity supplied by KEPCO, which is used as an electrical load in the data center, and electricity used to drive refrigerators and cooling towers.

data.source_sentence: 전기 요금은 다시 기본 요금과 전력량 요금으로 구분되며 요금 단가는 한국 전력의 기본 공급 약관에 따라 ‘일반용 고압A 선택II 기준을 적용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Electricity rates are again divided into basic rates and electricity rates, and the 'General Purpose (B) High Voltage A Selection II standard was applied for the unit price according to Korea Electric Power's basic supply terms and conditions.
data.target_sentence: Electricity rates are further divided into basic rates and energy rates, and the unit price is based on the standard of 'General High Voltage Class A Class II' according to the Korea Electric Power Basic Supply Agreement.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 2030년 예상 전기 요금은 삼중 열병합 시스템이 도입되어 운영되는 사업기간(2030년~2049년)을 고려하여 가정된 전기 요금을 의미하며, 기본 요금은 현재와 동일(8,320원/kW)하고 전력량 요금은 1.2배를 적용하여 2030년 예상 전기 요금을 추정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the estimated electricity rate for 2030 refers to the electricity rate assumed in consideration of the business period (2030-2049) in which the triple cogeneration system is introduced and operated, and the basic rate is the same (8,320 won/kW) and Electricity rates were estimated by applying 1.2 times the estimated electricity rates in 2030.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the expected electricity price in 2030 means the electricity price assumed considering the business period (2030-2049) when the triple cogeneration system is introduced and operated. The basic rate is the same as the present (8,320 won/kW), and the expected electricity rate for 2030 is estimated by applying 1.2 times the electricity rate.

data.source_sentence: 사업 기간(2030년~2049년) 동안 전기 요금 인상은 없는 것으로 가정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was assumed that there was no increase in electricity rates during the business period (2030-2049).
data.target_sentence: It is assumed that there is no electricity rate increase during the project period (2030-2049).

data.source_sentence: 해당 시간별로 전력량 요금이 달라지므로 2.2절에서 설명하였듯이 1년 8760시간별 전기 및 냉방 부하를 고려하는 요금을 적용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As the electricity rate varies by hour, as described in Section 2.2, the rate considering the electricity and cooling load for each 8760 hours per year was applied.
data.target_sentence: Since the energy rate varies by hour, the rate considering the power and cooling load per 8760 hours per year was applied as shown in Section 2.2.

data.source_sentence: 수소 연료 요금은 DOE에서 제시한 연료 요금을 적용하였으며 사업 기간(2030년~2049년) 동안 연료 요금 인하는 없는 것으로 가정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The hydrogen fuel charge was applied to the fuel charge proposed by the DOE, and it was assumed that there was no reduction in fuel charge during the business period (2030-2049).
data.target_sentence: For the hydrogen fuel rate, the fuel rate proposed by the DOE was applied, and it was assumed that there was no fuel rate reduction during the project period (2030-2049).

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 고려한 사례(CASE)의 조건은 5가지이며 Table 3과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: There are 5 conditions for the case (CASE) considered in this study, as shown in Table 3.
data.target_sentence: There are five conditions for the case (CASE) considered in this study as shown in Table 3.

data.source_sentence: 여기에, 성능과 비용에 따라 각 CASE에 동일한 기준으로 적용되어야 하는 공통 조건과, CASE별로 달리 적용되어야 하는 변동 조건을 설정하였고, Table 6과 Table 7에 이를 요약하여 정리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, common conditions that should be applied to each CASE on the same basis according to performance and cost and variable conditions that should be applied differently for each CASE are set, and these are summarized in Tables 6 and 7.
data.target_sentence: Here, according to the performance and cost, the common conditions that should be applied equally to each CASE and the variable conditions that should be applied differently for each CASE are set and summarized in Tables 6 and 7.

data.source_sentence: 본 사례 조사 연구에서 수행한 삼중 열병합 시스템의 성능 개선에 대한 경제성 분석 결과를 Table 8에 종합하여 나타내었고 사례(CASE)별 결과에 대하여 분석하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The economic analysis results of the performance improvement of the triple cogeneration system conducted in this case study are summarized in Table 8, and the results for each case (CASE) are analyzed.
data.target_sentence: Table 8 summarizes the results of economic analysis on the performance improvement of the Trigeneration system performed in this case study, and the results for each case (CASE) were analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 우선, CASE별 조건을 보면, CASE 1, 2, 4는 삼중 열병합 시스템에서 하나의 조건만 개선하는 경우이다.
data.mt_sentence: First, looking at the conditions for each CASE, CASEs 1, 2, and 4 are cases in which only one condition is improved in the triple heat and power system.
data.target_sentence: First, looking at the conditions for each CASE, CASEs 1, 2, and 4 are cases in which only one condition is improved in the Trigeneration system.

data.source_sentence: 성능 조건은 고온 PEMFC 시스템 효율 90%(발전효율 35%, 열효율 55%), 스택 교체 주기 5년, 흡수식 냉동기의 냉방 COP 0.8을 고려하였고 경제성 분석을 수행하기 위한 다른 부하, 성능 및 비용 조건은 Table 6의 공통 조건과 동일하게 적용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Performance conditions considered 90% of high temperature PEMFC system efficiency (35% power generation efficiency, 55% thermal efficiency), 5 years stack replacement cycle, COP 0.8 cooling of absorption refrigerator, and other load, performance, and cost conditions for economic analysis were applied as in Table 6.
data.target_sentence: The performance conditions considered high-temperature PEMFC system efficiency of 90% (generation efficiency of 35%, thermal efficiency of 55%), stack replacement cycle of 5 years, and cooling COP of the absorption chiller of 0.8. In addition, other load, performance, and cost conditions for performing economic analysis were applied identically to the common conditions in Table 6.

data.source_sentence: 경제성 분석 결과를 살펴보면, 내부 초기 투자비를 포함한 운영 기간 누적 NPV는 162 백만 원으로 “0”보다 크고 내부 수익률(IRR) 역시 사회적 할인율(4.5%)보다 높으므로 재무적 타당성이 있음을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Looking at the results of the economic analysis, it was confirmed that the cumulative NPV of the operation period including the internal initial investment cost was 162 million won, which was greater than “0”, and the internal rate of return (IRR) was also higher than the social discount rate (4.5%), so it was confirmed that there was financial feasibility.
data.target_sentence: Looking at the results of the economic analysis, it was confirmed that the cumulative NPV of the operating period including the internal initial investment cost was 162 million won, which was greater than 0, and the internal rate of return (IRR) was higher than the social discount rate (4.5%), so there was financial feasibility.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 2는 사업 연차별 할인율이 고려된 누적 현금 흐름을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 2 shows the accumulated cash flow considering the annual discount rate of the business.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2 shows the accumulated cash flow considering the annual discount rate of a business entity.

data.source_sentence: Table 9는 Reference 조건에서 고정비(초기 투자비), 변동비(유지 보수비, 연료비, 전기 요금)를 포함하여 20년 운영 기간 동안의 연차별 순현금 흐름과 누적 현금 흐름을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 9 shows the annual net cash flow and accumulated cash flow over the 20-year operating period, including fixed costs (initial investment cost) and variable costs (maintenance cost, fuel cost, electricity cost) under the reference condition.
data.target_sentence: <Table 9> shows the annual net cash flow and accumulated cash flow during the 20-year operating period including fixed costs (initial investment cost) and variable costs (maintenance cost, fuel cost, electricity cost) under the standard conditions.

data.source_sentence: 여기서, 순현금 흐름은 초기 투자비, 유지 보수비, 수소 연료비, 전기 요금 절감액의 합을 의미하며 해당 연차의 순현금 흐름이 “+” 또는 “-”값을 가질 수 있음을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, the net cash flow means the sum of the initial investment cost, maintenance cost, hydrogen fuel cost, and electricity cost savings, and it can be seen that the net cash flow for the corresponding year can have a “+” or “-” value.
data.target_sentence: Here, the net cash flow means the sum of the initial investment cost, maintenance cost, hydrogen fuel cost, and electricity cost savings, and it can be seen that the net cash flow for the year can be “+” or “-”. " value.

data.source_sentence: 55대의 25 kW급 삼중 열병합 발전시스템의 도입에 따라 운영에 필요한 수소 연료비와 유지 보수비가 발생하는 반면에, 전기 요금은 절감된다.
data.mt_sentence: With the introduction of 55 25 kW-class triple cogeneration systems, hydrogen fuel costs and maintenance costs required for operation are incurred, while electricity bills are reduced.
data.target_sentence: By introducing 55 25kW-Trigenafation systems, hydrogen fuel costs and maintenance costs required for operation are incurred, and electricity costs are reduced.

data.source_sentence: 1년 차의 결과를 사례로 설명하면 순현금 흐름(450 백만 원)은 유지 보수비(-84 백만 원), 수소 연료비(-1,365 백만 원), 전기 요금 절감액(1,898 백만 원)을 합한 금액을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Using the results of the first year as an example, net cash flow (KRW 450 million) means the sum of maintenance costs (KRW -84 million), hydrogen fuel costs (KRW -1,365 million), and savings in electricity bills (KRW 1,898 million) do.
data.target_sentence: Using the results of year 1 as an example, net cash flow (KRW 450 million) means the sum of maintenance costs (KRW -84 million), hydrogen fuel costs (KRW -1,365 million), and electricity cost savings (KRW 1,898 million).

data.source_sentence: 이 중에서 유지 보수비(-84 백만 원)는 삼중 열병합 시스템 1대 기준의 정기 유지보수비(1.430 백만 원)와 냉방 출력 31.43 kWth에 대한 흡수식 냉동기의 부품 교체 비용(0.089 백만 원)을 합한 1대당 1.519 백만원에 삼중 열병합 시스템 55대를 곱한 결과와 같음을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Of these, the maintenance cost (-84 million won) is equal to 1.519 million won per unit multiplied by 55 triple cogeneration systems, including regular maintenance costs (1.430 million won) for one triple cogeneration system and parts replacement costs for an absorption freezer (0.089 million won) for 31.43 kWth.
data.target_sentence: Of this, the maintenance cost (KRW -84 million) is KRW 1.519 million per unit, which is the sum of the regular maintenance cost (KRW 1.430 million) per triplex cogeneration system and the cost of replacing parts of the absorption chiller for a cooling output of 31.43 kWth (KRW 0.089 million). It can be seen that is equal to the result multiplied by 55 triplex cogeneration systems.

data.source_sentence: 20년 차의 할인율을 고려한 누적 현금 흐름은 162백만 원으로 Table 8의 해당 값과 같음을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The accumulated cash flow considering the discount rate for the 20th year is 162 million won, which is the same as the corresponding value in Table 8.
data.target_sentence: The accumulated cash flow, taking the 20-year discount rate into account, is 162 million won, which is the same as the corresponding amount in Table 8.

data.source_sentence: 식(10)으로부터 0시의 기존 전기 냉동기의 냉방 출력(1061 kWth)과 기존 전기 냉동기 COP(4.4)를 고려하면 0시에 기존 전기 냉동기에서 소비되는 전력은 241 kWe로 계산된다.
data.mt_sentence: From Equation (10), considering the cooling output (1061 kWth) of the existing electric refrigerator at 0 o'clock and the COP (4.4) of the existing electric refrigerator at 0 o'clock, the power consumed by the existing electric refrigerator at 0 o'clock is calculated as 241 kWe.
data.target_sentence: From Equation (10), considering the cooling output (1061 kWth) of the existing electric refrigerator at 00:00 and the COP (4.4) of the existing electric refrigerator at 00:00, the power consumed by the existing electric refrigerator at 00:00 is calculated as 241 kWe.

data.source_sentence: 기본 요금과 전력량 요금으로 구성되는 한전 전기 요금 체계에 따라서 0시에서 1시까지의 1시간 동안 사용한 전력량(564 kWh)에 대한 전력량 요금은 육지, 겨울철 경부하 시간대 2030년 예상 전기 요금의 전력량 요금 단가(69.7원/kWh)를 적용하면 39,311원임을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: According to KEPCO's electricity bill system, which consists of basic and electricity bill, the electricity bill for an hour (564 kWh) from 0 to 1 o'clock is 39,311 won if the unit price of electricity expected in 2030 is applied during the land and winter light load periods.
data.target_sentence: It is based on the amount of electricity used (564 kWh) for one hour from 00:00 to 01:00 according to the KEPCO electricity rate system, which consists of a basic rate and an electricity rate. It can be seen that the electricity rate is KRW 39,311 by applying the unit price (KRW 69.7/kWh) of the expected electricity rate in 2030 during the light load time of land and winter.

data.source_sentence: 나머지 운전 시간에 대해서도 마찬가지 방법을 이용하여 1년간 총 전력량요금(590 백만 원)을 산정할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: For the remaining operating hours, the total electricity charge (KRW 590 million) for one year may be calculated using the same method.
data.target_sentence: For the remaining operating hours, the total electricity bill for one year (590 million won) can be calculated in the same way.

data.source_sentence: 기본 요금은 최근 1년 중 최대 부하를 요금 적용 전력으로 적용하여 월 기본 요금 단가를 곱하여 매월 과금하는 방식이다.
data.mt_sentence: The basic rate is a method of applying the maximum load of the past year as the rate applied power and multiplying the basic monthly rate unit price to be charged monthly.
data.target_sentence: The basic charge is a method in which the maximum load of the previous year is applied as the applied electricity and multiplied by the monthly basic charge unit price charged monthly.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 1년 중 최대 부하(1,260.1 kW)를 요금 적용 전력으로 적용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the maximum load (1,260.1 kW) of the year was applied as the charge applied power.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the maximum load (1,260.1 kW) of the year was applied as the charging applied power.

data.source_sentence: 기본 요금 단가(8,320원/kW･월)에 12개월을 고려하는 것으로 가정하였고 그 결과 기본 요금은 126 백만 원으로 산정되었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was assumed that 12 months were taken into account in the basic rate unit price (8,320 won/kW･month), and as a result, the basic rate was calculated to be 126 million won.
data.target_sentence: Basic rate unit price (8,320 won/kW · As a result of assuming that 12 months are taken into account, the basic rate was calculated as 126 million won.

data.source_sentence: 보면, Reference 조건에서의 결과와 동일하게 정격 발전 출력 25 kW급 삼중 열병합 시스템 총 55대가 선정되었음을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that a total of 55 Trigeneration systems with a rated power output of 25 kW were selected as the same as the result under the reference condition.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that a total of 55 Trigeneration systems with a rated output of 25kW were selected with the same result under the reference condition.

data.source_sentence: 이는 현재 기준 즉, Reference 조건에서 새로운 시스템 즉, CASE 1을 도입할 경우 발생하는 경제적 편익을 새로운 시스템의 개발에 요구되는 R&D 비용을 반영하여 경제적 효과 즉, 내부수익률(IRR)을 산출할 수 있게 한다.
data.mt_sentence: This makes it possible to calculate the economic effect, that is, the internal rate of return (IRR), by reflecting the R&D cost required for the development of the new system for the economic benefits that arise when introducing a new system, that is, CASE 1, under the current standard, that is, the reference condition. .
data.target_sentence: Through this, the R&D cost required for the development of the new system, CASE 1, in the current standard, which is the reference condition, for the economic benefits arising from the introduction of the new system.

data.source_sentence: 이는 데이터 센터에 적용되는 삼중 열병합 시스템의 총 설치 용량이 1,375 kW로 동일하고 담당한 전기 부하 역시 같다는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: This means that the total installed capacity of the triple cogeneration system applied to the data center is the same at 1,375 kW, and the electrical load in charge is also the same.
data.target_sentence: In other words, the total installed capacity of the Trigeneration system applied to the data center is the same at 1,375kW, and the electrical load it is responsible for is also the same.

data.source_sentence: 초기 투자비도 3,024 백만 원으로 같으므로 누적 현금 흐름, 내부수익률(IRR) 등의 경제성 분석에서 초기 투자비용이 동일하게 반영되었다는 것을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the initial investment cost is also the same at KRW 3,024 million, it can be seen that the initial investment cost is reflected equally in the economic analysis of accumulated cash flow and internal rate of return (IRR).
data.target_sentence: Since the initial investment cost is also the same at 3,024 billion won, it can be seen that the initial investment cost is reflected equally in the economic analysis of the cumulative cash flow and the internal rate of return (IRR).

data.source_sentence: 지금까지 설명한 20년 운영 기간 동안의 누적 NPV 값에는 삼중 열병합 시스템 도입에 따른 초기 투자비가 반영되어 있는데, 이 “초기 투자비”는 기자재 비용 즉, 삼중 열병합 시스템 제품 구매 비용과 시스템 설치 공사 비용의 합을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: The accumulated NPV values over the 20-year operating period so far reflect the initial investment cost of introducing a triple cogeneration system, which means the sum of the equipment cost, namely the purchase cost of a triple cogeneration system product and the system installation cost.
data.target_sentence: The accumulated NPV value during the 20-year operating period described so far reflects the initial investment cost for the introduction of the 3rd generation system, and means the equipment cost, that is, the sum of the purchase cost of the 3rd generation system product and the system installation cost.

data.source_sentence: 이는 현재의 조건보다 우수한 성능 조건을 갖는 시스템으로 교체하는 경우에 시스템 교체 비용 즉 구매 비용과 설치 비용만 반영하여 시스템 운영 기간 20년 동안의 누적 현금 흐름을 산출한 사례에 해당한다.
data.mt_sentence: This corresponds to the case of calculating the accumulated cash flow for 20 years of system operation by reflecting only the system replacement cost, that is, the purchase cost and installation cost, when replacing the system with a system with better performance than the current condition.
data.target_sentence: This is the case when calculating the cumulative cash flow over 20 years of system operation by reflecting only the cost of replacing the system, i.e., the cost of purchase and installation, when replacing the system with a system that performs better than it is today.

data.source_sentence: 고려 가능한 CASE가 복수일 경우, 상호 간에 비교 분석을 통하여 비교 우위의 CASE를 채택하는 데 활용할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: If there are multiple CASEs that can be considered, it can be used to adopt a comparative advantage CASE through comparative analysis between each other.
data.target_sentence: If there are multiple CASEs that can be considered, they can be used to adopt a comparative advantage CASE through comparative analysis with each other.

data.source_sentence: 한편 Table 8에 제시된 경제성 분석 결과를 R&D 관점에서 살펴보면, 기술 개발을 통하여 성능이 개선된 시스템을 도입하는 경우에는 R&D 비용이 투자비에 반영되어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Meanwhile, looking at the economic analysis results presented in Table 8 from the perspective of R&D, R&D costs should be reflected in investment costs when introducing a system with improved performance through technology development.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, from the R&D perspective, looking at the results of the economic analysis in <Table 8>, when introducing a system with improved performance through technology development, the R&D cost should be reflected in the investment cost.

data.source_sentence: 허용 가능한 R&D 비용의 최대값은 현재의 조건보다 경제성이 훼손되지 않아야 하므로 Reference 조건의 내부수익률(IRR) 보다 최소한으로 큰 수준까지가 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The maximum value of the allowable R&D cost is at least greater than the internal rate of return (IRR) of the reference condition, since the economic feasibility should not be impaired compared to the current condition.
data.target_sentence: The maximum allowable R&D cost must be greater than or equal to the internal rate of return (IRR) of the baseline condition, as the economics must not be compromised relative to the current condition.

data.source_sentence: 식(12)에 의해 계산되는 R&D 투자효 과는 허용 R&D 비용을 10억 원 투자하는 경우, 증가되는 내부수익률의 비율을 의미하며 이는 다양한 허용 R&D 비용과 내부수익률의 증가분을 하나의 변수로 고려하여 R&D 투자의 우선 순위를 비교하는 데 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: The R&D investment effect calculated by Equation (12) refers to the ratio of internal returns increased when the allowable R&D cost is invested by 1 billion won, which is used to compare the priority of R&D investments by considering various allowable R&D costs and increases in internal returns as one variable.
data.target_sentence: The R&D investment effect calculated by Equation 12 means the rate at which the internal revenue increases when the allowable R&D cost is invested by 1 billion won, which compares the priorities of R&D investment by considering various allowable R&D costs and the increase in the internal rate used to do It returns as a single variable.

data.source_sentence: 즉, R&D 비용을 반영하지 않은 경제성 분석 결과에서는 CASE 4의 내부 수익률이 가장 낮지만, 성능 개선에 필요한 R&D 투자 비용을 고려한 투자 효과 관점에서는 CASE 4가 가장 우수함을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In other words, CASE 4 has the lowest internal rate of return in economic analysis that does not reflect R&D costs, but CASE 4 is the best in terms of investment effect considering R&D investment costs required for performance improvement improvement.
data.target_sentence: In other words, CASE 4 shows the lowest internal rate of return in the economic analysis that does not reflect R&D costs, but CASE 4 is the best in terms of investment effect considering the R&D investment cost required to improve performance.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 R&D 투자에서 발생하는 직접적인 성능(효율, 내구성) 개선 효과를 경제적 가치로 산출하고 그 값을 통하여 합리적인 R&D 투자 비용 규모를 파악하고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the direct performance (efficiency, durability) improvement effect arising from R&D investment was calculated as an economic value, and the reasonable R&D investment cost was determined through the value.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the effect of direct performance (efficiency, durability) improvement due to R&D investment was calculated as economic value, and through this, reasonable R&D investment cost was determined.

data.source_sentence: 연구 대상은 고온 PEMFC가 탑재된 삼중 열병합 시스템을 가정하였고, 직접적인 경제 효과는 데이터 센터에 적용되었을 때 발생하는 편익을 산출하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The study subject assumed a triple heat and power system equipped with high-temperature PEMFC, and the direct economic effect calculated the benefit generated when applied to the data center.
data.target_sentence: The study subjects assumed a tri gedaration system equipped with high-temperature PEMFC, and the direct economic effect was calculated using the data center benefit.

data.source_sentence: 비교 분석을 위하여, R&D 투자 이전의 현재 조건에서의 분석을 먼저 수행하여 기준(Reference)으로 삼았고, R&D 투자에 따른 사례 분석은 성능 개선 조건을 달리한 5개의 사례(CASE)를 가정하여 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For comparative analysis, the analysis under the current conditions before R&D investment was first performed as a reference, and the case analysis according to R&D investment was analyzed assuming five cases (CASE) with different performance improvement conditions.
data.target_sentence: For comparative analysis, first, the analysis of the status before R&D investment was used as a reference material, and case analysis according to R&D investment was analyzed assuming five cases (CASEs) with different performance improvement conditions.

data.source_sentence: 연구 전과 후의 에너지 밸런스를 분석하여 연구 설계와 결과값이 일치한다는 것을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: By analyzing the energy balance before and after the study, it was confirmed that the study design and the results were consistent.
data.target_sentence: By analyzing the energy balance before and after the study, it was confirmed that the study design and the results were consistent.

data.source_sentence: R&D 투자로 발생하는 직접적인 경제성 효과를 산출하는 방법을 제시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A method of calculating the direct economic effect generated by R&D investment was presented.
data.target_sentence: A method for estimating the direct economic effect of R&D investment is presented.

data.source_sentence: 즉, R&D 투자에 따른 비용과 편익의 경로를 추적하고 제약 조건과 에너지 밸런스를 만족하는 합리적인 방법론을 제시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In other words, a reasonable methodology that tracks the path of costs and benefits of R&D investment and satisfies constraints and energy balance is presented.
data.target_sentence: In other words, it presents a rational methodology that traces the path of costs and benefits of R&D investments and satisfies constraints and energy balances.

data.source_sentence: 그에 따른 사례 연구로 연료 전지 시스템의 R&D 효과를 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a case study, the R&D effect of the fuel cell system was analyzed.
data.target_sentence: As a case study, the R&D effect of the fuel cell system was analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 즉, R&D 투자의 순(+) 가치는 최소한 R&D 투자 이전인 현재의 조건(Reference) 이상일 경우 발생하므로 현재의 조건을 기준으로 R&D 투자에 따른 직접적인 효과를 편익으로 산출하여 허용 가능한 투자 규모를 제시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In other words, since the net (+) value of R&D investment occurs at least above the current condition (Reference), the direct effect of R&D investment was calculated as a benefit based on the current conditions and the acceptable amount of investment was presented.
data.target_sentence: In other words, since the net (+) value of R&D investment is at least higher than the current situation (reference), the direct effect of R&D investment is calculated as the benefit according to the current situation, and the allowed investment amount is presented.

data.source_sentence: 5가지 사례 연구를 수행하여, R&D 투자 효과 분석에서 R&D 개발 비용의 포함 전과 후의 투자 우선 순위가 달라짐을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: By conducting five case studies, it was confirmed that the priority of investment before and after including R&D development costs changed in the R&D investment effect analysis.
data.target_sentence: Through five case studies, it was confirmed that the priorities of investment before and after including R&D development costs in the analysis of the effect of R&D investment change.

data.source_sentence: 이는 복수의 R&D 투자 후보군의 선택적 투자 결정에 있어, 허용 가능한 R&D 규모를 정확히 산출하고 이를 비용에 반영하는 것이 중요하다는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: This means that in making a selective investment decision for multiple R&D investment candidates, it is important to accurately calculate the allowable R&D size and reflect it in the cost.
data.target_sentence: In other words, it is important to accurately calculate the allowable amount of R&D and reflect it in the cost when making selective investment decisions for multiple R&D investment targets.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 도출된 결과는 R&D 기획 단계에서 성능 개선을 목적으로 하는 신규 R&D 투자의 실행을 결정함에 있어 합리적인 의사 결정을 위한 가이드라인을 제시할 수 있다는 점에서 정책적인 시사점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The results derived from this study have policy implications in that they can provide guidelines for rational decision-making in determining the execution of new R&D investments aimed at improving performance in the R&D planning stage.
data.target_sentence: The results derived from this study have policy implications in that they can provide guidelines for rational decision-making in determining whether to execute new R&D investments for performance improvement in the R&D planning stage.

data.source_sentence: 투입 예산 대비 효과가 기대되는 과제를 선정하는 것이 중요하게 되며, 그 첫 단계는 과제 기획에서 출발한다.
data.mt_sentence: It becomes important to select tasks that are expected to be effective compared to the input budget, and the first step starts with task planning.
data.target_sentence: It becomes important to select tasks that are expected to be effective against the budget put in, and the first step begins with task planning.

data.source_sentence: 상정된 후보군 중에서 비교 우위의 과제를 선정하는 기획 절차에 있어서 본 연구의 결과는 R&D 투자 효과에 대한 기준으로 활용될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the planning procedure for selecting a task with a comparative advantage from the proposed candidate group, the results of this study can be used as a criterion for the effect of R&D investment.
data.target_sentence: The results of this study can be used as a criterion for the effectiveness of R&D investment in the planning process for selecting a project with a comparative advantage from among the proposed candidates.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 성능 개선을 주제로 한 사례 연구이므로 이 외 다양한 주제에 대한 연구는 필요할 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Since this study is a case study with the subject of performance improvement, research on various other subjects will be necessary.
data.target_sentence: Since this study is a case study with the subject of performance improvement, research on various other subjects will be necessary.

data.source_sentence: R&D 과제 단위에서의 적정 예산 규모 추정은 본 연구 결과를 토대로 후속 연구가 필요할 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the results of this study, it is judged that a follow-up study is needed to estimate the appropriate budget size in the R&D project unit.
data.target_sentence: Based on the results of this study, it is judged that a follow-up study is necessary to estimate the appropriate budget size of the R&D business unit.

data.source_sentence: 국가 연구 개발 투자 결정 과정에서는 경제성 이외에도 정책성, 사회성 등에 관한 가치가 평가 또는 판단 요소에 포함될 수 있으므로 이에 대한 후속 연구도 필요할 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: In the process of determining national R&D investment, in addition to economic feasibility, values related to policy and sociality may be included in evaluation or judgment factors, so follow-up studies will be required.
data.target_sentence: In the process of determining national R&D investment, in addition to economic feasibility, values related to policy and social performance may be included in evaluation or judgment factors, so follow-up studies will be required.

data.source_sentence: 한국은 2021년 8월 탄소중립기본법이 제정되면서 2030년까지 2018년 배출량 대비 최소 35%를 감축할 것을 법제화했다.
data.mt_sentence: With the enactment of the Framework Act on Carbon Neutrality in August 2021, Korea has legislated to reduce at least 35% of its 2018 emissions by 2030.
data.target_sentence: With the enactment of the Carbon Neutrality Framework Act in August 2021, Korea has decided to reduce emissions by at least 35% of 2018 emissions by 2030.

data.source_sentence: 이 상향된 NDC는 2030년까지 신재생에너지를 발전량 기준 30.2%까지 보급할 것을 목표로 하는데, 이는 2020년 12월 발표된 제9차 전력 수급 기본 계획에서 제시한 신재생에너지 보급 목표의 기존의 20.6%에서 약 1년 만에 대폭 상향되는 목표치이다.
data.mt_sentence: This raised NDC aims to supply renewable energy by 30.2% based on power generation by 2030, a sharp increase in about a year from the existing 20.6% of the existing renewable energy supply target presented in the 9th Basic Power Supply Plan announced in December 2020.
data.target_sentence: This upgraded NDC aims to supply up to 30.2% of new and renewable energy based on generation by 2030. This is a significant increase in about a year from the previous 20.6% of the new and renewable energy supply target presented in the 9th Basic Plan for Electricity Supply and Demand announced in December 2020.

data.source_sentence: 이 조치는 빠르게 신재생에너지 보급량을 끌어올려서 탄소 중립에 앞장서고 있는 영국, 독일 등의 국가와 속도를 맞추기 위함으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: The move is believed to be aimed at speeding up the supply of new and renewable energy to the UK and Germany, which are leading the way in carbon neutrality.
data.target_sentence: The move appears to be aimed at accelerating the supply of renewable energy to the UK and Germany, which are leading carbon neutrality.

data.source_sentence: 기존 20.6%의 신재생에너지 보급 목표에서는 변동성 재생 에너지인 태양광과 풍력이 각각 설비 용량 기준으로 약 34.0 GW와 17.7 GW를 보급할 계획이었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the existing goal of supplying 20.6% of new and renewable energy, solar and wind power, which are volatile renewable energy, were planned to supply about 34.0 GW and 17.7 GW based on facility capacity, respectively.
data.target_sentence: From the existing renewable energy penetration rate of 20.6%, solar power and wind power, which are highly volatile new and renewable energy, were planned to supply 34.0GW and 17.7GW, respectively, based on installed capacity.

data.source_sentence: 상향된 보급 목표에서는 이 수치가 단순 비례적으로 증가해도 약 49.8 GW와 25.9 GW로 변동성 재생에너지 규모가 약 75.7 GW에 이르게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the raised supply target, even if this figure increases simply proportionally, it will reach about 49.8 GW and 25.9 GW, and the amount of volatile renewable energy will reach about 75.7 GW.
data.target_sentence: At the increased supply target, even if these figures increase simply proportionally, they would reach around 49.8 GW and 25.9 GW, while the amount of volatile renewable energy would reach around 75.7 GW.

data.source_sentence: 제주도는 2020년 기준 변동성 재생에너지 발전 비중이 약 16.2%를 달성했고 전체 변동성 재생에너지 발전량 중 출력 제한 비율은 약 1.8%로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: As of 2020, the proportion of volatile renewable energy generation in Jeju Island achieved about 16.2%, and the output limit ratio of the total volatile renewable energy generation was about 1.8%.
data.target_sentence: As of 2020, the proportion of volatile renewable energy generation in Jeju Island was about 16.2%, and the output limit ratio of the total volatile renewable energy generation was about 1.8%.

data.source_sentence: 2034년 제주에서 출력 제한이 39.3%에 이른다는 것은 태양광과 풍력의 경제성이 약 40%가량 감소하는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: If the output limit reaches 39.3% in Jeju in 2034, it means that the economic efficiency of solar and wind power will decrease by about 40%.
data.target_sentence: If the production limit of Jeju Island reaches 39.3% in 2034, it means that the economic feasibility of solar and wind power will decrease by about 40%.

data.source_sentence: 재생에너지가 미래 전력 시스템의 주요 전원인 것을 고려할 때 이는 전력 공급에 있어서 상당한 비효율이 발생함을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Considering that renewable energy is the main source of power systems of the future, this means significant inefficiencies in power supply.
data.target_sentence: Considering that renewable energy is a major source of future power systems, this represents significant inefficiencies in power supply.

data.source_sentence: 정부는 2021년 ‘제1차 수소 경제 이행 기본 계획’을 발표하고 수소차와 연료 전지를 중심으로 한 수소 산업 생태계 구축을 천명하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The government announced the 'First Basic Plan for the Implementation of the Hydrogen Economy' in 2021 and declared the establishment of a hydrogen industry ecosystem centered on hydrogen cars and fuel cells.
data.target_sentence: In 2021, the government announced the 'first basic plan for hydrogen economy implementation' and declared the establishment of a hydrogen industry ecosystem centered on hydrogen cars and fuel cells.

data.source_sentence: 이에 따라 기본 계획에서 2030년까지그린수소 25만 톤급 생산 기반, 수소 승용차 누적 생산량을 85만 대를 목표로 제시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Accordingly, in the basic plan, 250,000 tons of green hydrogen production base and cumulative production of hydrogen passenger cars by 2030 were proposed as a target of 850,000 units.
data.target_sentence: Accordingly, the basic plan proposed 250,000 tons of green hydrogen production bases and a cumulative production of 850,000 hydrogen cars by 2030.

data.source_sentence: 이는 수소 기반 P2G를 수용할 수 있는 수소 생태계가 머지않은 시기에 구축되는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: This means that a hydrogen ecosystem that can accommodate hydrogen-based P2G will be built in the near future.
data.target_sentence: This means that a hydrogen ecosystem that can accommodate hydrogen-based P2G will be built.

data.source_sentence: 이와 함께 수소 저장 탱크는 ESS보다 대용량화하기가 경제적이고 장주기의 에너지 저장에도 용이하기 때문에 향후 재생에너지 기반 전력 공급 체계에서 수소 기반 P2G는 중요한 요소로 자리잡을 것으로 전망된다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, hydrogen-based P2G is expected to become an important element in the future renewable energy-based power supply system because hydrogen storage tanks are more economical to increase in capacity than ESS and easier to store energy for a long period of time.
data.target_sentence: In addition, hydrogen-based P2G is expected to become an important factor in future renewable energy-based power supply systems because hydrogen storage tanks are more economical and easier to store energy for a long time than ESS.

data.source_sentence: 수소 생산 방식은 LNG에서 수소를 추출하고 탄소를 발생시키는 그레이 수소, LNG에서 수소를 추출하지만 탄소를 포집하는 블루 수소, 수전해 기반 친환경적으로 수소를 생산하는 그린 수소로 분류된다.
data.mt_sentence: Hydrogen production methods are classified into gray hydrogen that extracts hydrogen from LNG and generates carbon, blue hydrogen that extracts hydrogen from LNG but captures carbon, and green hydrogen that produces hydrogen in an environmentally friendly manner based on water electrolysis.
data.target_sentence: The hydrogen production method is divided into gray hydrogen that generates carbon by extracting hydrogen from LNG, blue hydrogen that extracts hydrogen from LNG but captures carbon, and green hydrogen that produces hydrogen in an environmentally friendly manner based on water electrolysis.

data.source_sentence: 그린 수소는 에너지 생산과 사용에 있어서 탄소가 전혀 발생되지 않아 저탄소 에너지 사회로 가는 궁극적인 지향점이지만 현재 전력 생산 비용과 수전해 효율을 감안할 경우 경제성 달성이 쉽지 않다.
data.mt_sentence: Green hydrogen is the ultimate goal of a low-carbon energy society because it does not generate carbon at all in energy production and use, but it is not easy to achieve economic feasibility given the current power production cost and water electrolysis efficiency.
data.target_sentence: Green hydrogen is the ultimate goal toward a low-carbon energy society because it does not generate any carbon in energy production and use, but it is not easy to achieve economic feasibility considering the current electricity production cost and water electrolysis efficiency.

data.source_sentence: 낮시간 집중적인 태양광 발전으로 심각한 duck curve 발생 시 수전해가 전력 수요를 발생시켜 순수요를 평탄화해 준다면 must-run 발전기들을 보다안정적이고 효율적으로 운영할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: If water electrolysis generates power demand and planarizes pure demand in the event of a serious duck curve due to intensive solar power generation during the day, must-run generators can be operated more stably and efficiently.
data.target_sentence: If electricity demand is generated through water electrolysis and the duck curve due to intensive solar power generation during the day is severe, the essential generator can be operated more stably and efficiently by flattening the net demand.

data.source_sentence: 추가적으로 2034년 이후 제주와 같이 출력 제한이 전체 재생에너지의 40% 수준까지 발생하는 전력 시스템에서는 출력 제한 시 한계가격이 0원 혹은 음의 가격이 되어 발전소들의 경제성이 불안정해진다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, in a power system where the power limit is up to 40% of the total renewable energy after 2034, the limit price becomes 0 won or negative price when the power limit is applied, and the economic feasibility of power plants becomes unstable.
data.target_sentence: In addition, in the electric power system where the electric power limit is up to 40% of the total renewable energy after 2034, such as in Jeju, when the electric power limit is applied, the limit price becomes 0 won or a negative price, making the power plant economically unstable.

data.source_sentence: P2G는 출력 제한 관리를 통해서 안정적인 전력 공급에 필요한 전통 발전기들에게 충분한 경제성을 조정해 줄 수 있는 장점도 존재한다.
data.mt_sentence: P2G also has the advantage of being able to adjust the economic feasibility of traditional generators required for stable power supply through power limitation management.
data.target_sentence: P2G also has the advantage of being able to adjust the economic feasibility of existing generators required for stable power supply through power limit management.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 2025년 제주 전력 시스템을 대상으로 수소 기반 섹터 커플링의 출력 제어 경감 효과와 경제성을 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the output control reduction effect and economic feasibility of hydrogen-based sector coupling were analyzed for the Jeju electric power system in 2025.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the output control reduction effect and economic feasibility of the hydrogen-based sector linkage for the Jeju electric power system in 2025 were analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 2장에서는 수소 기반 섹터 커플링을 활용한 선행 연구에 대해서 분석하였고, 3장에서는 연구에서 적용된 모형에 대해서 설명하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In Chapter 2, previous studies using hydrogen-based sector coupling were analyzed, and in Chapter 3, the model applied in the study was explained.
data.target_sentence: In Chapter 2, previous studies using hydrogen-based sector coupling were analyzed, and in Chapter 3, the model applied to the study was explained.

data.source_sentence: AAA에서는 P2G 기반 풍력 출력 제한 문제 해결 방안을 분석하였는데, 수소 활용처를 기존 연료 전지 뿐만 아니라 수소차 등 수소 활용성 확대가 P2G 안착의 주요 요소임을 지적하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA analyzed the solution to the problem of P2G-based wind power output limitation, and pointed out that the expansion of hydrogen utilization, such as hydrogen vehicles as well as existing fuel cells, is a major factor in the establishment of P2G.
data.target_sentence: As a result of analyzing the solution to the problem of P2G-based wind power output limitation, AAA pointed out that the expansion of hydrogen use, such as hydrogen vehicles as well as existing fuel cells, is a major factor in P2G deployment.

data.source_sentence: AAA에서는 신재생 기반 수소 생산과 수소 충전소의 경제성에 대해서 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA analyzed the economic feasibility of renewable-based hydrogen production and hydrogen charging stations.
data.target_sentence: AAA analyzed the economics of renewable-based hydrogen production and hydrogen refueling stations.

data.source_sentence: 분석 결과 본격적 탈탄소 정책 하에서재생에너지 사용량이 13~56% 증가하였고, 총 시스템 비용은 7~16% 절감하는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the analysis, it was found that the use of renewable energy increased by 13~56% under the full-scale decarbonization policy, and the total system cost was reduced by 7~16%.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the analysis, it was found that the use of new and renewable energy increased by 13~56% under the full-scale decarbonization policy, and the total system cost was reduced by 7~16%.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 핀란드 전력 시스템을 바탕으로 재생에너지 수용을 위한 최적 수소저장 장치의 용량을 분석하였는데, 재생에너지 출력 제한을 최소화하는 것보다는 적정 수준의 출력 제한을 하는 수소 저장 장치가 경제적으로 타당함을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA analyzed the optimal capacity of a hydrogen storage device for accommodating renewable energy based on the Finnish power system, and showed that a hydrogen storage device with an appropriate level of output limit rather than minimizing the renewable energy output limit is economically feasible.
data.target_sentence: As a result of analyzing the optimal capacity of a hydrogen storage device for accommodating renewable energy based on the Finnish power system, AAA found that a hydrogen storage device with an appropriate level of output limit is more economically feasible than minimizing the renewable energy output limit.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1에서 묘사된 전력 흐름과 출력 제한에 대한 분석은 PLEXOS라는 전력 시스템 최적화 모형을 이용해서 재생에너지를 포함한 2025년 제주 전력 시스템의 연간 8,760시간의 운영을 비용 최소화에 기반해서 분석한다.
data.mt_sentence: The analysis of power flow and power limitations described in Figure 1 uses a power system optimization model called PLEXOS to analyze the operation of 8,760 hours per year of Jeju power system including renewable energy based on cost minimization.
data.target_sentence: The power flow and power limit analysis described in Figure 1 uses a power system optimization model called PLEXOS to analyze the 8,760 hours per year operation of the Jeju power system, including renewable energy, based on cost minimization.

data.source_sentence: 두 번째는 최적화 결과로 도출된 2025년 제주도의 SMP를 바탕으로 수전해 장치를 적용해서 재생에너지 출력 제한을 경감하고 수소 판매 수익을 올릴 수 있는 비즈니스 모델을 적용하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The second is to apply a business model that can reduce the renewable energy output limit and increase hydrogen sales revenue by applying a water electrolysis device based on Jeju Island's SMP in 2025 derived as a result of the optimization.
data.target_sentence: The second is to apply a business model that can reduce the new and renewable energy production limit and increase hydrogen sales revenue by applying the Jeju SMP-based water electrolysis device in 2025, which is derived from the optimization result.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 제시하는 수소 판매 비즈니스 모형은 재생에너지 출력 제한 시간 혹은 그 외 SMP가 낮은 시간에 전력을 이용해 수소를 생산, 저장하고 이를 개별 수소충전소로 수송해서 수소를 판매하는 구조이다.
data.mt_sentence: The hydrogen sales business model presented in this study is a structure in which hydrogen is produced and stored using electricity during the renewable energy output limit time or other times when the SMP is low, and transported to individual hydrogen charging stations to sell hydrogen.
data.target_sentence: The hydrogen sales business model presented in this study is a structure in which hydrogen is produced and stored using electricity during the renewable energy output time limit or when the SMP is low and transported to individual hydrogen charging stations to sell hydrogen.

data.source_sentence: 2025년 높은 재생에너지가 보급된 제주 전력 시스템에서 출력 제한, SMP 프로파일 등을 추정하기 위해서 전력 시스템 최적화 모형인 PLEXOS를 적용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: PLEXOS, a power system optimization model, was applied to estimate the output limit and SMP profile in the Jeju power system, where high renewable energy was supplied in 2025.
data.target_sentence: PLEXOS, a power system optimization model, was applied to estimate the output limit and SMP profile of the Jeju power system to which high renewable energy is supplied in 2025.

data.source_sentence: PLEXOS는 재생에너지, 에너지 저장 장치, 전기차 등으로 날로 고도화되는 전력 시스템을 선제적으로 모의하고 영향을 살펴보는 데 있어서 검증되고 다양한 기관에서 활용되고 있는 모형이다.
data.mt_sentence: PLEXOS is a model that has been verified and is being used by various organizations to preemptively simulate and examine the impact of a power system that is being upgraded day by day with renewable energy, energy storage devices, and electric vehicles.
data.target_sentence: PLEXOS is a model that has been verified and used by various organizations to preemptively simulate and review the impact of the power system, which is being upgraded day by day with new and renewable energy, energy storage devices, and electric vehicles.

data.source_sentence: 전력 시스템을 분석한 바 있으며, 기타 다양한 국내외 연구가 PLEXOS를 기반으로 이루어졌다.
data.mt_sentence: The power system has been analyzed, and various other domestic and international studies have been conducted based on PLEXOS.
data.target_sentence: Based on PLEXOS, the power system was analyzed and various other domestic and foreign studies were conducted.

data.source_sentence: 이 입력값으로 구성된 전력 시스템을 일반적으로 1시간 단위로 선형 계획법 혹은 혼합 정수 계획법을 기반으로 연간 전력 공급 비용을 최소화하는 발전 계획을 도출하는 것이 PLEXOS의 주요 기능이다.
data.mt_sentence: The main function of PLEXOS is to derive a power generation plan that minimizes the annual power supply cost based on a linear programming method or a mixed-integer programming method for a power system composed of this input value, usually in units of one hour.
data.target_sentence: The main function of PLEXOS is to derive a generation plan that minimizes the annual electricity supply cost based on linear programming or mixed-integer programming for a power system typically configured with this input in hourly increments.

data.source_sentence: 최적화의 결과값을 기반으로 발전기들의 시간별 기동 상태 및 발전량, 지역별 한계 가격, 재생에너지 출력 제한량 등을 도출할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the results of the optimization, it is possible to derive the starting state and amount of generation by time of the generators, the regional limit price, and the renewable energy output limit.
data.target_sentence: Based on the optimization result, it is possible to derive the starting state of the generator by time, the amount of power generation, the regional limit price, and the new and renewable energy output limit.

data.source_sentence: Table 1은 본 연구에 적용된 2025년 제주 전력 시스템의 전통 발전기, 재생에너지, HVDC 송전망에 대한 입력 값을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 1 shows the input values for the traditional generator, renewable energy, and HVDC transmission network of the Jeju Electric Power System in 2025 applied in this study.
data.target_sentence: Table 1 shows the input values of the traditional generator, renewable energy, and HVDC transmission network of Jeju Electric Power System in 2025 applied in this study.

data.source_sentence: 기타 도입에 불확실성이 있고 영향이 미미한 DR과 ESS는 모형에 반영하지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: DR and ESS with insignificant impact and uncertainty about introduction were not reflected in the model.
data.target_sentence: Uncertainties about DR and ESS and their introduction, which had a minimal impact, were not reflected in the model.

data.source_sentence: PLEXOS를 통해 분석된 재생에너지 출력 제한량과 SMP를 기반으로 수소기반 P2G 개념을 적용하여 전력망과 수 소 운송망을 결합하는 비즈니스 모형을 구현하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the renewable energy output limit and SMP analyzed through PLEXOS, a hydrogen-based P2G concept was applied to implement a business model that combines the power grid and the hydrogen transport network.
data.target_sentence: Based on the renewable energy output limit and SMP analyzed through PLEXOS, a hydrogen-based P2G concept was applied to implement a business model that combines a power grid and a hydrogen transport network.

data.source_sentence: Table2는 수전해를 통해 수소 생산, 저장, 운송, 충전소 판매에 이르는 수전해 비즈니스 운영 방법론과 적용된 가정에 대해서 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 2 shows the methodology of operating the water electrolysis business and the applied assumptions ranging from hydrogen production, storage, transportation, and charging station sales through water electrolysis.
data.target_sentence: Table 2 shows the methodology for operating the water electrolysis business and the assumptions applied through water electrolysis in hydrogen production, storage, transportation, and sales of charging stations.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 수전해를 통한 제주 출력 제한 최소화 가능성과 수소 운송 수단의 편익을 유연하게 살펴보기 위해 수소차의 규모를 탄력적으로 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the scale of hydrogen vehicles was flexibly set to flexibly examine the possibility of minimizing Jeju output limitation through water electrolysis and the benefits of hydrogen transportation.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the possibility of minimizing the Jeju production limit through water electrolysis and the advantages of hydrogen transportation were flexibly reviewed by setting the scale of the hydrogen car flexibly.

data.source_sentence: 즉 1 MW의 수전해 장치의 경우 8시간 충전의 경우 144 kg의 수소 저장 장치 투자가 요구된다.
data.mt_sentence: That is, in the case of a 1 MW water electrolyzer, an investment of 144 kg of hydrogen storage is required for 8 hours of charging.
data.target_sentence: That is, in the case of a 1MW water electrolyzer, an investment of 144kg of hydrogen storage is required for 8 hours of charging.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 2025년 제주의 재생에너지 출력 제한량 분석과 수전해의 경제성 분석에 있어서 Table 3과 같이 두 가지 요소를 차등적으로 적용하여 시나리오를 설정했다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, in the analysis of the limited amount of renewable energy output in Jeju in 2025 and the economic analysis of water electrolysis, two factors were differentially applied as shown in Table 3 to set the scenario.
data.target_sentence: In this study, two factors were differentially applied as shown in <Table 3> in the analysis of limited renewable energy production in Jeju Island in 2025 and the economic analysis of water electrolysis to establish a scenario.

data.source_sentence: 첫 번째는 제주도에서 출력 제한 시 적용되는 SMP의 수준이다.
data.mt_sentence: The first is the level of SMP applied when output is limited in Jeju Island.
data.target_sentence: The first is the SMP level applied when production is limited in Jeju Island.

data.source_sentence: 하나는 한계 비용이 제로인 재생에너지가 계통에서 수용되지 못하고 출력 제한 되는 경우 전력 경제 이론에 근거해 SMP가 0원이 되는 경우이고, 다른 하나는 제주는 육지와 송전선로로 연결되어 있기 때문에 육지의 SMP를 적용하는 경우이다.
data.mt_sentence: One is when renewable energy with zero marginal cost is not accepted in the system and its power is limited, SMP becomes 0 won based on the power economy theory, and the other is when SMP on land is applied because Jeju is connected by land and transmission lines.
data.target_sentence: One is when the renewable energy with zero marginal cost is not accepted by the system and the output is limited, and the SMP becomes zero based on the electricity economic theory. The other is the case of applying SMP on land because Jeju is connected to the land by transmission lines.

data.source_sentence: 역송 기능이 강화된 HVDC#3가 제때에 건설될 경우 제주도의 출력 제한이 상당 부분 경감될 수 있지만, 이 HVDC#3 완공이 지체될 경우 높은 규모의 출력 제한이 예상된다.
data.mt_sentence: Jeju Island's power restrictions can be significantly reduced if HVDC#3 with enhanced reverse transmission function is built in time, but high-scale power restrictions are expected if the completion of HVDC#3 is delayed.
data.target_sentence: If HVDC#3 with enhanced reverse power transmission function is built in a timely manner in Jeju Island, the output limit can be greatly reduced, but if the completion of HVDC#3 is delayed, a large-scale output limit is expected.

data.source_sentence: 이 HVDC#3의 유무에 따라 제주의 출력 제한 규모와 수전해 경제성을 차등적으로 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the presence or absence of this HVDC#3, the scale of output limitation of Jeju and the economic efficiency of water electrolysis were analyzed differentially.
data.target_sentence: According to the presence or absence of this HVDC#3, the scale of output limitation of Jeju Island and the economic feasibility of water electrolysis were analyzed differentially.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구의 배경 연도가 2025년으로 설정된 것도 이 HVDC#3의 영향을 함께 살펴보기 위함이다.
data.mt_sentence: The reason why the background year of this study was set to 2025 is to examine the impact of this HVDC#3.
data.target_sentence: The reason why the background year of this study is set to 2025 is to examine the effect of this HVDC#3.

data.source_sentence: 노란색은 육지에서 제주도로 송전되는 전력량, 회색은 화석 연료 기반 발전량, 파란색은 재생에너지 발전량, 주황색은 재생에너지 출력 제한량을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Yellow indicates the amount of electricity transmitted from land to Jeju Island, gray indicates the amount of fossil fuel-based power generation, blue indicates the amount of renewable energy generation, and orange indicates the limited amount of renewable energy output.
data.target_sentence: Yellow indicates the amount of electricity transmitted from land to Jeju Island, gray indicates fossil fuel generation, blue indicates renewable energy generation, and orange indicates limited renewable energy production.

data.source_sentence: 추가로 검은색 점선은 이날의 전력 수요를 나타내고, 빨간색 점선은 제주에서 육지로 역송되는 역송량을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, the black dotted line shows the electricity demand for the day, and the red dotted line shows the amount of back-transfer from Jeju to land.
data.target_sentence: Also, the black dotted line represents the power demand for that day, and the red dotted line represents the reverse power transmission from Jeju to the land.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 3은 HVDC#3이 포함된 시스템의 결과값으로 태양광이 집중되는 낮시간 8시~16시 사이에 적극적으로 제주에서 육지로 역송을 함으로써 출력 제한을 최소화하고 있음을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. Figure 3 shows the result of the system including HVDC#3, which shows that the output limit is minimized by actively transporting back to the land from Jeju between 8:00 and 16:00 during the daytime when sunlight is concentrated.
data.target_sentence: Figure 3 shows that as a result of the system including HVDC#3, the output limit is minimized by actively transporting it from Jeju to land between 8:00 and 16:00 during the daytime when sunlight is concentrated.

data.source_sentence: 반면 Fig. 4는 HVDC#3이 포함되지 않은 결과값으로 기존 HVDC 회선의 제한적인 역송 기능 때문에 8시~16시에 역송은 소폭 발생하고 그 시간 대규모의 출력 제한이 발생됨을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, Fig. 4 is a result value that does not include HVDC#3, and it can be seen that due to the limited reverse transmission function of the existing HVDC line, the reverse transmission occurs slightly between 8:00 and 16:00, and a large-scale output limitation occurs during that time.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, Fig. 4 is the result value that does not include HVDC #3, and it can be seen that due to the limited backtransmission function of the existing HVDC line, backtransmission occurs slightly between 8:00 and 16:00, and a large-scale output limit occurs at that time.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 3과 Fig. 4 둘 다에서 화석 연료 기반 Must Run 발전기가 출력 제한 시간에도 전력 공급 안정성을 위해 가동되고 있는 것이 확인 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: In both Fig. 3 and Fig. 4, it can be confirmed that the fossil fuel-based Must Run generator is operating for power supply stability even during the power limit time.
data.target_sentence: In both Fig. 3 and Fig. 4, it can be confirmed that the fossil fuel-based Must Run generator is operating for power supply stability even during the output limit time.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 5는 최적화 분석 결과로 도출된 연간 시간별 출력 제한 발생 횟수를 보여 준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. Fig. 5 shows the number of occurrences of output limit per hour per year derived as a result of the optimization analysis.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 5 shows the number of occurrences of output limitation per hour per year derived from the optimization analysis result.

data.source_sentence: 이는 HVDC#3 건설 유무에 따라 12시에 출력 제한이 발생할 가능성은 14.5%에서 58.1%로 증가할 수 있음을 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: This shows that the possibility of output limitation occurring at 12 o'clock can increase from 14.5% to 58.1% depending on whether or not HVDC#3 is constructed.
data.target_sentence: This shows that the possibility of output limitation in the 12 o'clock position can increase from 14.5% to 58.1% depending on whether HVDC#3 is established or not.

data.source_sentence: Table 3에서 설명된 수전해 운영 방법론을 기반으로 출력 제한 경감을 위한 전력 구매를 할 경우 SMP 프로파일이 어떻게 달라지는지를 봄철 출력 제한이 많이 발생하는 날을 대상으로 Fig. 6과 Fig. 7에 나타냈다.
data.mt_sentence: Figures 6 and 7 show how the SMP profile changes when purchasing power to reduce power limitation based on the water electrolysis operation methodology described in Table 3 for days when power limitation occurs a lot in spring.
data.target_sentence: Figures 6 and 7 show how the SMP profile changes when power is purchased to reduce the power limit based on the electrolytic operation methodology described in Table 3 for spring power-limited days.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 6은 HVDC#3가 연결되고 출력 제한 시 SMP 0원이 적용인 시나리오를 바탕으로 연간 출력 제한을 50% 경감시키는 수전해 용량인 100 MW가 활용될 경우 SMP 프로파일이 수전해 전과 후에 어떻게 달라지는지 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. Figure 6 shows how the SMP profile changes before and after hydrolysis when 100 MW, a water electrolysis capacity that reduces the annual output limit by 50%, is utilized based on a scenario where HVDC#3 is connected and SMP 0 is applied when output is limited .
data.target_sentence: Fig. 6 is based on the scenario where HVDC#3 is connected and SMP 0 source is applied when output is limited. It shows how the SMP profile differs before and after electrolysis when 100 MW of water electrolysis capacity, which reduces the annual power limit by 50%, is utilized.

data.source_sentence: 반면 해당 용량의 수전해가 적용될 경우 출력 제한 시간에 집중적으로 전력 수요를 발생시켜서 11시와 14시는 전력 구매 수준에 비례하게 SMP가 상승한 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, when water electrolysis of the corresponding capacity is applied, power demand is intensively generated during the output time limit, and it can be seen that the SMP rises in proportion to the power purchase level at 11 and 14 o'clock.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, when water electrolysis of the corresponding capacity is applied, power demand is generated intensively during the output limit time, and it can be seen that the SMP increased in proportion to the power purchase level at 11:00 and 14:00.

data.source_sentence: 12시, 13시, 15시는 수전해 전력 수요에도 불구하고 여전히 출력 제한이 발생되고 있어 여전히 0원의 SMP를 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: 12:00, 13:00, and 15:00 are still limited in power despite the demand for water electrolysis power, so they still show SMP of 0 won.
data.target_sentence: At 12:00, 13:00, and 15:00, despite the demand for water electrolysis, the production is still limited, so the SMP is still 0 won.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 7은 HVDC#3이 연결되지 않은 시나리오에서 동일하게 연간 출력 제한을 50% 경감시키는 수전해 용량이 적용된 경우의 SMP 패턴을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 7 shows the SMP pattern when water electrolytic capacity is applied to reduce the annual power limit by 50% in the same scenario where HVDC#3 is not connected.
data.target_sentence: Figure 7 shows the SMP pattern when water electrolytic capacity is applied to reduce the annual power limit by 50% in the same scenario where HVDC#3 is not connected.

data.source_sentence: SMP는 1단계에서 PLEXOS 통해서 도출되고, 2단계에서 수전해 가동 시 출력 제한량을 상회하여 증가한 수요에 대해서는 선형적으로 SMP가 증가한다고 가정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It is assumed that SMP is derived through PLEXOS in stage 1, and SMP linearly increases for demand that has increased above the output power limit during water electrolysis operation in stage 2.
data.target_sentence: It is assumed that the SMP is induced through PLEXOS in the first stage, and the SMP increases linearly with the increased demand over the output limit during the water electrolysis operation in the second stage.

data.source_sentence: 이때 낮은 SMP를 적용해서 수전해를 할 경우 수전해의 경제성이 보다 높게 나타날 것을 유추할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, it can be inferred that the economical efficiency of water electrolysis will be higher if water electrolysis is performed by applying a low SMP.
data.target_sentence: At this time, it can be inferred that the economical efficiency of water electrolysis will be higher if water electrolysis is performed by applying a low SMP.

data.source_sentence: 수소 충전소와 수소 운송 트레일러의 수는 일간 소화 가능한 수소 공급량과 트레일러 운송 용량을 기반으로 적용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The number of hydrogen charging stations and hydrogen transport trailers was applied based on the daily digestible hydrogen supply and trailer transport capacity.
data.target_sentence: The number of hydrogen refueling stations and hydrogen transport trailers was applied based on the daily hydrogen supply and trailer transport capacity.

data.source_sentence: 충전소당 수소 공급량 1,500 kg/일, 트레일러당 수소 운송량 12,900kg/일, 대당 일평균 기대 수소 사용량 13.7 kg/일을 기반으로 해당 시나리오의 수소 사용량에 대한 수소 충전소 개수, 트레일러 대수, 수소차 대수를 산정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the hydrogen supply amount of 1,500 kg/day per charging station, the hydrogen transportation amount of 12,900 kg/day per trailer, and the average expected daily hydrogen consumption per unit 13.7 kg/day, the number of hydrogen charging stations, the number of trailers, and the number of hydrogen vehicles for the scenario are calculated. did.
data.target_sentence: Based on 1,500 kg/day of hydrogen supply per charging station, 12,900 kg/day of hydrogen transport per trailer, and 13.7 kg/day of average expected hydrogen consumption per unit per day, we calculated the number of hydrogen charging stations, the number of trailers, and the number of hydrogen vehicles for the scenario.

data.source_sentence: 수전해의 이용률(capacity factor)은 용량이 작을수록 높아지는 것을 확인할 수 있다.
