data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that the capacity factor of water electrolysis increases as the capacity decreases.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that the capacity coefficient of water electrolysis increases as the capacity decreases.

data.source_sentence: 투자 비용은 앞서 설명하였듯이 수전해 장치, 수소 저장 장치, 수소 충전소, 수소 트레일러 비용의 전제에 근거해서 추산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As described above, the investment cost was estimated based on the premise of the cost of the water electrolysis device, the hydrogen storage device, the hydrogen charging station, and the hydrogen trailer.
data.target_sentence: As described above, the investment cost was estimated based on the cost of the water electrolyzer, hydrogen storage device, hydrogen filling station, and hydrogen trailer.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 할인율은 국가 사업에 보편적으로 적용되는 4.5%를 적용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the discount rate was 4.5% applied universally to national projects.
data.target_sentence: In this study, a discount rate of 4.5% was applied in common to national projects.

data.source_sentence: 점선은 본 연구에서 적용된 출력 제한 경감률 시나리오별 IRR값을 비선형 보간법을 이용해 추정한 선이다.
data.mt_sentence: The dotted line is the line estimated using the nonlinear interpolation method for the IRR value for each output limit reduction rate scenario applied in this study.
data.target_sentence: The dotted line is the line estimated by nonlinear interpolation of the IRR value for each output limit reduction rate scenario applied in this study.

data.source_sentence: 빨간색 점선은 본 연구에서 적용된 사회적 할인율인 4.5% 선을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: The red dotted line represents the 4.5% line, which is the social discount rate applied in this study.
data.target_sentence: The red dotted line represents the 4.5% line, which is the social discount rate applied in this study.

data.source_sentence: 즉 IRR을 연결한 파란 점선이 빨간 점선 위에 위치해 있으면 해당 용량의 수전해 설비는 경제성이 있는 것으로 판단할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In other words, if the blue dotted line connecting the IRR is located on the red dotted line, it can be judged that the water electrolysis facility of the corresponding capacity is economical.
data.target_sentence: That is, if the blue dotted line connecting the IRR is located on the red dotted line, it can be determined that the water electrolysis facility of the corresponding capacity is economical.

data.source_sentence: 이는 HVDC#3이 없을 경우 대규모의 출력 제한이 발생하며, 이 에너지를 SMP 0원에 구매 가능할 경우 적정 규모의 수전해 설비의 경우 높은 수준의 경제성 확보가 가능함을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: This shows that a large-scale output limitation occurs in the absence of HVDC#3, and if this energy can be purchased at SMP 0, it is possible to secure a high level of economic feasibility in the case of an appropriately sized water electrolysis facility.
data.target_sentence: This indicates that large-scale output limitation occurs in the absence of HVDC#3, and if this energy can be purchased at SMP 0, it is possible to secure a high level of economic feasibility for an appropriately sized water electrolysis facility.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 탄소 중립 달성을 위해 빠르게 증가하는 재생에너지로 인해 최근 이슈가 되고 있는 출력 제한 문제를 수소 기반 P2G 형태의 섹터 커플링으로 해결하는 것이 경제적으로 타당한지 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, we analyzed whether it is economically reasonable to solve the problem of output limitation, which has recently become an issue due to rapidly increasing renewable energy, with sector coupling in the form of hydrogen-based P2G to achieve carbon neutrality.
data.target_sentence: In this study, it was analyzed whether it is economically reasonable to solve the problem of output limitation, which has recently become an issue due to the rapid increase in renewable energy to achieve carbon neutrality, through hydrogen-based P2G type sector coupling.

data.source_sentence: 2025년 제주 전력 시스템을 배경으로 분석하였으며, 차등적인 출력 제한 규모에 대한 수전해 설비의 효과를 살펴보기 위해 HVDC#3이 설치가 된 경우와 되지 않은 경우를 구분해서 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was analyzed against the backdrop of the Jeju power system in 2025, and the case where HVDC#3 was installed and not installed was analyzed to examine the effect of the water electrolysis facility on the differential power limitation scale.
data.target_sentence: The Jeju power system in 2025 was analyzed as a background, and the effects of water electrolysis facilities on the differential output limit scale were investigated by analyzing the cases with and without HVDC#3.

data.source_sentence: 2025년 제주 출력 제한 분석 결과 HVDC#3가 제때 건설이 안 되면 제때 건설될 경우 대비 약 7배 출력 제한이 증가하는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the Jeju output limit analysis in 2025, it was found that if HVDC#3 is not built on time, the output limit will increase by about 7 times compared to if it is built on time.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the Jeju output limit analysis in 2025, it was found that if HVDC#3 is not implemented in a timely manner, the output limit increases by about 7 times compared to the case of timely construction.

data.source_sentence: 수송용 수소 충전소와 연계한 수전해 설비는 수소차 인프라가 충분히 갖춰질 경우 출력 제한 경감의 좋은 해결책이 될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: A water electrolysis facility in connection with a hydrogen charging station for transportation can be a good solution to alleviating the output limit if the hydrogen vehicle infrastructure is sufficiently equipped.
data.target_sentence: A water electrolysis facility in connection with a hydrogen charging station for transportation can be a good solution to alleviating output restrictions if sufficient hydrogen vehicle infrastructure is in place.

data.source_sentence: 이를 위해서는 생산되는 수소를 소비해 줄 수 있는 빠른 수소차 생태계 조성이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: For this, it is necessary to create a fast hydrogen car ecosystem that can consume the produced hydrogen.
data.target_sentence: For this, it is necessary to create a high-speed hydrogen car ecosystem that can consume the produced hydrogen.

data.source_sentence: 재생에너지 보급이 증가할수록 수전해 설비는 출력 제한의 해결책으로 더욱 가치가 높아진다.
data.mt_sentence: As the supply of renewable energy increases, the water electrolysis plant becomes more valuable as a solution to limiting the output.
data.target_sentence: As the supply of renewable energy increases, water electrolysis plants become more valuable as production-limiting solutions.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 2025년의 제주를 선제적으로 살펴보았지만, 2030년 대한민국 전체에 30.2%의 재생에너지가 보급될 경우 수요가 낮고 일사 조건이 좋은 봄, 가을철에 대규모의 출력 제한이 예상된다.
data.mt_sentence: Although this study looked at Jeju in 2025 preemptively, if 30.2% of renewable energy is supplied to all of Korea in 2030, a large-scale output limitation is expected in spring and autumn when demand is low and solar conditions are good.
data.target_sentence: Although this study preemptively looked at Jeju in 2025, if 30.2% of renewable energy is distributed nationwide in 2030, large-scale production is expected to be limited in spring and autumn when demand is low and sunny conditions are good.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 살펴보았듯이 출력 제한 규모가 크면 클수록 수전해 설비는 더욱 경제성이 높아지며 출력 제한 경감의 좋은 대안이 될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As we have seen in this study, the larger the output limit is, the more economical the water electrolysis facility becomes, and it can be a good alternative to alleviating the output limit.
data.target_sentence: As seen in this study, the larger the output limit, the more economical the water electrolysis facility becomes, so it can be a good alternative to alleviating the output limit.

data.source_sentence: 출력 제한 경감 문제를 효과적으로 해결하기 위해 출력 제한 시 SMP 0원에 준하는 가격 책정 방식이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to effectively solve the problem of reducing the output limit, a pricing method equivalent to SMP 0 won is required when limiting the output.
data.target_sentence: In order to effectively solve the problem of reducing the output limit, a pricing method corresponding to SMP 0 won is required when limiting the output.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 육지와 HVDC로 연결된 제주를 대상으로 분석했기 때문에 출력 제한 시 육지 SMP와 SMP 0원이 적용되는 상황에 대해서 차등적인 분석을 했다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, since we analyzed Jeju, which is connected to land by HVDC, differential analysis was performed on the situation where land SMP and SMP 0 were applied when output was limited.
data.target_sentence: In this study, since Jeju, which is connected to land by HVDC, was analyzed, differential analysis was performed on the situation where land SMP and SMP 0 were applied when output was limited.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 살펴보았듯이 출력제한 시 0원 혹은 음의 가격이 적용되면 더 다양한 자원들이 출력 제한 경감용도로 시장에 들어올 수 있는 경제성이 확보된다.
data.mt_sentence: As seen in this study, when the output power limit is applied at 0 won or a negative price, economic feasibility is ensured in which more diverse resources can enter the market for the reduction of the output limit.
data.target_sentence: As can be seen from this study, if the production limit is applied at 0 won or a negative price, economic feasibility is secured so that more diverse resources can enter the market to reduce the production limit.

data.source_sentence: 출력 제한을 과도하게 경감하기 위한 대규모 수전해 설비 확보는 경제적으로 비효율적이다.
data.mt_sentence: It is economically inefficient to secure a large-scale water electrolysis facility to excessively relieve the output limit.
data.target_sentence: It is economically inefficient to secure large-scale water electrolysis facilities to unduly relax production limits.

data.source_sentence: 출력 제한을 일정 부분 허용하며 효율적인 규모의 유연성 자원을 시장에 도입하는 것이 더욱 효율적인 해결책이 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Allowing some output limitations and introducing flexible resources of an efficient scale to the market is a more efficient solution.
data.target_sentence: A more efficient solution would be to allow some output limiting and introduce an efficient scale and flexible resource to the market.

data.source_sentence: 경제학의 원칙 중 하나가 올바른 가격 신호가 시장에서 자원의 효율적인 배분이 가능하게 해 준다는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: One of the principles of economics is that the right price signal allows for an efficient allocation of resources in the market.
data.target_sentence: One of the principles of economics is that the right price signal can allocate resources efficiently in the market.

data.source_sentence: 재생에너지 출력 제한 시 시장 가격이 합리적으로 적용될 때 출력 제한 문제가 효율적으로 해결될 수 있으며, 수소 기반 P2G 등의 섹터 커플링을 기반으로 한 창의적이고 혁신적인 해결 방안들이 적용 가능할 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: When the market price is reasonably applied when limiting renewable energy output, the output limit problem can be efficiently solved, and creative and innovative solutions based on sector coupling such as hydrogen-based P2G will be applicable.
data.target_sentence: If the market price is reasonably applied when limiting renewable energy production, the production limit problem can be effectively solved, and creative and innovative solutions based on sector coupling such as hydrogen-based P2G can be applied.

data.source_sentence: 2018년 4월 개최된 국제해사기구(이하 IMO) 제72차 해양환경보호위원회(이하 MEPC) 회의에서는 선박 온실가스 감축을 위한 전략 로드맵의 하나로 ‘IMO 선박 온실가스 감축 초기 전략(Initial IMO Strategy on reduction of GHGemissions from ships)’이 채택되었다.
data.mt_sentence: At the 72nd Marine Environment Protection Committee (MEPC) meeting of the International Maritime Organization (hereinafter referred to as IMO) held in April 2018, the 'IMO Initial IMO Strategy on reduction of GHGemissions from ships) was adopted.
data.target_sentence: The 72nd Marine Environment Protection Committee (MEPC) meeting of the International Maritime Organization (IMO) was held in April 2018. At this meeting, the ‘Initial IMO Strategy on reduction of GHGemissions from ships’ was adopted as one of the strategic roadmaps for reducing GHG emissions from ships.

data.source_sentence: 동 전략은 선박 온실가스 감축 목표와 함께 이를 실행하기 위한 구체적인 단･중･장기 기술 조치를 제시하고 있으며 선박의 에너지 효율 체계 개선과 효율 증대를 위한 기술 개발을 핵심 사항으로 포함하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This strategy presents specific short, medium, and long-term technical measures to implement the goal of reducing greenhouse gas emissions of ships, and includes technology development to improve the energy efficiency system and increase efficiency of ships.
data.target_sentence: This strategy suggests specific short-term, medium-term, and long-term technical measures to achieve the ship's greenhouse gas reduction target, and includes technology development to improve the ship's energy efficiency system and increase the ship's efficiency.

data.source_sentence: IMO 차원의 여러 국제 규제 개발을 통해 알 수 있듯이 선박 에너지 효율 증대는 해양 환경 보전 뿐만 아니라 해운 산업의 경쟁력 측면에서도 그 중요성이 더욱 커지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As can be seen through the development of various international regulations at the IMO level, increasing ship energy efficiency is becoming more important not only in the preservation of the marine environment but also in the competitiveness of the shipping industry.
data.target_sentence: As can be seen through the development of various international regulations at the IMO level, the improvement of ship energy efficiency is becoming more important not only for the preservation of the marine environment, but also for the competitiveness of the shipping industry.

data.source_sentence: 규제를 배경으로 최근 조선업계는 고효율･친환경 선박 기자재 개발을 적극적으로 추진하며 선박의 운항 에너지 효율 증대의 필요성을 강조하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Against the backdrop of regulations, the shipbuilding industry has recently been actively promoting the development of high-efficiency and eco-friendly ship equipment, emphasizing the need to increase the energy efficiency of ships.
data.target_sentence: Against the backdrop of these regulations, the shipbuilding industry is actively promoting the development of high-efficiency and eco-friendly ship equipment while emphasizing the need to increase the energy efficiency of ships.

data.source_sentence: 이를 바탕으로 선박 적용 및 에너지 효율 개선을 위한 다음의 여러 연구가 추진되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on this, the following studies are being carried out for ship application and energy efficiency improvement.
data.target_sentence: Based on this, the following research is being conducted to improve ship application and energy efficiency.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 ORC 발전에 사용되는 판형 열교환기의 종횡비 영향에 대한 열･유동을 수치 해석을 활용해 관찰하여 관계식을 도출하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA derived a relational equation by observing the heat and flow of the aspect ratio effect of the plate-shaped heat exchanger used for ORC power generation using numerical analysis.
data.target_sentence: AAA derived the relational expression by observing the heat and flow of the aspect ratio effect of the plate heat exchanger used in ORC power generation through numerical analysis.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1은 본 연구에서 개발하는 응축기가 포함된 선박용 ORC 시스템을 보여 준다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 1 shows the ship's ORC system including the condenser developed in this study.
data.target_sentence: Figure 1 shows the marine ORC system including the capacitor developed in this study.

data.source_sentence: 이 시스템은 선박 운항 과정에서 주기관으로부터 배출되는 배기가스를 Heater 열원으로 사용한다.
data.mt_sentence: This system uses the exhaust gas discharged from the main engine during the ship operation process as a heat source for the heater.
data.target_sentence: This is a system that uses the exhaust gas emitted from the main engine as a heat source for the heater during the ship's operation.

data.source_sentence: Heater를 통해 발생한 증기는 터빈을 운전하고 응축기는 선박에서 냉각수로 사용되는 30℃ 해수를 냉각원으로 이용하는 열에너지 사이클이다.
data.mt_sentence: The steam generated through the heater drives the turbine, and the condenser is a thermal energy cycle that uses seawater at 30°C, which is used as a coolant in ships as a cooling source.
data.target_sentence: This is a thermal energy cycle in which steam generated through the heater drives the turbine and the condenser uses seawater at 30°C that is used as the ship's cooling water as a cooling source.

data.source_sentence: 이를 통해 BBB FFF 상용 프로그램을 사용하여 열･유동 해석을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this, thermal and flow analysis was performed using the BBB FFF commercial program.
data.target_sentence: Through this, thermal and flow analysis was performed using the BBB FFF commercial program.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 2는 동 연구를 통해 개발할 응축기의 제작에 사용될 브레이징 타입 판형 열교환기 전열판을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 2 shows the heat transfer plate of the brazed type plate heat exchanger to be used in the manufacture of the condenser to be developed through this research.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 2 shows the heat transfer plate of the brazed plate heat exchanger used for the manufacture of the condenser to be developed through this study.

data.source_sentence: 프레스 금형 공법을 통해 제작된 전열판의 세부 형상을 살펴보면 단순히 핀(Fin)으로 유로만 나뉜 것이 아닌 핀 자체에 구멍(Hole)을 가공하여 유동에 따른 열전달 효율이 향상되도록 한 점을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The detailed shape of the heat transfer plate manufactured through the press mold method is not just divided into a flow path, but also a hole is processed in the pin itself to improve heat transfer efficiency according to the flow.
data.target_sentence: The detailed shape of the heat transfer plate manufactured by the press-molding method is not only divided into a flow path with fins, but also holes are machined in the fins themselves to improve the heat transfer efficiency according to the flow.

data.source_sentence: 전열판 형상에 대한 수치를 실측하였으며 수치 해석 계산을 위한 격자 생성을 고려해 모양을 단순화하여 BBB사의 FFF 프로그램을 이용해 3D 형상을 제작하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The figures for the shape of the heat transfer plate were measured, and the shape was simplified in consideration of the lattice generation for numerical analysis calculation, and a 3D shape was produced using BBB's FFF program.
data.target_sentence: Numerical values for the shape of the heat transfer plate were measured, and the shape was simplified in consideration of the grid generation for numerical analysis and calculation, and a three-dimensional shape was produced using BBB's FFF program.

data.source_sentence: 응축기는 제작사의 브레이징 공법 기술을 고려하여 총 25단의 전열판을 적층해 제작할 예정이다.
data.mt_sentence: The condenser will be manufactured by stacking a total of 25 layers of heat transfer plates in consideration of the manufacturer's brazing method technology.
data.target_sentence: The capacitor will be manufactured by laminating a total of 25 layers of heat transfer plates in consideration of the manufacturer's brazing technology.

data.source_sentence: 전열판 면적과 비교해 핀의 길이가 상대적으로 매우 작다.
data.mt_sentence: Compared to the area of the heat transfer plate, the length of the fin is relatively small.
data.target_sentence: Compared to the area of the heat transfer plate, the length of the Fin is relatively small.

data.source_sentence: 핀이 포함된 전열판을 25단 적층해 형상을 만들어 격자를 생성하면 과도한 격자 생성으로 인해 수치 해석 계산 진행 자체가 어렵고 계산 정확도가 떨어진다.

data.source_sentence: 시뮬레이션의 대상은 응축기에 유입되는 포화 증기 상태의 R134a 냉매가 냉각수에 의해 응축되어 과냉각 상태로 토출되는 상변화 과정이다.

data.source_sentence: R134a 냉매의 경우에는 CFX 계산에 적합한 물성이 담긴 파일을 별도로 제공하고 있지 않으므로 이는 BBB에서 제공하는 FFF 변환프로그램을 통해 CFX 계산이 가능하도록 변환하는 작업이 필요하다.

data.source_sentence: 이상적인 유기랭킨 사이클 운전에서 응축은 완전한 등압 하에 진행되지만, 실제 응축기 내부에서 발생하는 압력 강하는 유동의 가속, 마찰, 중력 그리고 열교환기의 기하학적 구조 등에 영향을 받는다.

data.source_sentence: 만약 포화액으로 변하는 지점이 출구와 근접한다면, 응축되지 못한 기체 상태의 냉매가 응축기 후단에 설치된 펌프에 유입되어 펌프 운전에 손상을 미칠 수도 있기 때문이다.

data.source_sentence: 실험방법은 FCT검사 자동화 장비에 이동을 감지하는 SMR Sensor를 부착하고 레이저 트레커 장비에 측정 센서를 통하여 로봇 위치 반복정밀도를 측정하였으며 30회 반복 측정을 통하여 장비의 신뢰성을 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As for the experimental method, an SMR sensor that detects movement was attached to the FCT inspection automation equipment, the robot position repeatability was measured through a measuring sensor on the laser tracker equipment, and the reliability of the equipment was measured through repeated measurements 30 times.
data.target_sentence: As for the experimental method, an SMR sensor that detects motion was attached to the FCT inspection automation equipment, the robot position repeatability was measured through the measurement sensor of the laser tracker equipment, and the equipment reliability was measured through repeated measurements 30 times.

data.source_sentence: 음성 인식 분석의 성능 평가 목표는 녹음된 wave와 Digital Wave의 총량을 비교하여 99% 이상의 정확도를 목표로 검사 자동화 장비를 제작하였으며 제작된 자동화 장비를 이용하여 실험을 실시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The performance evaluation goal of speech recognition analysis was to compare the total amount of recorded wave and digital wave, and to achieve more than 99% accuracy, automated inspection equipment was manufactured, and an experiment was conducted using the manufactured automation equipment.
data.target_sentence: The goal of performance evaluation of speech recognition analysis is to compare the total amount of recorded waves and digital waves. In order to achieve more than 99% accuracy, an automated inspection equipment was manufactured and an experiment was conducted using the manufactured automation equipment.

data.source_sentence: 실험 결과는 1차에서 정확도 99.236%, 2차에서 99.929%, 3차에서 99.297%, 4차에서 99.747%, 5차에서 99.308%로 나타났으며, 목표하고자 하는 결과값을 모두 만족하는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: The experimental results showed an accuracy of 99.236% in the first round, 99.929% in the second, 99.297% in the third, 99.747% in the fourth, and 99.308% in the fifth, and all of the desired results were satisfied.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the experiment, the first order 99.236%, the second order 99.929%, the third order 99.297%, the fourth order 99.747%, and the fifth order 99.308% showed the accuracy of all desired results.

data.source_sentence: 음성분석 실험에서 전기밥솥에 입력된 음성으로부터 출력된 wave의 총량을 비교하여 실험한 결과 정확도 99% 이상의 결과값을 나타내어 음성 분석 실험의 결과는 신뢰할 수 있는 수준으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the voice analysis experiment, the total amount of waves output from the voice input to the electric rice cooker was compared and the result showed an accuracy of 99% or more, so the result of the voice analysis experiment is judged to be reliable.
data.target_sentence: In the voice analysis experiment, the result of comparing the total amount of waves output from the voice input to the rice cooker showed more than 99% accuracy, so the results of the voice analysis experiment are judged to be reliable.

data.source_sentence: 채널 실험 결과에서는 입력된 이미지Grey/R/G/B와 출력된 이미지를 Visio으로 확인하여 진행하였으며 4개로 이루어진 채널에서 모두 OK 판정값이 검출되어 Grey/R/G/B의 실험 결과도 신뢰할 수 있는 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the channel test result, the input image Gray/R/G/B and the output image were checked with Visio and OK judgment values were detected in all 4 channels, so the experimental results of Gray/R/G/B are also reliable. It is judged that there is
data.target_sentence: As a result of checking the input image Gray/R/G/B and the output image with Visio as a result of the channel test, OK judgment values are detected for all 4 channels, so Gray/R/G/B is also reliable.

data.source_sentence: FND Segment검사에서는 PBC에서 출력되는 다양한 이미지들을 비전으로 확인하여 검사를 진행하였으며 모든 결과에서 A~G까지의 Segment가 정상적으로 작동하는 것을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the FND segment test, the various images output from the PBC were checked by vision, and it was confirmed that the segments A to G were operating normally in all the results.
data.target_sentence: In the FND segment test, various images output from the PBC were checked with wiy vision, and it was confirmed that the A to G segments were operating normally in all results.

data.source_sentence: 로봇 위치 반복 정밀도 측정 실험을 통하여 FCT검사 자동화 장비의 위치 반복 정밀도에 대한 신뢰성을 측정하였으며 축의 이동 시작점과 끝점을 측정하여 평균값을 구한 결과 0.027 mm로 로봇 위치 반복 정밀도에 대한 신뢰성은 만족하는 수준으로 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: The reliability of the position repeatability of the FCT inspection automation equipment was measured through the robot position repeatability measurement experiment. The average value was obtained by measuring the start and end points of the axis movement. As a result, the reliability of the position repeatability of the robot is satisfactory. .
data.target_sentence: The reliability of the position repeatability of the FCT inspection automation equipment was measured through the robot position repeatability measurement experiment. As a result of measuring the starting point and ending point of the axis movement and obtaining the average value, the reliability of the repeatability of the robot position was found to be at a satisfactory level with 0.027 mm.

data.source_sentence: 선정된 기저부 경사각 및 깊이에 따라 기저부 형상은 총 6가지로 설계하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A total of six base shapes were designed according to the selected base inclination angle and depth.
data.target_sentence: A total of 6 base shapes were designed according to the selected base inclination angle and depth.

data.source_sentence: 모든 해석 모델에서 적층 비드의 마지막 두 층은 과적층(over stacking)으로 정의하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In all analysis models, the last two layers of the laminated beads were defined as over-stacking.
data.target_sentence: In all analysis models, the last two layers of laminated beads were defined as overstacking.

data.source_sentence: 생성된 FE 모델의 기저부 경사각과 깊이 조합별 적층 면적은 Table 2와 같다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 2 shows the stacking area for each base inclination angle and depth combination of the generated FE model.
data.target_sentence: Table 2 shows the stacked area for each base inclination angle and depth combination of the generated FE model.

data.source_sentence: 적층 중 해석 모델의 측면 및 바닥면에는 자연 대류 조건이 적용되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Natural convection conditions were applied to the side and bottom surfaces of the analytical model during lamination.
data.target_sentence: During lamination, natural convection conditions were applied to the side and bottom surfaces of the analysis model.

data.source_sentence: 상면에는 아르곤 가스에 의한 강제 대류와 자연 대류를 동시에 고려한 등가 열손실(equivalent heat loss) 조건이 적용되었다.
data.mt_sentence: An equivalent heat loss condition was applied to the upper surface considering both forced convection and natural convection by argon gas.
data.target_sentence: An equivalent heat loss condition was applied to the upper surface considering both forced and natural convection by argon gas.

data.source_sentence: Table 3은 FEA에 사용된 적층 조건이다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 3 shows the lamination conditions used for FEA.
data.target_sentence: Table 3 shows the lamination conditions used for FEA.

data.source_sentence: 이 FEA에 사용된 열원 효율(η)은 Table 3과 같이 0.28이다.
data.mt_sentence: The heat source efficiency (η) used in this FEA is 0.28 as shown in Table 3.
data.target_sentence: The heat source efficiency (η) used in this FEA is 0.28 as shown in Table 3.

data.source_sentence: 레이저 열원은 식 (3)과 같이 플랫 탑(flat-top) 형상에 가까운 가우시안(gaussian) 분포의 체적 열원 (volumetric heat flux)으로 가정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The laser heat source was assumed to be a volumetric heat flux having a Gaussian distribution close to the flat-top shape as shown in Equation (3).
data.target_sentence: The laser heat source was assumed to be a volumetric heat flux having a Gaussian distribution close to the planar shape as shown in Equation (3).

data.source_sentence: 열원은 수직방향으로 적용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The heat source was applied in the vertical direction.
data.target_sentence: The heat source was applied in a vertical direction.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 7은 기저부 경사각과 깊이에 따른 경사면 모서리 영역들에서의 HAZ 깊이 변화이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 7 shows a change in the HAZ depth in the inclined surface corner regions according to the inclination angle and depth of the base.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 7 shows the change in HAZ depth of the inclined surface edge area according to the inclination angle and depth of the base.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 7(c)와 같이 기저부 경사각이 감소하고 깊이가 증가할수록 기저부 경사면 상부 모서리의 HAZ 최대 깊이(ψ 2,HAZ)가 증가하는 것을 알 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. As shown in 7(c), it was found that the maximum HAZ depth (ψ 2,HAZ) of the upper edge of the base inclined surface increased as the base inclination angle decreased and the depth increased.
data.target_sentence: Fig. As shown in 7(c), it can be seen that the maximum HAZ depth (ψ 2,HAZ) of the upper edge of the base inclined plane increases as the base inclination angle decreases and the depth increases.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 9는 기저부 경사각과 깊이에 따른 최대 유효 응력 변화이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 9 shows the maximum effective stress change according to the inclination angle and depth of the base.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 9 shows the maximum effective stress change according to the inclination angle and depth of the base.

data.source_sentence: 기저부 깊이가 2mm인 경우는 해석에 적용된 두 가지 기저부 경사각 조건에서 최대 유효 응력이 거의 유사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When the depth of the base was 2 mm, the maximum effective stress was almost similar under the two base inclination angle conditions applied to the analysis.
data.target_sentence: When the depth of the base was 2 mm, the maximum effective stress was almost similar in the two base inclination angle conditions applied to the analysis.

data.source_sentence: 이 결과들로부터 경사각이 30도이고 깊이가 3 mm 이상인 기저부 설계가 적층부 인근 유효 응력 측면에서 바람직할 것으로 사료되었다.
data.mt_sentence: From these results, it was considered that a base design with an inclination angle of 30 degrees and a depth of 3 mm or more would be preferable in terms of effective stress near the laminate.
data.target_sentence: From these results, it was determined that a base design with an inclination angle of 30 degrees and a depth of 3 mm or more would be preferable in terms of effective stress in the vicinity of the laminate.

data.source_sentence: 기저부 깊이가 2 mm이고 기저부 경사각이 45도인 경우에는 기저부 상부 모서리 영역에 과도 잔류 응력이 발생하는 것을 알 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: When the depth of the base was 2 mm and the angle of inclination of the base was 45 degrees, it was found that excessive residual stress occurred in the upper edge region of the base.
data.target_sentence: When the depth of the base was 2mm and the angle of inclination of the base was 45 degrees, it was found that excessive residual stress occurred in the upper edge of the base.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 11은 기저부 경사각 및 깊이에 따른 최대 주응력 최대값(σ p,m )의 변화이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 11 is the change in the maximum principal stress value (σ p,m ) according to the base inclination angle and depth.
data.target_sentence: Figure 11 shows the change of the maximum principal stress value (σ p,m ) according to the base inclination angle and depth.

data.source_sentence: 에너지 제어형 용착 공정을 이용하여 기계 부품을 보수할 때 기저부 경사각과 깊이가 보수된 영역의 열 및 잔류응력 특성 변화에 미치는 영향을 분석 고찰하여 다음과 같은 결론을 얻을 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: The following conclusions were obtained by analyzing and examining the effect of the inclination angle and depth of the base on the change of thermal and residual stress characteristics in the repaired area when mechanical parts were repaired using the energy-controlled welding process.
data.target_sentence: The following conclusions were obtained by analyzing and examining the effect of the inclination angle and depth of the base on the change of thermal and residual stress characteristics of the repaired area when mechanical parts were repaired using the energy-controlled welding process.

data.source_sentence: 기저부 경사각이 감소하고 기저부 깊이가 증가할수록 HAZ 영역이 증가하는 것을 알 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was found that the HAZ area increased as the base inclination angle decreased and the base depth increased.
data.target_sentence: It was found that the HAZ area increased as the base inclination angle decreased and the base depth increased.

data.source_sentence: 기저부 깊이 증가에 따라 기저부 상부 모서리의 HAZ 최대 깊이가 현저히 증가하는 것을 알 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was found that the maximum depth of the HAZ at the upper corner of the base increased significantly as the depth of the base increased.
data.target_sentence: We found that the maximum depth of the HAZ at the upper edge of the base increased significantly as the depth of the base increased.

data.source_sentence: 기저부 경사각이 감소하고 기저부 깊이가 증가할수록 적층부 인근의 잔류 응력이 감소하는 것을 알 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was found that the residual stress near the laminated part decreased as the base inclination angle decreased and the base depth increased.
data.target_sentence: It was found that the residual stress in the vicinity of the laminated part decreased as the base inclination angle decreased and the base depth increased.

data.source_sentence: 단축 인장 시험의 경우 시험편 형상은 Fig. 2와 같이 KSM 6518인 아령형 3호이며, Fig. 3과 같이 재료를 그립으로 고정하여 인장하고, 이때 인장 속도는 5.00 mm/min로 시험한다.
data.mt_sentence: For the uniaxial tensile test, the specimen shape is shown in Fig. As shown in 2, it is KSM 6518 dumbbell type No. 3, Fig. As shown in 3, the material is fixed with a grip and tensioned, and the tensile speed is tested at 5.00 mm/min.
data.target_sentence: In the case of uniaxial tensile test, the specimen shape is shown in Fig. As in 2, it is KSM 6518 dumbbell type No.3, and the material is fixed and tensioned with a grip as in 3, and the tensioning speed was 5.00 mm/min.

data.source_sentence: 연료전지 시험편을 단축 인장시험에서와 같이 등이축 인장시험에서 0~25%와 0~40%의 변형률 범위내에서 각각 10회 반복하중을 주었을 때, 시험 결과는 Fig. 7(a)와 같으며 원점으로 피팅시킨 결과를 Fig. 7(b)에 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: When the fuel cell specimen was subjected to repeated loads 10 times within the strain range of 0~25% and 0~40% respectively in the isobiaxial tensile test as in the uniaxial tensile test, the test results are shown in Fig. Fig. 7(a) shows the result of fitting with the origin. It is shown in 7(b).
data.target_sentence: The test results when the fuel cell specimen was subjected to repeated loads 10 times within the strain range of 0 to 25% and 0 to 40%, respectively, in an equiaxial tensile test such as a uniaxial tensile test, are shown in Fig. Same as 7(a). ), the result of fitting with the origin is the same as 7(b).

data.source_sentence: 면압측정에 사용한 시험편과 동일한 형상에 대해 Hyper Mesh로 요소를 분할한 형상을 Fig. 10과 같이 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure shows the shape of the element divided by Hyper Mesh for the same shape as the test piece used for the surface pressure measurement. It is expressed as 10.
data.target_sentence: Figure 10 shows the geometry of the element divided by Hyper Mesh for the same geometry as the specimen used for surface pressure measurement.

data.source_sentence: 개스킷 단면 해석은 3개의 셀 적층을 대상으로 하였으며, 이때 Anode 반응면, Cathode 반응면 및 냉각면 개스킷의 면압을 계산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The gasket cross-section analysis was performed for three cell stacks, and the surface pressures of the anode reaction surface, cathode reaction surface, and cooling surface gasket were calculated.
data.target_sentence: Gasket cross-section analysis was performed on three cell stacks to calculate the surface pressures of the anode reaction surface, cathode reaction surface, and cooling surface gasket.

data.source_sentence: 이때, 면압은 기밀유지에 충분하여야 하고 파손되거나 내구성이 저하되지 않도록 과도한 변형을 방지하여야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, the surface pressure should be sufficient to maintain airtightness, and excessive deformation should be prevented to prevent damage or deterioration of durability.
data.target_sentence: At this time, the surface pressure should be sufficient to maintain airtightness, and excessive deformation should be prevented to prevent damage or deterioration of durability.

data.source_sentence: 개스킷 판재에 대한 면압 측정결과와 해석결과를 비교하여 최적의 변형률에너지 모델을 선정하였으며 이를 이용하여 개스킷 형상에 대한 면압을 계산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The optimal strain energy model was selected by comparing the results of the measurement of the surface pressure on the gasket plate with the analysis results, and the surface pressure for the gasket shape was calculated using this.
data.target_sentence: The optimal strain energy model was selected by comparing the surface pressure measurement result and the analysis result of the gasket plate, and the surface pressure for the gasket shape was calculated using this.

data.source_sentence: 등이축 인장시험은 변형률 에너지 함수에 관계없이 유사한 결과를 보이나 단축 인장 시험의 경우 변형률 에너지 함수의 선정에 따른 결과와 차이가 크다.
data.mt_sentence: The isobiaxial tensile test shows similar results regardless of the strain energy function, but the uniaxial tensile test has a large difference from the result according to the selection of the strain energy function.
data.target_sentence: The equiaxial tensile test shows similar results regardless of the strain energy function, but the uniaxial tensile test shows a significant difference from the results according to the selection of the strain energy function.

data.source_sentence: 개스킷의 면압에 대한 거동을 가장 잘 나타내는 변형률 에너지 함수는 단축과 등이축 인장 모두 모델이다.
data.mt_sentence: The strain energy functions that best represent the behavior of gaskets against face pressure are models for both uniaxial and isobiaxial tension.
data.target_sentence: The strain energy functions that best represent the behavior of gaskets against face pressure are models for uniaxial and equiaxial tension.

data.source_sentence: 개스킷 각 층의 최대 면압은 단축과 등이축에서 모두 내부의 기밀 이상 수준으로 을 충분히 만족하며 분리판 변형도 적어 연료에 적용이 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: The maximum surface pressure of each layer of the gasket satisfies the level above the internal airtightness in both uniaxial and isoaxial axis, and the separation plate deformation is small, so it can be applied to fuel.
data.target_sentence: The maximum surface pressure of each layer of the gasket satisfies the level of internal airtightness or higher for both uniaxial and equiaxial, and the separation plate deformation is small, so it can be applied to fuel.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 산업자원부 및 한국산업기술평가관리원의 소재 부품 기술 개발 전략 핵심 소재 자립화 기술-개발의 연구 결과로 수행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: This study was carried out as a result of the research of the core material independence technology development strategy of the Ministry of Commerce, Industry and Energy and the Korea Institute of Industrial Technology Evaluation and Planning.
data.target_sentence: This study was carried out as a result of research on core material self-reliance technology of the material parts technology development strategy of the Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy and the Korea Industrial Technology Evaluation and Planning Institute.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문의 1장에서는 연구에 고려된 인버터 제품에 대한 소개와 설치 현장에서 실측된 진동 신호를 분석한 내용을 2장에서는 피로, 온도를 손상 기전으로 고려하여 가속화 시험 계획을 수립한 내용을 다룬다.
data.mt_sentence: Chapter 1 of this paper deals with the introduction of inverter products considered in the study and the analysis of vibration signals measured at the installation site. Chapter 2 deals with the establishment of an accelerated test plan considering fatigue and temperature as damage mechanisms.
data.target_sentence: Chapter 1 of this paper deals with the introduction of inverter products considered in the study and analysis of vibration signals measured at the installation site. Chapter 2 deals with the establishment of an accelerated test plan considering fatigue and temperature as damage mechanisms.

data.source_sentence: 얻어진 진동 신호의 시계열 데이터를 처리하여 1 Hz의 정도를 가지는 가속도 PSD곡선을 구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: By processing the time series data of the obtained vibration signal, an acceleration PSD curve having an accuracy of 1 Hz was obtained.
data.target_sentence: By processing the time series data of the obtained vibration signal, an acceleration PSD curve with an accuracy of 1 Hz was obtained.

data.source_sentence: 모든 측정 지점에서 구해진 세 방향의 가속도 중 가장 큰 값을 비교 분석한 결과 가장 작은 값로 계산되었다.

Therefore, hydrogen production technology using biomass plays a major role in global environmental protection such as treatment of waste and wastewater and mitigation of greenhouse effect as well as the replacement effect of fossil fuels. expected to do

data.source_sentence: 생물학적 방법은 광분해법과 발효법으로 구분되며, 광분해법은 박테리아와 조류가 참여하는 광합성 과정과 물의 광분해 과정에서, 발효법은 탄화수소로 구성된 바이오매스가 미생물에 의해 발효되면서 유기산으로 전환되는 과정에서 생산되는 수소를 목적으로 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Biological methods are divided into photolysis and fermentation methods, and photolysis aims at hydrogen produced during the photosynthesis of bacteria and algae and the photolysis of water, and the fermentation method is converted into organic acids when biomass composed of hydrocarbons is fermented by microorganisms.

Photolysis targets the hydrogen produced during photosynthesis of bacteria and algae and the photolysis of water. Fermentation methods target the hydrogen produced when biomass composed of hydrocarbons is fermented by microorganisms and converted into organic acids.

data.source_sentence: 전기분해법은 가수분해 중 가장 상용화된 기술이며, 강한 흡열 반응으로 많은 에너지가 필요한데, 전기에너지를 공급하여 수소를 생산하는 방식이다.
data.mt_sentence: Electrolysis is the most commercially available technology among hydrolysis, and a lot of energy is required due to a strong endothermic reaction, and hydrogen is produced by supplying electric energy.
data.target_sentence: Electrolysis is the most commercialized technology among hydrolysis and requires a lot of energy due to a strong endothermic reaction, and generates hydrogen by supplying electric energy.

data.source_sentence: 현재 상용화된 전기분해법은 알카라인, 양성자 교환막(PEM), 고체 산화물 전해질 등이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Currently commercialized electrolysis methods include alkaline, proton exchange membrane (PEM), and solid oxide electrolyte.
data.target_sentence: Currently commercialized electrolysis methods include alkali, PEM (Proton Exchange Membrane), solid oxide electrolyte, and the like.

data.source_sentence: 열분해는 수소와 산소로 분해될 때까지 물을 고온으로 가열하는 방법으로, 공정이 간단하지만 2500°C 이상의 고온 환경이 필요하기에 반응온도를 낮추기 위한 연구가 진행 중이다.
data.mt_sentence: Thermal decomposition is a method of heating water at a high temperature until it is decomposed into hydrogen and oxygen. Although the process is simple, research is underway to lower the reaction temperature because it requires a high temperature environment of 2500°C or higher.
data.target_sentence: Pyrolysis is a method of decomposing water into hydrogen and oxygen by heating it to a high temperature. Although the process is simple, research is being conducted to lower the reaction temperature because it requires a high temperature environment of 2500°C or higher.

data.source_sentence: 열분해법은 물을 산소와 수소로 만드는 화학반응을 순환시켜 물을 분해하며 SnO2/SnO 순환 반응을 사용한다.

data.target_sentence: The thermal decomposition method circulates a chemical reaction that converts water into oxygen and hydrogen to decompose water and uses the SnO2/SnO cycle reaction.

data.source_sentence: 위의 수소생산기술을 통해 생산된 기술은 정제공정을 거쳐 공급된다.
data.mt_sentence: The technology produced through the above hydrogen production technology is supplied through a refining process.

data.source_sentence: 흡착법은 기체 분리 방법으로, 분자들에 흡착제에 흡착되는 강도, 속도, 양 등의 차이를 이용한다.

data.target_sentence: In general, silica, alumina, activated carbon, zeolite, etc. are used as adsorbents.

data.source_sentence: 막분리법은 분리막 투과 메커니즘을 이용한 정제기술이며, 분리막은 분자투과막, 원자투과막 등으로 나뉜다.
data.mt_sentence: The membrane separation method is a purification technology using a membrane permeation mechanism, and the separation membrane is divided into a molecular permeable membrane and an atomic permeable membrane.
data.target_sentence: The membrane separation method is a purification technology using a membrane permeation mechanism, and the separation membrane is divided into a molecular permeable membrane and an atomic permeable membrane.

data.source_sentence: 분자투과막은 다공성 세라믹으로 구성되며 분자체 효과, 표면 확산, 뉴센확산에 의하여 분리가 일어난다.

data.target_sentence: Molecular permeable membrane is composed of porous ceramic, and separation occurs by molecular sieve effect, surface diffusion, and Newsen diffusion.

data.source_sentence: 원자 투과막은 금속 박막으로 구성되며, 금속 표면에 수소 분자가 흡착되고 원자로 해리되어 금속 격자 사이를 이동하여 반대편에서 분자로 재결합하는 방식을 사용한다.
data.mt_sentence: The atom-permeable membrane is composed of a metal thin film, and hydrogen molecules are adsorbed on the metal surface and dissociated into atoms, moving between the metal lattice and recombination into molecules on the other side.
data.target_sentence: The atomic permeable membrane is composed of a metal thin film, and hydrogen molecules are adsorbed on the metal surface, dissociate into atoms, move between the metal lattice, and recombine into molecules on the opposite side.

data.source_sentence: 액화 암모니아는 액화 수소(LH2)와 액상 유기수소화물(LOHC) 대비 단위 부피당 약 1.5배의 수소 저장 용량을 가 지고 있으며, 상온에서 비교적 낮은 압력(0.8 MPa)으로도 액화가 가능하므로 운반과 유지 측면에서 유리한 점이 있다.

data.source_sentence: 암모니아는 농업에 필수적인 요소인 만큼, 세계적으로 이미 암모니아의 생성 및 유통 인프라가 존재하므로 이를 쉽게 이용할 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 합성 암모니아는 전 세계 암모니아 생산량의 77%를 차지하며, 대부분 촉매를 이용한 하버-보슈(Harber Bosch) 공정으로 생산되며 이 공정을 Fig. 6에 나타내었다.

data.source_sentence: 그 후 암모니아의 운송을 위해 2 MPa의 압력으로 압축되어 액화 암모니아의 형태로 저장된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is then compressed at a pressure of 2 MPa for transport of ammonia and stored in the form of liquefied ammonia.

data.source_sentence: 공정 과정의 암모니아 합성 효율은 약 70%이며, 합성된 암모니아의 생산량의 약 1.5배의 이산화탄소를 발생시킨다.

data.source_sentence: 역화 발생 메커니즘의 예로는 (i) 중심 유동에서의 화염전파, (ii) 경계층 안에서의 화염 전파, (iii) 연소 진동에 의한 화염 전파, 그리고 (iv) 연소로 유도된 와류 붕괴 등이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Examples of flashback mechanisms include (i) flame propagation in central flow, (ii) flame propagation within boundary layers, (iii) flame propagation by combustion vibrations, and (iv) combustion-induced vortex collapse.
data.target_sentence: Examples of flashback mechanisms include (i) central flow flame propagation, (ii) flame propagation within boundary layers, (iii) flame propagation by combustion oscillations, and (iv) combustion induced vortex collapse.

data.source_sentence: 화염 역화는 수소 전소를 위한 예혼합연소 시스템 설계 시 최우선으로 고려해야 할 문제라고 해도 과언이 아니다.
data.mt_sentence: It is no exaggeration to say that flame backfire is a matter to be considered as a top priority when designing a premixed combustion system for hydrogen burning.
data.target_sentence: It is no exaggeration to say that flame flashback is a top consideration when designing a premixed combustion system for hydrogen combustion.

data.source_sentence: 실제 발전용 가스터빈 엔진에서 압축기를 거쳐 연소기로 유입되는 고온 고압의 공기로 인하여, 일반적으로 연소기 입구 온도 및 압력은 각각 600-950 K와 4-30 atm의 범위에 놓여있다.
data.mt_sentence: Due to the high-temperature and high-pressure air flowing into the combustor through the compressor in the actual power generation gas turbine engine, the combustor inlet temperature and pressure are generally in the range of 600-950 K and 4-30 atm, respectively.
data.target_sentence: In real power generation gas turbine engines, due to the high temperature and high pressure of air entering the combustor through the compressor, the combustor inlet temperature and pressure are typically in the range of 600-950K and 4-30atm respectively. .

data.source_sentence: 만약 연료/공기 혼합부의 온도가 최소 자연 발화 온도보다 높음과 동시에 충분한 연소 시간이 주어질 경우, 역화 현상과 비슷하게 혼합부에서 국부적으로 화염이 부착 및 유지되어 연소 시스템에 심각한 손상을 유발할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: If the temperature of the fuel/air mixture is higher than the minimum natural ignition temperature and sufficient combustion time is given, flames may be locally attached and maintained at the mixture, similar to backfire, causing serious damage to the combustion system.
data.target_sentence: If the temperature of the fuel/air mixture is above the minimum auto-ignition temperature and given a sufficient combustion time, similar to a flashback, a flame may locally attach and remain in the mixture and cause serious damage to the combustion system.

data.source_sentence: 자연 발화는 화염이 연소실에서 역행하지 않고 혼합부에서 화염이 발생하는 것이므로 역화와 다른 물리적 현상으로 구분되고, 점화원이 없는 상태에서 충분히 높은 온도로 인하여 혼합부에서 연료/공기 혼합기가 자발적으로 점화되는 현상으로 정의된다.
data.mt_sentence: Natural ignition is classified as a physical phenomenon other than backfire because the flame does not reverse in the combustion chamber and flames occur in the mixing unit, and is defined as spontaneous ignition of the fuel/air mixer in the mixing unit due to a sufficiently high temperature without an ignition source.
data.target_sentence: Autoignition is classified as a physical phenomenon other than flashback because the flame is generated in the mixing section without reversing the flame in the combustion chamber, and is defined as spontaneous ignition of the fuel/air mixture in the mixing section by sufficiently high heat. Temperature without an ignition source.

data.source_sentence: 메탄연소는 저주파 종방향 연소불안정 모드가 나타나지만, 수소 연소는 고주파 방사형 연소 불안정 모드가 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: Methane combustion exhibits a low-frequency longitudinal combustion instability mode, whereas hydrogen combustion exhibits a high-frequency radial combustion instability mode.

data.source_sentence: 수소 연소에서의 연소 불안정을 제어하거나 방지하는 기술 개발이 필수적이다.
data.mt_sentence: It is essential to develop a technology to control or prevent combustion instability in hydrogen combustion.

data.source_sentence: 수소는 대표적인 무탄소 연료로서 연소 과정에서 이산화탄소를 배출하지 않는 큰 장점을 갖고 있지만, 수소를 연료로 사용할 시 메탄에 비해 더 많은 질소산화물 배출을 야기할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Hydrogen is a representative carbon-free fuel and has a great advantage in that it does not emit carbon dioxide during combustion, but when hydrogen is used as a fuel, it can cause more nitrogen oxide emissions than methane.
data.target_sentence: Hydrogen is a representative carbon-free fuel and has the great advantage of not emitting carbon dioxide during combustion. However, when hydrogen is used as a fuel, it can emit more nitrogen oxides than methane.

data.source_sentence: 반대로, 수소의 빠른 화염 속도로 인한 낮은 희박 가연 한계를 이용한다면, 부분 부하 운전 조건에서는 비교적 낮은 온도에서 화염을 안정적으로 유지하면서 메탄에 비해 상대적으로 낮은 질소산화물 배출을 기대할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Conversely, if the low lean flammability limit due to the high flame speed of hydrogen is used, a relatively low NOx emission compared to methane can be expected while maintaining the flame stably at a relatively low temperature under partial load operating conditions.
data.target_sentence: Conversely, with hydrogen's low lean flammability limit due to its high flame speed, relatively low NOx emissions can be expected compared to methane while maintaining a stable flame at relatively low temperatures under part-load operating conditions.

data.source_sentence: 수소와 더불어 암모니아는 대표적인 무탄소 연료 중 하나이다.
data.mt_sentence: Along with hydrogen, ammonia is one of the representative carbon-free fuels.
data.target_sentence: Ammonia is one of the representative carbon-free fuels along with hydrogen.

data.source_sentence: 이 암모니아는 연료로서 직접 이용될 수 있을 뿐만 아니라 수소 캐리어 역할도 할 수 있기에, 발전 부분에서 이 연료의 활용이 탄소중립 실현을 가속화할 수 있을 것으로 기대된다.
data.mt_sentence: Since this ammonia can be used not only as a fuel directly but also as a hydrogen carrier, it is expected that the use of this fuel in power generation will accelerate the realization of carbon neutrality.

data.source_sentence: 더욱이, 암모니아는 수소와 메탄과 비교하였을 때, 높은 비등점과 낮은 응결 기압을 갖고 있어서 수송 및 저장이 용이한 장점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Moreover, compared with hydrogen and methane, ammonia has a high boiling point and low condensing pressure, so that it is easy to transport and store.
data.target_sentence: In addition, ammonia has a higher boiling point and lower condensing pressure than hydrogen and methane, making it easy to transport and store.

data.source_sentence: 암모니아를 가스터빈 엔진의 연료로서 직접 이용하기 위해서 두 가지의 기술적 난제 해결이 선행되어야 한다.

data.source_sentence: 본 6.2절에서는 앞서 언급한 암모니아 연소의 두 가지 단점에 대해 다루고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: This section 6.2 will address the two disadvantages of ammonia combustion mentioned above.
data.target_sentence: This section 6.2 will address the two disadvantages of ammonia combustion mentioned above.

data.source_sentence: 화염 속도가 압력이 증가함에 따라 감소하는 경향이 있어, 실제 가스터빈 엔진의 고압 환경에서는 위 수치보다 더 낮아질 것으로 예상한다.

data.mt_sentence: Ammonia, unlike hydrogen, is a carbon-free fuel that contains nitrogen atoms.
data.target_sentence: Ammonia, unlike hydrogen, is a carbon-free fuel that contains nitrogen atoms.

data.source_sentence: 암모니아에 포함된 질소 원자는 비교적 낮은 온도에서 해리될 수 있고, 연소 과정에서 발생하는 중간 생성물에 의해 질소산화물로 쉽게 전환될 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 암모니아 연소의 질소산화물 배출 특성과 더불어, 연료 과농 조건에서는 다량의 미연소된 암모니아가 급격하게 증가한다.

data.mt_sentence: Various efforts are being made around the world, such as the formation of an international consortium, business agreements between countries, and business agreements between companies, centering on carbon-neutral fuels.
data.target_sentence: Various efforts are being made around the world, such as the formation of an international consortium, business agreements between countries, and business agreements between companies, centering on carbon-neutral fuels.

data.source_sentence: 탄소중립 가스터빈 연소는 자체 기술 개발도 중요하지만, 여러 국가 간, 기업 간의 설정에 따라, 환경 변수가 달라질 것이며, 여러 가지 시나리오에 대응할 수 있는 기술 개발이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Carbon-neutral gas turbine combustion is also important to develop its own technology, but environmental variables will vary depending on the settings between countries and companies, and it is necessary to develop technology that can respond to various scenarios.
data.target_sentence: In-house technology development is also important for carbon-neutral gas turbine combustion, but environmental variables vary according to country and company settings, and technology development that can respond to various scenarios is required.

data.source_sentence: 내연 기관 엔진에서 사용되고 있는 대표적인 에너지원제가 따른다.
data.mt_sentence: A representative energy source used in internal combustion engine engines follows.
data.target_sentence: Typical energy sources used in internal combustion engines are as follows.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 연구 분야 중, 디젤 엔진의 매연 저감을 위한 대체 에너지 연구가 활발히 수행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Among these research fields, research on alternative energy for reducing soot from diesel engines is being actively conducted.
data.target_sentence: Among these research fields, research on alternative energy to reduce the soot from diesel engines is being actively conducted.

data.source_sentence: 이와 관련된 다양한 연구 분야 중 하나로 기존 탄화수소 연료의 배기 배출물 저감을 극대화하기 위한 연료(Fuel)와 물(H2O)을 혼합한 에멀젼(Emulsion) 연료 연구가 활발히 수행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As one of the various research fields related to this, research on emulsion fuel, which is a mixture of fuel and water (H2O), has been actively conducted to maximize the reduction of exhaust emissions of existing hydrocarbon fuels.
data.target_sentence: As one of the various research fields related to this, research on emulsion fuel, which is a mixture of fuel and water (H2O), is being actively conducted to maximize exhaust gas reduction of existing hydrocarbon fuels.

data.source_sentence: 에멀젼 연료는 서로 다른 두 액체(Liquid)의 혼합물로 연소 특성 변화를 위해 사용하며 주요 특성 변화로 미소 폭발(Micro-explosion) 현상이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Emulsion fuel is a mixture of two different liquids and is used to change combustion characteristics, and there is a micro-explosion phenomenon as a major characteristic change.
data.target_sentence: Emulsion fuels are mixtures of two different liquids used to change their combustion characteristics, with micro-explosives as the main characteristic change.

data.source_sentence: 미소 폭발은 액적(Droplet) 안에서 서로 다른 물성을 갖는 액체 간의 비등점 차이로 인하여 먼저 기화된 액체에 의해 액적이 팽창하다가 폭발하는 현상이며, 이로 인해 연료가 미립화되는 대표적인 특성을 갖는다.
data.mt_sentence: Micro-explosion is a phenomenon in which a droplet expands and then explodes due to a difference in boiling point between liquids having different physical properties in a droplet, which is vaporized first, and thus has a typical characteristic of atomizing fuel.
data.target_sentence: A micro-explosion is a phenomenon in which a droplet expands and then explodes due to the difference in boiling point between liquids having different physical properties in the droplet. Due to this, the fuel has a typical characteristic of atomization.

data.source_sentence: 이 과정에서 미소 폭발로 미립화된 연료는 공기와의 접촉 면적이 증가해 연소 효율이 증가되며, 연소 과정에서 물의 증발 잠열에 의해 단일 연료 연소보다 화염의 최대 온도가 낮아진다.
data.mt_sentence: In this process, the fuel atomized by micro-explosion increases the contact area with air to increase the combustion efficiency, and the maximum temperature of the flame is lower than that of single fuel combustion due to the latent heat of evaporation of water in the combustion process.
data.target_sentence: In this process, the fuel atomized by the micro-explosion increases the contact area with air to increase the combustion efficiency, and the maximum temperature of the flame is lower than that of single fuel combustion due to the latent heat of evaporation of water during combustion process.

data.source_sentence: NOX와 PM의 저감 효과는 환경 오염에 대한 대안으로 에멀젼 연료가 주목받는 가장 주요한 요인으로 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: The reduction effect of NOX and PM is considered to be the most important factor in which emulsion fuel is attracting attention as an alternative to environmental pollution.
data.target_sentence: The reduction effect of NOX and PM is considered to be the most important factor that emulsion fuel is attracting attention as an alternative to environmental pollution.

data.source_sentence: 바이오디젤 연료는 디젤 연료보다 CO(Carbon monoxide), HC(Hydrocarbon), PM 및 Soot 저감에 효과적이지만 질소산화물 배출이 증가하는 단점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Biodiesel fuel is more effective in reducing carbon monoxide (CO), HC (hydrocarbon), PM and soot than diesel fuel, but has the disadvantage of increasing nitrogen oxide emissions.
data.target_sentence: Biodiesel fuel is more effective at reducing carbon monoxide (CO), HC (hydrocarbons), PM and soot than diesel fuel, but has the disadvantage of increasing nitrogen oxide emissions.

data.source_sentence: 배기 배출 저감에 더 효과적인 바이오디젤 에멀젼 연료의 연소 특성에 관한 연구는 미비하다.
data.mt_sentence: Studies on the combustion characteristics of biodiesel emulsion fuel, which are more effective in reducing exhaust emission, are scarce.
data.target_sentence: Studies on the combustion characteristics of biodiesel emulsion fuel, which are more effective in reducing exhaust gas, are lacking.

data.source_sentence: 이에 따라, 연료의 기초적인 연소 특성 연구에 특화된 액적 연소 실험을 수행하여 바이오디젤 에멀젼 연료 연소 특성 분석이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Accordingly, it is necessary to analyze the combustion characteristics of biodiesel emulsion fuel by performing a droplet combustion experiment specialized in the study of the basic combustion characteristics of fuel.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, it is necessary to analyze the combustion characteristics of biodiesel emulsion fuels by conducting droplet combustion experiments specialized in the study of basic combustion characteristics of fuels.

data.source_sentence: 실험으로 얻은 디젤 에멀젼과 바이오디젤 에멀젼 연료의 특성이 비슷하면 디젤 에멀젼 연료에서 진행된 선행 연구 결과들로 바이오디젤 에멀젼 연료에서의 적용 가능성을 판단할 수 있을 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: If the characteristics of the diesel emulsion and biodiesel emulsion fuel obtained from the experiment are similar, the applicability of the biodiesel emulsion fuel can be judged from the results of previous studies conducted on the diesel emulsion fuel.
data.target_sentence: If the properties of the diesel emulsion obtained through the experiment and the biodiesel emulsion fuel are similar, the applicability of the biodiesel emulsion fuel can be judged from the results of previous studies on the diesel emulsion fuel.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 디젤, 바이오디젤 단일 연료와 물을 혼합한 에멀젼 연료의 연소 특성 및 기초 화염 특성을 비교 분석하기 위해 단일 액적 연소 실험을 적용하여 실험 연구를 중점으로 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, a single droplet combustion experiment was applied to compare and analyze the combustion characteristics and basic flame characteristics of emulsion fuels in which diesel and biodiesel single fuel and water were mixed.
data.target_sentence: In this study, a single droplet combustion experiment was applied to compare and analyze the combustion characteristics and basic flame characteristics of diesel and biodiesel single fuel and water-mixed emulsion fuel.

data.source_sentence: 본 실험 연구에서 사용된 장치는 Fig. 1과 같이 두 개의 알루미늄 레일과 실험용 고정대(Wood panel)를 제작하였고, 지름 6.0 mm 저항 4.33 Ω 열선을 활용하여 코일 형태의 점화기로 사용하여 구성하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The device used in this experimental study is shown in Fig. As shown in 1, two aluminum rails and a wood panel were fabricated, and a coil-type igniter was used using a 6.0 mm diameter resistance 4.33 Ω heating wire.
data.target_sentence: The device used in this experiment is shown in Fig. 1, two aluminum rails and one wooden panel were manufactured, and a coil type igniter was manufactured using a heating wire with a diameter of 6.0 mm and a resistance of 4.33 Ω.

data.source_sentence: 연료 액적의 연소를 위해 강선(Fiber)을 사용하여 액적을 고정하였으며, 전원공급 장치(Power supply; TPE-3010S)와 직접 연결된 코일 점화기를 활용하여 액적 연소를 위한 열원이 공급되도록 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The droplet was fixed using a fiber for combustion of the fuel droplet, and a heat source for combustion of the droplet was supplied by using a coil igniter directly connected to a power supply (TPE-3010S).
data.target_sentence: The droplet was fixed by using a fiber for fuel droplet combustion, and a heat source for droplet combustion (TPE-3010S) was supplied using a coil igniter directly connected to a power source.

data.source_sentence: 실험에 사용된 전원 공급 장치는 출력 전류와 전압을 최대 10 A, 30 V만큼 인가시킬 수 있으며 전원 공급 장치에 대한 제원(Specification)은 Table 1과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The power supply used in the experiment can apply an output current and voltage of up to 10 A and 30 V, and the specifications for the power supply are shown in Table 1.
data.target_sentence: The power used in the experiment can apply the maximum output current and voltage of 10A and 30V, and the specifications of the power are shown in Table 1.

data.source_sentence: 점화기로부터 공급된 열원은 고정된 연료 액적에 자발화(Auto-ignition) 현상으로 점화되어 연소를 진행하는 실험을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: An experiment was performed in which the heat source supplied from the igniter was ignited by an auto-ignition phenomenon in fixed fuel droplets to proceed with combustion.
data.target_sentence: An experiment was conducted in which the heat source supplied from the igniter was ignited by an auto-ignition phenomenon in a fixed fuel droplet to proceed with combustion.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 단일 액적 연료 연소를 위해 적용된 출력 전류와 전압은 각각 9.0~9.4 A 및 10.5 V로 실험 장치를 구성하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the output current and voltage applied for the combustion of single droplet fuel were 9.0 to 9.4 A and 10.5 V, respectively.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the output current and voltage applied to the combustion of single-droplet fuel were 9.0~9.4A and 10.5V, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 이미지 취득 과정은 전원 공급 장치에서 전원 공급과 동시에 오실로스코프(Oscilloscope; DLM2022)에서 초고속 카메라로 신호가 전달되어 전체 연소 과정을 촬영한 후 실험 이미지를 취득하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the image acquisition process, a signal was transmitted from an oscilloscope (DLM2022) to a high-speed camera at the same time as power was supplied from the power supply, and the entire combustion process was photographed, and then experimental images were acquired.
data.target_sentence: In the image acquisition process, the entire combustion process was captured by sending a signal from the oscilloscope (DLM2022) to the high-speed camera at the same time as power was supplied from the power source.

data.source_sentence: 초고속 카메라로 취득한 액적 연소 이미지들은 MATLAB을 사용하여 이미지를 후처리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Droplet combustion images acquired with a high-speed camera were post-processed using MATLAB.
data.target_sentence: Droplet combustion images acquired with a high-speed camera were post-processed using MATLAB.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 2의 후처리 과정에서 명도 임계값(Threshold value)을 설정하여 원본 이 미지에서 0.6 이상의 명도 영역만 추출하여 필터링하기 때문에 필터링을 거친 화염의 길이는 원본보다 다소 축소된 경향이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the post-processing process of Fig. 2, the length of the filtered flame tends to be somewhat reduced than the original because only the brightness area of 0.6 or more is extracted and filtered from the original image by setting the threshold value.
data.target_sentence: In the post-processing process of FIG. 2, the length of the filtered flame tends to be slightly reduced compared to the original because only a brightness region of 0.6 or more is extracted from the original image by setting a threshold value and filtered.

data.source_sentence: 미소 폭발로 미립화된 액적의 경우에 는 명도가 충족되지 않기 때문에 이미지 후처리 과정에서 화염에 비해 식별에 어려움이 있어, 미소 폭발에 대한 이미지는 원본 이미지를 사용하여 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of droplets atomized by a micro-explosion, since the brightness is not satisfied, it is difficult to identify compared to a flame in the image post-processing process, so the image of the micro-explosion was analyzed using the original image.
data.target_sentence: In the case of droplets sprayed by micro-explosion, the brightness was not satisfied, so it was difficult to identify compared to flame in the image post-processing process, so the micro-explosion image was analyzed using the original image.

data.source_sentence: 후처리 과정을 통해 점화 지연, 화염 소멸, 액적 연소 수명을 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Ignition delay, flame extinction, and droplet combustion lifetime were analyzed through the post-treatment process.
data.target_sentence: Ignition delay, flame extinction, and droplet combustion lifetime were analyzed through the post-treatment process.

data.source_sentence: 점화 지연은 열선에 전류가 공급된 시점부터 연료 액적이 산화하여 화염 발생까지 소요된 기간이다.
data.mt_sentence: Ignition delay is the period from when current is supplied to the heating wire until the fuel droplet is oxidized to generate a flame.
data.target_sentence: Ignition delay is the time from the time an electric current is applied to the heating element until the fuel droplets oxidize and cause a flame.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 3(a)에서 전원 공급 장치가 작동하여 전류를 인가받은 열선으로 부터 가열된 연료 액적이 자발화되어 화염이 발생하는 시점인 Fig. 3(b)까지 측정된 시간이 점화 지연을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: In Fig. 3(a), the time measured up to Fig. 3(b), which is the point at which the heated fuel droplets spontaneously generate flames from the heating wire applied with current by operating the power supply, means the ignition delay.
data.target_sentence: In Fig. 3(a), the time measured until Fig. 3(b), which is the point at which the heated fuel droplet turns on the power and spontaneously generates a flame in the heating wire to which the current is applied, means the ignition delay.

data.source_sentence: 액적 연소 시작 이후 화염이 소멸되는 Fig. 3(c)를 화염 소멸로 정의하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 3(c) in which the flame disappears after the start of droplet combustion was defined as flame extinguishment.
data.target_sentence: In Fig. 3(c), flame extinction after the start of droplet combustion was defined as flame extinction.

data.source_sentence: 이때, 화염 소멸 시점과 점화 지연 사이의 시간차를 계산하여 수명 시간으로 정리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, the time difference between the flame extinction time and the ignition delay was calculated and summarized as the life time.
data.target_sentence: At this time, the time difference between the flame extinction time and the ignition delay was calculated and summarized as the lifetime.

data.source_sentence: 미소 폭발 발생 시기는 Fig. 4와 같이 액적에서 미립화가 발생되는 시간을 측정하여 정리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The timing of the micro-explosion is shown in Fig. As shown in 4, the time at which atomization occurs in the droplets was measured and arranged.
data.target_sentence: The timing of the micro-explosion was arranged by measuring the time at which atomization occurred in the droplet as shown in Figure 4.

data.source_sentence: 과정으로 얻어진 실험 데이터들은 본 실험 연구에 적용된 6가지 연료 종류의 단일 액적 연료에 대한 증발 및 화염 거동 특성 분석을 위해 기초 실험 연구 자료로 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The experimental data obtained through the process were used as basic experimental research data to analyze the characteristics of evaporation and flame behavior of single droplet fuels of the six fuel types applied in this experimental study.
data.target_sentence: The experimental data obtained through this process were used as basic experimental study data to analyze the vaporization characteristics and flame behavior of single droplet fuels of the six fuel types applied in this experimental study.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 5는 미소 폭발이 강하게 발생하여 연소가 중단되거나 급격한 연료 소모로 인한 실화 현상이 발생하는 결과를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 5 shows the results of a strong microexplosion, which stops combustion, or a misfire phenomenon occurs due to rapid fuel consumption.
data.target_sentence: Figure 5 shows the results of a misfire caused by a strong micro-explosion that stops combustion or rapid fuel consumption.

data.source_sentence: 강한 미소 폭발로 퍼져 나가는 연료들이 연소하면서 화염의 크기가 순간적으로 팽창되어 연소하고, 폭발 후 남아있는 연료 액적 직경이 작아 연소가 짧게 진행되거나 폭발과 함께 화염이 소멸하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As the fuel that spreads out with a strong micro-explosion burns, the size of the flame momentarily expands and burns, and the fuel droplet diameter remaining after the explosion is small, so the combustion proceeds briefly or the flame disappears with the explosion.
data.target_sentence: As the fuel that spreads through a strong micro-explosion burns, the size of the flame expands instantaneously and burns, and the diameter of the remaining fuel droplets after the explosion is small, so the combustion proceeds for a while or the flame disappears with the explosion.

data.source_sentence: 이유로 강한 미소 폭발이 발생하면 분석에 필요한 데이터를 얻지 못하였다.
data.mt_sentence: If a strong micro-explosion occurred for some reason, the data needed for analysis could not be obtained.
data.target_sentence: If for some reason a strong micro-explosion occurs, the data needed for analysis cannot be obtained.

data.source_sentence: 이에 따라, 물의 함량이 높을수록 미소 폭발의 강해짐을 억제하기 위해 에멀젼 연료 혼합 시 물 함량을 5.0 Vol%로 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Accordingly, the water content was set to 5.0 Vol% when mixing the emulsion fuel in order to suppress the strength of the micro-explosion as the water content increased.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, in order to suppress the intensity of the micro-explosion as the water content increased, the water content was set to 5.0 Vol% when mixing the emulsion fuel.

data.source_sentence: 본 실험 연구에서는 디젤, 팜유, 카놀라 및 에멀젼 연료를 적용한 액적 연소 실험을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this experimental study, a droplet combustion experiment was conducted to apply diesel, palm oil, canola, and emulsion fuel.
data.target_sentence: In this experimental study, droplet combustion experiments were performed to apply diesel, palm oil, canola oil, and emulsion fuel.

data.source_sentence: 바이오디젤 연료는 인화점, 밀도, 점성, 세탄가 등의 물성치가 디젤 연료에 비해 높게 나타나는 특성이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Biodiesel fuel has properties such as flash point, density, viscosity, and cetane number that appear higher than that of diesel fuel.
data.target_sentence: Biodiesel fuel has characteristics such as flash point, density, viscosity and cetane number that are higher than diesel fuel.

data.source_sentence: 연료-물 에멀젼 연료는 균일한 혼합이 중요하며 이를 위해 계면활성제를 사용하는 방법을 본 연구에 적용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For fuel-water emulsion fuel, uniform mixing is important, and for this purpose, a method using a surfactant was applied in this study.
data.target_sentence: For fuel-water emulsion fuel, uniform mixing is important, and for this purpose, a method using a surfactant was applied in this study.

data.source_sentence: 계면활성제는 친수성(Hydrophilic) 머리와 소수성(Hydro-phobic) 꼬리가 결합한 화합물로 물과 기름을 혼합하는 특성이 있어 에멀젼 연료 혼합에 사용되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The surfactant is a compound that combines a hydrophilic head with a hydrophobic tail and has a property of mixing water and oil, so it is used for emulsion fuel mixing.
data.target_sentence: Surfactant is a compound that combines a hydrophilic head and a hydrophobic tail, and has the property of mixing water and oil, so it is used in emulsion fuel mixing.

data.source_sentence: 에멀젼 연료 액적의 미소 폭발 특성을 보면 다음과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The microexplosion characteristics of the emulsion fuel droplets are as follows.
data.target_sentence: The micro-explosive properties of droplets of emulsion fuel are as follows:

data.source_sentence: 앞서 언급한 바와 같이, 미소 폭발은 에멀젼에 함유된 물이 액적 안에서 기화되어 팽창하다 폭발하는 현상이기 때문에 베이스 원료의 물성이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: As mentioned earlier, the physical properties of the base material are important because the micro-explosion is a phenomenon in which water contained in the emulsion vaporizes in droplets and expands and then explodes.

data.source_sentence: 디젤 연료의 경우, 상대적으로 낮은 점성으로 인해 팽창을 억제하는 힘이 약해져 미소 폭발이 상대적으로 약하게 일어나며 액적의 미립화가 적게 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of diesel fuel, the force to suppress expansion is weakened due to its relatively low viscosity, so that the micro-explosion occurs relatively weakly and the atomization of droplets occurs less.
data.target_sentence: In the case of diesel fuel, the viscosity is relatively low and the force to suppress expansion is weak, so the micro-explosion occurs relatively weakly and the atomization of droplets occurs less.

data.source_sentence: 바이오디젤 연료의 경우 상대적으로 높은 점성에 의해 디젤 에멀젼 연료보다 더 오랜 시간 팽창 가능하며 이를 통해 더 강한 폭발과 분열이 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of biodiesel fuels, relatively high viscosity allows them to expand for longer than diesel emulsion fuels, resulting in stronger explosions and fission.
data.target_sentence: Because biodiesel fuel has a relatively high viscosity, it expands longer than diesel emulsion fuel, resulting in stronger explosions and fission.

data.source_sentence: 바이오디젤 에멀젼 연료는 디젤 에멀젼 연료보다 미소 폭발의 발생 빈도와 미소 폭발과 함께 미립화가 많이 발생하기 때문에 액적 직경 감소에 더 크게 영향을 받는다.
data.mt_sentence: The biodiesel emulsion fuel is more affected by the droplet diameter reduction than the diesel emulsion fuel because of the frequency of occurrence of micro-explosion and the occurrence of atomization with the micro-explosion.
data.target_sentence: Biodiesel emulsion fuel is more affected by droplet diameter reduction than diesel emulsion fuel due to the occurrence frequency of micro-explosion and generation of atomization due to micro-explosion.

data.source_sentence: 점화 지연이 빠른 액적은 미소 폭발이 점화보다 빠르거나 동시에 발생하지만, 점화 지연이 증가한 액적은 점화 지연 이후 미소 폭발이 발생하는 결과를 Fig. 7에서 확인 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: A droplet with a fast ignition delay occurs faster or simultaneously than ignition, but a droplet with an increased ignition delay shows the result of a micro-explosion after ignition delay in Fig. 7.
data.target_sentence: A droplet with a fast ignition delay occurs faster or at the same time as the ignition, but a droplet with an increased ignition delay shows the result of a micro-explosion after ignition delay in Fig. 7.

data.source_sentence: 미소 폭발은 에멀젼 연료 혼합을 위해 사용된 물이 실험 연료의 점도나 표면 장력과 같은 물리적 물성 변화에 영향을 미치고, 연료의 특성이 결과에 직접적인 영향을 미치는 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is judged that the water used for emulsion fuel mixing affects changes in physical properties such as viscosity and surface tension of the experimental fuel, and that the fuel properties directly affect the results.

data.source_sentence: 후속 연구를 통해 에멀젼 연료의 물성 변화가 미소 폭발과 점화 지연 결과에 미치는 영향을 분석하기 위한 추가적인 연구가 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Further studies are needed to analyze the effect of changes in the properties of emulsion fuels on the micro-explosion and ignition delay results through follow-up studies.
data.target_sentence: Further studies are needed to analyze the effects of changes in the properties of tanned fuels on micro-explosion and ignition delay outcomes through follow-up studies.

data.source_sentence: 순수 연료와 에멀젼 연료 액적의 점화가 지연되는 원인을 살펴보고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The purpose of this study is to investigate the cause of delayed ignition of pure fuel and emulsion fuel droplets.
data.target_sentence: The purpose of this study is to investigate the causes of delayed ignition of pure fuel and emulsion fuel droplets.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 8에서 (a)와 (b)는 각각 디젤, 바이오디젤과 에멀젼 연료의 점화 지연을 그래프로 나타냈다.

data.target_sentence: Fig. 8(a) and (b) are graphs showing the ignition delay of diesel, biodiesel, and emulsion fuel, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 바이오디젤 에멀젼 연료는 순수 바이오디젤 연료보다 점화 지연이 감소하는 경향을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Biodiesel emulsion fuel showed a tendency to decrease ignition delay than pure biodiesel fuel.
data.target_sentence: Biodiesel emulsion fuel showed a tendency to reduce ignition delay than pure biodiesel fuel.

data.source_sentence: 이는 상대적으로 강하게 발생하는 미소 폭발이 점화 지연을 감소시키는 현상을 야기하여 나타난 것으로 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: This is thought to be caused by a relatively strong micro-explosion causing a decrease in ignition delay.
data.target_sentence: It is thought that the ignition delay decreased due to the relatively strong micro-explosion.

data.source_sentence: 디젤 에멀젼 연료는 순수 디젤 연료보다 점화 지연이 증가하는 결과를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Diesel emulsion fuel showed increased ignition delay than pure diesel fuel.
data.target_sentence: Diesel emulsion fuel has increased ignition delay than pure diesel fuel.

data.source_sentence: 결과는 디젤 에멀젼연료의 미소 폭발의 영향으로 인한 점화지연의 감소보다액적 내 물의 증발 잠열이 열을 흡수하여 점화지연 시간이 증가하기 때문에 나타난 것으로 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: The result is considered to be because the latent heat of evaporation of water in the droplet absorbs heat and the ignition delay time increases rather than the decrease in ignition delay due to the effect of micro-explosion of diesel emulsion fuel.
