data.source_sentence: 이때, 압입 하중은 코팅막 두께의 10% 이내로 모재 영향성을 배제하였으며 포아송비는 0.18로 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, the indentation load was within 10% of the coating film thickness to exclude the influence of the base material, and a Poisson's ratio of 0.18 was used.
data.target_sentence: At this time, the indentation load was set to within 10% of the thickness of the coating film to exclude the influence of the base material, and Poisson's ratio of 0.18 was used.

data.source_sentence: Table 2에 트라이보 시험에 사용한 운전 조건을 요약하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 2 summarizes the operating conditions used in the tribo test.
data.target_sentence: Table 2 summarizes the operating conditions used for friction testing.

data.source_sentence: 특히, 시험 초기의 트라이볼로지 특성과 장시간 운동 시의 특성 변화가 다름을 가정하고 시험 시간에 대한 회전수는 3600, 7200, 1400, 43000 Cycles로 각각 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, assuming that the tribology characteristic at the beginning of the test and the characteristic change during long-term exercise are different, the number of rotations for the test time was set to 3600, 7200, 1400, and 43000 Cycles, respectively.
data.target_sentence: In particular, assuming that the friction characteristics at the beginning of the test and the change in characteristics during long-term motion are different, the number of revolutions for the test time was set to 3600, 7200, 1400, and 43000 cycles, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 변수에 의해 증착된 ta-C 코팅막의 마찰 거동을 관찰하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The friction behavior of the deposited ta-C coating film was observed by parameters.
data.target_sentence: The friction behavior of the deposited ta-C coating film was observed as a parameter.

data.source_sentence: 평균 마찰 계수의 정성적 값은 모두 0.2 이하로 필터의 꺾임 각도와 방전 전류 차이에 있어 미소한 차이점은 있지만 그 오차의 범위가 작고 안정적 마찰 거동을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: All of the qualitative values of the average friction coefficient were 0.2 or less, and although there was a slight difference in the difference between the bending angle of the filter and the discharge current, the error range was small and the friction behavior was stable.
data.target_sentence: The qualitative values of the average friction coefficient were all less than 0.2, and although there was a slight difference in the difference between the bending angle of the filter and the discharge current, the error range was small and the friction behavior was stable.

data.source_sentence: 자장 필터의 꺾임 각도가 90으로 제작된 시료에서 마찰 계수의 평균 진팅막 대비 45폭이 불규칙적으로 발생하는 것이 관찰되었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was observed that the 45 width of the friction coefficient compared to the average jintting film was irregularly generated in the sample manufactured with the bending angle of the magnetic field filter of 90.
data.target_sentence: It was observed that in the sample prepared with the bending angle of the magnetic field filter at 90°, the width of the friction coefficient compared to the average jintting film was 45° irregularly.

data.source_sentence: 변수에 의해 증착된 ta-C 코팅막의 마모 거동을 관찰하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The abrasion behavior of the deposited ta-C coating film was observed by parameters.
data.target_sentence: The wear behavior of the deposited ta-C coating film was observed as a parameter.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 5에 ta-C 코팅막과 상대 재료의 마모량을 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 5 shows the amount of wear of the ta-C coating film and the counterpart material.
data.target_sentence: Figure 5 shows the wear amount of the ta-C coating film and the mating material.

data.source_sentence: 초기 마모 구간에서는 필터 유형 (90)과 방전 전류의 설정값 효과는 거의 없고 코팅막의 경도 특성(Fig. 3)이 주요 인자로 disk와 ball 모두에서 높은 마모량을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the initial wear section, the filter type (90) and the discharge current have little effect, and the hardness characteristics of the coating film (Fig. 3) are the main factors, and they show high wear in both disk and ball.
data.target_sentence: In the early wear period, the filter type (90) and the setpoint effect of the discharge current have little effect. The hardness characteristic of the coating film (Fig. 3) was the main factor and showed a high amount of wear on both the disk and the ball.

data.source_sentence: 방전 전류가 100 A로 제작된 시료에서 가장 많은 마모량을 보이며 방전 전류가 60 A로 감소될 때 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The sample produced with a discharge current of 100 A showed the largest wear and tear, which was decreased when the discharge current was reduced to 60 A.
data.target_sentence: The sample produced with a discharge current of 100A showed the greatest wear and decreased when the discharge current was reduced to 60A.

data.source_sentence: 특성은 필터의 유형 차이보다는 높은 방전 전류에서 코팅 속도가 증가하고 경도가 감소하는 상반 관계에서 나타나는 현상으로 설명할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Characteristics can be explained by the reciprocal relationship where the coating rate increases and the hardness decreases at high discharge current, rather than the difference in filter type.
data.target_sentence: Characteristics can be described as an inverse relationship where the coating rate increases and the hardness decreases at high discharge current, rather than the difference in filter types.

data.source_sentence: 현상은, Carbon-based 코팅막 등 DLC 코팅에서 나타나는 전형적인 계면에서의 흑연화(graphitization)에 의한 저마찰 · 저마모 메커니즘으로 설명할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The phenomenon can be explained by a low friction and low wear mechanism by graphitization at the interface typical of DLC coatings such as carbon-based coatings.
data.target_sentence: This phenomenon can be explained by the mechanism of low friction and low wear due to graphitization at the common interface of DLC coatings such as carbon-based coatings.

data.source_sentence: 상대적으로 방전 전류가 높고 필터의 각도가 작아질수록 흑연화가 가속되어 저마찰 · 저마모 특성이 나타나야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: As the discharge current is relatively high and the angle of the filter is small, graphitization is accelerated, and low friction and low abrasion characteristics should appear.
data.target_sentence: Because the discharge current is relatively high and the angle of the filter is small, graphitization should be promoted, and the characteristics of low friction and low wear should appear.

data.source_sentence: 필터 각도 45, 방전 전류 100 A 조건의 경우 기계적 물성이 가장 작지만 가장 높은 마모량이 나타났으므로 추가적 원인 규명을 하고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of a filter angle of 45 and a discharge current of 100 A, the mechanical properties were the smallest, but the highest abrasion was observed, so the cause was further investigated.
data.target_sentence: In the case of a filter angle of 45 degrees and a discharge current of 100A, the mechanical properties were the smallest, but the highest abrasion was observed, so the cause was further investigated.

data.source_sentence: 이를 위해 3.1절에서 언급한 마찰 거동 결과로부터 고경도 코팅 표면에 존재하는 거대 입자의 돌출이 마모에도 영향을 주었을 것으로 판단되어 표면 거칠기 변화를 측정하고 그 결과를 Fig. 6에 표시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: To this end, the result of the friction behavior mentioned in Section 3.1 determines that the protrusion of large particles on the surface of the high hardness coating may have affected wear, and the change in surface roughness is measured and the result is shown in Fig. 6.
data.target_sentence: For this purpose, as a result of the friction behavior mentioned in Section 3.1, it was determined that the protrusion of large particles on the surface of the high-hardness coating film could affect the wear, and the change in surface roughness was measured and the result is shown in Fig. 6.

data.source_sentence: 표면 거칠기의 경우 마모 트랙 내부에 존재하는 거대 입자의 크기와 양을 산출하기 위해 10점 평균 거칠기(Rz)를 활용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of surface roughness, a 10-point average roughness (Rz) was used to calculate the size and amount of large particles present inside the abrasion track.
data.target_sentence: For surface roughness, a 10-point average roughness (Rz) was used to calculate the size and amount of large particles present inside the wear track.

data.source_sentence: ta-C 코팅 막의 연삭 마모는 외력이 작용하고 있는 상태에서 상대 재료와의 상호 접촉으로 인해 표면에서 코팅막의 찢김을 유발하는 것으로 시작한다.
data.mt_sentence: The abrasive wear of the ta-C coating film starts by causing the coating film to tear at the surface due to the mutual contact with the mating material under an external force.
data.target_sentence: Abrasion of the ta-C coating film starts with the phenomenon of tearing of the coating film from the surface due to mutual contact with the counterpart by external force.

data.source_sentence: 이후, 회전수가 증가함에 따라 마모 표면 층에서 매우 작은 거대 입자의 debris 조각이 마모면을 따라 이동한다.
data.mt_sentence: Thereafter, as the number of revolutions increases, very small large particles of debris from the wear surface layer move along the wear surface.
data.target_sentence: After that, as the number of revolutions increases, very small and large debris particles from the wear surface layer move along the wear surface.

data.source_sentence: 이후, 연속적 접촉에 따라 소성 변형과 함께 연삭 마모가 증가한다.
data.mt_sentence: Thereafter, grinding wear increases along with plastic deformation according to continuous contact.
data.target_sentence: Thereafter, the abrasive wear increases with plastic deformation due to continuous contact.

data.source_sentence: 종합적 현상은 접촉 면적 증대와 함께 표면 거칠기 증가로 이어졌을 것으로 추측되었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was assumed that the overall phenomenon led to an increase in the surface roughness along with an increase in the contact area.
data.target_sentence: It was assumed that the overall phenomenon leads to an increase in surface roughness along with an increase in the contact area.

data.source_sentence: ta-C 코팅막, 상대 재료의 마모량 분석 결과와 표면 거칠기 변화 분석을 바탕으로 추론한 마모 메커니즘의 규명을 위해 Fig. 7에 회전수에 따른 disk와 ball의 광학이미지를 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 7 shows the optical images of disks and balls according to the rotational speed to identify the wear mechanism inferred based on the analysis of the wear amount of the Ta-C coating film and the relative material and the analysis of the change in surface roughness.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 7 shows the optical images of the disk and ball according to the rotational speed to understand the wear mechanism inferred through the analysis of the wear amount of the Ta-C coating film and the relative material and the analysis of the change in surface roughness.

data.source_sentence: 실험에 사용된 시료 모두 disk의 연삭 마모량은 cycles 증가에 따라 감소하였으며 장기간 마모 구간에서의 마모 면과 ball에서의 wear scar면은 매우 매끄럽게 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: For all samples used in the experiment, the grinding wear of disk decreased with increasing cycles, and the wear surface in the long-term wear section and the wear scar surface in the ball were very smooth.
data.target_sentence: For all specimens used in the experiment, the grinding wear of the disk decreased as the cycle increased, and the wear surface in the long-term wear section and the wear trace surface of the ball were very smooth.

data.source_sentence: 아울러, 꺾임 각도가 90도에서 제작된 ta-C 코팅막이 상대적으로 거대 입자에서 제작된 코팅막 대비 크기와 양이 많았다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, the ta-C coating film produced at a bending angle of 90 degrees had a relatively large size and quantity compared to the coating film produced from large particles.
data.target_sentence: In addition, the ta-C coating film produced at a bending angle of 90 degrees showed a relatively large size and amount compared to the coating film produced with large particles.

data.source_sentence: 이를 통해, 필터의 꺾임 각도와 아크 방전 전류별 제작된 ta-C 코팅막의 마찰 및 마모 거동에 대한 원인을 규명하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this, the cause of the friction and wear behavior of the ta-C coating film manufactured by the bending angle of the filter and the arc discharge current was investigated.
data.target_sentence: Through this, the cause of friction and wear behavior of the ta-C coating film prepared by the bending angle of the filter and the arc discharge current was investigated.

data.source_sentence: 자장 필터 꺾임 각도 차이에 따른 마모 특성의 현상에 대한 마모 메커니즘 수립을 위해 FE-SEM 측정 이미지를 Fig. 8에 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 1 shows the FE-SEM measurement images to establish the wear mechanism for the wear characteristics caused by the difference in the bending angle of the magnetic field filter. 8 is shown.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 8 is an FE-SEM measurement image to establish the wear mechanism for the wear characteristics according to the difference in the bending angle of the magnetic field filter.

data.source_sentence: 마모면의 측정 지점은 연삭 마모가 가장 잘 관찰되는 구간인 14000 cycles 시험 후 표면을 선정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The measurement point of the wear surface was selected after the 14000 cycles test, which is the section where grinding wear is most observed.
data.target_sentence: The measurement point of the wear surface was selected after the 14000 cycle test, which is the section where grinding wear is observed the most.

data.source_sentence: 이때 비교를 위해 자장 필터 꺾임 각도가 45 및 90도와 아크 방전 전류 100 A로 각각 증착된 ta-C 코팅막이 사용되었다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, for comparison, a ta-C coating film deposited with a magnetic field filter bending angle of 45 and 90 degrees and an arc discharge current of 100 A, respectively, was used.
data.target_sentence: At this time, for comparison, a ta-C coating film deposited with a magnetic field filter bending angle of 45 degrees and 90 degrees and an arc discharge current of 100A was used.

data.source_sentence: 대표적인 표면 결함은 (1) 양각의 거대 입자, (2) 양각의 spike (3) 음각의 pore로 구분된다.
data.mt_sentence: Representative surface defects are classified into (1) embossed large particles, (2) embossed spikes and (3) engraved pores.
data.target_sentence: Representative surface defects are classified as (1) embossed large particles, (2) embossed spikes, and (3) engraved pores.

data.source_sentence: 거대 입자는 코팅 초기 단계에서 기계적 필터에 완벽하게 여과되지 않고 코팅막에 증착되는 흑연 입자이다.
data.mt_sentence: Large particles are graphite particles that are not completely filtered by the mechanical filter in the initial stage of coating and are deposited on the coating film.
data.target_sentence: Large particles are graphite particles that are not completely filtered by a mechanical filter at the beginning of the coating film and are deposited on the coating film.

data.source_sentence: Spike는 코팅 중 기계적 필터에서 흡착된 탄소가 모재로 입사되어 생성된 DLC 성분의 부산물이며 기공(pore)는 거대 입자가 코팅 중 DLC 코팅막에서 탈락된 기공 형태의 결함이다.
data.mt_sentence: Spike is a by-product of the DLC component generated when carbon adsorbed from the mechanical filter enters the base material during coating, and pores are pore-shaped defects in which large particles are removed from the DLC coating film during coating.
data.target_sentence: Spikes are by-products of DLC components that occur when carbon adsorbed from a mechanical filter enters the base material during the coating process, and pores are pore-shaped defects in which large particles are removed from the DLC coating film during the coating process.

data.source_sentence: 자장에서 제작된 ta-C 코팅막에서 필터 각도가 90의 마모흔이 선명하게 존재하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Abrasion marks with a filter angle of 90 were clearly present in the ta-C coating film produced in a magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: Abrasions with a filter angle of 90° were clearly present in the ta-C coating film generated in a magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: ta-C 코팅의 장기간 사용을 위한 코팅 조건의 선정 시에는 기계적 물성에 대한 고려도 중요하지만 제작하는 자장 필터의 꺾임 각도 선정이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: When selecting coating conditions for long-term use of ta-C coating, consideration of mechanical properties is important, but it is important to select the bending angle of the magnetic field filter to be manufactured.
data.target_sentence: While it is important to consider the mechanical properties when selecting coating conditions for long-term use of ta-C coatings, it is also important to select the bending angle of the magnetic field filter to be manufactured.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 두 가지 타입의 자장 여과필터(90o)의 꺾임 각도와 아크 방전 전류(60 A, 100 A)에 의해 제작된 ta-C 코팅막을 활용하여 장시간 사용을 목적으로 트라이볼로지 특성을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This research verified the tribological characteristics for long-term use using the Ta-C coating film manufactured by the bending angles of the two types of magnetic field filter (90o) and arc discharge currents (60A, 100A).
data.target_sentence: In this study, friction characteristics were verified during long-term use using a Ta-C coating film made with two magnetic field filters (90o) and a bending angle of arc discharge currents (60A, 100A).

data.source_sentence: 트라이보 시험 후 마찰, 마모, 표면 거칠기 및 마모면 분석으로부터 추론한 메커니즘에 대한 실험적 결과는 아래와 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The experimental results for the mechanism deduced from the analysis of friction, wear, surface roughness and wear surface after the tribo test are as follows.
data.target_sentence: After the friction test, the experimental results for the mechanism derived from the friction, wear, surface roughness and wear surface analysis are as follows.

data.source_sentence: 자장필터 꺾임 각도 및 아크 방전 전류 변수는 평균 마찰계수(0.2 이하)에 영향은 없으나 필터의 꺾임 각도가 90°에서 45°로 변경될 경우 표면 결함증가에 따라 마찰계수의 진폭 변화에 영향이 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetic field filter bending angle and arc discharge current variables did not affect the average friction coefficient (0.2 or less), but when the bending angle of the filter was changed from 90° to 45°, the change in the amplitude of the friction coefficient was affected by the increase in surface defects.
data.target_sentence: The magnetic field filter bending angle and arc discharge current variables have no effect on the average friction coefficient (less than 0.2). However, when the bending angle of the filter was changed from 90° to 45°, the change in the amplitude of the friction coefficient was affected by the increase in surface defects.

data.source_sentence: 장기 마모 구간에 있어서는, ta-C 코팅막의 흑연화가 최대 4.6배의 마모량 감소로 이어졌으나 disk의 표면 거칠기가 중요한 요소로 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the long-term wear section, graphitization of the ta-C coating film led to a reduction of abrasion by up to 4.6 times, but it was confirmed that the surface roughness of the disk was an important factor.
data.target_sentence: In the long-term wear section, the abrasion was reduced by up to 4.6 times due to graphitization of the ta-C coating film, but it was confirmed that the surface roughness of the disk was an important factor.

data.source_sentence: 장기간 마모 구간에서 표면 거칠기가 지배적으로 작용한 원인은 ta-C 코팅막 표면 및 내부에 숨어있는 (spike) 결함이 연삭 마모 과정에 있어 영향을 준 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The cause of the dominant action of surface roughness in the long-term wear period is that the ta-C coating film surface and hidden (spike) defects affected the grinding wear process.
data.target_sentence: The dominant cause of surface roughness during long-term wear is that the ta-C coating surface and hidden (spike) defects affect the abrasive wear process.

data.source_sentence: 윤활유는 다양한 기계 시스템에서 마찰 및 마모 감소의 기능 외에도 냉각, 힘의 전달 등 여러가지 유용한 기능들을 수행한다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition to reducing friction and wear in various mechanical systems, lubricants perform a number of useful functions, such as cooling and transmission of forces.
data.target_sentence: In addition to reducing friction and wear in various mechanical systems, lubricants perform a number of useful functions, such as cooling and force transmission.

data.source_sentence: 윤활유의 관리는 윤활유를 사용하는 기계 시스템의 유지 및 보수 측면에서 아주 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Management of lubricants is very important in terms of maintenance and repair of mechanical systems using lubricants.
data.target_sentence: Lubricating oil management is very important in terms of maintenance and repair of mechanical systems that use lubricants.

data.source_sentence: 윤활유의 오염도를 정기적으로 점검하거나 윤활유 센서를 기반한 상시 모니터링 시스템을 설치하여 윤활유의 상태를 확인한다.
data.mt_sentence: Regularly check the contamination level of the lubricant or install a constant monitoring system based on the lubricant sensor to check the condition of the lubricant.
data.target_sentence: Check the contamination level of the lubricant regularly or install a constant monitoring system based on the lubricant sensor to check the condition of the lubricant.

data.source_sentence: 이렇게 윤활유의 효과적인 관리는 기계시스템의 내구성과 직접적인 관련이 있으므로 반드시 필요한 절차이다.
data.mt_sentence: Effective management of lubricating oil is a necessary procedure because it is directly related to the durability of the mechanical system.
data.target_sentence: Effective management of lubricating oil is a necessary procedure because it is directly related to the durability of the mechanical system.

data.source_sentence: 윤활유의 사용 기간이 증가할수록 그 성능이 열화되므로 원활한 기능의 수 행 및 효과적인 관리를 위해서는 적당한 시점에 윤활유를 교체해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the performance deteriorates as the period of use of the lubricant increases, it is necessary to replace the lubricant at an appropriate time for smooth function performance and effective management.
data.target_sentence: Since the performance deteriorates as the period of use of the lubricant increases, it is necessary to replace the lubricant at an appropriate time for smooth functional performance and effective management.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1은 배관 시스템에서 배관 내벽의 녹(rust)을 제거하는 작업의 전과 후의 모습을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 1 shows the before and after operation of removing rust from the inner wall of the pipe in the pipe system.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 1 shows the before and after rust removal of the inner wall of the pipe in the pipe system.

data.source_sentence: 오일 플러싱은 녹 뿐만 아니라 슬러지(sludge), 마모 입자(wear particle), 물 등의 오염물을 제거하여 기계 시스템 또는 장비의 성능을 유지하고 잠재적인 고장의 원인을 감소시키는 데 효과적이다.
data.mt_sentence: Oil flushing is effective in removing rust as well as contaminants such as sludge, wear particles, and water to maintain the performance of mechanical systems or equipment and reduce potential causes of failure.
data.target_sentence: Oil flushing is effective in removing rust as well as contaminants such as sludge, abrasive particles and water to maintain the performance of mechanical systems or equipment and reduce potential causes of failure.

data.source_sentence: 오일 플러싱을 효과적으로 수행하기 위해서는 전용 플러싱 오일을 사용하거나 사용 압력보다 조금 높은 압력으로 순환하여 이물질을 제거한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to effectively perform oil flushing, use dedicated flushing oil or circulate at a pressure slightly higher than the operating pressure to remove foreign substances.
data.target_sentence: For effective oil flushing, use dedicated flushing oil or circulate at a pressure slightly higher than the operating pressure to remove foreign substances.

data.source_sentence: 용제(solvent)가 없어 플러싱 후에 새로운 윤활유가 주입되더라도 윤활유의 기능에 문제가 없게 한다.
data.mt_sentence: There is no solvent, so even if a new lubricant is injected after flushing, there is no problem with the function of the lubricant.
data.target_sentence: Since there is no solvent, make sure that there is no problem with the function of the lubricant even if new lubricant is added after flushing.

data.source_sentence: 오일 플러싱은 Fig. 2와 같이 발전 및 해양 플랜트, 방위 산업, 풍력 발전, 조선, 제지 산업, 건설기계, 철도, 석유화학 산업 등 다양한 분야에 적용하여 기계 시스템의 신뢰성을 유지, 보존하는데 기여하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Oil flushing is applied to various fields such as power generation and offshore plants, defense industry, wind power generation, shipbuilding, paper industry, construction machinery, railway, and petrochemical industry, contributing to maintaining and preserving the reliability of mechanical systems, as shown in Fig.  2.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Figure 2, oil flushing is applied to various fields such as power generation and offshore plants, defense industry, wind power generation, shipbuilding, paper industry, construction machinery, railways, petrochemicals, and mechanical systems.

data.source_sentence: 기존의 오일 플러싱 시스템에서 이물질을 제거하는 데 한계가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: There is a limit to removing foreign substances from the existing oil flushing system.
data.target_sentence: There is a limit to the removal of foreign matter in conventional oil flushing systems.

data.source_sentence: 즉 기계 시스템의 곳곳에 산재되어 있는 이물질을 기존의 방법으로는 제거하는 데 어려움이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: That is, it is difficult to remove foreign substances scattered throughout the mechanical system by an existing method.
data.target_sentence: That is, it is difficult to remove foreign substances scattered throughout the machine system by the conventional method.

data.source_sentence: 보다 효과적인 방법으로 플러싱을 수행함으로써 이물질에 의한 손상 방지, 잠재적 고장을 방지하려는 연구가 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Research is needed to prevent damage caused by foreign substances and prevent potential failure by performing flushing in a more effective way.
data.target_sentence: Research is needed to perform flushing in a more effective way to prevent damage from debris and prevent potential failure.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 기존 오일 플러싱 장치에 마이크로 버블 발생 장치를 결합함으로써 배관 내벽 뿐만 아니라 윤활시스템 여러 곳에 산재한 이물질을 제거하여 플러싱의 성능을 개선하고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study attempted to improve the performance of flushing by removing foreign substances scattered not only in the inner wall of the pipe but also in various places of the lubrication system by combining the microbubble generator with the existing oil flushing device.
data.target_sentence: In this study, we tried to improve the flushing performance by combining a micro bubble generator with an existing oil flushing device to remove foreign substances scattered on various parts of the lubrication system as well as the inner wall of the pipe.

data.source_sentence: 기존 오일 플러싱 장치의 개선을 위해 마이크로 버블 발생 장치를 개발하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A microbubble generating device was developed to improve the existing oil flushing device.
data.target_sentence: To improve the existing oil flushing device, we developed a microbubble generator.

data.source_sentence: 마이크로 버블 발생 장치는 벤츄리(Venturi) 효과를 이용하여 마이크로 버블들을 윤활유 순환 시스템에 공급하는 장치이다.
data.mt_sentence: The microbubble generator is a device that supplies microbubbles to the lubricant circulation system using the Venturi effect.
data.target_sentence: A micro-bubble generator is a device that uses the venturi effect to supply micro-bubbles to the lubricating oil circulation system.

data.source_sentence: 벤츄리 효과는 파이프 내부의 유동에서 유체가 단면적이 좁은 영역을 지날 때 압력이 작아지는 현상이다.
data.mt_sentence: The venturi effect is a phenomenon in which the pressure decreases when the fluid passes through a narrow area in the flow inside the pipe.
data.target_sentence: The venturi effect is a decrease in pressure as a fluid passes through a narrow area in the flow inside a pipe.

data.source_sentence: 해석 모델의 기하학적 형상은 Table 1에 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: The geometric shape of the analysis model is shown in Table 1.
data.target_sentence: The geometrical form of the analysis model is shown in Table 1.

data.source_sentence: 공기 관(air tube)은 지름이 5 mm 이고 원주 방향으로 10개가 등 간격으로 설치되어 있으며 윤활유 순환 라인(lube circulation line)과 연결되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The air tube has a diameter of 5 mm, and 10 are installed at equal intervals in the circumferential direction, and are connected to the lube circulation line.
data.target_sentence: 10 air tubes with a diameter of 5mm are installed at equal intervals in the circumferential direction and are connected to the lubricating oil circulation line.

data.source_sentence: 압축기를 사용하여 적절한 압력의 공기로 압축하여 공기 관에 공급하고 벤츄리 형상의 윤활유 순환 라인에는 미세한 공기 호스(air hose)를 통해 공기가 공급된다.
data.mt_sentence: Using a compressor, it is compressed with air of an appropriate pressure and supplied to the air pipe, and air is supplied to the venturi-shaped lubricant circulation line through a fine air hose.
data.target_sentence: Using a compressor, it is compressed with air of an appropriate pressure and supplied to the air pipe, and air is supplied to the venturi-shaped lubricating oil circulation line through a fine air hose.

data.source_sentence: 이때 공기가 윤활유에 혼입하는 과정에 마이크로 버블이 발생된다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, microbubbles are generated in the process of air mixing into the lubricant.
data.target_sentence: At this time, microbubbles are generated in the process of mixing air with the lubricant.

data.source_sentence: 우선 CFD 해석을 통해 마이크로 버블의 생성 과정을 살펴보았다.
data.mt_sentence: First, the process of generating microbubbles was examined through CFD analysis.
data.target_sentence: First, we looked at the process of microbubbles through CFD analysis.

data.source_sentence: 이때 해석에서는 VOF(Volume of Fluid) 모델을 사용하였고 공기와 액체 윤활유가 공존하는 현상에서 각 상(phase)의 비율을 살펴 보았다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, the VOF (Volume of Fluid) model was used for the analysis, and the ratio of each phase in the coexistence of air and liquid lubricant was examined.
data.target_sentence: At this time, the VOF (Volume of Fluid) model was used for the analysis, and the ratio of each phase was investigated in the coexistence of air and liquid lubricant.

data.source_sentence: 외부에서 5 bar의 압축된 공기가 공기 호스를 통해 윤활유 순환 라인에 공급되고 입구(inlet)의 오일 유입 속도는 2.243 m/s이고 출구(outlet)의 압력 조건은 대기압이다.
data.mt_sentence: Compressed air of 5 bar from the outside is supplied to the lubricating oil circulation line through an air hose, the oil inlet velocity at the inlet is 2.243 m/s, and the pressure condition at the outlet is atmospheric pressure.
data.target_sentence: Compressed air of 5 bar from the outside is supplied to the lubricating oil circulation line through an air hose, and the oil inflow speed at the inlet is 2.243 m/s, and the pressure condition at the outlet is atmospheric pressure.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 4는 단면 형상에 대한 압력과 속도 분포를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 4 shows the pressure and velocity distribution for the cross-sectional shape.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 4 shows the pressure and velocity distribution for the cross-sectional shape.

data.source_sentence: 윤활유 순환 라인의 압력은 단면적이 작아지는 영역 전에는 압력이 높게 나타나고 단면적이 작아지는 영역에서는 벤츄리 효과에 의해 압력이 낮게 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: The pressure of the lubricant circulation line is high before the area where the cross-sectional area is small, and the pressure is low in the area where the cross-sectional area is small due to the venturi effect.
data.target_sentence: The pressure in the lubricant circulation line is high before the area with a small cross-sectional area, and the pressure is low in the area with a small cross-sectional area due to the venturi effect.

data.source_sentence: 유체의 속도는 윤활유 순환 라인과 공기 호스가 만나는 부분에서 최대이다.
data.mt_sentence: The velocity of the fluid is maximum at the point where the lubricating oil circulation line and the air hose meet.
data.target_sentence: The flow rate of the fluid is maximum at the point where the lubricating oil circulation line and the air hose meet.

data.source_sentence: CFD에서 구해진 윤활유 순환 라인 내벽에서의 압력 분포는 구조 해석의 경계 조건으로 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: The pressure distribution on the inner wall of the lubricant circulation line obtained from CFD is used as a boundary condition for structural analysis.
data.target_sentence: The pressure distribution of the inner wall of the lubricant circulation line obtained from CFD is used as a boundary condition for structural analysis.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 5 (b)를 보면 벤츄리 효과에 의해 단면적이 좁아지는 영역 이후에는 공기의 비율이 많아지는 현상으로 마이크로 버블이 잘 형성되고 있는 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 5 (b) shows that microbubbles are well formed due to an increase in the ratio of air after the region where the cross-partal part is narrowed by the venturi effect.
data.target_sentence: In Figure 5(b), it can be seen that the proportion of air increases after the area where the cross-section is narrowed by the venturi effect, so that microbubbles are well formed.

data.source_sentence: 수치 해석을 통해 설계 조건을 확정한 뒤, 제작하여 검정을 위한 실험을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After confirming the design conditions through numerical analysis, it was fabricated and tested for verification.
data.target_sentence: After confirming the design conditions through numerical analysis, it was manufactured and verified.

data.source_sentence: 검정을 위한 실험에서 실제 이물질이 있는 시스템에 대한 실험을 수행하기 어려워 인공의 이물질을 주입하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the experiment for testing, it was difficult to conduct an experiment on a system with actual foreign substances, so artificial foreign substances were injected.
data.target_sentence: In the test for testing, artificial foreign substances were injected because it was difficult to experiment with systems with real foreign substances.

data.source_sentence: 플러싱 테스트를 수행한 후의 이물질 제거율(회수율)을 기존 플러싱 방법과 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The foreign material removal rate (recovery rate) after performing the flushing test was compared with the conventional flushing method.
data.target_sentence: After the flushing test, the foreign material removal rate (recovery rate) was compared with the conventional flushing method.

data.source_sentence: 기존의 플러싱 시스템과 개선된 플러싱 시스템의 차이는 마이크로 버블 발생 장치의 결합 유무이다.
data.mt_sentence: The difference between the existing flushing system and the improved flushing system is the presence or absence of coupling of the microbubble generating device.
data.target_sentence: The difference between the existing flushing method and the improved flushing method is the presence or absence of a microbubble generator.

data.source_sentence: 검정 실험을 위해 윤활유 순환 시스템을 설계 제작하고 가동 전에 배관 내부에는 100 g의 그리트(grit)를 미리 주입을 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For the verification experiment, a lubricant circulation system was designed and manufactured, and 100 g of grit was pre-injected into the pipe before operation.
data.target_sentence: For the verification experiment, a lubricant circulation system was designed and manufactured, and 100 g of grit was pre-injected into the pipe before operation.

data.source_sentence: 그리트는 Fig. 7과 같이 작은 입자이며 주로 연마제 등으로 사용되나 본 실험에서는 윤활유 순환 시스템의 이물질로 사용되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Grits are small particles as shown in Figure 7, and are mainly used as abrasives, but in this experiment, they were used as foreign substances in the lubricating oil circulation system.
data.target_sentence: Grit is a small particle as shown in Figure 7 and is mainly used as an abrasive, but in this experiment, it was used as a foreign substance in the lubricant circulation system.

data.source_sentence: 본 실험에서 사용한 그리트의 평균 지름은 대략 1 mm이고 다양한 형상으로 존재하여 실제 윤활 시스템에서는 큰 마모 입자에 해당된다.
data.mt_sentence: The average diameter of the grit used in this experiment is approximately 1 mm and exists in various shapes, corresponding to large abrasion particles in the actual lubrication system.
data.target_sentence: The average diameter of the grit used in this experiment is about 1 mm, and it exists in various shapes corresponding to large wear particles in real lubrication systems.

data.source_sentence: 윤활유 온도를 60℃로 가열하고 1시간 동안 순환을 시키고 시스템을 정지 시킨 다음, 스트레이너에 걸러진 그리트의 양을 측정하는 실험을 총 3회 실시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After heating the lubricating oil temperature to 60°C, circulating for 1 hour, stopping the system, and measuring the amount of grit filtered through the strainer, a total of three experiments were performed.
data.target_sentence: After heating the lubricating oil temperature to 60° C. and circulating it for 1 hour, the system was stopped, and the amount of grit filtered through a strainer was measured, and a total of three experiments were performed.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 8은 실험에 사용한 스트레이너의 모습을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 8 shows the strainer used in the experiment.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 8 shows the strainer used in the experiment.

data.source_sentence: Table 2는 스트레이너에 회수된 그리트의 양에 대한 실험 결과들이다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 2 shows the experimental results on the amount of grit recovered to the strainer.
data.target_sentence: Table 2 shows the experimental results for the amount of grit returned to the strainer.

data.source_sentence: 회수된 그리트에서 윤활유가 빠져 나갈 때까지 기다린 후, 그 질량을 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After waiting for the lubricating oil to escape from the recovered grit, the mass was measured.
data.target_sentence: After waiting for the lubricant to escape from the recovered grit, the mass was measured.

data.source_sentence: 일부 그리트의 표면에 윤활유가 묻어 있을 수 있지만 회수된 그리트의 전체 질량에 크게 영향을 주지 않을 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: Lubricating oil may be on the surface of some grit, but it is not expected to significantly affect the total mass of the recovered grit.
data.target_sentence: Lubricating oil may be present on the surface of some particles, but is not expected to significantly affect the total mass of recovered particles.

data.source_sentence: 이때 Case-1은 기존의 플러싱 시스템을 나타내고 Case-2는 기존 플러싱 시스템에 마이크로 버블 발생 장치가 결합된 플러싱 시스템을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, Case-1 represents the existing flushing system, and Case-2 represents the flushing system in which the microbubble generator is combined with the existing flushing system.
data.target_sentence: In this case, Case-1 represents the existing washing method, and Case-2 represents the method in which the microbubble generator is combined with the existing washing method.

data.source_sentence: 즉 마이크로 버블 발생 장치가 결합된 플러싱 시스템의 그리트 회수율이 기존의 플러싱 시스템보다 13% 개선되었다.
data.mt_sentence: That is, the grit recovery rate of the flushing system to which the microbubble generating device is combined was improved by 13% compared to the conventional flushing system.
data.target_sentence: That is, the grit recovery rate of the flushing system combined with the microbubble generator was improved by 13% compared to the conventional flushing system.

data.source_sentence: 그리트의 회수율이 크다는 것은 플러싱으로 인해 윤활 시스템의 이물질을 효과적으로 제거하여 플러싱 성능이 개선되었음을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: The high grit recovery rate means that the flushing effectively removes foreign substances from the lubrication system, which improves flushing performance.
data.target_sentence: A high grit recovery rate means that flushing effectively removes debris from the lubrication system, improving flushing performance.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 9와 같은 마이크로 버블 발생 장치는 플러싱에 사용되는 윤활유에 미세한 버블을 주입하는 장치이다.
data.mt_sentence: The micro bubble generating device as shown in Fig. 9 is a device that injects fine bubbles into lubricating oil used for flushing.
data.target_sentence: The device for generating fine bubbles shown in FIG. 9 is a device for injecting fine bubbles into the lubricant used for flushing.

data.source_sentence: 기존 플러싱 시스템의 윤활유는 Fig. 10(a)와 같으나 마이크로 버블 발생 장치가 결합된 플러싱 시스템의 윤활유는 Fig. 10(b)와 같이 다수의 미세한 버블들이 포함되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The lubricant of the existing flushing system is Fig. The lubricant of the flushing system to which the microbubble generator is combined, as shown in 10(a), is Fig. A number of fine bubbles are included, as shown in 10(b).
data.target_sentence: Figure 10(a) shows the lubricant of the conventional flushing system, but the lubricant of the flushing system combined with the microbubble generator contains a lot of fine air bubbles as shown in Figure 10(b).

data.source_sentence: 이는 미세한 버블들이 파괴되는 과정에서 벽면이나 바닥의 이물질을 쉽게 분리하는 효과를 가지는 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: This is judged to have the effect of easily separating foreign substances on the wall or floor in the process of destroying fine bubbles.
data.target_sentence: This is considered to have the effect of easily separating foreign substances on the wall or floor in the process of destroying fine air bubbles.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 윤활유의 교체 과정에서 잔존 이물질을 제거하는 플러싱 시스템의 성능을 개선하고자 마이크로 버블 발생 장치를 결합한 플러싱 시스템을 개발하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, in order to improve the performance of the flushing system that removes residual foreign substances in the process of replacing the lubricant, a flushing system combined with a microbubble generator was developed.
data.target_sentence: In this study, a flushing system combined with a microbubble generator was developed to improve the performance of the flushing system to remove residual foreign substances during the lubricant replacement process.

data.source_sentence: 마이크로 버블 발생 장치는 벤츄리 효과를 이용하여 윤활유 순환 라인의 좁아진 영역에는 압력이 낮아져 외부로 부터의 공기 유입을 용이하게 하고 적당한 가압 조건을 이용하여 마이크로 버블이 잘 발생하게 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the micro bubble generator, pressure is lowered in a narrowed area of the lubricant circulation line using a venturi effect to facilitate air inflow from the outside and to generate micro bubbles well using suitable pressurization conditions.
data.target_sentence: The micro-bubble generator uses the venturi effect to lower the pressure in a narrow area of the lubricant circulation line to facilitate the inflow of air from the outside, and to generate micro-bubbles well under appropriate pressurization conditions.

data.source_sentence: 검증 실험에서는 그리트의 회수(제거)율로 확인한 결과, 기존 플러싱 시스템보다 이물질 제거율이 10% 이상 개선되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the verification experiment, as a result of confirming the recovery (removal) rate of grit, the removal rate of foreign substances was improved by more than 10% compared to the conventional flushing system.
data.target_sentence: As a result of checking the grit recovery (removal) rate in the verification experiment, the foreign material removal rate was improved by more than 10% compared to the existing flushing system.

data.source_sentence: 이는 윤활유 순환 과정에 미세한 버블들이 파괴되는 과정에 이물질을 벽면이나 바닥으로부터 잘 분리하는 효과를 가지기 때문이다.
data.mt_sentence: This is because it has the effect of well separating foreign substances from the wall or floor in the process of destroying fine bubbles in the lubricating oil circulation process.
data.target_sentence: This is because it is effective in separating foreign substances from walls or floors in the process of destroying fine air bubbles in the lubricating oil circulation process.

data.source_sentence: 고분자 연료 전지 스택에서 분리판은 전지의 성능 및 내구성을 좌우하는 핵심 부품 중 하나이다.
data.mt_sentence: In a polymer fuel cell stack, a separator is one of the key components that determine the performance and durability of a cell.
data.target_sentence: In a polymer fuel cell stack, a separator is one of the key components that determine the performance and durability of a cell.

data.source_sentence: 고분자 연료 전지 스택에서 분리판은 고온의 습한 산성 환경에서 사용되기 때문에 우수한 내식성이 요구되며, 전기에너지를 모아주는 집전 기능을 하기 때문에 높은 전기 전도도를 가져야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In the polymer fuel cell stack, since the separator is used in a high temperature and humid acidic environment, excellent corrosion resistance is required, and since it functions as a current collector to collect electrical energy, it must have high electrical conductivity.
data.target_sentence: The polymer fuel cell stack requires excellent corrosion resistance because it uses a separator in a high temperature and high humidity acidic environment, and has to have high electrical conductivity because it serves as a current collector to collect electrical energy.

data.source_sentence: 뿐만 아니라 고분자 전해질 연료 전지의 기계적 강도 확보 및 반응 가스의 누출 방지 등의 역할을 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, it serves to secure the mechanical strength of the polymer electrolyte fuel cell and prevent leakage of reactive gas.
data.target_sentence: It also serves to secure the mechanical strength of the polymer electrolyte fuel cell and prevent leakage of reactive gas.

data.source_sentence: 단전지의 분리 (Separation of unit cells) 및 반응 가스의 투과 방지 (No gas permeability) : 연료전지 스택은 단위 전지를 직렬로 적층하여 전압을 높이는 구조로 제작되며, 분리판(separator)은 각 단위 전지 사이에 반응 가스가 섞이지 않도록 분리해 주는 역할을 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Separation of unit cells and No gas permeability: The fuel cell stack is manufactured to increase the voltage by stacking unit cells in a straight line, and the separator is for each unit cell. It serves to separate the reaction gases so that they do not mix.
data.target_sentence: No separation of unit cells and no gas permeability: The fuel cell stack is manufactured to increase the voltage by stacking unit cells in a straight line, and the separator serves to separate the reactant gases so that they do not mix.

data.source_sentence: 유로의 구조는 전극 내 촉매 표면으로의 가스 공급에 크게 영향을 준다.
data.mt_sentence: The structure of the flow path greatly affects the gas supply to the catalyst surface in the electrode.
data.target_sentence: The structure of the flow path greatly affects the gas supply to the catalyst surface of the electrode.

data.source_sentence: 전류 집전(Current collection) : 연료전지 단위 전지의 양극에서 식 (1)과 같이 수소의 산화 반응에 의해 발생된 전자는 분리판을 통하여 음극으로 이동하여 식 (2)와 같이 산소와 만나 물을 생성하는 데 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: Current collection: Electrons generated by the oxidation reaction of hydrogen at the anode of the fuel cell unit cell as shown in Equation (1) move to the cathode through the separator and meet oxygen as shown in Equation (2) to produce water used to do
data.target_sentence: Current collection: As shown in Equation (1), the electrons generated by the oxidation reaction of hydrogen at the anode of the fuel cell unit cell move to the cathode through the separator, and as shown in Equation (2), water used to produce water by meeting with oxygen.

data.source_sentence: 분리판은 전류의 집전 기능을 하므로 전기 전도도가 높은 소재로 제작되어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the separator functions as a current collector, it must be made of a material with high electrical conductivity.
data.target_sentence: Since the separator functions as a current collector, it must be made of a material with high electrical conductivity.

data.source_sentence: 가스 확산층과 기계적 접촉에 의하여 전류가 흐르므로 분리판의 표면은 낮은 접촉 저항을 유지해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Since a current flows by mechanical contact with the gas diffusion layer, the surface of the separator must maintain low contact resistance.
data.target_sentence: Since current flows by mechanical contact with the gas diffusion layer, the surface of the separator must maintain a low contact resistance.

data.source_sentence: 열 분산(Heat dissipation) : 연료 전지 스택의 내부에서는 전기 화학 반응열 및 이온의 이동에 의한 저항열이 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: Heat dissipation: Heat of electrochemical reaction and resistance heat due to movement of ions are generated inside the fuel cell stack.
data.target_sentence: radiation: In the fuel cell stack, heat of electrochemical reaction and heat of resistance due to movement of ions are generated.

data.source_sentence: 발생된 열이 축적되어 전지 내부의 온도가 과다하게 올라가면 물의 증발이 일어나 고분자 전해질 내부의 건조 (drying)가 일어난다.
data.mt_sentence: When the generated heat accumulates and the temperature inside the battery rises excessively, evaporation of water occurs and drying occurs inside the polymer electrolyte.
data.target_sentence: When the generated heat accumulates and the temperature inside the battery rises excessively, evaporation of water occurs and drying occurs inside the polymer electrolyte.

data.source_sentence: 발생된 열을 적절하게 외부로 배출시켜 전해질 막의 건조가 일어나지 않도록 해 주어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The generated heat should be properly discharged to the outside to prevent drying of the electrolyte membrane.
data.target_sentence: The generated heat must be properly discharged to the outside to prevent the electrolyte membrane from drying out.

data.source_sentence: 형성된 물이 전극 내부나 분리판의 유로에 가득 차면 가스의 공급이 차단되어 스택의 성능이 크게 저하된다.
data.mt_sentence: When the formed water fills the inside of the electrode or the flow path of the separator, the gas supply is cut off and the performance of the stack is greatly reduced.
data.target_sentence: When the formed water fills the inside of the electrode or the inside of the flow path of the separator, the gas supply is cut off and the performance of the stack is greatly reduced.

data.source_sentence: 음극에서 생성된 물을 빠르게 외부로 배출시켜 주어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The water generated at the cathode must be quickly discharged to the outside.
data.target_sentence: The water generated at the cathode must be quickly drained to the outside.

data.source_sentence: 연료 전지 스택의 강도를 유지시켜 주는 중심 구조물 (Backbone of fuel cell stack): 연료전지 스택은 전압을 높여주기 위하여 수십 개의 단위 전지를 직렬로 적층하는 구조로 제작된다.
data.mt_sentence: Backbone of fuel cell stack that maintains strength of fuel cell stack: A fuel cell stack is manufactured in a structure in which dozens of unit cells are directly stacked in order to increase voltage.
data.target_sentence: The backbone of the fuel cell stack that maintains the strength of the fuel cell stack: A fuel cell stack is manufactured in a structure in which dozens of single cells are directly stacked to increase voltage.

data.source_sentence: 기계적 강도를 유지하는 중심 구조물이 없으면 기체의 누출을 방지하기 위한 셀의 실링이 어렵게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Without a central structure maintaining mechanical strength, it is difficult to seal the cell to prevent gas leakage.
data.target_sentence: Without a central structure that maintains mechanical strength, it is difficult to seal the cell to prevent gas leakage.

data.source_sentence: 조그만 충격에도 셀의 기밀성이 쉽게 손상될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Even a small impact can easily damage the airtightness of the cell.
data.target_sentence: Even a small impact can easily damage the cell's airtightness.

data.source_sentence: 위 전지에 사용되는 막전극 접합체나 가스 확산층은 기계적 강도가 낮은 탄소나 고분자 소재로 만들어져 있어서 기계적 강도를 유지할 수 있는 구조물로 사용되기 어렵다.
data.mt_sentence: The membrane electrode assembly or gas diffusion layer used in the above battery is made of carbon or polymer material with low mechanical strength, so it is difficult to use as a structure capable of maintaining mechanical strength.
data.target_sentence: Since the membrane electrode assembly or gas diffusion layer used in the battery is made of carbon or polymer material having low mechanical strength, it is difficult to use in a structure capable of maintaining mechanical strength.

data.source_sentence: 분리판이 단위전지에 기계적 강도를 부여하는 역할을 해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The separator should serve to impart mechanical strength to the unit cell.
data.target_sentence: The separator should serve to impart mechanical strength to the unit cell.

data.source_sentence: 고분자 연료전지 스택에 사용되는 분리판은 2.1.1에서 열거한 6가지 역할의 수행 및 상용화를 위하여 아래와 같은 10가지 조건을 만족시켜야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Separators used in polymer fuel cell stacks shall satisfy the following 10 conditions for the performance and commercialization of the six functions listed in 2.1.1.
data.target_sentence: The separator used in the polymer fuel cell stack must satisfy the following 10 conditions for the performance and commercialization of the six functions listed in 2.1.1.

data.source_sentence: 2.1.2에서 열거한 고분자 연료전지 스택용 분리판의 10가지 요구 조건 중 성형성은 단가에 포함되어 있으며, 물 제거 특성 및 무피독성은 현재까지 고려되고 있지 않다.
data.mt_sentence: Among the 10 requirements for separators for polymer fuel cell stacks listed in 2.1.2, formability is included in the unit price, and water removal properties and non-toxicity have not been considered until now.
data.target_sentence: Among the 10 requirements for polymer fuel cell stack separators listed in 2.1.2, moldability is included in the unit price, and moisture removability and non-toxicity have not been considered until now.

data.source_sentence: 고분자 연료 전지 스택용 분리판으로 사용 가능한 소재는 표 2와 같이 크게 금속 소재, 탄소 소재 및 복합 소재로 나뉜다.
data.mt_sentence: Materials that can be used as separators for polymer fuel cell stacks are largely divided into metal materials, carbon materials, and composite materials as shown in Table 2.
data.target_sentence: Materials that can be used as separators for polymer fuel cell stacks can be largely divided into metal materials, carbon materials, and composite materials, which are shown in <Table 2>.

data.source_sentence: 금속은 가공이 쉽고, 높은 기계적 강도와 열 및 전기 전도도를 가지며 기계적 강도가 우수하여 얇게 제작이 가능하여 부피를 줄일 수 있다는 장점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Metal is easy to process, has high mechanical strength, thermal and electrical conductivity, and has excellent mechanical strength, so it can be manufactured thinly, thereby reducing the volume.
data.target_sentence: Metals are easy to process, have high mechanical strength, thermal and electrical conductivity, and have excellent mechanical strength, so they can be made thin and bulky.

data.source_sentence: 금속 소재의 단점으로는 부식에 취약하며, 촉매 피독성이 있을 수 있고, 부식이 진행됨에 따라 접촉 저항이 증가한다는 점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Disadvantages of metal materials include that they are susceptible to corrosion, may be toxic to catalysts, and that contact resistance increases as corrosion progresses.
data.target_sentence: The disadvantages of metallic materials are that they are prone to corrosion, can be toxic to catalysts, and contact resistance increases as corrosion progresses.

data.source_sentence: 탄소 소재는 전기전도도 및 열전도도가 높고, 부식 저항성이 우수한 장점이 있으나 기계적 충격에 쉽게 깨지고, 기밀성 및 기계적 강도를 부여하기 위하여 상대적으로 두꺼워서 부피가 커지고 단가가 높다는 단점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Carbon material has the advantages of high electrical and thermal conductivity and excellent corrosion resistance, but it is easily broken by mechanical shock, and it is relatively thick to give airtightness and mechanical strength, so it has a disadvantage in that the volume is large and the unit price is high.
data.target_sentence: Carbon materials have advantages such as high electrical conductivity and thermal conductivity, and excellent corrosion resistance. However, there are disadvantages in that it is easily broken by mechanical impact and is relatively thick in order to impart airtightness and mechanical strength, so that the volume increases and the unit price is high.

data.source_sentence: 탄소 소재로는 높은 전기 전도도를 가지고 화학적으로 안정하다는 장점 덕분에 먼저 연구가 선행되어 온 그래파이트와 그래파이트 화합물이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As carbon materials, there are graphite and graphite compounds, which have been researched ahead of time thanks to their advantages of high electrical conductivity and chemical stability.
data.target_sentence: Carbon materials include graphite and graphite compounds, which have been previously studied because of their high electrical conductivity and chemical stability.

data.source_sentence: 복합 소재는 내식성이 우수하고 가볍고 고강도의 장점과 기계적 충격에 약하고 전기 전도도가 상대적으로 낮고 단가가 높다는 단점을 가지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Composite materials have the advantages of excellent corrosion resistance, lightness, high strength, weakness against mechanical impact, and relatively low electrical conductivity and high unit cost.
data.target_sentence: Composite materials have advantages of corrosion resistance, lightness, and high strength, and have disadvantages in that they are weak against mechanical impact, have relatively low electrical conductivity, and have high unit cost.

data.source_sentence: 고분자 연료 전지에서 그래파이트 분리판을 대신할 수 있는 금속 분리판이 크게 주목을 받고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Metal separators that can replace graphite separators in polymer fuel cells are receiving great attention.
data.target_sentence: Metal separators that can replace graphite separators in polymer fuel cells are attracting attention.

data.source_sentence: 그 중 스테인리스강이 가장 활발히 연구되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Among them, stainless steel is being studied most actively.
data.target_sentence: Among them, stainless steel is the most actively studied.

data.source_sentence: 금속 분리판 소재의 종류와 특성에 대해 알아보고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: We would like to learn about the types and characteristics of metal separator materials.
data.target_sentence: I would like to learn about the types and properties of metal separator materials.

data.source_sentence: 고분자 연료전지 스택용 분리판에 사용 가능한 소재는 스텐리스강, 티타늄 그리고 알루미늄과 마그네슘과 같은 경금속이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Materials that can be used for separators for polymer fuel cell stacks include stainless steel, titanium, and light metals such as aluminum and magnesium.
data.target_sentence: Materials that can be used as a separator for a polymer fuel cell stack include light metals such as stainless steel, titanium, aluminum, and magnesium.

data.source_sentence: 표 3은 스텐리스강, 티타늄, 알루미늄 및 마그네슘의 특성을 보여 준다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 3 shows the properties of stainless steel, titanium, aluminum and magnesium.
data.target_sentence: Table 3 shows the properties of stainless steel, titanium, aluminum and magnesium.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 무게 측면에서 비교해 보면 동일한 부피일 경우 밀도가 낮은 마그네슘과 알루미늄이 상대적으로 유리하지만 기계적 강도를 고려한다면 더 얇게 만들 수 있는 티타늄이 오히려 더 유리할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: First, if we compare in terms of weight, magnesium and aluminum with low density are relatively advantageous when they have the same volume, but if mechanical strength is considered, titanium, which can be made thinner, may be more advantageous.
data.target_sentence: First, in terms of weight, magnesium and low-density aluminum are relatively advantageous when the volume is the same, but considering the mechanical strength, titanium, which can be made thinner, may be more advantageous.

data.source_sentence: 열 관리 측면에서도 열전도율이 높은 알루미늄이 가장 유리하며, 마그네슘, 티타늄, 스텐리스강 순으로 열전달 계수가 낮아진다.
data.mt_sentence: In terms of thermal management, aluminum with high thermal conductivity is the most advantageous, and the heat transfer coefficient decreases in the order of magnesium, titanium, and stainless steel.
data.target_sentence: In terms of thermal management, aluminum with high thermal conductivity is the most advantageous, and the heat transfer coefficient decreases in that order: magnesium, titanium, and stainless steel.

data.source_sentence: 분리판 제조 비용적 측면에서는 스텐리스강이 가장 저렴하며 티타늄이 가장 비싸다.
data.mt_sentence: In terms of manufacturing cost, stainless steel is the cheapest and titanium is the most expensive.
data.target_sentence: In terms of manufacturing cost, stainless steel is the cheapest and titanium is the most expensive.

data.source_sentence: 알루미늄과 마그네슘은 스텐리스강이나 타이타늄 소재보다 낮은 밀도 및 단가 그리고 높은 열 및 전기 전도도의 장점을 가지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Aluminum and magnesium have advantages of lower density and unit cost and higher thermal and electrical conductivity than stainless steel or titanium materials.
data.target_sentence: Aluminum and magnesium have the advantages of lower density, lower unit cost, and higher thermal and electrical conductivity than stainless steel or titanium materials.

data.source_sentence: 알루미늄과 마그네슘은 내식성이 취약하여 고분자 전해질 연료 전지의 불규칙한 전압 변화 및 습한 산성 분위기에서 사용되기에 적절하지 않다.
data.mt_sentence: Aluminum and magnesium have poor corrosion resistance, so they are not suitable for use in an irregular voltage change and in a humid acidic atmosphere of a polymer electrolyte fuel cell.
data.target_sentence: Aluminum and magnesium have poor corrosion resistance, so they are not suitable for use in a wet acidic atmosphere and irregular voltage changes in a polymer electrolyte fuel cell.

data.source_sentence: 타이타늄은 높은 내식성을 가졌지만 연료 전지의 작동 환경에서 점진적으로 부식이 진행되는 것으로 알려져 있기 때문에 코팅을 통한 표면 개질이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Although titanium has high corrosion resistance, it is known that corrosion progresses gradually in the operating environment of a fuel cell, so surface modification through coating is required.
data.target_sentence: Although titanium has high corrosion resistance, it is known that corrosion progresses slowly in the operating environment of fuel cells, so surface modification through coating is required.

data.source_sentence: 타이타늄은 스테인리스강보다 높은 내식성과 전기 전도도 및 낮은 밀도를 가지고 있어서 스테인리스강 분리판보다 더 가벼운 분리판을 만들수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Titanium has higher corrosion resistance, electrical conductivity and lower density than stainless steel, making it possible to make separators lighter than stainless steel separators.
data.target_sentence: Titanium has more corrosion resistance, higher electrical conductivity and lower density than stainless steel, which makes it possible to make separators lighter than stainless steel separators.

data.source_sentence: 가벼운 티타늄 분리판을 적용한 경량 연료 전지는 무인 항공기, 항공 모빌리티, 우주 항공기 등의 분야에 적용될 가능성이 높다.
data.mt_sentence: A lightweight fuel cell with a lightweight titanium separator is highly likely to be applied to fields such as unmanned aerial vehicles, air mobility, and space aircraft.
data.target_sentence: A lightweight fuel cell to which a lightweight titanium separator is applied is highly likely to be applied to fields such as unmanned aerial vehicles, aircraft mobility, and spacecraft.

data.source_sentence: 금속 분리판의 내식성 및 전도성을 향상시키기 위해 연구되어 온 코팅층으로는 귀금속 코팅, 질화물 코팅, 탄화물이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Coating layers that have been studied to improve corrosion resistance and conductivity of metal separators include noble metal coatings, nitride coatings, and carbides.
data.target_sentence: Coatings studied to improve the corrosion resistance and conductivity of metal separators include jewelry coatings, nitride coatings and carbides.

data.source_sentence: 부식 전류 밀도는 800℃에서 1000℃까지 온도가 증가할수록 낮아졌고 계면 접촉 저항도 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The corrosion current density decreased with increasing temperature from 800°C to 1000°C, and the interfacial contact resistance also decreased.
data.target_sentence: The corrosion current density decreased as the temperature increased from 800°C to 1000°C, and the interfacial contact resistance also decreased.

data.source_sentence: 이후 코팅 전 스테인리스강과 a-C 코팅된 스테인리스강, Zr-C/a-C 코팅된 스테인리스강의 분극 시험을 진행하여 Zr-C/a-C 코팅이 효과적임을 증명했다.
data.mt_sentence: After that, polarization tests of stainless steel, a-C coated stainless steel, and Zr-C/a-C coated stainless steel were conducted before coating, proving that the Zr-C/a-C coating was effective.
data.target_sentence: Thereafter, polarization tests were performed on stainless steel, aC coated stainless steel, and Zr-C/aC coated stainless steel before coating to prove that the Zr-C/aC coating was effective.

data.source_sentence: 분리판은 반응 가스의 투과 방지, 반응 가스의 공급, 전류 집전, 발생된 열의 분산, 발생된 물의 제거 및 스택의 기계적 강도 부여의 여섯 가지 역할을 수행한다.
data.mt_sentence: The separator performs six roles: preventing the permeation of the reactive gas, supplying the reactive gas, collecting current, dissipating the generated heat, removing the generated water, and imparting mechanical strength to the stack.
data.target_sentence: The separator performs six roles: preventing reaction gas from permeating, supplying reactive gas, collecting current, dissipating generated heat, removing generated water, and providing mechanical strength to the stack.

data.source_sentence: 금속 분리판의 상용화를 위하여 성형성이 좋고 가격이 낮아야 하며 가볍고 내식성과 전기 전도성이 높아야 하며 촉매 피독성이 없어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: For the commercialization of metal separators, the formability should be good, the price should be low, light weight, corrosion resistance and electrical conductivity should be high, and there should be no catalyst poisoning.
data.target_sentence: For the commercialization of metal separators, good formability, low price, light weight, high corrosion resistance and electrical conductivity, and no catalyst poisoning are required.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 공업적으로 사용되는 금속 소재는 표면에 저항이 높은 자연산 화피막이 형성되어 있으며, 고분자 연료 전지의 작동 환경 하에서 쉽게 부식이 발생할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, metal materials used in industry have a high resistance natural oxidation film formed on the surface, and corrosion can easily occur under the operating environment of polymer fuel cells.
data.target_sentence: In general, industrial metal materials form a high-resistance natural oxide film on the surface, so corrosion is easy to occur in the operating environment of polymer fuel cells.

data.source_sentence: 금속 분리판의 부식을 억제시키고 높은 전기 전도성을 부여하는 코팅층이 필수적으로 요구된다.
data.mt_sentence: A coating layer that suppresses corrosion of the metal separator and provides high electrical conductivity is necessarily required.
data.target_sentence: A coating layer that suppresses corrosion of the metal separator and provides high electrical conductivity is essential.

data.source_sentence: 본 기고에서는 분리판 소재의 종류, 특성 및 금속 분리판의 내식성 및 전도성을 향상시킬 수 있는 코팅층으로 귀금속 코팅, 질화물 코팅, 탄화물 코팅, 탄소 코팅, 전도성 고분자 코팅 등을 간단하게 소개하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this article, noble metal coatings, nitride coatings, carbide coatings, carbon coatings, and conductive polymer coatings are briefly introduced as coating layers that can improve the types and properties of separator materials and the corrosion resistance and conductivity of metal separators.
data.target_sentence: In this article, we will briefly introduce the types and properties of separator materials, as well as gem coatings, nitride coatings, carbide coatings, carbon coatings and conductive polymer coatings as coating layers that can improve the corrosion resistance and conductivity of metal separators.

data.source_sentence: 클러스터를 구성할 최소한의 픽셀 개수를 지정하면 거리 함수를 계산하여 유사성을 갖는 클러스터를 유연하게 구축할 수 있는 장점을 가지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: If the minimum number of pixels to compose a cluster is specified, it has the advantage of being able to flexibly build a cluster with similarity by calculating a distance function.
data.target_sentence: The advantage of specifying the minimum number of pixels that make up a cluster is the flexibility to build clusters with similarities by calculating the distance function.

data.source_sentence: 특징들을 이용하여 부식 이미지로부터 k-means와 DBSCAN으로 구한 특정 공간 영역에서 각각의 히스토그램을 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Each histogram was compared in a specific spatial region obtained by k-means and DBSCAN from corrosion images using the features.
data.target_sentence: Each histogram was compared in a specific spatial domain obtained with k-means and DBSCAN from the corrosion images using properties.

data.source_sentence: 영상 이미지에서 시험편의 전체 픽셀 수, 색상 등 시험편 특성을 영상처리 기법으로 분석하기 위해서는 주어진 이미지에서 시험편을 분리하는 작업이 선행되어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to analyze the characteristics of the specimen such as the total number of pixels and the color of the specimen in the image image using the image processing technique, it is necessary to separate the specimen from the given image.
data.target_sentence: In order to analyze the characteristics of the sample such as the total number of pixels and color of the sample in the image using image processing techniques, it is necessary to separate the sample from the given image.

data.source_sentence: 시험편의 색상 분석은 시험편 전체의 픽셀 수를 기준으로 가능한 배경 부분을 제거하기 위해 grab-cut된 영역에 내접한 최대 직사각형(the largest inscribedrectangle)을 구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For color analysis of the specimen, the largest inscribedrectangle inscribed in the grab-cut area was obtained in order to remove the possible background part based on the number of pixels in the entire specimen.
data.target_sentence: For color analysis of the sample, the largest inscribed rectangle inscribed in the grab-cut area was obtained to remove possible background parts based on the number of pixels in the total sample.

data.source_sentence: 최대 내접 사각 영역을 원 영상에서 잘라낸(crop) 영상을 대상으로 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The maximum inscribed rectangular area was analyzed for the cropped image from the original image.
data.target_sentence: The maximum inscribed rectangular area was analyzed for the cropped image from the original image.

data.source_sentence: 영상에서 지각적으로 특징이 비슷한 픽셀들로 구성된 작은 영역을 하나의 수퍼 픽셀로 대치하고, 이 수퍼 픽셀을 기본 단위로 영상 처리함으로써 처리 속도를 매우 빠르게 할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: By replacing a small area consisting of pixels with perceptually similar features in the image with one super pixel, and processing this super pixel in basic units, the processing speed can be very fast.
data.target_sentence: Turning a small area of pixels with perceptually similar characteristics into a single superpixel in an image and processing these superpixels as basic units can speed up processing very quickly.

data.source_sentence: SLIC는 주어진 영상을 사용자가 지정한 수 퍼픽셀 개수 k개로 클러스터링한다.
data.mt_sentence: SLIC clusters the given image into k number of superpixels designated by the user.
data.target_sentence: SLIC clusters a given image into k superpixels specified by the user.

data.source_sentence: 즉, 영상을 격자 간격이 S인 k개 격자로 나누고, 각 클러스터를 C로 초기화 한 후에 가로, 세로 k 크기가 각각 2S인 제한된 영역 내에서 다음 알고리즘 1과 같이 슈퍼픽셀을 결정한다.
data.mt_sentence: That is, the image is divided into k grids with a grid interval of S, and after initializing each cluster to C, superpixels are determined within a limited area with a horizontal and vertical k size of 2S, respectively, as in Algorithm 1 below.
data.target_sentence: In other words, the image is divided into k grids with a grid interval of S, and each cluster is initialized to C, and then, as in Algorithm 1 below, superpixels are determined within a limited area with a horizontal and vertical k size of 2S, respectively.

data.source_sentence: K-means는 주어진 입력 영상을 사용자가 지정한 클러스터 개수 k개로 영역을 분할하는 기법으로 최적의 클러스터 수 k값을 선정하는 것이 매우 중요한 문제이다.
data.mt_sentence: K-means is a technique for dividing a given input image into k number of clusters designated by a user, and it is very important to select the optimal number of clusters k value.
data.target_sentence: K-means is a technique that divides a given input image into k clusters designated by the user. It is very important to select the optimal number of clusters for the k value.

data.source_sentence: DBSCAN에서는 주어진 반경과 최소 픽셀 수에 따라서 클러스터들로 분할된다.
data.mt_sentence: In DBSCAN, clusters are divided according to a given radius and minimum number of pixels.
data.target_sentence: In DBSCAN, clusters are divided according to a given radius and minimum number of pixels.

data.source_sentence: 주어진 영상 데이터 D에서 각 픽셀은 다음과 같이 분류된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the given image data D, each pixel is classified as follows.
data.target_sentence: In the given image data D, each pixel is classified as follows:

data.source_sentence: 여기서 dist(p,q)는 두 픽셀 p, q 간의 거리 함수이고 일반적으로 유클리드 거리 함수를 이용한다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, dist(p,q) is the distance function between two pixels p and q, and the Euclidean distance function is generally used.
data.target_sentence: where dist(p,q) is a function of the distance between two pixels p and q, and the Euclidean distance function is usually used.

data.source_sentence: 핵심 픽셀은 아니지만, 어떤 핵심 픽셀의 ϵ-이웃픽셀을 외곽 픽셀이라 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Although not a core pixel, the ϵ-neighbor of a core pixel is called an outer pixel.
data.target_sentence: Although not a core pixel, the ϵ-neighbor of a core pixel is called an outer pixel.

data.source_sentence: 반경 ϵ 과 최소 픽셀 수 MinPts 가 주어지면, 임의의 핵심 픽셀 p의 ϵ-이웃 픽셀은 p로 부터 직접 밀도 기반 도달 가능한 관계(directdensity reachable)라고 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Given a radius ϵ and a minimum number of pixels MinPts, the ϵ-neighboring pixel of any key pixel p is said to be directly density-based reachable from p.
data.target_sentence: Given a radius ϵ and a minimum number of pixels MinPts, the ϵ adjacent pixels of a core pixel p are said to be the direct densities achievable at p.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 p의 ϵ-이웃 픽셀 q가 또 다른 핵심 픽셀이면 q의 ϵ-이웃 픽셀들은 픽셀 p로부터 밀도 기반 도달 가능(density reachable)하다.
data.mt_sentence: Where p's ϵ-neighboring pixel q is another key pixel, then q's ϵ-neighboring pixels are density-reachable from pixel p.
data.target_sentence: If the ϵ-adjacent pixel of p is another key pixel, then the ϵ-adjacent pixel of q is the achievable density at pixel p.

data.source_sentence: 픽셀 p, q가 임의의 픽셀 r로부터 밀도 기반 도달 가능하면 픽셀 p, q는 주어진 ϵ과 MinPts 조건 아래에서 밀도 기반 연결(density connected) 관계에 있다.
data.mt_sentence: If the pixels p, q are density-based reachable from any pixel r, then the pixels p, q are in density connected relation under the given ϵ and MinPts conditions.
data.target_sentence: If pixel p, q is a density reachable at any pixel r, then pixel p, q is density-linked given the conditions of ϵ and MinPts.

data.source_sentence: 그림 1에서 화살표는 직접 밀도 기반 도달 가능한 관계를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Arrows in Figure 1 indicate direct density-based achievable relationships.
data.target_sentence: The arrows in Figure 1 indicate the direct density achievable relationship.

data.source_sentence: 밀도 도달 가능한 픽셀들을 구하고, 이 픽셀들을 코어 픽셀과 외곽 픽셀을 구분하고, 여기에 속하지 않은 픽셀을 노이즈 픽셀로 지정한다.
data.mt_sentence: Obtain density reachable pixels, distinguish between core and outer pixels, and designate pixels that do not belong to them as noise pixels.
data.target_sentence: Get density reachable pixels, distinguish between core and outer pixels, and designate pixels that do not belong to them as noise pixels.

data.source_sentence: ϵ 반경 안에 있는 핵심 픽셀을 연결한다.
data.mt_sentence: Connect the core pixels within 반경 a radius.
data.target_sentence: Connect key pixels within a ϵ radius.

data.source_sentence: 연결된 핵심 픽셀들로 하나의 군집을 만든다.
data.mt_sentence: Create a cluster of connected core pixels.
data.target_sentence: Creates a cluster of connected core pixels.

data.source_sentence: 모든 외곽 픽셀들을 처음 속한 군집에 할당한다.
data.mt_sentence: All outer pixels are assigned to the first cluster.
data.target_sentence: All outer pixels are assigned to the first cluster.

data.source_sentence: 컬러 영상은 RGB 채널의 혼합으로 표현되는데 영상 분석에서 RGB 영상을 각 채널별로 처리할 때 색상의 왜곡 및 인간의 색상에 대한 직관성과 다소 차이가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: A color image is expressed as a mixture of RGB channels, and when RGB images are processed for each channel in image analysis, color distortion and human color intuition are somewhat different.
data.target_sentence: Color images are expressed in a mixed form of RGB channels, and when RGB images are processed for each channel in image analysis, color distortion and human color intuition are somewhat different.

data.source_sentence: HSV의 컬러 공간은 색상, 채도, 밝기로 구성되어 있어 Hue 값으로 직관적인 색상 정보를 구할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: HSV's color space consists of color, saturation, and brightness, so intuitive color information can be obtained with Hue values.
data.target_sentence: HSV color space consists of hue, saturation, and lightness, so you can get intuitive color information with Hue values.

data.source_sentence: 채도는 0~255 값으로 표현되며, 숫자가 클수록 색이 선명하다.
data.mt_sentence: The saturation is expressed in values from 0 to 255, and the larger the number, the clearer the color.
data.target_sentence: Saturation is expressed as a value from 0 to 255, the higher the number, the more vivid the color.

data.source_sentence: 밝기 구간은 0~255이고, 0은 완전히 어둡고, 255는 가장 밝은 상태이다.
data.mt_sentence: The brightness range is 0 to 255, where 0 is completely dark, and 255 is the brightest state.
data.target_sentence: Brightness ranges from 0 to 255, with 0 being completely dark and 255 being the brightest.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 분할된 영역을 HSV 공간으로 변환한 후에 Hue 값을 기준으로 통계 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, after transforming the partitioned region into HSV space, statistical analysis was performed based on the Hue value.
data.target_sentence: In this study, a statistical analysis was performed based on the Hue value after converting the partitioned region into the HSV space.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구의 부식 분석 방법을 그림 2 에 나타냈다.
data.mt_sentence: The corrosion analysis method of this study is shown in Figure 2.
data.target_sentence: The corrosion analysis method in this study is shown in Figure 2.

data.source_sentence: 히스토그램 평활화(Histogram Equalization)를 통해 입력 영상의 명암 대비를 개선한다.
data.mt_sentence: Histogram equalization improves contrast of the input image.
data.target_sentence: Histogram equalization improves the contrast of the input image.

data.source_sentence: 녹색 사각형 밖은 배경(Background area)으로 설정하였으며, 사각형 내부에는 객체(Detection area)와 객체가 아닌 미지정 픽셀(Undetected area)이 혼재하는 것을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: The outside of the green rectangle was set as the background area, and it was confirmed that the object (Detection area) and the undetected area (Undetected area) were mixed inside the rectangle.
data.target_sentence: The outside of the green square was set as the background area, and it was confirmed that the detected area and the undetected area were mixed inside the square.

data.source_sentence: 분리된 이미지의 가장자리에 불규칙한 검은색 부분은 1.6 mm 두께를 가진 단면 이미지 경계에서의 선명도 저하로 시험편 일부가 잘려 나가거나, 시험편에 접한 배경 일부가 포함된 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the irregular black part at the edge of the separated image, it can be confirmed that a part of the test piece is cut off due to a decrease in sharpness at the boundary of the cross-sectional image with a thickness of 1.6 mm, or a part of the background in contact with the test piece is included.
data.target_sentence: In the irregular black part at the edge of the separated image, it can be confirmed that a part of the test piece is cut due to a decrease in sharpness at the boundary of the 1.6mm-thick cross-sectional image, or a part of the background in contact with the test piece is included.

data.source_sentence: 그림 4(a)의 빨간색 직사각형은 그림 3의 (b)영역에 내접한 최대 직사각형 영역을 나타낸다.

data.target_sentence: The red rectangle in Fig. 4(a) represents the maximum rectangular area inscribed in Fig. 3(b).

data.source_sentence: 그림 5의 왼쪽 열은 GI의 1년 차 노출 단면 사진(그림 4의 (b)에 해당되는 부분)을 k=5로 설정하였으며, k-means를 수행하였을 때의 클러스터 값을 나타낸다.

data.target_sentence: The left column of Figure 5 shows the cluster values when k-means is performed with k=5 on the exposure cross-section photo of the first year of GI (the part corresponding to (b) of Figure 4).

data.source_sentence: 오른쪽 열은 좌측 분할 영역을 RGB에서 HSV로 변환한 Hue에 대한 히스토그램이다.
data.mt_sentence: The right column is a histogram of Hue converted from RGB to HSV of the left divided region.
data.target_sentence: The right column is Hue's histogram converted from RGB to HSV for the left slice.

data.source_sentence: 그림 5(c)는 흰색 계통의 도금층 영역을 나타내고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 5(c) shows the plating layer region of the white system.
data.target_sentence: Figure 5(c) shows the area of the white plating layer.

data.source_sentence: 그림 5(d)의 Hue 값이 190~260 영역으로 푸른색 계통의 값들을 나타내고 있는 것을 확인할 수 있었으며, 그 비율은 20.84%를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: It could be confirmed that the Hue values in Figure 5(d) ranged from 190 to 260, indicating blue-colored values, and the ratio was 20.84%.
data.target_sentence: Hue values in Figure 5(d) range from 190 to 260, indicating blue values, and it can be seen that the ratio is 20.84%.

data.source_sentence: 그림 5(e), (g), (i)의 영역도 그림 5(a), (c)의 영역과 마찬가지로 Hue값이 붉은색과 푸른색 계통의 영역에 걸쳐 넓게 분포하는 것을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the regions of Fig. 5(e), (g), and (i), like the regions of Fig. 5(a) and (c), it was confirmed that the Hue value was widely distributed over the red and blue regions.
data.target_sentence: In the areas of Figures 5(e), (g) and (i), it was confirmed that Hue values were widely distributed over the red and blue areas, as in the areas of Figures 5(a) and (c).

data.target_sentence: The black polygons in Figure 6(a) are plots representing 1000 superpixels for Figure 4(b).
