data.mt_sentence: Figure 7 shows the results of DBSCAN of the test specimens exposed for 2 to 6 years.
data.target_sentence: Figure 7 shows DBSCAN results for specimens exposed for 2 to 6 years.

data.source_sentence: 좌측 열은 2년, 3년, 5년, 6년 노출된 단면 이미지이며, 우측 열은 슈퍼 픽셀 1000개로 DBSCAN한 이미지를 나타내었으며 그 결과는 표 1에 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: The left column shows the cross-sectional images exposed for 2, 3, 5, and 6 years, and the right column shows the DBSCAN image with 1000 super pixels, and the results are shown in Table 1.
data.target_sentence: The left column shows cross-sectional images exposed for 2 years, 3 years, 5 years, and 6 years, and the right column shows DBSCAN images with 1000 superpixels, and the results are shown in Table 1.

data.source_sentence: 1년 차 샘플에서 DBSCAN은 621개 영역으로 클러스터링되었으며, 군집 중 가장 큰 영역을 나타낸 No. 1의 경우16.3106%의 비율을 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the first-year sample, DBSCAN was clustered into 621 regions, showing a ratio of 16.3106% for No.1, which represents the largest region of the cluster.
data.target_sentence: In the first-year sample, DBSCAN was clustered into 621 regions, and the first place representing the largest region of the cluster had a rate of 16.3106%.

data.source_sentence: 픽셀 수가 가장 적은 n번째(621번) 영역은 0.0086%를 나타내는 것을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was confirmed that the n-th area (No. 621) with the smallest number of pixels represents 0.0086%.
data.target_sentence: It was confirmed that the n-th area (No. 621) with the smallest number of pixels was 0.0086%.

data.source_sentence: 그림 8의 (a)는 GI 강판의 1년간 노출한 시험편 중 가장 큰 분할 영역만을 분리해 낸 것으로, 이 영역은 k-means에 의한 분할 영역과 공간적으로 상당 부분 겹치는 영역이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 8 (a) shows the separation of only the largest divided area among the test specimens exposed to GI steel sheets for a year, which overlaps the divided area by k-means in a substantial part spatially.
data.target_sentence: Figure 8(a) shows the separation of only the largest segmented area among the specimens exposed to the GI steel sheet for one year, and a significant portion of the segmented area is spatially overlapped by k-means.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 해안가에서 6년간 옥외 폭로시킨 GI 강판의 절단면에서의 부식 이미지를 비지도 학습 방법인 k-means 클러스터링과 슈퍼 픽셀DBSCAN법을 이용하여 분석하였으며, 2가지 학습 방법에 따른 이미지 분할 결과를 비교 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, corrosion images from cut surfaces of GI steel plates exposed outdoors for 6 years at the shore were analyzed using unsupervised learning methods k-means clustering and super pixel DBSCAN method, and image segmentation results according to the two learning methods were compared. analyzed.
data.target_sentence: In this study, corrosion images on the cut surfaces of GI steel sheets exposed outdoors for 6 years at the coast were analyzed using k-means clustering and super-pixel DBSCAN, which are unsupervised learning methods. And the results of image segmentation according to the two learning methods were compared and analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 특히, 2가지 방법에 따른 특징들로 인하여 특성 분석 목적에 따른 영상 분할 방법을 제시하는 것이 가능한 것을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, it was confirmed that it was possible to present an image segmentation method according to the purpose of characteristic analysis due to the features according to the two methods.
data.target_sentence: In particular, it was confirmed that it is possible to present an image segmentation method according to the purpose of characteristic analysis due to the characteristics according to the two methods.

data.source_sentence: 부식면의 픽셀 단위의 색상 Hue값과 그 영역에서의 전자 주사 현미경, 에너지 분산 분광법, 전자 탐침 미세분석법 등을 접목하면 부식 이미지의 색상으로 표면 구조, 성분 분석도 가능할 것으로 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: If the color Hue value of the pixel unit of the corrosion surface is combined with electron scanning microscopy, energy dispersive spectroscopy, electron probe microanalysis, etc. in the area, it is thought that the surface structure and component analysis will be possible with the color of the corrosion image.
data.target_sentence: It is thought that surface structure and component analysis can be performed with the color of the corrosion image by incorporating color Hue values in pixel units of the corroded surface and electron scanning microscopy, energy dispersive spectroscopy, and electron probe microanalysis in that area.

data.source_sentence: 화면 색상이 왜곡되거나 디스플레이 표면에서 무지개 형태의 얼룩이 보이는 레인보우 현상이 발생할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The color of the screen may be distorted, or rainbow-like specks appearing on the display surface may occur.
data.target_sentence: Colors on the screen may be distorted or rainbow-like spots may appear on the display surface.

data.source_sentence: 최적 조건일 때 AgNW/PC 필름의 전기적 및 광학적 특성평가를 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Electrical and optical properties evaluation of AgNW/PC films under optimal conditions was performed.
data.target_sentence: Electrical and optical properties of AgNW/PC films were evaluated under optimal conditions.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2는 코팅부, 합지부, 광경화부의 세부 사진을 보여 준다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 2 shows detailed photos of the coating part, lamination part, and photocuring part.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2 is a detailed picture of the coating part, lamination part, and photocuring part.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2(a)와 같이, 코팅부의 분사노즐(dispenser)은 AgNW/PET 필름과 10 mm 이격되어, 일정한 공압에 의해서 광경화 수지를 갈지자 형상으로 코팅한다.
data.mt_sentence: As shown in Fig. 2(a), the spray nozzle (dispenser) of the coating part is 10 mm apart from the AgNW/PET film, and the photocurable resin is coated in a shape of a grind by constant pneumatic pressure.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Figure 2(a), the spray nozzle (dispenser) of the coating part is 10 mm apart from the AgNW/PET film, and the photocurable resin is coated in a staggered shape by constant air pressure.

data.source_sentence: 이때 코팅된 광경화 수지는 닥터 블레이드(Dr. blade unit)에 의해서 일정한 두께로 도포된다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, the coated photocurable resin is applied to a constant thickness by a doctor blade (Dr. blade unit).
data.target_sentence: At this time, the coated photocurable resin is Dr. It is applied with a certain thickness by the blade unit.

data.source_sentence: 필름 합지부는 코팅부의 닥터 블레이드 바로 후단에 위치하며, 그림 2(b)와 같이 2개의 롤러로 구성된다.
data.mt_sentence: The film lamination part is located just after the doctor blade of the coating part, and consists of two rollers as shown in Figure 2(b).
data.target_sentence: The film lamination part is located just behind the doctor blade of the coating part and consists of two rollers as shown in Fig. 2(b).

data.source_sentence: 2개의 롤러들은 광경화 수지층을 매개로 AgNW/PET 필름과 PC 필름에 일정한 압력을 가함으로써 필름들을 합지시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: Two rollers laminate the films by applying a constant pressure to the AgNW/PET film and the PC film through the photocurable resin layer.
data.target_sentence: Two rollers apply constant pressure to the AgNW/PET film and the PC film through the photocurable resin layer to laminate the films.

data.source_sentence: 광경화부는 필름합지부 하단에 위치하며, UV를 조사함으로써 광경화 수지층을 경화시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: The photocurable part is located at the bottom of the film lamination part, and cures the photocurable resin layer by irradiating UV.
data.target_sentence: The photocurable part is located below the film lamination part, and irradiates UV to cure the photocurable resin layer.

data.source_sentence: 그 후, 경화된 필름을 적층(winding)하고, 최종적으로 합지 필름에서 PET 필름을 박리하게 되면 AgNW가 PET 필름에서 PC 필름으로 전사된 AgNW/PC 필름이 완성된다.
data.mt_sentence: After that, the cured film is laminated (winding), and the PET film is finally peeled off the laminated film to complete the AgNW/PC film in which AgNW is transferred from the PET film to the PC film.
data.target_sentence: Thereafter, the cured film is laminated (winded), and the PET film is finally peeled off the laminated film to complete the AgNW/PC film in which AgNW is transferred from the PET film to the PC film.

data.source_sentence: 합지된 필름의 광경화 수지층은 광경화부의 UV(365 nm, 1 W)에 의해서 경화되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The photocurable resin layer of the laminated film was cured by UV (365 nm, 1 W) of the photocurable part.
data.target_sentence: The photocurable resin layer of the laminated film was cured by UV (365 nm, 1W) of the photocurable part.

data.source_sentence: 최종적으로, 합지 필름에서 PET 필름을 박리함으로써, AgNW/PC 필름이 제작되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Finally, an AgNW/PC film was manufactured by peeling the PET film from the lamination film.
data.target_sentence: Finally, an AgNW/PC film was prepared by peeling the PET film from the lamination film.

data.source_sentence: 열 사이클 횟수와 고온 다습 환경에 노출 시간이 전극 전사에 미치는 영향을 확인하기 위해서 환경 챔버(HRS-306L, ESPEC, Japan)가 사용되었다.
data.mt_sentence: An environmental chamber (HRS-306L, ESPEC, Japan) was used to determine the effect of the number of thermal cycles and exposure time to high-temperature and high-humidity environment on electrode transfer.
data.target_sentence: An environmental chamber (HRS-306L, ESPEC, Japan) was used to determine the effect of the number of thermal cycles and exposure time to high-temperature and high-humidity environments on electrode migration.

data.source_sentence: UV 조사 시간이 전극 전사에 미치는 영향을 확인하기 위하여, 광경화 수지가 UV에 노출되는 시간에 따라 전기 전도도를 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to confirm the effect of UV irradiation time on electrode transfer, electrical conductivity was measured according to the time the photocurable resin was exposed to UV.
data.target_sentence: In order to confirm the effect of UV irradiation time on electrode movement, the electrical conductivity according to the UV exposure time of the photocurable resin was measured.

data.source_sentence: UV 조사 시간이 60초 미만에서는 전극 전사가 잘 이루어지지 않았으며, 60~120초에서 AgNW/PC 필름의 면저항 변화율은 미비하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When the UV irradiation time was less than 60 seconds, electrode transfer was not performed well, and the sheet resistance change rate of the AgNW/PC film was insignificant at 60 to 120 seconds.
data.target_sentence: When the UV irradiation time was less than 60 seconds, electrode transfer was not performed well, and the sheet resistance change rate of the AgNW/PC film was insignificant in 60 to 120 seconds.

data.source_sentence: 그림 3은 광경화부에서 합지 필름에 UV를 60초 조사하고 PET 필름을 박리한 후에, PET 필름과 PC 필름에서 광학 현미경으로 관측된 은나노 망상 구조 형상을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 3 shows the shape of the silver nano-network structure observed with an optical microscope in the PET film and PC film after UV irradiation was applied to the laminated film for 60 seconds in the photocuring part and the PET film was peeled off.
data.target_sentence: 3 shows the shape of the silver nano-network structure observed with an optical microscope on the PET film and the PC film after UV irradiation was applied to the laminated film in the photocuring unit for 60 seconds and the PET film was peeled off.

data.source_sentence: 그림에서 보는 것과 같이 AgNW의 상당 부분이 PET 필름에서 PC film으로 전사한 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As shown in the figure, it can be seen that a considerable part of AgNW has been transferred from the PET film to the PC film.
data.target_sentence: As shown in the figure, it can be seen that a significant portion of AgNW was transferred from the PET film to the PC film.

data.source_sentence: 합지 필름에서 PET 필름을 박리할 때, PC 필름으로의 전극 전사의 비율을 높이기 위해서는 PET 필름과 AgNW의 접착 강도를 감소시키는 방법이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When peeling the PET film from the laminated film, there is a method of reducing the adhesive strength between the PET film and AgNW in order to increase the ratio of electrode transfer to the PC film.
data.target_sentence: There is a method of lowering the adhesion between the PET film and AgNW in order to increase the electrode transfer rate to the PC film when the PET film is peeled from the laminated film.

data.source_sentence: 열 사이클 실험의 주요 파라미터는 최대 설정 온도와 사이클 횟수이며, 최대 설정 온도는 60℃, 100℃, 140℃, 사이클 횟수는 10회, 30회, 50회로 총 9번의 실험이 수행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The main parameters of the thermal cycle experiment were the maximum set temperature and the number of cycles, and the maximum set temperature was 60 °C, 100 °C, 140 °C, and the number of cycles was 10, 30, and 50 cycles. A total of 9 experiments were performed.
data.target_sentence: The main parameters of the thermal cycle experiment were the maximum set temperature and the number of cycles. The maximum set temperature was 60 °C, 100 °C, and 140 °C, and the number of cycles was 10, 30, and 50, for a total of 9 experiments.

data.source_sentence: 고온 다습 환경에 노출 시간이 전극 전사에 미치는 영향을 확인하기 위하여, AgNW/PET와 PC 합지 필름에 고온 다습 노출시간을 파라미터로 실험을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to confirm the effect of exposure time to high-temperature and high-humidity environment on electrode transfer, an experiment was performed using high-temperature and high-humidity exposure time as a parameter on AgNW/PET and PC laminated films.
data.target_sentence: In order to determine the effect of exposure time to high temperature and high humidity environment on electrode transfer, experiments were performed with high temperature and high humidity exposure time as parameters for AgNW/PET and PC laminated films.

data.source_sentence: 고온 다습 실험에서, 온도는 85 ℃, 습도는 85%로 설정하였으며, 노출 시간은 1~6시간까지 1시간 간격으로 설정하여, 총 6번의 실험이 수행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the high-temperature and high-humidity experiment, the temperature was set to 85 °C and the humidity to 85%, and the exposure time was set at 1 hour intervals from 1 to 6 hours, and a total of 6 experiments were performed.
data.target_sentence: The high-temperature, high-humidity experiment was set at a temperature of 85° C. and a humidity of 85%, and the exposure time was set at 1 hour intervals from 1 hour to 6 hours, and a total of 6 experiments were performed.

data.source_sentence: 그림과 같이 PET 필름에 잔류하는 AgNW가 일부 관찰되었으며, 대부분의 AgNW/PC 필름의 면저항은 400 Ω/sq 이상으로 측정되어 UV 조건만을 인가했을 때 보다 전기적 성능의 감소를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: As shown in the figure, some AgNWs remaining in the PET film were observed, and the sheet resistance of most AgNW/PC films was measured to be 400 Ω/sq or more, indicating a decrease in electrical performance compared to when only UV conditions were applied.
data.target_sentence: As shown in the figure, some AgNWs remaining in the PET film were observed, and most of the AgNW/PC films had sheet resistance of 400Ω/sq or more, indicating that the electrical performance was lower than when only UV conditions were applied. applied.

data.source_sentence: 이상의 실험으로부터 전극 전사에 영향을 미치는 주요 인자는 UV 조사 시간이며, 열 사이클과 고온 다습 환경에 노출이 전극 전사 특성에 악영향을 미치는 요인으로 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: From the above experiment, it was confirmed that the main factor affecting electrode transfer is UV irradiation time, and exposure to heat cycles and high-temperature and high-humidity environments adversely affects electrode transfer characteristics.
data.target_sentence: Through the above experiment, it was confirmed that the main factor affecting electrode transfer is UV irradiation time, and exposure to thermal cycles and high temperature and high humidity environment negatively affects electrode transfer characteristics.

data.source_sentence: 열 사이클과 고온 다습 환경에 노출이 PET 필름과 AgNW 사이의 접착 강도 감소에 영향을 주지만, 광경화 수지와 AgNW 사이의 접착 강도 역시 감소하여 전체적으로는 전극 전사 비율이 감소한 것으로 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: Although the thermal cycle and exposure to high temperature and high humidity environment affect the decrease in the adhesive strength between the PET film and AgNW, the adhesive strength between the photocurable resin and AgNW also decreases, which is thought to decrease the overall electrode transfer ratio.
data.target_sentence: Thermal cycling and exposure to high-temperature and high-humidity environment affect the deterioration of the adhesion between the PET film and AgNW, but the adhesion between the photocurable resin and AgNW is also reduced, which is thought to reduce the overall electrode transfer rate.

data.source_sentence: 코팅된 필름에서 레인보우 현상이 발생하는 이유는 외부 환경 요인에 의해서 필름의 두께 또는 모양이 변화하여 입사하는 빛의 간섭 패턴이 필름 전체적으로 일정하지 않기 때문이다.
data.mt_sentence: The reason why the rainbow phenomenon occurs in the coated film is that the thickness or shape of the film is changed by external environmental factors, so that the interference pattern of the incident light is not uniform throughout the film.
data.target_sentence: The reason why the rainbow phenomenon occurs in the coating film is that the thickness or shape of the coating film changes due to external environmental factors, so that the interference pattern of the incident light is not uniform throughout the coating film.

data.source_sentence: 자외선에 강한 내구성을 가지고 있다고 알려져 있는 PC필름이 전장용 디스플레이로 사용될 경우 이러한 레인보우 현상을 상당히 줄일 수 있을 것으로 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is believed that such a rainbow phenomenon can be significantly reduced if a PC film, which is known to have strong durability against ultraviolet rays, is used as a display for electric fields.
data.target_sentence: It is believed that this rainbow phenomenon can be drastically reduced by using a PC film, which is known to have strong UV resistance, as an electric field display.

data.source_sentence: 전도성 필름 소재를 PET 필름이 아니라 PC 필름으로 사용하게 되면, 자동차 전장 부품에 일체화가 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: If the conductive film material is used as a PC film rather than a PET film, it can be integrated into automotive electronic parts.
data.target_sentence: If the conductive film material is used as a PC film instead of a PET film, it can be integrated into automotive electronic parts.

data.source_sentence: 더 상세하게는 본 연구에서 제작된 AgNW/PC 필름은 광경화 수지를 통해서 전장 부품으로 사용될 사출물 표면에 in-mold labeling(IML)공법을 이용하여 쉽게 부착할 수 있고, 따라서 미래형 자동차의 터치 센서로 양산될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: More specifically, the AgNW/PC film produced in this study can be easily attached to the surface of the injection product to be used as an electrical component through a photo-curing resin using the in-mold labeling (IML) method, and thus can be used as a touch sensor for future automobiles. can be mass-produced.
data.target_sentence: More specifically, the AgNW/PC film fabricated in this study can be easily attached to the surface of an injection-molded product to be used as an electric component using an in-mold labeling (IML) method through a photocurable resin. Therefore, it can be mass-produced as a touch sensor for future cars.

data.source_sentence: 나아가, 개발된 롤 투 롤 공정은 PC 필름 외에도 더 다양한 소재에 투명 전극을 전사시킬 수 있기 때문에 다양한 응용 분야의 창출이 가능할 것으로 기대된다.
data.mt_sentence: Furthermore, the developed roll-to-roll process is expected to be able to create various application fields because it can transfer transparent electrodes to more diverse materials in addition to PC films.
data.target_sentence: In addition, the developed roll-to-roll process is expected to create a variety of applications as it can deliver transparent electrodes to more diverse materials in addition to PC films.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 PET 필름에 부착된 AgNW를 PC필름에 전사시킬 수 있는 롤 투 롤 공정을 개발하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study developed a roll-to-roll process that can transfer AgNW attached to PET film to PC film.
data.target_sentence: In this study, a roll-to-roll process was developed to transfer AgNW attached to PET film to PC film.

data.source_sentence: 해당 공정을 통해서 UV 시간, 열 사이클 횟수, 고온 다습 환경에 노출 시간을 조건으로 최적 공정 조건을 도출하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this process, optimal process conditions were derived under the conditions of UV time, heat cycle count, and exposure time to high-temperature and humid environments.
data.target_sentence: Through this process, optimal process conditions were derived under conditions such as UV time, number of thermal cycles, and exposure time to a high temperature and high humidity environment.

data.source_sentence: 최적 조건일 때 면저항은 52 Ω/sq 로 측정되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the optimal condition, the sheet resistance was measured to be 52 Ω/sq.
data.target_sentence: In the optimal condition, the sheet resistance was measured to be 52Ω/sq.

data.source_sentence: 기판은 니켈폼(다공성 니켈 기판)을 사용하였으며 가로 3 cm, 세로 5 cm의 크기로 자른 뒤 표면의 산화층을 제거하기 위해 5M HCl 용액에 15분 동안 에칭하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Nickel foam (porous nickel substrate) was used for the substrate, and after cutting it to a size of 3 cm in width and 5 cm in length, it was etched in 5M HCl solution for 15 minutes to remove the oxide layer on the surface.
data.target_sentence: Nickel foam (porous nickel substrate) was used as the substrate, and after cutting into a size of 3 cm in width and 5 cm in length, it was etched in 5 M HCl solution for 15 minutes to remove the oxide layer on the surface.

data.source_sentence: 에칭된 니켈폼을 전착 용액에 24시간 이상 충분히 담궈 니켈폼 내부의 잔존 기포를 제거하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The etched nickel foam was sufficiently immersed in the electrodeposition solution for more than 24 hours to remove the remaining air bubbles inside the nickel foam.
data.target_sentence: The etched nickel foam was sufficiently immersed in the electrodeposition solution for more than 24 hours to remove air bubbles remaining inside the foam.

data.source_sentence: 전착된 전극을 증류수에 세척 후 80℃에서 건조 후 핫프레스(hot press)를 이용하여 250℃에서 10분 동안 단위 면적당 100 kg/cm2의 압력을 가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The electrodeposited electrode was washed with distilled water, dried at 80°C, and hot press was used to apply a pressure of 100 kg/cm2 per unit part at 250°C for 10 minutes.
data.target_sentence: The electrodeposited electrode was washed with distilled water and dried at 80° C., and then a pressure of 100 kg/cm 2 per unit part was applied at 250° C. for 10 minutes using a hot press.

data.source_sentence: 위 셀의 내구성 실험은 수소가 충분하게 발생할 수 있는 조건인 500 mA/cm2의 전류 밀도로 고정 후 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The durability test of the above cell was conducted after fixing it to a current density of 500 mA/cm2, which is a condition in which hydrogen could sufficiently occur.
data.target_sentence: The durability test of the cell was carried out after fixing to a current density of 500 mA/cm 2 , which is a condition in which hydrogen can be sufficiently generated.

data.source_sentence: Cu와 Co의 혼합 수화물 나노 시트가 니켈폼 위에 성장될 때 다음과 같은 반응이 일어난다.
data.mt_sentence: When a mixed hydrate nanosheet of Cu and Co is grown on nickel foam, the following reaction occurs.
data.target_sentence: When a mixed hydrate nanosheet of Cu and Co is grown on a nickel foam, the following reaction occurs.

data.source_sentence: 보고된 CCO 나노 시트의 전착에 필요한 전압인 –1VSCE를 가하여 기판 크기에 따라 전착 후 Fig. 1a에서와 같이 산소 발생 촉매 활성 평가를 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After electrodeposition according to the size of the substrate by applying -1VSCE, which is a voltage required for electrodeposition of the reported CCO nanosheet, the oxygen generation catalyst activity was evaluated as shown in Fig. 1a.
data.target_sentence: By applying -1VSCE, which is the voltage required for the reported electrodeposition of CCO nanosheets, the oxygen evolution catalytic activity after electrodeposition according to the size of the substrate was evaluated as shown in FIG. 1a.

data.source_sentence: 전극 기판 크기가 증가함에 따라 동일 전착 전압이 주어졌을 때 촉매 활성이 감소됨을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was confirmed that the catalytic activity decreased when the same electrodeposition voltage was given as the electrode substrate size increased.
data.target_sentence: It was confirmed that the catalytic activity decreased as the size of the electrode substrate increased when the same electrodeposition voltage was applied.

data.source_sentence: 기판의 면적이 9 cm2의 경우 가해 주는 전착 전압에 따른 전극 표면 분석을 FE-SEM을 통해 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When the area of the substrate was 9 cm2, the electrode surface analysis according to the applied electrodeposition voltage was confirmed through FE-SEM.
data.target_sentence: When the area of the substrate was 9 cm2, the electrode surface analysis according to the applied electrodeposition voltage was confirmed through FE-SEM.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 2의 결과에서 보이는 것과 같이, -0.5 VSCE와 -1.0 VSCE의 전착 전압에서는 기판 위에 나노 시트가 충분하게 형성되지 않았음을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As shown in the results of Fig. 2, it can be confirmed that the nanosheets are not sufficiently formed on the substrate at the electrodeposition voltages of -0.5 VSCE and -1.0 VSCE.
data.target_sentence: As shown in the results of FIG. 2 , it can be confirmed that the nanosheets were not sufficiently formed on the substrate at electrodeposition voltages of -0.5 VSCE and -1.0 VSCE.

data.source_sentence: 반면에, – 1.5VSCE의 전압을 가해 줬을 때, 이전 보고된 결과와 동일하게 나노시트가 기판표면층에 고르게 형성되었다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, when a voltage of −1.5 VSCE was applied, nanosheets were uniformly formed on the substrate surface layer as in the previously reported results.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, when a voltage of -1.5 VSCE was applied, nanosheets were uniformly formed on the substrate surface layer as previously reported results.

data.source_sentence: 반면에, –2.0 VSCE의 전압을 가해 줬을 때에는 -1.5 VSCE의 결과처럼 전체적으로 고른 나노 시트 형상을 보여 주고 있으나, 국부적으로 촉매 입자가 응집되었음을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, when a voltage of -2.0 VSCE was applied, it showed a uniform nanosheet shape as a result of -1.5 VSCE, but it was confirmed that the catalyst particles were locally aggregated.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, when a voltage of -2.0 VSCE was applied, a uniform nanosheet shape was obtained as a result of -1.5 VSCE, but it was confirmed that the catalyst particles were locally aggregated.

data.source_sentence: 이때, copper nitrate의 농도를 20 mM으로 높였을 경우 입자가 응집되는 정도는 줄어들었으나, 전체적으로 나노시트 형태를 유지하지 못하였다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, when the concentration of copper nitrate was increased to 20 mM, the degree of agglomeration of particles decreased, but the nanosheet shape as a whole could not be maintained.
data.target_sentence: At this time, when the concentration of copper nitrate was increased to 20 mM, the degree of aggregation of the particles was reduced, but the overall shape of the nanosheet could not be maintained.

data.source_sentence: 용액의 농도별로 전착된 전극의 OER 활성을 Fig. 3e와 같이 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 2 shows the OER activity of the electrodeposited electrode according to the concentration of the solution. It was measured as in 3e.
data.target_sentence: The OER activity of the electrodeposition electrode according to the concentration of the solution is shown in Fig. 3e was measured.

data.source_sentence: 전착 용액의 농도를 10:100로 진행한 전극에서 가장 높은 OER 활성값을 나타냈으며, 이는 OER의 활성점으로 작용하는 Co의 높은 함유량에 의한 것으로 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: The electrode with the electrodeposition solution concentration of 10:100 showed the highest OER activity value, which is thought to be due to the high content of Co, which acts as an active point of OER.
data.target_sentence: The electrode with an electrodeposition solution concentration of 10:100 showed the highest OER activity value, which is thought to be due to the high content of Co, which acts as an active point of OER.

data.source_sentence: 최종적으로 촉매 반응이 활발하게 일어날 수 있는 나노 시트 형태를 유지하며, Co의 산소 발생 활성점을 풍부하게 가지는 두 번째 공정에서 가장 높은 활성을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Finally, the nanosheet form in which the catalytic reaction can occur actively was maintained, and the highest activity was shown in the second process, which has abundant oxygen generation active sites of Co.
data.target_sentence: Finally, the nanosheet form in which the catalytic reaction can occur actively was maintained, and the highest activity was shown in the secondary process rich in oxygen generating active sites of Co.

data.source_sentence: 셀의 활성 만큼이나 중요한 요소인 내구성을 평가하기 위해 500 mA/cm2 의 일정한 전류 밀도 하에서 전압 변화를 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: To evaluate durability, which is a factor as important as cell activity, voltage change was measured under a constant current density of 500 mA/cm2.
data.target_sentence: To evaluate durability, which is a factor as important as cell activity, voltage changes were measured at a constant current density of 500 mA/cm 2.

data.source_sentence: 70시간 동안 내구성 평가를 진행했을 때 전압은 80 mV 증가하였으며, 시간이 증가함에 따라 변화의 증가 기울기가 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When the durability evaluation was performed for 70 hours, the voltage increased by 80 mV, and the slope of the change decreased as the time increased.
data.target_sentence: When durability was evaluated for 70 hours, the voltage increased by 80 mV, and the slope of the change decreased as time passed.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 전기 화학적 전착법을 이용하여 CCO 나노 시트를 기판에 직접 성장시켰으며, 대면적화에 따른 변화를 전착 전압, 전착 용액의 농도, 그리고 전착 방법 조건의 조절을 통한 최적화 공정을 개발하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, CCO nanosheets were directly grown on a substrate by using an electrochemical electrodeposition method, and an optimization process was developed by adjusting the electrodeposition voltage, the concentration of the electrodeposition solution, and the conditions of the electrodeposition method to change the size of the substrate.
data.target_sentence: In this study, CCO nanosheets were directly grown on substrates using an electrochemical electrodeposition method. In addition, an optimization process was developed by adjusting the electrodeposition voltage, the concentration of the electrodeposition solution, and the electrodeposition method conditions for the change according to the large area.

data.source_sentence: 최종적으로 250℃에서 10분 동안 가압하여 얻어진 전극에서 가장 높은 산소 발생 성능을 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Finally, the electrode obtained by pressing at 250° C. for 10 minutes showed the highest oxygen generation performance.
data.target_sentence: Finally, the electrode obtained by pressing at 250° C. for 10 minutes showed the highest oxygen generation performance.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 9는 PP 신호의 단선 시 측정 위치에 따른 전압변화와 충전제어 특성을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 9 shows the voltage change and charge control characteristics according to the measurement position when the PP signal is disconnected.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 9 shows the voltage change and charge control characteristics according to the measurement position when the PP signal is disconnected.

data.source_sentence: AC 단선 시간이 22초를 초과하면 단선 횟수와 상관없이 충전제어가 AC 단자에서 접촉 불량이 발생하면 충전전류 공급이 중단되면서 높은 서지 전류가 발생하고 노이즈가 발생 되었다.
data.mt_sentence: If the AC disconnection time exceeds 22 seconds, regardless of the number of disconnections, charging control stops supplying charging current when a contact failure occurs at the AC terminal, generating a high surge current and generating noise.
data.target_sentence: If the AC disconnection time exceeds 22 seconds, the charging control stops supplying the charging current, generating a high surge current and generating noise if a bad contact occurs at the AC terminal regardless of the number of disconnections.

data.source_sentence: 풍력 및 태양 에너지와 같은 신재생 에너지는 전력 생산이 외부 환경에 큰 영향을 받기 때문에 부하 변동에 따라 전력 생산량 조절이 어려운 단점을 가지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Renewable energy, such as wind and solar energy, has a disadvantage in that it is difficult to control power output depending on load fluctuations because power production is greatly affected by the external environment.
data.target_sentence: Renewable energies such as wind power and solar power have a disadvantage in that it is difficult to control the output according to load fluctuations because they are greatly influenced by the external environment.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 단점을 보완하기 위해 신재생 에너지 발전은 잉여 전력 저장을 위한 에너지 저장 시스템과 연계한 운용이 필요하며, 이러한 에너지 저장 매체로서 액체 수소가 최근 많은 관심을 받고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to compensate for these disadvantages, renewable energy generation requires operation in connection with an energy storage system for storing surplus power, and liquid hydrogen has recently received a lot of attention as such an energy storage medium.
data.target_sentence: In order to compensate for these shortcomings, renewable energy generation must be operated in connection with an energy storage system that stores surplus power, and liquid hydrogen has recently been attracting attention as such an energy storage medium.

data.source_sentence: 상온, 대기압 조건에서 기체상태인 수소를 액체 상태로 변환하기 위해서는 수소 액화 공정이 필요하며, 이러한 수소 액화 공정 기술 및 관련 기자재 개발이 현재 선진국을 중심으로 활발히 진행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: A hydrogen liquefaction process is required to convert gaseous hydrogen into a liquid state at room temperature and atmospheric pressure, and development of such hydrogen liquefaction process technology and related equipment is currently being actively carried out mainly in developed countries.
data.target_sentence: In order to convert gaseous hydrogen into a liquid state at room temperature and atmospheric pressure, a hydrogen liquefaction process is required, and the development of this hydrogen liquefaction process technology and related equipment is currently being actively conducted mainly in developed countries.

data.source_sentence: 현재까지 개발된 수소 액화 공정은 헬륨, 네온과 같은 안정적인 성질의 기체를 극저온 상태로 만든 후, 기체 수소와의 열 교환을 통해 액화시키는 방식이 주로 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: The hydrogen liquefaction process developed so far is mainly used to liquefy gas with stable properties, such as helium and neon, into a cryogenic state and then liquefy through heat exchange with gaseous hydrogen.
data.target_sentence: The hydrogen liquefaction process developed so far is a method of liquefying a gas with stable properties, such as helium and neon, in a cryogenic state, and then liquefying it through heat exchange with gaseous hydrogen.

data.source_sentence: 이때, 헬륨, 네온과 같은 냉매를 극저온 상태로 만드는 핵심 기자재로서 터보 팽창기가 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, a turbo expander is used as a core material for making a refrigerant such as helium and neon into a cryogenic state.
data.target_sentence: At this time, a turbo expander is used as a core material for making a refrigerant such as helium or neon into a cryogenic state.

data.source_sentence: 기체 정압베어링은 외부에서 가압된 기체를 베어링에 공급하여 회전축을 부상하는 원리로 작동되며, 높은 강성으로 고속 회전 및 높은 회전 정밀도가 요구되는 시스템에 많이 활용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Gas static pressure bearings operate on the principle of levitating the rotating shaft by supplying externally pressurized gas to the bearing, and are widely used in systems requiring high-speed rotation and high rotational precision with high rigidity.
data.target_sentence: Gas static pressure bearings operate on the principle of levitating the rotating shaft by supplying externally pressurized gas to the bearing, and are widely used in systems requiring high-speed rotation and high rigidity rotational precision.

data.source_sentence: Fleming등은 orifice를 적용한 정압 베어링에 대해 포켓의 부피가 커질수록 안정성이 악화됨을 해석을 통해 보였으며, 불균형 질량을 이용한 실험을 통해 공급 압력 증가에 따라 베어링 강성이 증가함을 확인하였다
data.mt_sentence: Fleming et al. interpreted that the stability of a positive pressure bearing to which orifice is applied would deteriorate as the pocket volume becomes larger, and through an experiment with unbalanced mass, it was verified that the bearing stiffness increases as the supply pressure increases
data.target_sentence: In the case of a static pressure bearing to which an orifice is applied, it was interpreted by Fleming et al. that the stability decreased as the pocket volume increased, and it was confirmed through an unbalanced mass test that the bearing stiffness increased as the supply pressure increased.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 수치 해석을 통해 베어링 설계 변수에 대한 성능 변화를 예측하였으며, 베어링 강성 측정으로 해석 모델의 정확성을 입증하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA predicted performance changes for bearing design variables through numerical analysis, and verified the accuracy of the analysis model by measuring bearing stiffness.
data.target_sentence: AAA predicted performance changes for bearing design variables through numerical analysis and verified the accuracy of the analysis model by measuring bearing stiffness.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 베어링 설계 변수 변화에 따른 성능 해석을 수행하여 강성이 최대가 되는 급기 계수가 존재함을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA performed a performance analysis according to the change of bearing design parameters and showed that there is a supply air coefficient that maximizes the stiffness.
data.target_sentence: AAA performed a performance analysis according to the change of bearing design parameters and showed that there is a supply air coefficient that maximizes the stiffness.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 2열 orifice형 베어링에 대해 급기홀 축 방향 위치가 1/7에 있을 때 가 1/4에 있을 때 보다 하중지지능력이 향상됨을 예측하다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA predicts that for two-row orifice-type bearings, the load support ability is improved when the air supply hole axial position is 1/7 compared to when it is 1/4 of the air supply hole axial position.
data.target_sentence: AAA predicts that the load-bearing capacity of the double-row orifice-type bearing will be improved when the supply hole axial position is 1/7 than when the supply hole axial position is 1/4 of the supply hole axial position.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 자성형 급기홀을 가지는 베어링의 섭동압력을 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA measured the perturbation pressure of bearings with magnetic air supply holes.
data.target_sentence: AAA measured perturbation pressure in bearings with magnetic air supply holes.

data.source_sentence: 기체 정압베어링의 해석 모델 개발 및 검증에 관한 연구와 함께 기체 정압베어링의 고속회전기계 적용 증가에 따라 베어링의 안정성 향상을 위한 연구들도 수행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Along with the research on the development and verification of the analysis model of the gas static pressure bearing, studies were also conducted to improve the stability of the bearing as the application of the gas static pressure bearing to high-speed rotating machinery increased.
data.target_sentence: As the application of gas static pressure bearings to high-speed rotating machines increased, along with research on the development and verification of analysis models for gas static pressure bearings, studies to improve bearing stability were also conducted.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 급기홀에 원주 방향 Groove 적용 시 베어링 강성을 향상시킬 수 있음을 해석을 통해 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was shown through analysis that AAA can improve bearing stiffness when applying a circumferential groove to the air supply hole.
data.target_sentence: AAA has shown through analysis that the bearing stiffness can be improved when the circumferential groove is applied to the air supply hole.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 원형 및 비원형 정압 베어링의 안정성에 관한해석을 수행하여 안정성 향상을 위해서는 베어링 수에 따라 적절한 형상의 베어링 적용이 필요함을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA conducted an analysis on the stability of circular and non-circular static pressure bearings and showed that it is necessary to apply a bearing of an appropriate shape according to the number of bearings to improve stability.
data.target_sentence: AAA analyzed the stability of circular static pressure bearings and non-circular static pressure bearings and showed that it is necessary to apply bearings of appropriate shapes according to the number of bearings in order to improve stability.

data.source_sentence: 상기에서 기술한 바와 같이 그동안 기체 정압베어링의 성능 예측 및 안정성 향상을 위해 많은 연구들이 수행되었으며, 이를 바탕으로 기체 정압 베어링은 다양한 형태의 회전기계에 성공적으로 적용되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As described above, many studies have been conducted to predict the performance and improve stability of gas static pressure bearings, and based on this, gas static pressure bearings have been successfully applied to various types of rotating machines.
data.target_sentence: As such, many studies have been conducted to predict the performance of gas static pressure bearings and improve stability, and based on this, gas static pressure bearings are successfully applied to various rotating machines.

data.source_sentence: 현재까지 기체 정압베어링의 극저온 터보 팽창기 적용에 대한 연구는 많이 이루어지지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: Until now, there have been few studies on the application of cryogenic turbo expanders to gas static pressure bearings.
data.target_sentence: So far, few studies have applied cryogenic turboexpanders to gas static bearings.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1은 본 연구를 통해 개발중인 수소 액화용 터보팽창기를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: 2-1. Gas static pressure bearing Fig. 1 shows the turbo expander for hydrogen liquefaction under development through this study.
data.target_sentence: Figure 1 shows the hydrogen liquefied turboexpander under development in this study.

data.source_sentence: 터보팽창기의 작동 유체는 헬륨이며, 작동 유체를 팽창시켜 온도를 낮추는 터빈과 부하 조절용 압축기 임펠러가 회전축 양단에 조립된다.

data.source_sentence: Table 7은 현재 상용화되어 사용되고 있는 합성 에스테르 전기 절연유인 Midel 7131의 물포화한계를 공식 1에 의하여 계산한 것이며, 온도가 높을수록 물 포화한계가 증가함을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 7 shows the water saturation limit of Midel 7131, a synthetic ester electrical insulating oil currently commercially available and used, calculated by Equation 1, and it can be seen that the water saturation limit increases as the temperature increases.
data.target_sentence: Table 7 shows the water saturation limit of Midel 7131, a synthetic ester-based electrical insulating oil currently on the market, calculated by Equation 1, and it can be seen that the water saturation limit increases as the temperature increases.

data.source_sentence: 합성 에스테르 전기 절연유는 변압기 내부에 물이 존재하게 되면 합성 에스테르가 가수분해되어 변압기 수명이 단축되기 때문에 국제적으로 수분에 대한 제한치를 mg/kg 단위로 사용을 제한하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The use of synthetic ester electrical insulating oil is limited internationally in mg/kg because synthetic ester is hydrolyzed and the life of the transformer is shortened when water is present inside the transformer.
data.target_sentence: The use of synthetic ester electrical insulating oil is internationally restricted in mg/kg units because synthetic esters are hydrolyzed and the life of the transformer will be shortened if there is water inside the transformer.

data.source_sentence: Table 8에는 합성 에스테르 전기 절연유의 수분 제한에 대한 국제규격을 보여 주고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 8 shows the international standards for moisture restriction of synthetic ester electrical insulating oils.
data.target_sentence: Table 8 shows the international standards for moisture limits for synthetic ester electrical insulating oils.

data.source_sentence: 합성 에스테르는 식물성 오일과 같이 사용하는 포화지방산과 불포화 지방산의 함량에 따라 높은 온도에서열화 생성물과 공기 중의 산소에 의한 산화생성물이 생기는 메카니즘은 유사하다.
data.mt_sentence: Synthetic esters have a similar mechanism of generating degradation products at high temperatures and oxidation products by oxygen in the air depending on the content of saturated fatty acids and unsaturated fatty acids used with vegetable oils.
data.target_sentence: Synthetic esters produce decomposition products at high temperatures depending on the content of saturated and unsaturated fatty acids used in vegetable oils and fats, and have a similar mechanism of generating oxidation products by oxygen in the air.

data.source_sentence: 이에 따라 물리적 및 화학적물성 변화를 일으킨다
data.mt_sentence: This causes changes in physical and chemical properties
data.target_sentence: This causes changes in physical and chemical properties.

data.source_sentence: 상용 중인 합성 에스테르 전기 절연유의 주요 품질특성은 Table 10에 나타내었다
data.mt_sentence: Table 10 shows the main quality characteristics of commercially available synthetic ester electrical insulating oils.
data.target_sentence: Table 10 shows the key quality characteristics of commercially available synthetic ester electrical insulating oils.

data.source_sentence: 합성 에스테르는 제조시 최종 생성물인 tetra ester의 함량에 따라 발화점, 산가, 저온성, 밀도 등 주요특성에 영향을 준다.
data.mt_sentence: Synthetic esters affect key characteristics such as flash point, acid value, low temperature, and density depending on the content of tetra ester, the final product, during manufacture.
data.target_sentence: Synthetic esters affect key properties, such as flash point, acid value, low temperature, and density, depending on the content of tetraester, which is the final product, during the manufacturing process.

data.source_sentence: 합성 에스테르 전기 절연유는 300-310C 정도의 발화온도를 보여 서 변압기 화재 안전성을 크게 높인다.
data.mt_sentence: Synthetic ester electrical insulating oil has an ignition temperature of 300-310C, which greatly improves the fire safety of transformers.
data.target_sentence: The ignition temperature of synthetic ester electrical insulating oil is 300-310C, which greatly improves the fire safety of the transformer.

data.source_sentence: 수분 흡습성은 높은 수준으로 제조 시 품질 모니터링이 반드시필요함에 따라 수분함량을 중량 mg/kg 단위로 관리한다.
data.mt_sentence: The moisture hygroscopicity is high, and as quality monitoring is required during manufacture, the moisture content is managed in units of weight mg/kg.
data.target_sentence: Moisture content is controlled in mg/kg by weight due to its high moisture absorption and the need for quality monitoring during manufacturing.

data.source_sentence: 합성 에스테르는 광유계 전기 절연유보다 유전율이 높기 때문에 변압기 내 절연지와 유전체 시스템에서 전기장 분포에 이점을 가지는 것으로 보고되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Synthetic esters have been reported to have an advantage in electric field distribution in insulating papers and dielectric systems in transformers because they have a higher dielectric constant than mineral oil-based electrical insulating oils.
data.target_sentence: Synthetic esters have been reported to have an advantage in electric field distribution in dielectric systems of insulating papers and transformers because of their higher permittivity than mineral-based electrical insulating oils.

data.source_sentence: 합성 에스테르 전기 절연유는 해외에서 풍력 발전기 등에 적용되는 것이 보고되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It has been reported that synthetic ester electrical insulating oil is applied to wind power generators overseas.
data.target_sentence: It is reported that synthetic ester electrical insulating oil is applied to overseas wind power generators.

data.source_sentence: 식물성 전기 절연유과 합성 에스테르 전기 절연유가 광유계 전기 절연유보다 인화점 상대적으로 높아 화재 위험성이 낮으며, 생분해성도 우수하게 나타나고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Vegetable electrical insulating oil and synthetic ester electrical insulating oil have a relatively higher flash point than mineral oil-based electrical insulating oil, resulting in a low risk of fire and excellent biodegradability.
data.target_sentence: Vegetable electrical insulating oil and synthetic ester-based electrical insulating oil have a relatively high flash point compared to mineral oil-based electrical insulating oil, which reduces the risk of fire and has excellent biodegradability.

data.source_sentence: 친환경 전기 절연유는 화학적 구조 특성상 광유계 전기 절연유 대비 수분흡습성이 높은 편이나, 특히 합성 에스테르 전기 절연유는 다소 취약한 특성을 보여주고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Eco-friendly electric insulating oil has higher moisture absorption than mineral oil-based electric insulating oil due to the characteristics of the chemical structure, but synthetic ester electric insulating oil in particular shows somewhat weak characteristics.
data.target_sentence: Eco-friendly electrical insulating oil has higher hygroscopicity than mineral oil-based electrical insulating oil due to the characteristics of its chemical structure, but synthetic ester electric insulating oil in particular shows somewhat weak characteristics.

data.source_sentence: Table 12에 국내 · 외에서 개발되어 유통되어 사용 중인 친환경 전기 절연유의 유통 품질관리에 요구되는 품질기준을 제시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 12 presents the quality standards required for distribution quality control of eco-friendly electrical insulating oil developed, distributed, and used at home and abroad.
data.target_sentence: Table 12 presents the quality standards required for distribution quality control of eco-friendly electrical insulating oil developed, distributed, and used at home and abroad.

data.source_sentence: 국내 전기 절연유는 그 사용 목적과 주성분에 따라 품질기준이 구분되고 있는데 「석유 및 석유 대체 연료 사업법」과 KS C 2301에서는 1종부터 8종까지 구분하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Domestic electrical insulating oil is classified according to its purpose of use and its main ingredients, and the quality standards are classified into types 1 to 8 in the 「Oil and Petroleum Alternative Fuel Business Act」 and KS C 2301.
data.target_sentence: Domestic electrical insulating oil is classified according to its use and main component, and the quality standards are classified from type 1 to type 8 in the 「Petroleum and Alternative Fuel Business Act」 and KS C 2301.

data.source_sentence: 광유계 전기 절연유는 1종 4호를 대체할 수 있는 식물성 전기 절연유 품질기준만 KSCIEC 62770을 적용하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: KSCIEC 62770 is applied only to the quality standards of vegetable electrical insulating oil that can replace Type 1 No. 4 for mineral oil-based electrical insulating oil.
data.target_sentence: KSCIEC 62770 applies only to the quality standards of vegetable electrical insulating oil that can replace Type 1 No.4 of mineral oil based electrical insulating oil.

data.source_sentence: 국내 · 외 전력회사는 바이오 기반 친환경 전기 절연유를 직접적으로 변압기 등에 사용을 확대하여 사용하고, 계통의 안정성을 고려하여 주기적으로 모니터링하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Domestic and foreign electric power companies directly expand the use of bio-based eco-friendly electric insulating oil in transformers, etc., and periodically monitor it in consideration of the stability of the system.
data.target_sentence: Domestic and foreign power companies are directly expanding the use of bio-based eco-friendly electrical insulating oil such as transformers and monitoring the system periodically in consideration of the stability of the system.

data.source_sentence: 이를 모니터링 할 수 있는 것은 유중가스를 분석하여 관리기준을 확립하고 운영하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: It is possible to monitor this by analyzing gas in oil to establish and operate management standards.
data.target_sentence: By monitoring this through gas-in-oil analysis, management standards can be established and operated.

data.source_sentence: 2000년부터 2021년까지 발표된 바이오기반 친환경 전기 절연유와 관련된 논문들에서 대상 절연유를 파악하였으며, 이를 중심으로 연구의 주요동향을 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The target insulating oil was identified in the papers related to bio-based eco-friendly electrical insulating oil published from 2000 to 2021, and major trends of the study were analyzed based on this.
data.target_sentence: The target insulating oil was identified in papers related to bio-based eco-friendly electrical insulating oil published from 2000 to 2021, and the main trends of the study were analyzed based on this.

data.source_sentence: 전세계적으로 재생에너지 보급 확대와 전력 장비의 화재 안전성과 환경 친화성으로 인해 친환경 전기 절연유에 대한 연구개발이 늘어나는 추세이다.
data.mt_sentence: Globally, research and development of eco-friendly electric insulating oil is increasing due to the expansion of renewable energy supply and fire safety and environmental friendliness of electric power equipment.
data.target_sentence: Globally, research and development of eco-friendly electric insulating oil is increasing due to the expansion of the supply of new and renewable energy and the fire safety and environmental friendliness of electric power equipment.

data.source_sentence: 다양한 연구결과에 따르면, 친환경 전기 절연유인 식물성 오일과 합성 에스테르의 제조기술, 열안정성, 산화안정성, 특성변화 및 품질관리 등이 절연유 특성 유지에 영향을 미치는 주요 인자로 검토되었다.
data.mt_sentence: According to various research results, the manufacturing technology of vegetable oil and synthetic ester, which are eco-friendly electrical insulating oils, thermal stability, oxidation stability, property change, and quality control were reviewed as major factors affecting the maintenance of insulating oil properties.
data.target_sentence: According to various research results, vegetable oil and synthetic ester manufacturing technology, thermal stability, oxidation stability, physical property change, and quality control, which are eco-friendly electrical insulating oils, are being reviewed as major factors affecting the maintenance of insulating oil properties.

data.source_sentence: 인자들을 적절하게 고려하여 바이오 기반 전기 절연유 개발하여 안정성이 유지 될 때 상용화할 수 있는 사실이 여러 연구를 통해 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: It has been reported through several studies that it can be commercialized when stability is maintained by developing bio-based electrical insulating oil by considering factors appropriately.
data.target_sentence: Several studies have reported that bio-based electrical insulating oil can be commercialized only when it is developed with proper consideration and stability.

data.source_sentence: 특히, 식물성 오일과 합성 에스테르에 존재하는 포화 지방산과 불포화 지방산의 함량에 따른 열화와 산화특성을 고려한 제조기술이 기술적 이슈로 등장하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, manufacturing technology in consideration of deterioration and oxidation characteristics according to the content of saturated and unsaturated fatty acids present in vegetable oils and synthetic esters is emerging as a technical issue.
data.target_sentence: In particular, manufacturing technology in consideration of deterioration and oxidation characteristics according to the content of saturated and unsaturated fatty acids present in vegetable oils and synthetic esters is emerging as a technical problem.

data.source_sentence: 가스 포일 베어링(Gas Foil Bearing, GFB)은 무급유윤활 특성과 오일 베어링 및 구름 요소 베어링에 비해 상대적으로 작은 마찰을 갖기 때문에 소형 고속 회전기기에 널리 사용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Gas Foil Bearings (GFB) are widely used in small, high-speed rotating machines because of their lubrication-free characteristics and relatively low friction compared to oil bearings and rolling element bearings.
data.target_sentence: Gas foil bearings (GFBs) are widely used in small high-speed rotating machinery due to their lubrication-free properties and relatively low friction compared to oil bearings and rolling element bearings.

data.source_sentence: 가스 포일 베어링은 윤활유체로 공기를 사용하기 때문에 오일 베어링에 비해작은 강성과 감쇠를 갖는다.
data.mt_sentence: Since gas foil bearings use air as lubricating fluids, they have smaller stiffness and attenuation than oil bearings.
data.target_sentence: Because gas foil bearings use air as lubricant, they have less stiffness and damping than oil bearings.

data.source_sentence: 특성은 가스 포일 베어링이 적용된 회전체 시스템이 고유진동수를 통과하거나 회전체 시스템에 외란이 가해질 때 회전체동역학 안정성에 불리하게 작용될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Characteristics may adversely affect the stability of the rotor dynamics when the rotating body system to which the gas foil bearing is applied passes the natural frequency or when a disturbance is applied to the rotating body system.
data.target_sentence: These characteristics can negatively affect the stability of rotor dynamics when a rotating body system with gas foil bearings is subjected to natural frequencies or when disturbances are applied to the rotating body system.

data.source_sentence: 가스 포일 베어링을 회전체 시스템에 적용하기 위해서는 회전체-베어링 시스템(rotor-bearing system)의 회전체동역학적 안정성에 대한 예측과 검증이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to apply the gas foil bearing to the rotating body system, prediction and verification of the rotor-dynamic stability of the rotor-bearing system is required.
data.target_sentence: In order to apply the gas foil bearing to the rotating body system, prediction and verification of the rotor dynamic stability of the rotor bearing system is required.

data.source_sentence: 이에 따라 가스 포일베어링을 회전체에 적용하기 위한 많은 연구들이 진행되어왔다.
data.mt_sentence: Accordingly, many studies have been conducted to apply gas foil bearings to rotating bodies.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, many studies have been conducted to apply a gas foil bearing to a rotating body.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 두 장의 범프포일을 갖는 이중범프포일 저널 베어링을 통해 가스 포일 저널 베어링의 하중지지 능력이 향상됨을 정하중 실험을 통해 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA showed that the load-bearing capacity of gas foil journal bearings was improved through a static load test through a double bump foil journal bearing with two bump foils.
data.target_sentence: AAA showed that the load-bearing capacity of gas foil journal bearings was improved through static load testing with double bump foil journal bearings with two bump foils.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 범프포일과 탑포일 사이에 점탄성물질을 추가하여 기존 베어링에 비해 강성과 감쇠를 증가시킬수 있음을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA showed that stiffness and damping can be increased compared to conventional bearings by adding a viscoelastic material between the bump foil and the top foil.
data.target_sentence: AAA has shown that stiffness and damping can be increased compared to conventional bearings by adding a viscoelastic material between the bump foil and the top foil.

data.source_sentence: 점탄성 물질이 추가된 베어링을 사용하여 임계속도 이상의 속도에서 진동 진폭을 감소시키고 비동기 진동성분을 감소시킬 수 있음을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: It has been shown that the use of bearings with added viscoelastic materials can reduce the vibration amplitude and reduce the asynchronous vibration component at speeds above the critical speed.
data.target_sentence: It has been shown that the use of bearings with added viscoelastic materials can reduce vibration amplitude and reduce asynchronous vibration components at velocities above the critical speed.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 두 장의 탑포일을 사용한 멀티레이어 가스 포일 저널 베어링(Multi-layer GFJB)을 개발하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA has developed a multi-layer gas foil journal bearing (Multi-layer GFJB) using two top foils.
data.target_sentence: AAA has developed a multilayer gas foil journal bearing (multilayer GFJB) using two top foils.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 예압(preload)을 통해 가스 포일 저널베어링의 간극(clearance)을 조정하여 하중지지능력을 향상시킬 수 있음을 실험적으로 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA has experimentally shown that the load-bearing capacity can be improved by adjusting the clearance of gas foil journal bearings through preload.
data.target_sentence: AAA has experimentally shown that the load-bearing capacity can be improved by adjusting the clearance of gas foil journal bearings through preload.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 탑포일과 범프포일 사이에 심포일(shim foil)을 추가한 가스 포일 저널 베어링을 소개하였으며 수학적 모델링을 통해 정적/동적 하중에 대한 성능 해석을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA introduced a gas foil journal bearing with a shim foil added between the top foil and the bump foil, and performance analysis was performed for static/dynamic loads through mathematical modeling.
data.target_sentence: AAA introduced a gas foil journal bearing with an added shim foil between the top foil and bump foil, and performed performance analysis for static and dynamic loads through mathematical modeling.

data.source_sentence: 심포일을 갖는 가스 포일 저널 베어링을 공기압축기에 적용하여 회전체동역학적 성능을 평가하고 해석 모델을 검증하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A gas foil journal bearing with a symphoil was applied to an air compressor to evaluate the rotational dynamic performance and verify the analysis model.
data.target_sentence: A gas foil journal bearing with symphoil was applied to an air compressor to evaluate the rotational dynamic performance and validate the analytical model.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 참고문헌에 사용된 공기압축기를 수소 전기 자동차에 적용하여 NVH(noise, vibration, and harshness) 특성에 관한 연구를 수행하였으며 가스 포일 저널 베어링으로 지지되는 공기압축기가 이동수단에 적용될 수 있음을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA conducted a study on noise, vibration, and harshness (NVH) characteristics by applying the air compressor used in the reference to hydrogen electric vehicles, and showed that the air compressor supported by the gas foil journal bearing can be applied to the means of transportation.
data.target_sentence: AAA conducted a study on noise, vibration, and roughness (NVH) characteristics by applying an air compressor used for reference to a hydrogen electric vehicle, and showed that an air compressor supported by a gas foil journal bearing can be applied to transportation.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 가스 포일 저널 베어링으로 지지되는 회전축에 불평형질량(imbalance mass)을 증가시키며 가스포일 저널 베어링의 회전체동역학 특성을 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA increased the imbalance mass on the rotating shaft supported by the gas foil journal bearing and measured the rotor dynamics of the gas foil journal bearing.
data.target_sentence: AAA increased the unbalanced mass of the rotating shaft supported by the gas foil journal bearings and measured the rotor dynamics of the gas foil journal bearings.

data.source_sentence: AAA1과 AAA2는 가스 포일 저널 베어링의 정특성 실험 결과를 통해 비선형 강성이 포함된 비선형 진동 예측 모델을 개발하였으며 참고문헌의 실험결과와 비교하여 해석 모델을 검증하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA1 and AAA2 developed a nonlinear vibration prediction model including nonlinear stiffness based on the static characteristic test results of gas foil journal bearings, and verified the analysis model by comparing it with the experimental results of references.
data.target_sentence: AAA1 and AAA2 developed a nonlinear vibration prediction model including nonlinear stiffness based on the static characteristic test results of gas foil journal bearings, and verified the analytical model by comparing it with the experimental results in the reference literature.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 참고문헌에서 사용된 공기압축기의 바닥 가진 실험을 통해 외란에 대한 회전체-베어링 시스템의 회전체동역학적 안정성 평가를 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA performed the evaluation of the rotor dynamic stability of the rotor-bearing system against disturbance through the bottom excitation experiment of the air compressor used in the reference.
data.target_sentence: AAA performed an evaluation of the rotor dynamic stability of a rotor bearing system against disturbances through a bottom excitation experiment of an air compressor used in the literature.

data.source_sentence: 실험을 통해 회전체-베어링 시스템의 비선형 진동 특성을 확인하였으며 바닥 가진 실험을 모사한 해석 모델을 통해 비선형 진동을 예측하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Through the experiment, the nonlinear vibration characteristics of the rotating body-bearing system were confirmed, and the nonlinear vibration was predicted through the analysis model simulating the floor excitation experiment.
data.target_sentence: The nonlinear vibration characteristics of the rotating bearing system were confirmed through the experiment, and the nonlinear vibration was predicted through the analysis model simulating the floor excitation experiment.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문은 참고문헌에 소개된 단일 포일을 사용하면서도 비선형 강성 특성과 예압 효과를 가질 수 있는 가스 빔포일 베어링을 공기압축기에 적용하여 회전체동역학 성능을 측정하고 해석 모델과 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, the rotor dynamics performance was measured and compared with the analysis model by applying a gas beam foil bearing, which can have nonlinear stiffness characteristics and preload effect, to an air compressor while using the single foil introduced in the reference literature.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, the rotor dynamics performance was measured and compared with the analysis model by applying a gas beam foil bearing, which can have non-linear stiffness characteristics and preload effect, to an air compressor using a single foil introduced in the reference literature.

data.source_sentence: 베어링은 각각 세장의 탑포일과 빔포일을 가지며 포일들은 도브 테일 그루브(dove tail groove)에 끼워진다.
data.mt_sentence: The bearings each have three top foils and a beam foil, and the foils fit into a dove tail groove.
data.target_sentence: The bearings each have three top foils and a beam foil, and the foils fit into pigeon tail grooves.

data.source_sentence: 이때 빔포일의 빔 부위는 구부러지지 않고 베어링 내면에 지지된다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, the beam portion of the beam foil is supported on the inner surface of the bearing without being bent.
data.target_sentence: At this time, the beam portion of the beam foil is supported on the inner surface of the bearing without being bent.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 2는 가스 빔포일 저널 베어링의 회전체동역학 특성을 측정하기 위해 적용된 소형 터보 공기압축기 시스템의 개략도를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 2 shows a schematic diagram of a small turbo air compressor system applied to measure the rotational dynamic characteristics of a gas beamfoil journal bearing.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2 is a schematic diagram of a compact turbo air compressor system applied to the measurement of the rotational dynamics of a gas beamfoil journal bearing.

data.source_sentence: 회전축의 양 단에 위치한 두 개의 가스 빔포일 저널 베어링이 반경방향 하중을 지지하며, 한 개의 임펠러(impeller)의 반대쪽 끝단에 설치된 범프 타입의 가스 포일 스러스트 베어링은 축방향 하중을 지지한다.
data.mt_sentence: Two gas beam foil journal bearings located at both ends of the rotating shaft support radial loads, and a bump-type gas foil thrust bearing installed at the opposite end of one impeller supports axial loads.
data.target_sentence: Two gas-beam foil journal bearings located at both ends of the rotating shaft support radial loads, and bump-type gas foil thrust bearings installed at the opposite end of one impeller support axial loads.

data.source_sentence: 임펠러 끝단의 체결 볼트에는 수직방향(vertical), 수평방향(horizontal), 그리고 축방향 (axial)의 진동 변위를 측정하기 위한 와전류식 변위 센서를 설치하였다.
data.mt_sentence: An eddy current type displacement sensor is installed on the fastening bolt of the impeller end to measure vibration displacement in a vertical direction, a horizontal direction, and an axial direction.
data.target_sentence: An eddy current displacement sensor is installed on the fixing bolt at the end of the impeller to measure the vibration displacement in the vertical, horizontal and axial directions.

data.source_sentence: 실험은 고속 전동기의 기저 회전속도(15 krpm)에서 최대 회전속도(100 krpm)까지 1초 동안 급가속과 30초 동안 완가속 하며 수행되었으며 최고 속도 구동 이후 전동기 전원을 제거하여 회전축을 자유감속(cost down)하여 정지시켰다.
data.mt_sentence: The experiment was conducted with rapid acceleration and slow acceleration for 1 second from the base rotation speed (15 krpm) to the maximum rotation speed (100 krpm), and the motor power was removed after driving at the maximum speed, and the rotation shaft was stopped by cost-down.
data.target_sentence: The experiment was conducted with rapid and low acceleration for 1 second to 30 seconds from the reference rotation speed (15krpm) to the maximum rotation speed (100krpm), and the motor power was removed after driving at the maximum speed, and the rotation shaft was stopped by cost-down.

data.source_sentence: 회전 동기 진동 주파수 성분은 회전축의 불평형질량에 의한 진동 성분으로 회전축의 밸런싱(balancing) 작업을 통해 진동 크기를 감소시킬 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The rotation synchronous vibration frequency component is a vibration component due to the unbalanced mass of the rotation shaft, and the magnitude of vibration can be reduced through balancing of the rotation shaft.
data.target_sentence: The rotation synchronous vibration frequency component is a vibration component due to the unbalanced mass of the rotation shaft, and the magnitude of the vibration can be reduced by balancing the rotation shaft.

data.source_sentence: 회전축의 진동 변위와 경향은 가속 시간에 관계없이 일정함을 보여 회전체-베어링 시스템이 각가속도에 관계없이 회전체동 역학적으로 안정됨을 확인했다.
data.mt_sentence: The vibration displacement and tendency of the rotating shaft were shown to be constant regardless of the acceleration time, confirming that the rotating body-bearing system was mechanically stable regardless of the angular acceleration.
data.target_sentence: The vibration displacement and trend of the rotating shaft were shown to be constant regardless of the acceleration time, confirming that the rotating bearing system was mechanically stable regardless of the angular acceleration.

data.source_sentence: 회전축은 전원 제거이후 약 9.7초간 자유감속 하여 회전속도에 따라 유체동압윤활(hydrodynamic lubrication)영역과 혼합윤활(mixedlubrication) 영역 그리고 경계윤활(boundary lubrication) 영역을 보이며 정지하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The rotating shaft was freely decelerated for about 9.7 seconds after power removal and stopped showing a hydrodynamic lubrication area, a mixed lubrication area, and a boundary lubrication area according to the rotational speed.
data.target_sentence: After removing the power, the rotating shaft decelerates freely for about 9.7 seconds and stops while displaying the fluid lubrication area, mixed lubrication area, and boundary lubrication area according to the rotation speed.

data.source_sentence: 실험 결과 회전속도 40 krpm이상의 영역에서는 임펠러의 공력 저항에 의해 회전속도가 빠르게 감소한다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the experiment, the rotational speed rapidly decreases due to the aerodynamic resistance of the impeller in an area with a rotational speed of 40 krpm or more.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the experiment, it was found that the rotational speed rapidly decreased due to the aerodynamic resistance of the impeller in the region where the rotational speed was 40krpm or more.

data.source_sentence: 이후 회전속도 9 krpm ~ 40 krpm의 유체동압 윤활 영역에서 베어링의 유체전단력에 의해 지수적으로 감소함을 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: Afterwards, it is shown that it decreases exponentially due to the fluid shear force of the bearing in the hydrodynamic lubrication region with a rotation speed of 9 krpm to 40 krpm.
data.target_sentence: Afterwards, it can be seen that the rotational speed decreases exponentially by the fluid shear force of the bearing in the hydrodynamic lubrication region of 9 to 40 krpm.

data.source_sentence: 이후 회전속도가 지수함수 형태에서 건마찰(dri-friction)에 의한 일차 함수의 형태로 전환하는 혼합윤활 영역을 보이며 약 3.6 krpm 이하의 경계윤활 영역에서 회전축과 베어링이 완전 접촉(touch-down)하여 회전속도가 빠르게 감소함을 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: After that, the rotation speed shows a mixed lubrication area where the rotation speed changes from the exponential function form to the primary function by dry friction, and the rotation shaft and bearing are in complete touch-down in the boundary lubrication area below about 3.6 krpm, thereby rapidly decreasing the rotation speed.
data.target_sentence: After that, the mixed lubrication area is shown in which the rotational speed converts from an exponential function to a linear function due to dry friction. In the boundary lubrication area of about 3.6 krpm or less, the rotating shaft and the bearing completely touch-down and the rotational speed decreases rapidly.

data.source_sentence: 두 베어링 모두 회전속도가 감소함에 따라 유체동압윤활 영역, 혼합윤활 영역, 경계윤활 영역을 보이며 정지함을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be confirmed that both bearings stop showing a fluid dynamic pressure lubrication area, a mixed lubrication area, and a boundary lubrication area as the rotation speed decreases.
data.target_sentence: As the rotational speed decreases, it can be seen that both bearings show no hydrodynamic lubrication region, mixed lubrication region, or boundary lubrication region.

data.source_sentence: 범프포일 베어링의 경우 터치다운 이후 회전속도가 빔포일 베어링에 비해 급격히 감소함을 보이는데이는 3개의 패드(Pad)를 갖는 빔포일 베어링의 회전축과 베어링간의 마찰 면적이 더 작기 때문으로 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of bumpfoil bearings, the rotational speed decreases rapidly compared to beamfoil bearings after touchdown because the friction area between the rotating shaft and the bearing of beamfoil bearings with three pads is smaller.
data.target_sentence: In the case of bumpfoil bearings, the rotational speed decreases sharply compared to beamfoil bearings after grounding because the friction area between the bearing and the rotating shaft of the three-padded beamfoil bearing is small.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 6은 실제 축계를 바탕으로 회전체동역학 성능 예측을 위해 수행한 유한요소 해석 모델을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 6 shows the finite element analysis model performed to predict rotational dynamics performance based on the actual axis.
data.target_sentence: Figure 6 shows the finite element analysis model performed to predict the rotational dynamics performance based on the actual axis.

data.source_sentence: 해석모델은 총 29개의 절점을 가지고 있으며 복잡한 형상의 임펠러는 무게 중심에 위치한 질량과 관성모멘트로 모사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The analysis model has a total of 29 nodes, and the impeller with a complex shape was simulated with the mass and inertial moment located at the center of gravity.
data.target_sentence: The analysis model has a total of 29 nodes, and the complex shape of the impeller is simulated using the mass and moment of inertia located at the center of gravity.

data.source_sentence: 회전축은 양단의 가스 빔포일 저널 베어링으로 지지되며 이때 양 베어링에 부가되는 하중은 각각 3.40N과 3.38N으로 유사하다.
data.mt_sentence: The rotating shaft is supported by gas beamfoil journal bearings at both ends, and the loads applied to both bearings are similar at 3.40N and 3.38N, respectively.
data.target_sentence: The rotating shaft is supported by gas beam foil journal bearings at both ends, and the loads applied to both bearings are similar at 3.40N and 3.38N, respectively.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 7은 유한요소 모델링을 통해 해석된 회전축의 고 유진동수 (free-free mode natural frequency)를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 7 shows the natural frequency (free-free mode natural frequency) of the rotating shaft analyzed through finite element modeling.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 7 shows the natural frequency (free mode natural frequency) of the rotating shaft analyzed through finite element modeling.

data.source_sentence: 해석 결과는 회전축의 고유진동수가 정지 시에는 약143 krpm(2383 Hz)이며, 회전속도의 증가에 따라 자이로 스코프 효과에 의해 점차 증가하여 약 155 krpm (2583 Hz)에서 회전축의 동기 진동 (Synchronous vibration)과의 공진을 예측한다.
data.mt_sentence: The analysis result shows that the natural frequency of the rotating shaft is about 143 krpm (2383 Hz) when it is stopped, and it gradually increases due to the gyroscope effect as the rotational speed increases, resulting in synchronous vibration of the rotating shaft at about 155 krpm (2583 Hz). predict resonance with
data.target_sentence: The analysis result shows that the natural frequency of the rotating shaft is about 143 krpm (2383 Hz) when it is stopped. As the rotation speed increases, it gradually increases due to the gyroscope effect, and resonance with the synchronous vibration of the rotation shaft is predicted at about 155 krpm (2583 Hz).

data.source_sentence: Fig. 8은 회전축-베어링 시스템의 회전체동역학 성능을 예측하기 위해 수행된 가스 빔포일 저널 베어링의 회전속도에 대한 강성 및 감쇠의 예측 결과를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 8 shows the prediction results of stiffness and attenuation for the rotational speed of the gas beamfoil journal bearing performed to predict the rotational dynamic performance of the rotational axis-bearing system.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 8 shows the stiffness and damping prediction results for the rotational speed of the gas beamfoil journal bearing performed to predict the rotational dynamic performance of the rotating shaft bearing system.

data.source_sentence: 베어링에 부가되는 축 하중은 3.4N을 사용하였으며 해석에 사용한 가스 빔포일 저널 베어링의 형상 치수 및 물성치는 Table 2를 통해 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The axial load applied to the bearing was used as 3.4N, and the shape dimensions and physical properties of the gas beam foil journal bearing used in the analysis can be confirmed in Table 2.
data.target_sentence: The axial load applied to the bearing was used as 3.4N, and the shape dimensions and properties of the gas beam foil journal bearing used in the analysis can be confirmed in Table 2.

data.source_sentence: 베어링의 강성 및 감쇠는 포트란(fortran)기반의 자체 해석 프로그램을 사용하였으며 식 (1)의 등온, 등점성의 이상기체 레이놀즈 방정식을 기반으로 한다.
data.mt_sentence: For the stiffness and damping of the bearing, a fortran-based self-analysis program was used, and it is based on the Reynolds equation of an ideal gas of isothermal and iso-viscous properties in Equation (1).
data.target_sentence: For the stiffness and damping of the bearing, a fortran-based self-analysis program was used, which was based on the Reynolds equation of isothermal and isotropic ideal gases in Equation 1.

data.source_sentence: 이때 p, h, μ, Ω, R, t, x, z는 각각 압력, 유막두께, 점도, 회전축 각속도, 회전축 반지름, 시간 그리고 각각 원주방향 좌표, 축방향 좌표를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, p, h, μ, Ω, R, t, x, and z represent pressure, oil film thickness, viscosity, angular velocity of the rotation axis, radius of rotation axis, time, and circumferential and axial coordinates, respectively.
data.target_sentence: Here, p, h, μ, Ω, R, t, x, and z represent pressure, oil film thickness, viscosity, angular velocity of the rotating shaft, radius of the rotating shaft, time, circumferential and axial coordinates, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 이때 베어링에 부가되는 정적 하중에 의한 빔포일 변형량(wd)은 참고문헌의 스프링 정적 강성 모델을 이용하여 구하며 베어링의 강성 및 감쇠는 참고문헌의 모델을 통해 계산된다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, the beam foil deformation amount (wd) due to the static load applied to the bearing is obtained using the spring static stiffness model of the reference, and the stiffness and damping of the bearing are calculated through the model of the reference.
data.target_sentence: At this time, the beam foil deformation amount (wd) due to the static load applied to the bearing is calculated using the standard spring static stiffness model, and the stiffness and damping of the bearing are calculated through the standard model.

data.source_sentence: 예측 결과 모든 회전속도에서 하중 방향의 직교 강성(KXX)과 직교 감쇠(CXX)가 가장 크게 나타남을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: The prediction results show that the orthogonal stiffness (KXX) and orthogonal damping (CXX) in the load direction are the largest at all rotational speeds.
data.target_sentence: The prediction results show that the orthogonal stiffness (KXX) and orthogonal damping (CXX) in the direction of the load are the largest at all rotational speeds.

data.source_sentence: 가스 빔포일 저널 베어링의 강성과 감쇠 성분은 회전속도가 증가함에 따라 크기가 감소하며 해석 구간 내에서 모두 양의 값을 갖는다.
data.mt_sentence: The stiffness and damping components of the gas beamfoil journal bearing decrease in size as the rotational speed increases, and both have positive values within the analysis section.
data.target_sentence: The stiffness and damping components of gas beamfoil journal bearings decrease in size with increasing rotational speed, both of which are positive within the analysis section.

data.source_sentence: 감쇠 계수의 경우 해석 구간 내에서 모든 성분이 양의 값으로 예측되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of the damping coefficient, all components within the analysis interval were predicted to be positive values.
data.target_sentence: In the case of damping coefficient, all components in the analysis section were predicted to have positive values.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 9는 회전속도에 따른 베어링의 강성 및 감쇠계수 를 유한요소 모델링에 적용한 회전체-베어링 시스템의 회전속도에 따른 강체모드 고유 진동수를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 9 shows the unique frequency of rigid mode according to the rotational speed of the rotor-bearing system applying the stiffness and attenuation coefficient of the bearing according to the rotational speed to the finite element modeling.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 9 shows the natural frequency of the stiffness mode according to the rotational speed of the rotor bearing system by applying the bearing stiffness and damping coefficient according to the rotational speed in the finite element modeling.

data.source_sentence: 비록 압축기 공간의 제약으로 인해 진동 위상을 측정하지 못하여 회전축의 런아웃(runout) 제거를 수행하지 못하였으나, 질량 불평형 응답 해석 결과는 측정된 실험결과를 잘예측함을 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: Although the vibration phase could not be measured due to the constraint of the compressor space and thus the runout of the rotating shaft could not be removed, the mass imbalance response analysis results showed that the measured experimental results were well predicted.
data.target_sentence: Although the runout of the rotating shaft could not be eliminated because the vibration phase could not be measured due to the space constraints of the compressor, the mass imbalance response analysis showed that the measured experimental results were well predicted.

data.source_sentence: 질량 응답 예측 결과 1차 임계속도와 2차 임계속도 부근에서 공진으로 인한 진동변위 상승이 예측되었으며 회전속도가 증가함에 따라 진동 변위가 감소함을 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the mass response prediction, an increase in vibrational displacement due to resonance was predicted near the first and second critical speeds, and it was shown that the vibrational displacement decreased as the rotational speed increased.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the mass response prediction, an increase in vibrational displacement due to resonance was predicted near the first and second critical speeds, and the vibrational displacement decreased as the rotational speed increased.

data.source_sentence: 실험결과와 비교하였을 때 2차 임계속도의 위치와 진동 변위가 유사하게 예측됨을 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: Compared with the experimental results, it is shown that the position and vibration displacement of the second critical velocity are predicted similarly.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that the position and vibration displacement of the second critical speed are predicted similarly with the experimental results.

data.source_sentence: 1차임계속도의 경우 회전축이 유체동압으로 완전히 부상하기 이전 영역으로 회전축의 진동 변위가 상승하다 회전축 완전 부상 이전 영역에서는 감소함을 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of the first critical speed, the vibrational displacement of the rotating shaft rises to the region before the rotating shaft is fully floated due to the hydrodynamic pressure, and it is decreased in the region before the rotating shaft is fully floated.
data.target_sentence: In the case of the first critical speed, the vibrational displacement of the rotating shaft rises to a region before the rotating shaft is completely floated by the hydrodynamic pressure, and decreases in the region before the rotating shaft is completely floated.

data.source_sentence: 바닥 가진 응답 실험은 동적 외란에 대한 회전체-베어링 시스템의 회전체동역학적 응답 특성 평가에 그 목적이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The purpose of the floor excitation response experiment is to evaluate the rotor dynamic response characteristics of the rotor-bearing system to dynamic disturbances.
data.target_sentence: The purpose of the floor excitation response experiment is to evaluate the rotor dynamic response characteristics of a rotor bearing system to dynamic disturbances.

data.source_sentence: 기저 회전속도인 15 krpm(250 Hz)로 회전중인압축기의 바닥판을 수직방향으로 가진한 후 회전축의 진동 변위를 측정하는 방법으로 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This was carried out by measuring the vibration displacement of the rotating shaft after vibrating the bottom plate of the rotating compressor in the vertical direction at the base rotation speed of 15 krpm (250 Hz).

data.source_sentence: 작동 유체가 래버린스 씰의 간극을 통과할 때 압력 에너지의 일부가 운동 에너지로 변환된다.

data.source_sentence: 래버린스 씰의 공동 내부에서는 난류와 점성의 상호작용으로 운동에너지와 압력 에너지가 소산되고 누설 유량이 감소한다.
