data.target_sentence: Inside the cavity of the labyrinth seal, kinetic energy and pressure energy are dissipated due to the interaction of turbulence and viscosity, and the leak flow rate is reduced.

data.source_sentence: 래버린스 씰은 제작과 설치가 쉽고 우수한 기밀 성능을 통해 터보 기계의 효율을 향상시킬 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Labyrinth seals are easy to manufacture and install, and can improve the efficiency of turbomachinery through excellent airtight performance.
data.target_sentence: Labyrinth seals are easy to manufacture and install and can improve the efficiency of turbomachinery through good airtight performance.

data.source_sentence: 최근 터보 기계들의 고성능화, 고속화, 소형화 추세에 따라 래버린스 씰의 간극이 작아지고 있으며 그 결과 간극에서 발생한 유체력이 증가하여 터보 기계의 회전체 동역학적 불안정을 유발하는 원인으로 주목받고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, as turbomachines become more high-performance, faster, and smaller, the gap of the labyrinth seal is decreasing, and as a result, the fluid force generated in the gap increases, causing rotational dynamic instability of the turbomachines.

data.target_sentence: AAAet al. Assuming the cavity of the labyrinth seal as two controlled volumes, a two controlled volumetric bulk flow model was developed and the experimental results were compared.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 벌크 플로우 모델에 에너지 방정식을 추가하여 래버린스 씰을 해석하였다.

data.source_sentence: 해당 모델은 씰 입구의 유동 방향을 잘 고려한 해석 결과를 도출하였다.

data.target_sentence: The model derived analysis results considering the flow direction of the seal inlet well.

data.source_sentence: 벌크 플로우 모델은 해석 코드 개발이 어렵고 형상이 복잡한 씰에 대해서는 적용하는데 한계가 있어 최근에는 전산유체역학 (CFD)에 기반한 해석 방법이 선호되고 있다.

data.target_sentence: Recently, analysis methods based on computational fluid dynamics (CFD) have been preferred, because bulk flow models are difficult to develop analysis codes and have limitations in application to seals with complex shapes.

data.source_sentence: 높은 작동 온도에서 열팽창으로 인해 간극이 작아져 누설 유량이 감소하였지만 일정 온도 이상에서는 열 팽창량이 간극보다 커져 터보 기계의 작동이 불가능한 경우도 발생하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In some cases, the gap is reduced due to thermal expansion at a high operating temperature, and thus the leakage flow rate is reduced, but at a certain temperature or higher, the thermal expansion amount is greater than the gap, making the turbo machine impossible to operate.
data.target_sentence: In some cases, at high operating temperatures, thermal expansion reduces the gap, reducing the leakage flow, but above a certain temperature the amount of thermal expansion is greater than the gap, making turbomachinery impossible to operate.

data.source_sentence: 래버린스 씰에서 발생하는 회전체 동역학적 불안정성의 원인 중 하나는 유체의 원주방향 유속이다.
data.mt_sentence: One of the causes of rotational dynamic instability in labyrinth seals is the circumferential flow velocity of the fluid.
data.target_sentence: One of the causes of rotational dynamic instability in labyrinth seals is the circumferential flow velocity of the fluid.

data.source_sentence: 실제 터보 기계에서 압축기나 펌프를 지난 유체는 원주방향으로의 회전 성분을 지니게 되는데 씰 영역에 진입하기 전유체의 원주방향 유속 성분을 프리스월(Pre-swirl)이라고 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In an actual turbo machine, a fluid that has passed through a compressor or pump has a rotating component in the circumferential direction, and the circumferential flow velocity component of the fluid before entering the seal area is called a pre-swirl.
data.target_sentence: In an actual turbomachine, the fluid passing through the compressor or pump has a component that rotates in the circumferential direction, and the circumferential flow velocity component of the fluid before entering the sealing area is called pre-swirl.

data.source_sentence: 프리스월의 방향과 로터의 회전방향이 같을 때 프리스월에 의해 유체의 원주방향 유속이 증가하고 불안정한 유체력 또한 증가한다.
data.mt_sentence: When the direction of the free wall and the rotation direction of the rotor are the same, the circumferential flow velocity of the fluid increases due to the free wall, and the unstable fluid force also increases.
data.target_sentence: When the direction of the pre-swirl and the rotational direction of the rotor are the same, the circumferential flow rate of the fluid increases due to the pre-swirl and the unstable fluid force also increases.

data.source_sentence: 프리스월을 억제하기 위해 씰 입구에 스월 브레이크(Swirl Brake)를 장착할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: A swirl brake may be installed at the seal inlet to suppress the free wall.
data.target_sentence: A vortex brake can be installed at the seal inlet to suppress pre-vortex.

data.source_sentence: 적절하게 설계된 스월 브레이크는 프리스월을 감소시켜 씰에서 발생하는 불안정한 유체력을 억제하고 터보 기계의 안정성을 증가시킬 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Properly designed swirl brakes can reduce freewheels, thereby suppressing unstable fluid forces generated from the seal and increasing the stability of the turbo machine.
data.target_sentence: A properly designed swirl brake can reduce pre-swirl, suppressing unstable fluid forces generated in the seal and increasing turbomachinery stability.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 스월 브레이크의 형상과 성능 사이의 관계를 분석하고 유효 길이와 유효 각도의 개념을 제시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA analyzed the relationship between the shape and performance of the swirl brake and presented the concept of effective length and effective angle.
data.target_sentence: AAA presented the concept of effective length and effective angle by analyzing the relationship between the shape and performance of the swirl brake.

data.source_sentence: 스월 브레이크 베인의 길이와 각도가 스월 브레이크의 성능에 많은 영향을 준다는 것을 발견하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was found that the length and angle of the swirl brake vane greatly affected the performance of the swirl brake.
data.target_sentence: It was found that the length and angle of the swirl brake vane had a great effect on the performance of the swirl brake.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 역방향 스월 브레이크가 장착된 래버린스 씰의 동특성 시험을 수행하였으며 기존 스월 브레이크보다 역방향 스월 브레이크를 장착한 래버린스 씰의 동특성이 개선된 것을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA conducted a dynamic characteristic test of a labyrinth seal equipped with a reverse swirl brake and confirmed that the dynamic characteristic of a labyrinth seal equipped with a reverse swirl brake was improved compared to the existing swirl brake.
data.target_sentence: AAA conducted a dynamic property test of a labyrinth seal equipped with a reverse swirl brake, and confirmed that the dynamic properties of a labyrinth seal equipped with a reverse swirl brake were improved compared to the conventional swirl brake.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 스월 브레이크 형상 최적화를 통한 래버린스 씰의 동특성 개선 연구의 전 단계로 단순한 형상의 스월 브레이크가 장착된 래버린스 씰의 동특성 해석을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, dynamic characteristics analysis of labyrinth seal equipped with a simple shape swirl brake was performed as a preliminary stage of research on improving the dynamic characteristics of the labyrinth seal through the shape optimization of the swirl brake.
data.target_sentence: In this study, dynamic characteristics analysis of labyrinth seals equipped with simple shape vortex brakes was performed as a preliminary step in the study of improving dynamic properties of labyrinth seals through shape optimization of vortex brakes.

data.source_sentence: 스월 브레이크의 프리스월 억제 성능을 확인하기 위해 프리스월을 증가 또는 감소시키면서 래버린스 씰의 동특성 계수를 예측하였다.
data.mt_sentence: To confirm the freewall inhibition performance of the swirl brake, the dynamic property coefficient of the Labyrinth seal was predicted while increasing or decreasing the freewall.
data.target_sentence: In order to check the pre-swirl suppression performance of the swirl brake, the dynamic property coefficient of the labyrinth seal was predicted while increasing or decreasing the pre-swirl.

data.source_sentence: 래버린스 씰의 동특성 계수를 예측하기 위해서는 로터의 휘돌림 운동을 고려한 해석이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to predict the coefficient of dynamic characteristics of the Labyrinth seal, an analysis considering the rotational motion of the rotor is required.
data.target_sentence: In order to predict the dynamic coefficient of the Labyrinth Seal, it is necessary to analyze the rotational motion of the rotor.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1은 로터의 휘돌림 운동을 각각 고정 좌표계와 상대 좌표계에서 나타낸 그림이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 1 is a diagram showing the rotational motion of the rotor in a fixed coordinate system and a relative coordinate system, respectively.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 1 is a diagram illustrating rotational motion of a rotor in a fixed coordinate system and a relative coordinate system, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 씰 중심 O에 고정된 좌표계에서 로터를 관측하면 로터의 위치가 시간에 따라 이동하기 때문에 움직이는 격자와 비정상 상태 해석이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: When the rotor is observed in a coordinate system fixed at the center of the seal O, the position of the rotor moves with time, so a moving grid and an anomaly analysis are necessary.
data.target_sentence: When observing the rotor in a coordinate system fixed at the center of the seal O, the position of the rotor moves with time, so a moving grid and anomaly analysis are required.

data.source_sentence: 로터 중심 O' 에 휘돌림 속도 Ω로 회전하는 상대 좌표계에서 로터를 관측하면 로터의 벽면은 O' 을 중심으로 각속도 ω– Ω로 회전하면서 스테이터의 벽면은 O'를 중심으로 각속도 – Ω로 회전한다.
data.mt_sentence: When the rotor is observed in a relative coordinate system rotating at the rotor center O' with a whirling speed Ω, the wall of the rotor rotates with an angular velocity of ω– Ω around O' while the wall of the stator rotates with an angular velocity of – Ω around O'. .
data.target_sentence: Observing the rotor in a relative coordinate system rotating at the rotor center O' at a swirling speed Ω, the rotor wall rotates with an angular velocity ω– Ω around O' while the stator wall rotates at an angular velocity – Ω around O' .

data.source_sentence: 여기서 -는 시계 방향으로 회전하는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, - means rotating clockwise.
data.target_sentence: Here, - means to rotate clockwise.

data.source_sentence: 상대 좌표계에서 로터의 위치는 항상일정하고 격자의 이동과 변형이 없기 때문에 정상 상태에서 휘돌림 운동을 해석할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the position of the rotor in the relative coordinate system is always constant and there is no movement or deformation of the lattice, it is possible to analyze the whirling motion in the steady state.
data.target_sentence: Since the position of the rotor in the relative coordinate system is always constant and there is no movement or deformation of the grid, rotational motion can be analyzed in a steady state.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 2는 로터에 작용하는 유체력을 나타낸 그림이다.
data.mt_sentence: Coefficient Fig. 2 is a diagram showing the fluid force acting on the rotor.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 2 is a diagram illustrating a fluid force acting on a rotor.

data.source_sentence: 로터의 휘돌림 궤도를 원으로 가정하고 래버린스 씰에 서 발생하는 유체력을 선형화 하여 강성계수(directstiffness coefficient) K, 연성강성계수(cross-coupled stiffnesscoefficient) k, 감쇠계수(direct damping coefficient) C, 연성감쇠계수(cross-coupled damping coefficient) c로 표현하면 식 (1)과 같이 반대칭(skew-symmetric) 행렬을 가지는 행렬방정식으로 표현할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Assuming that the rotational trajectory of the rotor is a circle, and linearizing the fluid force generated from the labyrinth seal, directstiffness coefficient K, cross-coupled stiffness coefficient k, direct damping coefficient C, When expressed as a cross-coupled damping coefficient c, it can be expressed as a matrix equation having a skew-symmetric matrix as in Equation (1).
data.target_sentence: Assuming that the rotational trajectory of the rotor is a circle, and expressing the fluid force generated in the maze seal, the direct stiffness coefficient K, the cross-coupled stiffness coefficient k, and the direct damping coefficient C as the cross-coupled damping coefficient c, it can be expressed as a matrix equation with the asymmetric matrix as shown in Equation (1).

data.source_sentence: 작동 유체가 기체인 경우 추가 질량항이 유체력에 미치는 영향이 매우작으므로 본 연구에서는 무시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When the working fluid is a gas, the effect of the additional mass term on the fluid force is very small, so it is ignored in this study.
data.target_sentence: When the working fluid is a gas, the effect of the additional mass term on the fluid force is very small, so it is ignored in this study.

data.source_sentence: 식 (1)을 상대 좌표계에서 편심된 로터의 위치에 대해 반지름 방향과 접선 방향으로 분해하여 정리하면 식 (2)를 얻을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Equation (2) can be obtained by decomposing Equation (1) in the radial and tangential directions with respect to the position of the eccentric rotor in the relative coordinate system.
data.target_sentence: Equation (2) can be obtained by decomposing Equation (1) in the radial and tangential directions based on the position of the eccentric rotor in the relative coordinate system.

data.source_sentence: 연성강성계수와 감쇠계수는 래버린스 씰의 안정성을 판단하는데 매우 중요한 변수이다.
data.mt_sentence: The ductile stiffness coefficient and damping coefficient are very important variables in determining the stability of labyrinth seals.
data.target_sentence: The ductile stiffness modulus and damping modulus are very important variables that determine the stability of the labyrinth seal.

data.source_sentence: 로터에 작용하는 유체력은 압력을 적분하여 얻을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The fluid force acting on the rotor can be obtained by integrating the pressure.
data.target_sentence: The fluid force acting on the rotor can be obtained by integrating the pressure.

data.source_sentence: 편심된 로터에 작용하는 반지름 방향 유체력 Fr과 접선 방향 유체력 Ft는 식 (3)을 통해 계산할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The radial fluid force Fr and the tangential fluid force Ft acting on the eccentric rotor can be calculated through Equation (3).
data.target_sentence: The radial fluid force Fr and the tangential fluid force Ft acting on the eccentric rotor can be calculated through Equation 3.

data.source_sentence: 로터가 동기 휘돌림 운동을 한다고 가정하면 유효감쇠계수(Effective damping coefficient) Ceff는 연성강성계수 k와 감쇠계수 C, 회전 속도 ω로 정의되며 식 (4)를 이용하여 계산할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Assuming that the rotor performs a synchronous whirling motion, the effective damping coefficient Ceff is defined by the ductile stiffness coefficient k, the damping coefficient C, and the rotational speed ω, and can be calculated using Equation (4).
data.target_sentence: Assuming that the rotor is in synchronous slewing motion, the effective damping coefficient Ceff is defined as the ductile stiffness coefficient k, the damping coefficient C and the rotational speed ω, which can be calculated using Equation (4).

data.source_sentence: 해석 모델의 형상과 작동 조건에 대해 서술하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: I would like to describe the shape and operating conditions of the analysis model.
data.target_sentence: I would like to explain the shape of the analysis model and its operating conditions.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 3은 래버린스 이가 스테이터에 있는 TOS (Teeth-on-rotor) 형태의 단면 형상을 나타낸 그림이다.
data.mt_sentence: The shape and operating conditions of the Labyrinth Seal Fig. 3 are the figures showing the cross-sectional shape of the Teeth-on-rotor (TOS) shape in the Labyrinthian stator.
data.target_sentence: 3 is a view showing a cross-sectional shape of a TOS (Teeth-on-Rotor) having labyrinth teeth in the stator.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 3의 Rs, Cr, B, L, Tp는 각각 로터 반지름, 씰 간극, 래버린스이 높이, 래버린스 이 피치, 래버린스 이 끝 두께를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. Rs, Cr, B, L, and Tp in 3 represent the rotor radius, seal clearance, labyrinth tooth height, labyrinth tooth pitch, and labyrinth tooth tip thickness, respectively.
data.target_sentence: Rs, Cr, B, L, and Tp in Fig. 3 represent the rotor radius, seal gap, labyrinth tooth height, labyrinth tooth pitch, and labyrinth tooth tip thickness, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 래버린스 씰의 치수와 작동 조건은 Table 1에 정리되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The dimensions and operating conditions of the labyrinth seal are summarized in Table 1.
data.target_sentence: The dimensions and operating conditions of labyrinth seals are summarized in Table 1.

data.source_sentence: 스월(swirl)은 유체의 원주 방향 유속 성분이며 스월비(swirl ratio)는 스월과 로터 표면 속도의 비로 정의된다.
data.mt_sentence: Swirl is a component of the fluid's circumferential flow rate, and the swirl ratio is defined as the ratio of the swirl to the rotor surface speed.
data.target_sentence: Swirl is the component of the circumferential flow rate of the fluid, and the swirl ratio is defined as the ratio of swirl to rotor surface velocity.

data.source_sentence: 프리스월 비는 프리스월과 로터 표면 속도의 비로 정의되며 아래의 식 (5)로 나타낼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The free wall ratio is defined as the ratio of the free wall to the rotor surface speed and can be expressed by Equation (5) below.
data.target_sentence: The pre-vortex ratio is defined as the ratio of the pre-vortex to the rotor surface speed and can be expressed as Equation 5 below.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 4에 스월 브레이크의 3D 형상이 나타나 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 4 shows the 3D shape of the swirl break.
data.target_sentence: Figure 4 shows the 3D geometry of the swirl break.

data.source_sentence: 기존 연구에 의하면 스월 브레이크 베인(vane)의 길이, 두께, 간극, 각도, 개수 등이 스월 브레이크의 성능에 영향을 준다.
data.mt_sentence: According to previous studies, the length, thickness, clearance, angle, number, etc. of the swirl brake vanes affect the performance of the swirl brake.
data.target_sentence: Previous studies have shown that the length, thickness, clearance, angle, number, etc. of the swirl brake vanes affect the performance of the swirl brake.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 스월 브레이크 베인의 길이, 두께, 간극, 개수를 설계변수로 하여 여러 개의 스월 브레이크를 설계하고 CFD 해석을 통해 프리스월이 가장 많이 감소하는 형상을 선택하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, several swirl brakes were designed using the length, thickness, gap, and number of swirl break vanes as design variables, and the shape with the greatest reduction in free swirl was selected through CFD analysis.
data.target_sentence: In this study, several swirl brakes were designed using the length, thickness, spacing, and number of swirl brake vanes as design variables, and the shape with the greatest free swirl reduction was selected through CFD analysis.

data.source_sentence: 해석에 사용된 스월브레이크의 치수는 Table 2에 정리되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The dimensions of the swirl brake used in the analysis are summarized in Table 2.
data.target_sentence: The dimensions of the swirl brake used in the analysis are summarized in Table 2.

data.source_sentence: 래버린스 씰의 동특성 해석을 위해 Ansys CFX를 사용하여 편심된 3D 래버린스 씰의 CFD 모델을 생성하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A CFD model of the eccentric 3D labyrinth seal was generated using Ansys CFX for dynamic characteristic analysis of the labyrinth seal.
data.target_sentence: For dynamic characterization of maze seals, CFD models of eccentric 3D maze seals were generated using Ansys CFX.

data.source_sentence: 열전달과 난류 해석에 등온 열전달 모델과SST(shearstress transport) 난류 모델을 사용하였으며 경계층의 점성 유동을 해석하기 위해 벽면의 y+ 값은 1~5 범위로 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: An isothermal heat transfer model and a shear stress transport (SST) turbulence model were used for heat transfer and turbulence analysis, and the y+ value of the wall was set in the range of 1 to 5 to analyze the viscous flow of the boundary layer.
data.target_sentence: For the analysis of heat transfer and turbulence, an isothermal heat transfer model and a shear stress transport (SST) turbulence model were used. For the viscous flow analysis of the boundary layer, the y+ value of the wall was set in the range of 1 to 5.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 5는 격자 민감도 테스트 결과를 나타낸 그림이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 5 is a diagram showing the results of the lattice sensitivity test.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 5 is a diagram showing the results of a grating sensitivity test.

data.source_sentence: 프리스월을 고려한 해석을 수행하기 전 압력 경계 조건을 사용하여 입구 영역의 축방향 속도 성분을 구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Before performing the analysis considering the freeswall, the axial velocity component of the inlet area was obtained using the pressure boundary condition.
data.target_sentence: Before performing the analysis considering the pre-swirl, the axial velocity component of the inlet region was obtained using the pressure boundary condition.

data.source_sentence: 프리스월을 고려한 해석에서는 압력 경계 조건을 사용하여 구한 축방향 속도 성분에 원주방향 유속을 추가 한 속도 경계 조건을 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the analysis considering the freeswall, the velocity boundary condition obtained by adding the circumferential flow velocity to the axial velocity component obtained using the pressure boundary condition was used.
data.target_sentence: In the analysis considering the swirling vortex, the velocity boundary condition obtained by adding the circumferential flow velocity to the axial velocity component obtained using the pressure boundary condition was used.

data.source_sentence: 해석 영역의 출구에는 압력 경계 조건을, 벽면에는 Fig. 1의 표시된 각속도와 단열 조건을 부여하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Pressure boundary conditions were given to the outlet of the analysis area, and angular velocity and insulation conditions indicated in Fig. 1 were given to the wall.
data.target_sentence: The pressure boundary condition is applied to the outlet of the analysis area, and Fig. The same angular velocity and adiabatic conditions as 1 were given.

data.source_sentence: 마지막으로 잔차(residual)가 10이하 일 때를 수렴 기준으로 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Finally, when the residual is 10 or less, the convergence criterion was set.
data.target_sentence: Finally, the convergence criterion was set when the residual was less than 10.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 5 (b)는 유체가 스월 브레이크를 지나며 원주방향 유속이 감소하는 것을 보여주고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 5(b) shows that the fluid passes through the swirl brake and the circumferential flow velocity decreases.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 5(b) shows that the fluid passes through the vortex brake and the circumferential flow velocity decreases.

data.source_sentence: 기존 래버린스 씰은 입구 근처의 원주방향 유속이 높고 씰 출구 근처의 원주방향 유속이 낮은데 유체가 축방향으로 진행하면서 스테이터의 점성 저항에 의해 원주방향 유속이 점차 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The existing Labyrinth Seal has a high circumferential flow rate near the inlet and a low circumferential flow rate near the seal outlet, and the circumferential flow rate gradually decreased due to the viscosity resistance of the stator as the fluid progressed in the axial direction.
data.target_sentence: Existing labyrinth seal has a high circumferential flow rate near the inlet and a low circumferential flow rate near the seal outlet, and as the fluid proceeds in the axial direction, the circumferential flow gradually decreases due to the viscosity resistance of the stator.

data.source_sentence: 반면 스월 브레이크가 장착된 래버린스 씰은 입구 근처에서 낮은 원주방향 유속이 출구에 가까워질수록 높아지는데 점성 유동에 의해 원주방향 유속이 증가 하기 때문이다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, in labyrinth seals equipped with swirl brake, the low circumferential flow velocity near the inlet increases as it approaches the exit, because the circumferential flow velocity increases due to the viscous flow.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, in a labyrinth seal equipped with a swirl brake, the low circumferential flow rate near the inlet increases as it approaches the outlet because the circumferential flow rate increases due to the viscous flow.

data.source_sentence: 스월 브레이크가 장착된 래버린스 씰의 평균 원주방향 유속 크기가 기존래버린스 씰보다 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The average circumferential flow velocity size of the Labyrinth seal equipped with the swirl brake was reduced compared to the conventional Labyrinth seal.
data.target_sentence: The average circumferential flow rate of a Labyrinth Seal with swirl break has been reduced compared to a conventional Labyrinth Seal.

data.source_sentence: 여기서는 래버린스 씰의 안정성과 관련이 깊은 연성강성계수 와 감쇠계수, 유효감쇠계수만을 다루었다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, only the ductile stiffness coefficient, attenuation coefficient, and effective attenuation coefficient, which are deeply related to the stability of the Labyrinth seal, were dealt with.
data.target_sentence: Only the ductile stiffness modulus, damping factor, and effective damping factor, which are closely related to the stability of Labyrinth seals, are dealt with here.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 10은 연성강성계수 해석 결과를 비교한 그림이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 10 is a comparison of the analysis results of the ductile stiffness coefficient.
data.target_sentence: Figure 10 compares the analysis results of the ductile stiffness modulus.

data.source_sentence: 반면에 스월 브레이크가 장착된 래버린스 씰은 프리스월이 억제되어 연성강성계수는 대체로 일정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, in the Labyrinth seal equipped with the swirl brake, the free wall was suppressed, and the ductile rigidity coefficient was generally constant.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, in Labyrinth Seal equipped with swirl break, pre-swirl was suppressed and the ductile stiffness coefficient was generally constant.

data.source_sentence: 연성강성계수는 공동내 유속과 관련이 있는데 공동 내 원주방향 유속이 크고 로터의 회전 방향과 같을 때 로터에 더 큰 접선 방향 유체력이 작용해 연성강성계수가 크게 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: The ductile stiffness coefficient is related to the flow rate in the cavity, and when the circumferential flow rate in the cavity is large and the rotational direction of the rotor is the same, a larger tangential fluid force acts on the rotor, resulting in a large ductile stiffness coefficient.
data.target_sentence: The ductile stiffness coefficient is related to the flow velocity in the cavity, and when the circumferential flow velocity in the cavity is large and the rotation direction of the rotor is the same, a greater tangential fluid force acts on the rotor, resulting in a large ductile stiffness coefficient.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 11은 감쇠계수 해석 결과를 비교한 그림이다.

data.source_sentence: 감쇠계수는 기존 래버린스 씰과 스월 브레이크를 장착한 래버린스 씰 모두 프리스월 비에 관계없이 100 ~ 150 N-s/m 사이로 나타났다.

data.target_sentence: The damping coefficient was found to be between 100 and 150 N-s/m regardless of the free swirl ratio for both the existing labyrinth seal and the labyrinth seal equipped with a swirl brake.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 스월 브레이크가 장착된 래버린스 씰의 동특성 해석을 수행하고 스월 브레이크가 없는 기존래버린스 씰의 해석 결과와 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, dynamic characteristics analysis of labyrinth seals equipped with swirl brakes was performed and compared with the analysis results of conventional labyrinth seals without swirl brakes.
data.target_sentence: In this study, dynamic characteristic analysis of labyrinth seal equipped with swirl brake was performed and compared with the analysis result of labyrinth seal without swirl brake.

data.source_sentence: 스월 브레이크의 형상을 최적화한다면 넓은 프리스월 범위에서 래버린스 씰의 동특성을 개선할 수 있을 것으로 보이며, 해석 결과를 정리하면 다음과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: If the shape of the swirl brake is optimized, it seems that the dynamic characteristics of the labyrinth seal can be improved in a wide free swirl range, and the analysis results are summarized as follows.
data.target_sentence: If the shape of the swirl brake is optimized, it seems that the dynamic properties of the labyrinth seal can be improved in a wide pre-swirl range, and the analysis results are summarized as follows.

data.source_sentence: 기존 래버린스 씰에서 연성강성계수는 프리스월 비가 증가함에 따라 선형적으로 증가하였고 스월 브레이 크가 장착된 래버린스 씰에서도 프리스월 비가 증가함에 따라 선형적으로 증가하지만 기울기가 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the existing Labyrinth Seal, the ductile stiffness coefficient linearly increased with the increase of the freewall ratio, and in the Labyrinth Seal equipped with the swirl brake, the increase of the freewall ratio linearly increased but the slope decreased.

data.source_sentence: 감쇠계수는 두 래버린스 씰에서 모두 프리스월 비에 관계없이 대체로 일정한 경향을 보였다.

data.source_sentence: 세계 자동차 시장의 페러다임이 기존의 내연기관 자동차에서 점차 친환경 자동차로 넘어가고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The paradigm of the global automobile market is gradually shifting from conventional internal combustion engine cars to eco-friendly cars.
data.target_sentence: The paradigm of the global automobile market is gradually changing from conventional internal combustion engine cars to eco-friendly cars.

data.source_sentence: 기존의 자동차들은 내연기관의 작동에 휘발유 또는 디젤과 같은 화석 연료의 사용을 필요로 하고, 이에 따라 주행 중배기가스 및 큰 소음을 배출하며, 에너지 효율이 떨어진다는 단점이 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: Conventional vehicles require the use of fossil fuels such as gasoline or diesel for the operation of an internal combustion engine, thereby emitting exhaust gas and loud noise during driving, and reducing energy efficiency.
data.target_sentence: Existing vehicles have to use fossil fuels such as gasoline or diesel to operate their internal combustion engines, so exhaust gas and loud noise are generated while driving, and energy efficiency is reduced.

data.source_sentence: 주요 선진국들은 적극적으로 친환경 자동차 관련 정책들을 시행해 오고 있으며, 유럽 국가들은 2030년경 기존 내연기관 자동차 생산 및 신규 등록을 전면 중단한다고 발표했다.
data.mt_sentence: Major advanced countries have been actively implementing eco-friendly vehicle-related policies, and European countries have announced that they will completely suspend the production and registration of existing internal combustion engine vehicles around 2030.
data.target_sentence: Major advanced countries are actively implementing eco-friendly vehicle-related policies, and European countries have announced that they will completely suspend the production and registration of existing internal combustion engine vehicles around 2030.

data.source_sentence: 배출가스 규제가 매년 강화됨에 따라 미국 및 유럽에서는 이를 충족하지 못하는 차량은 벌금을 물리게 되었으며, 중국에서는 규제 미달 시 판매를 원천적으로 금지하고 있다.

data.source_sentence: 미국의 전기자동차 시장은 탄소발자국 저감 노력에 의해 주도될 것으로 전망되고 있고 바이든 행정부는 트럼프 정부와는 달리 친환경 정책을 취하고 있으며 이에 따라 친환경 자동차 시대로의 전환이 가속화 될 예정이다.
data.mt_sentence: The electric vehicle market in the United States is expected to be driven by efforts to reduce carbon footprint, and the Biden administration, unlike the Trump administration, is adopting an eco-friendly policy, which will accelerate the transition to the eco-friendly car era.

data.source_sentence: 전기차로의 전환에 있어 필수인 차량 경량화 소재의 수요 또한 증가하고 있으며 자동차 생산 시 일반 철 사용 비중은 하락하고 알루미늄, 고강도 철강 등 가벼운소재의 도입이 증가하고 있다.

data.mt_sentence: In electric vehicles, cooling is very important compared to internal combustion engines, and oil entering the reducer is also a very important factor in lubrication.

data.source_sentence: 3D 프린팅은 다품종 소량 생산과 개인 맞춤형 제작이 용이한 산업으로 경제의 규모와 저임금 노동비 우위를 가진 전통적인 방식과 다른 형태의.

data.target_sentence: 3D printing is an industry that facilitates low-volume production of various types and individual customization, and is different from traditional methods with advantages in economic scale and low wages and labor costs.

data.source_sentence: FDM 방식은 Fig. 1과 같이 가열된 노즐헤드를 통해 재료가 용융 압출되어 나오면서 경화/된 층을 쌓는 방식이며 절삭가공으로는 제작하기 어려운 복잡한 형상을 손쉽게 출력할 수 있는 장점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The FDM method is a method of stacking cured/formed layers as materials are melted and extruded through the heated nozzle head as illustrated in Fig. 1, and it has an advantage of easily outputting a complicated shape which is difficult to manufacture by cutting.
data.target_sentence: The FDM method is shown in as shown in Figure 1, the material is melt-extruded through a heated nozzle head and hardened/formed layers are laminated, which has the advantage of being able to easily output complex shapes that are difficult to manufacture by cutting.

data.source_sentence: particle 등을 필라멘트와 융합하여 복합소재를 제작하는 기존의 연구와는 다르게 연속적인 구리 와이어를 삽입하여 제작한 필라멘트의 적층 공정은 필라멘트 전체를 용융하여 적층하는 방식과는 차이가 있다.

data.source_sentence: 필라멘트 제작 장치는 크게 용융 구간과 경화 구간, 인출 구간으로 나눌 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 솔리드 채우기로 내부 적층 비율을 100%로 설정하여 적층물 내부의 빈 공간을 최대한 줄였다.
data.mt_sentence: The void space inside the stack was minimized as much as possible by setting the internal stacking ratio to 100% with solid fill.
data.target_sentence: By setting the internal lamination rate to 100% as solid fill, the empty space inside the stack is minimized as much as possible.

data.source_sentence: 기본적인 인장 시험 방법으로는 도그본 시편 혹은 원통형 시편을 KS 규격이나 ISO 규격 혹은 규격에 맞게 절단하거나 제작하여 단면적을 측정한 후인장 시험기의 상 하부에 장착하여 시험을 진행한다.
data.mt_sentence: As a basic tensile test method, a dogbone or cylindrical specimen is cut or manufactured according to the KS standard or ISO standard or standard, the cross-sectional area is measured, and then the test is performed by mounting it on the upper and lower parts of the tensile tester.
data.target_sentence: As a basic method of tensile testing, a dogbone or cylindrical specimen is cut or manufactured according to the KS standard or ISO standard or standard, and the cross-sectional area is measured and then mounted on the upper and lower parts for testing. of tensile testing machine.

data.source_sentence: 인장 시험을 진행할 때 표준 규격 선정이 매우 중요하다.

data.target_sentence: When performing a tensile test, it is very important to select a standard size.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 5-(a)는 본 실험에서 사용한 표준 시편의 도면이다 복합소재 필라멘트에 사용한 재료는 폴리머와 금속 와이어이므로 인장 시험에는 폴리머를 대상Ⅳ의 인장 시편 규격을 으로 하는 ASTM-D638-사용하였다.

data.target_sentence: Figure 5-(a) is a diagram of the standard specimen used in this experiment. Since the materials used for the composite filament are polymer and metal wire, ASTM-D638-, which uses the polymer as the tensile specimen standard of Subject IV, was used for the tensile test.

data.source_sentence: 3D 프린팅에 있어 기계적 특성은 방향에 따라 달라지므로 최대 인장강도를 얻기 위해 적층 경로는 Fig.5-(b)에서 확인할 수 있듯이 인장 방향으로 고정하여 시편을 제작하였다.

data.target_sentence: The tensile specimen actually fabricated using this lamination path is shown in as in Fig. 5-(c).

data.source_sentence: 나일론 시편의 실험 결과 나일론 시편의 최대 인장강도는 측정되었고 변형률 평균은 경우 탄성이 뛰어난 특성상 변형률이 크게 측정되었다.

data.source_sentence: 입자 대전량을 구하기 위한 대전 방법에는 전계대전(Field Charging)과 확산대전(Diffusion Charging)으로 나눌 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The charging method for obtaining the particle charge amount can be divided into field charging and diffusion charging.
data.target_sentence: The charging method for calculating the amount of particle charge can be divided into field charging and diffusion charging.

data.source_sentence: 전계대전은 전기장 안에서 코로나 방전에 의해 발생된 음이온에 의한 대전방법이며 전기장 내의 빠른 이동속도로 인하여 충돌하며 대전되게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: An electric field charge is a charge method caused by an anion generated by corona discharge in an electric field and is charged by colliding with a fast moving speed in the electric field.
data.target_sentence: Electric field charge is a charge generated by negative ions generated by corona discharge in an electric field and is charged by colliding with a fast moving speed in the electric field.

data.source_sentence: 확산대전은 전기장이 없는 경우 음이온과 혼합되는 과정에서 Brown Force에 의해 대전되는 방법이다.
data.mt_sentence: Diffusion charging is a method that is charged by the Brown Force in the process of mixing with anions in the absence of an electric field.
data.target_sentence: Diffusion charging is a method of charging by Brown force in the process of mixing with negative ions in the absence of an electric field.

data.source_sentence: 결과를 바탕으로 입자의 크기가 커질수록 입자 대전량이 커지면서 Filter의 입구부에 가깝게 집진되는 것을 확인할 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 육안으로 식별이 곤란한 배관의 표면 정보를 얻기 위해 레이저 변위 센서를 이용하여 제작한 측정장비로 배관의 표면을 스캔하였으며 측정된 부식 높이를 파라미터로 하여 배관의 상태를 분류하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the surface of the pipe was scanned with a measuring device manufactured using a laser displacement sensor to obtain information on the surface of the pipe, which is difficult to identify with the naked eye, and the condition of the pipe was classified using the measured corrosion height as a parameter.

The state of the pipe was classified using the measured corrosion height as a parameter.

data.mt_sentence: A CNN classification algorithm is presented for the application of an artificial intelligence methodology that classifies the state using the surface data of the pipe.
data.target_sentence: We present a CNN classification algorithm for the application of an artificial intelligence methodology to classify states using surface data of pipes.

data.source_sentence: 배관의 측정 조건으로 축 방향은 150mm, 폭은 센서의 측정범위인 21mm로 데이터를 획득하였다.

data.source_sentence: 데이터 용량과 스캔 속도를 고려하여 센서 이송속도는 30mm/s, 프레임 수는 284 frame/s로 스캔하였다.

data.mt_sentence: The characteristic of CNN is to classify low-dimensional information by extending it to a high dimension, and when learning a specific pattern from a certain location in an image, it is an algorithm that recognizes a pattern learned from another location.
data.target_sentence: The characteristic of CNN is to classify low-dimensional information by extending it to a high dimension, and when learning a specific pattern from a specific location in an image, it is an algorithm that recognizes patterns learned from other locations.

data.source_sentence: Early Stopping 기법을 사용하여 학습 도중 Loss 값이 감소하지 않으면 조기 종료하여 학습시간을 단축하였다.학습 과정의 Loss와 Accuracy를 Fig. 8에 나타내었으며, 초기에는 Loss 값은 크고, Accuracy도 낮게 나타나지만, Epoch가 증가할수록 점점 수렴하는 것을 나타내고 있다

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 회전익 항공기인 멀티콥터 형태 의 PAV를 대상으로, 로터 축간거리의 변화에 따른 추력 성능변화와 위험속도 변화를 연구하였다.

data.target_sentence: Table 1 shows the four rotor shaft distances considered in this study.

data.source_sentence: 로터 블레이드 개수는 2개로 정해져 있고, 비압축성 유체로 밀도의 변화가 없다고 가정하면 두 항은 적분기호 밖으로 나오게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Assuming that the number of rotor blades is set to two and there is no change in density as an incompressible fluid, the two terms come out of the integrator.

data.source_sentence: 양력계수는 풍동 실험이나 전산 해석을 통해 얻을 수 있으나 본 연구에서는 에어 포일 이론을 이용하여 값을 구하였으며 식 (2)에 나타내었다.

data.target_sentence: The lift coefficient can be obtained through a wind tunnel experiment or computational analysis, but in this study, the value was obtained using the airfoil theory and is as Equation (2).

data.source_sentence: 식 (2)의 받음각은 로터 블레이드의 속도, 유도 속도에 따라 결정되며 로터 블레이드 피치 각에 따라 유도 각도는 결정된다.
data.mt_sentence: The angle of attack in Equation (2) is determined by the speed and induction speed of the rotor blades, and the induction angle is determined according to the rotor blade pitch angle.
data.target_sentence: In Equation (2), the angle of attack is determined by the speed and induction speed of the rotor blade, and the induction angle is determined by the pitch angle of the rotor blade.

data.source_sentence: 로터 블레이드 단면에서 작용하는 유동 성분은 Fig. 2에서 보여준다.

data.target_sentence: The flow components acting on the cross section of the rotor blades are shown in Figure 2.

data.source_sentence: 유도 속도와 로터의 회전 각속도를 통해 유도 각을 구하였고, 로터 블레이드의 유도 각과 피치 각 차이 때문에 비틀림을 갖는 로터 블레이드의 길이 방향에 따라 받음각을 계산하였으며 식 (3)~(6)과 같이 관계식을 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: An induction angle was obtained through the induction speed and the rotational angular velocity of the rotor, and the receiving angle was calculated according to the longitudinal direction of the rotor blade due to the difference between the induction angle and the pitch angle of the rotor blade, and the relation expression was shown as Equation (3)~(6).
data.target_sentence: The induction angle was obtained through the induction speed and the rotational angular velocity of the rotor, and the acceptance angle along the longitudinal direction of the rotor was calculated due to the difference between the induction angle and the pitch angle of the rotor blade, and the relation expression was shown as Equation (3)~(6).

data.source_sentence: 로터 블레이드 추력 식을 정리해서 나 타내면 아래의 식 (7)과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: If the rotor blade thrust equation is summarized and expressed, it is the same as Equation (7) below.
data.target_sentence: The rotor blade thrust equation is summarized and expressed as Equation 7 below.

data.mt_sentence: When flying in place, the thrust required to lift the weight of 2,000 kg of the PAV is 1,962N, and by substituting the shape dimensions of the rotor blades into Equation (7), the rotational speed is calculated inversely to calculate 962rpm.

data.source_sentence: 전산 유체해석 계산을 위한 CFD 격자 구성을 Fig. 4에 나타내었으며, 로터 블레이드의 회전 운동을 하는 영역과 외부 유체 영역에서 Wall에 해당하는 부분을 제하고 격자를 생성하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The CFD grid configuration for computational fluid analysis calculations is shown in Fig. As shown in Fig. 4, a grid was created by subtracting the part corresponding to the wall from the area where the rotor blade rotates and the external fluid area.
data.target_sentence: The CFD grid configuration for computational fluid analysis calculation is shown in Fig. 4, and the grid was created by subtracting the part corresponding to the wall from the rotor blade rotation area and the external fluid area.

data.source_sentence: 로터 축간거리를 변화시켜가며 추력을 구하기에 앞서 하나의 로터를 이용하여 유체해석을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Fluid analysis was performed using one rotor before obtaining thrust while changing the distance between the axes of the rotor.
data.target_sentence: Fluid analysis was performed using one rotor before obtaining thrust while changing the interaxial distance of the rotor.

data.source_sentence: 이를 네 배 하면 1,522.29N으로, 깃 요소 이론에서 계산된 1,962N과 22.4%의 오차가 발생하였다.
data.mt_sentence: If this is quadrupled, it is 1,522.29N, which is 22.4% of error from the 1,962N calculated in the blade element theory.
data.target_sentence: If you increase this by 4, it becomes 1,522.29N, which is 22.4% of the error of 1,962N calculated in the blade element theory.

data.source_sentence: 이는 축간거리를 배제하여 나온 결과로 보이며, 이와 같은 큰 오차가 발생한 이유는 로터 블레이드 끝단에서 발생한 와류의 영향으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: This appears to be the result of excluding the distance between the shafts, and the reason for such a large error is judged to be the effect of the vortex generated at the end of the rotor blade.
data.target_sentence: This seems to be the result of excluding the distance between the shafts, and it is judged that such a large error is due to the effect of the eddy current at the tip of the rotor blade.

data.source_sentence: 본 전산 유체해석의 목적은 로터 축간거리 변화에 따른 추력 값의 변화이기 때문에, 로터 간의 블레이드 끝단에서 발생하는 와류의 영향을 받지 않는 단 일로터의 추력 계산 값의 4배에 해당하는 1,522.29N과 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the purpose of this computational fluid analysis is to change the thrust value according to the change of the rotor axial distance, it is compared with 1,522N, which is four times the thrust calculation value of a single rotor that is not affected by eddy currents at the blade ends.
data.target_sentence: The purpose of this computational fluid analysis is the change in the thrust value according to the change in the rotor axis distance. For this reason, it was compared with 1,522.29 N, which is four times the calculated thrust of a single rotor that is not affected by the vortex generated at the tip of the blade between the rotors.

data.source_sentence: 로터에 의해 발생하는 유체의 속도를 Fig. 5에 나타내었으며, 축간거리 변화에 따른 추력 변화를 Table 4와 Fig. 6에 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure shows the speed of the fluid generated by the rotor. It is shown in 5, and the thrust change according to the change in the interaxial distance is shown in Table 4 and Figure 6.
data.target_sentence: Figure 5 shows the speed of the fluid generated in the rotor, and the change in thrust according to the change in the shaft distance is shown in Table 4 and Figure 6.

data.source_sentence: 따라서 Case A에서는 와류가 생성되지 않을 정도로 로터가 밀접해 단일로 터보다 성능이 뛰어난 것으로 보이고, Case B부터 Case D까지는 축간거리가 멀어지면서 와류의 영향에서 벗어나기 때문에 단일로터의 추력 값으로 수렴한다고 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: Therefore, in Case A, the rotor is so close that a vortex is not generated that it seems to perform better than a single rotor, and it is judged that the thrust value of the single rotor converges because the axial distance from Case B to Case D is away from the vortex.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, in Case A, the performance is better than that of a single rotor because no vortex occurs because the rotor is too close, and it is judged that the thrust value of the single rotor converges because the axial distance from Case B to Case D is away from the vortex.

data.source_sentence: 유한요소법은 전체 구조물을 유한개의 요소로 나눠 각 요소의 변위를 미지수로 하는 연립방정식을 구하고 이를 조합하여 전체 구조물의 결과 값을 얻어내는 것을 뜻한다.
data.mt_sentence: The finite element method divides the entire structure into a finite number of elements, obtains a system of equations in which the displacement of each element is unknown, and combines them to obtain the result value of the entire structure.
data.target_sentence: The finite element method divides the entire structure into a finite number of elements, finds a system of equations for which the displacement of each element is unknown, and combines them to obtain the result of the entire structure.

data.source_sentence: 유한요소법의 두 절점에서 요소의 경계조건을 이용하여 강성행렬(K) 와 질량 행렬 (M)을 구할 수 있고 이를 통해 시스템의 고유진동수를 구할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the two nodes of the finite element method, the stiffness matrix (K) and the mass matrix (M) can be obtained using the boundary conditions of the elements, and through this, the natural frequency of the system can be obtained.
data.target_sentence: The stiffness matrix (K) and the mass matrix (M) can be obtained using the boundary conditions of the elements at the two nodes of the finite element method, and through this, the natural frequency of the system can be obtained.

data.source_sentence: 강성행렬과 질량행렬을 이용해서 운동방정식을 세우면, Mθ+Kθ¨=0이 되며, θ=θ¯ejwt 라 가정하고 식 (8)에 대입하면, ejwt(K−ωM)θ¯=0 이 된다.
data.mt_sentence: If the equation of motion is established using a rigid matrix and a mass matrix, M++K¨=0=0, assuming θ=θejwt, and substituting it into Equation (8), ejwt(K-MM)¯00.
data.target_sentence: If the equation of motion is established using the rigid body matrix and the mass matrix, M++K¨=0=0, θ=θejwt is assumed, and when substituted into Equation (8), ejwt(K−ωM)θ¯=0.

data.source_sentence: 변화하는 로터 축간거리에 대한 캠벨 다이어그램 (Campbell diagram)을 구하기 위해 80rad/s부터 170rad/s까지 30rad/s의 간격의 조건으로 위험속도를 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: To obtain a Campbell diagram for the changing rotor shaft distance, the dangerous speed was measured under the condition of an interval of 30 rad/s from 80 rad/s to 170 rad/s.
data.target_sentence: To obtain a Campbell diagram for the varying rotor shaft distance, the critical speed was measured at 30 rad/s intervals from 80 rad/s to 170 rad/s.

data.source_sentence: 위험속도는 고유진동수와 회전주파수가 일치하는 지점의 속도이다.
data.mt_sentence: The dangerous speed is the speed at the point where the natural frequency coincides with the rotation frequency.
data.target_sentence: The critical velocity is the velocity at which the natural frequency coincides with the rotational frequency.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 회전 주파수 대역을 80rad/s에서 170rad/s까지 변화를 주어 해석하였고, Case A부터 C까지는 2차 고유진동수에서 위험속도를 얻었으며 Case D는 3차 고유진동수에서 위험속도를 얻었다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the rotation frequency band was analyzed by changing it from 80 rad/s to 170 rad/s, and in Cases A to C, dangerous speeds were obtained at the 2nd natural frequency, and in Case D, the dangerous speed was obtained at the 3rd natural frequency.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the rotation frequency band was changed from 80 rad/s to 170 rad/s and analyzed. In Cases A to C, the dangerous speed was obtained from the second natural frequency, and in Case D, the dangerous speed was obtained from the third natural frequency.

data.source_sentence: 낮은 차원의 고유진동수에서 위험속도를 얻는 것이 더 유리하고, 축간거리가 짧아질수록 고유진동수가 높아지기 때문에 공진 회피 측면에서는 축간거리가 짧을수록 좋다고 볼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It is more advantageous to obtain a risk speed at a low-dimensional natural frequency, and the shorter the interaxial distance, the higher the natural frequency, so in terms of resonance avoidance, the shorter the interaxial distance, the better.
data.target_sentence: It is advantageous to obtain a dangerous speed at a low-dimensional natural frequency, and the shorter the shaft distance, the higher the natural frequency, so in terms of resonance avoidance, the shorter the interaxial distance, the better.

data.source_sentence: 하지만 평면접촉식 커플러의 복잡한 기하학적 형상구조는 유압 변속이 이뤄지는 동안 더 높은 에너지 소비로 이어지게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: However, the complex geometry of the planar contact coupler leads to higher energy consumption during the hydraulic shift.
data.target_sentence: However, the complex geometry of planar contact couplers leads to higher energy consumption during hydraulic shifting.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 사용된 전산해석 도구 및 모델링, 유동 장 해석과 압력 특성은 상용 기계요소 설계 및 검증 소프트웨어인 Solidworks를 유압 커플러 내부 유동에 맞게 적용하여 최적설계를 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For the computational analysis tools and modeling, flow field analysis, and pressure characteristics used in this study, an optimal design was performed by applying Solidworks, a commercial mechanical element design and verification software, to the flow inside the hydraulic coupler.
data.target_sentence: For the computational analysis tools and modeling, flow field analysis, and pressure characteristics used in this study, Solidworks, a commercial mechanical element design and verification software, was applied to the flow inside the hydraulic coupler to perform optimal design.

data.source_sentence: 기존의 포펫(poppet) 타입과 구형(spherical) 타입의 커플러와 평면 접촉(flat-face) 타입의 커플러 이미지를 Fig. 1에 나타냈다.
data.mt_sentence: The conventional popet type and spherical type couplers and flat-face type coupler images are shown in Fig. 1.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 1 shows images of conventional poppet-type and spherical couplers and planar-type couplers.

data.source_sentence: 기존의 포펫과 구형 타입의 커플러 에서는 플러그와 소켓 사이에 잔여 공간이 발생함에 따라 오일의 노출에 따른 누유 현상이 잦는 것이 현재 실정이다.
data.mt_sentence: In the conventional popet and spherical type coupler, as the remaining space is generated between the plug and the socket, leakage due to exposure of the oil is frequently occurring.
data.target_sentence: Existing poppets and spherical couplers have a residual space between the plug and the socket, and leakage due to oil exposure frequently occurred.

data.source_sentence: 이를 바탕으로 구조설계를 진행하였으며, 평면 접촉식 퀵 커플러의 내부 형상 구조 및 유동 특성을 분석하여 설계변경을 통한 성능 개선을 수행하기 위해 수치해석을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Structural design was carried out based on this, and numerical analysis was performed to improve performance through design change by analyzing the internal shape structure and flow characteristics of the planar contact type quick coupler.
data.target_sentence: Structural design was carried out based on this, and numerical analysis was performed to improve performance through design change by analyzing the internal shape structure and flow characteristics of the planar contact type quick coupler.

data.source_sentence: 접촉조건에 따른 벽과 유체의 마찰에 의한 압력강하 발생과 내부형상 구조에 따른 압력강하의 발생은 원활한 유압 라인의 연결을 방해하며 내부 유동 흐름 에 큰 저항을 주게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The pressure drop due to the friction between the wall and the fluid according to the contact condition and the pressure drop due to the internal shape structure interfere with the smooth connection of the hydraulic line and give a great resistance to the internal flow.
data.target_sentence: The pressure drop due to the friction between the wall and the fluid according to the contact condition, the pressure drop due to the internal shape structure, prevents the smooth connection of the hydraulic line, and the resistance to the internal flow is large.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 K1,K2,K3는 커플러의 입 출구 및 내부 형상변화에 의한 손실계수를 나타내며, FD는 커플 러 내부의 유체마찰계수로서 유동상태가 층류와 난류일 때의 레이놀즈수에 의해 결정된다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, K1, K2, and K3 represent the loss coefficients due to the change of the coupler's inlet/outlet and internal shape, and FD is the fluid friction coefficient inside the coupler, which is determined by the Reynolds number when the flow conditions are laminar and turbulent.
data.target_sentence: Here, K1, K2, K3 represent the loss coefficient due to the inlet/outlet and internal shape change of the coupler. FD is the fluid friction coefficient inside the coupler and is determined by the Reynolds number when the flow state is laminar or turbulent.

data.source_sentence: Table 1에서는 본 연구에 적용된 평면 접촉식 유 압 퀵 커플러의 내부유동 흐름에 영향을 미치는 형상 중 Ring 부분을 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 1 shows the ring part among the shapes that affect the internal flow of the plane contact hydraulic quick coupler applied in this study.
data.target_sentence: Table 1 shows the ring part among the shapes that affect the internal flow of the plane contact hydraulic quick coupler applied in this study.

data.source_sentence: 재설계한 Ring의 형상은 유동 흐름이 원활히 이루어질 수 있도록 비교적 완만한 형상을 나타내면서 면적을 넓혀 유속을 낮춤과 동시에 난류가 발생하지 않도록 적절한 형상으로 재설계하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The shape of the redesigned ring was redesigned to show a relatively gentle shape so that the flow could be made smoothly, and to reduce the flow rate by widening the area and to have an appropriate shape to prevent turbulence at the same time.
data.target_sentence: The redesigned ring has a relatively gentle shape to ensure smooth flow, and has been redesigned to have an appropriate shape to reduce the flow rate and prevent turbulence at the same time by increasing the area.

data.source_sentence: 3D모델링으로 구성된 내부 단면도의 각 섹션별 파트들을 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: The parts for each section of the internal cross-sectional view composed of 3D modeling are shown.
data.target_sentence: The parts for each section of the interior section made of 3D modeling are shown.

data.source_sentence: 스테인레스 321L 소재의 물성값 Table 2에 나타내었다. 이는 구조해석을 진행할시 평균적으로 널리 사용되는 강화 스테인레스 강 AISI 321 소재를 적용하였고 각 상태량들이 외부조건의 영향 없이 일정한 상태로 가정하여 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The physical properties of the 321L stainless steel material are shown in Table 2. When structural analysis was conducted, reinforced stainless steel AISI 321 material, which is widely used on average, was applied, and each state amount was assumed to be in a constant state without an influence of external conditions.
data.target_sentence: The physical properties of 321L stainless steel materials are shown in Table 2. Structural analysis applied the widely used reinforced stainless steel AISI 321 material on average, and each state quantity was assumed to be in a constant state without the influence of external conditions.

data.source_sentence: Solid works 구조해석 시 사용된 Boundary condition으로 30MPa의 내압을 ring 부에 적용하여 기존의 Quick coupler에 대해 사용되는 정격사용압력을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The rated operating pressure used for the existing quick coupler was confirmed by applying a withstand pressure of 30 MPa to the ring part as a boundary condition used in the structural analysis of solid works.
data.target_sentence: The rated operating pressure used in the existing quick coupler was confirmed by applying an internal pressure of 30 MPa to the ring part as a boundary condition used for structural analysis of solid structures.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 4에서는 초기모델과 재설계를 통한 개선된 모델에 대해 최대 응력을 비교한 값이다.
data.mt_sentence: In Fig. 4, the maximum stress is compared with the initial model and the improved model through redesign.
data.target_sentence: In Fig. 4, the maximum stress was compared with the initial model and the improved model through redesign.

data.source_sentence: 이는 유로의 면적이 증가함에 따라 응력이 고루 분포됨을 유추할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This can be inferred that the stress is evenly distributed as the area of the flow path increases.
data.target_sentence: It can be inferred that the stress is evenly distributed as the area of the flow path increases.

data.source_sentence: 구성된 Mesh를 Solid works를 이용하여 유동해석을 하였으며, 해석조건으로는 적용 유체, Scale, Model, Boundary Condition 등을 부여하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Flow analysis was performed on the composed mesh using solid works, and the applied fluid, scale, model, and boundary conditions were given as analysis conditions.
data.target_sentence: Flow analysis was performed on the composed mesh using solid work, and the analysis conditions were presented as applied fluid, scale, model, and boundary conditions.

data.source_sentence: Boundary Condition으로는 층류유동, 온도는 20.05℃로 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Laminar flow was set as the boundary condition, and the temperature was set to 20.05℃.
data.target_sentence: The boundary condition was set to laminar flow and the temperature was set to 20.05°C.

data.source_sentence: 이후 개선된 모델의 속도와 압력 온도분포, 내부 유동 흐름에 대한 난류의 결과를 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Afterwards, the results of turbulence for velocity, pressure and temperature distribution of the improved model and internal flow were analyzed.
data.target_sentence: Afterwards, the results of turbulence and internal flow for the flow velocity, pressure, and temperature distribution of the improved model were analyzed.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 5에서는 내부 유동 흐름에 대한 유선을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 5 shows the streamlines for the internal flow stream.
data.target_sentence: Figure 5 shows the streamlines for the internal flow flow.

data.source_sentence: 이는 압력강하가 증가할수록 유속이 급격하게 상승함을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that the flow rate increases rapidly as the pressure drop increases.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that the flow rate increases rapidly as the pressure drop increases.

data.source_sentence: 평면 접촉식 유압 Quick coupler에 대하여 Ring 부의 형상변경 전과 변경 후의 구조해석을 통한 같은 내압이 부여될 때 파괴 압력에 따른 응력의 분포와 최대 응력 값을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The distribution of stress and the maximum stress value according to the breaking pressure were confirmed when the same internal pressure was applied through structural analysis before and after the shape change of the ring part for the planar contact hydraulic quick coupler.
data.target_sentence: The maximum stress value according to the stress distribution and breaking pressure was confirmed when the same internal pressure was applied through structural analysis before and after the shape change of the ring part for planar contact hydraulic quick coupler.

data.source_sentence: 1MPa에서 5MPa로 양 끝의 압력차를 증가시켰을 때 유량, 속도, 온도분포가 모두 점점 증가함을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was confirmed that when the pressure difference at both ends was increased from 1 MPa to 5 MPa, the flow rate, speed, and temperature distribution all gradually increased.
data.target_sentence: It was confirmed that when the pressure difference at both ends was increased from 1 MPa to 5 MPa, the flow velocity, velocity, and temperature distribution all gradually increased.

data.source_sentence: 퀵 커플 Ring부를 평면접촉식으로 개선하였을 때 속도분포에서의 변화가 가장 뚜렷하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When the quick couple ring part was improved to a planar contact type, the change in speed distribution was the most obvious.
data.target_sentence: When the quick coupling part was improved to a planar contact type, the change in velocity distribution was most evident.

data.source_sentence: 나노 필러형태가 있는 음가형 실리콘 마스터는 이형이 쉽도록 불소화 자기조립 단층 용액(trichloro(1H,1H,2H,2H-perfluorooctyl)silane)으로 표면을 처리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The surface of the negative silicon master in the form of a nanofiller was treated with a fluorinated self-assembled monolayer solution (trichloro(1H,1H,2H,2H-perfluorooctyl)silane to facilitate release.
data.target_sentence: The surface of the negative silicon master in the form of nanopillars was treated with a fluorinated self-assembled monolayer solution (trichloro(1H,1H,2H,2H-perfluorooctyl)silane) to facilitate release.

data.source_sentence: 정확한 나노구조 형상을 관찰하기 위하여 PUA 필름을 금속 스퍼터링(G20, GSEM, Korea)으로 5nm 두께의 백금(Pt)을 코팅한 후 주사전자현미경(SU820 0, Hitachi, Japan)을 사용하여 관찰하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to observe the precise nanostructure shape, the PUA film was coated with platinum (Pt) with a thickness of 5 nm by metal sputtering (G20, GSEM, Korea) and then observed using a scanning electron microscope (SU820 0, Hitachi, Japan).
data.target_sentence: In order to observe the exact shape of the nanostructure, the PUA film was coated with platinum (Pt) with a thickness of 5 nm through metal sputtering (G20, GSEM, Korea) and observed using a scanning electron microscope (SU820 0, Hitachi, Japan).

data.source_sentence: PET 필름으로 덮인 PUA 용액은 UV 노출에 의해 빠르게 경화하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The PUA solution covered with PET film was quickly cured by UV exposure.
data.target_sentence: The PUA solution covered with PET film cured rapidly by UV exposure.

data.source_sentence: PUA 기반 나노기둥은 넓은 면적에 균일하게 형성되었고, 규칙적인 배열을 가진다.
data.mt_sentence: PUA-based nanopillars are uniformly formed over a large area and have a regular arrangement.
data.target_sentence: PUA-based nanopillars are uniformly formed over a large area and have a regular arrangement.

data.source_sentence: 최종 제작된 표면은 나노기둥이 있는 투명하고 유연한 필름으로, PET 필름의 두께 조절이 가능하기 때문에 표면 거칠기와 곡률이 있는 다양한 표면에 나노구조 필름을 적용할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The final manufactured surface is a transparent and flexible film with nanopillars, and since the thickness of the PET film can be controlled, the nanostructured film can be applied to various surfaces with surface roughness and curvature.
data.target_sentence: The final prepared surface is a transparent and flexible film with nanopillars, and the thickness of the PET film can be controlled, so that the nanostructured film can be applied to various surfaces with surface roughness and curvature.

data.source_sentence: 각각의 나노기둥은 직경 500nm, 높이 500nm, 간격 500 nm를 가진다.
data.mt_sentence: Each nanopillar has a diameter of 500 nm, a height of 500 nm, and a spacing of 500 nm.
data.target_sentence: Each nanopillar has a diameter of 500 nm, a height of 500 nm, and a spacing of 500 nm.

data.source_sentence: 그림 3는 Bare PUA와 PUA nanopillars의 물 접촉각 을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 3 shows the water contact angle of bare PUA and PUA nanopillars.
data.target_sentence: Figure 3 shows the water contact angles of bare PUA and PUA nanopillars.

data.source_sentence: UV 성형 기술을 기반으로 PUA는 간단하고 재현 가능한 방식으로 직경 500nm의 나노 기둥 어레이를 제작했다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on UV molding technology, PUA fabricated an array of nanopillars with a diameter of 500 nm in a simple and reproducible manner.
data.target_sentence: Based on UV molding technology, PUA fabricated an array of nanopillars with a diameter of 500 nm in a simple and reproducible manner.

data.source_sentence: 생체적합성을 가진 PUA을 나노토폴러지에 적용함으로 그람음성균 대한 우수한 항균력을 보여주었고, 기둥 모양의 나노 구조는 기계적 내구성이 우수하다.
data.mt_sentence: By applying PUA with biocompatibility to the nanotopology, it showed excellent antibacterial activity against Gram-negative bacteria, and the columnar nanostructure has excellent mechanical durability.
data.target_sentence: By applying the biocompatible PUA to the nanotopology, it showed excellent antibacterial activity against Gram-negative bacteria, and the columnar nanostructure has excellent mechanical durability.

data.source_sentence: 개발된 유연하고 투명한 항균 활성이 우수한 필름은 다목적 표면에 적용 가능하며 일상, 건강, 산업분야에서 활용될 수 있을 것으로 생각한다.
data.mt_sentence: The developed flexible and transparent film with excellent antibacterial activity can be applied to multi-purpose surfaces and is expected to be utilized in daily life, health and industrial fields.
data.target_sentence: The developed flexible and antibacterial transparent film can be applied to multi-purpose surfaces, so it is expected to be used in daily life, health and industrial fields.

data.source_sentence: 이 논문은 2021년도 한국연구재단 "이공분 야기초연구사업"의 지원을 받아 연구되었다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper was studied with the support of the Korea Research Foundation's "Eungongbun Yagi Elementary Research Project" in 2021.
data.target_sentence: This thesis was researched with the support of the 2021 "Basic Science and Engineering Research Project" of the National Research Foundation of Korea.

data.source_sentence: 온실가스 감축 이행에 대한 국제적인 관심이 고조되고 있는 상황에서 지구온도의 상승을 1.5℃ 이내로 억제하기 위하여 2050년까지 탄소 순 배출량이 제로가 되는 탄소 중립 사회로의 전환이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In the context of growing international interest in the implementation of greenhouse gas reduction, it is necessary to transition to a carbon-neutral society in which net carbon emissions will be zero by 2050 in order to keep the increase in global temperature within 1.5℃.
data.target_sentence: In the context of growing international interest in the implementation of greenhouse gas reduction, it is necessary to transition to a carbon-neutral society where net carbon emissions will be zero by 2050 in order to keep the global temperature rise within 1.5℃.

data.source_sentence: 우리나라는 최근까지 대부분의 목재 펠릿을 수입에 의존하고 있는 상황으로 산림청의 목재펠릿 이용현황 통계에 따르, 2014년도부터 2018년도까지 우리나라 목재펠릿 자급률은 각각 5.0%, 5.3%, 3.0%, 3.8%, 5.9%에 불과한 실정이다.
data.mt_sentence: Korea has relied on imports for most wood pellets until recently, and according to the Forest Service's wood pellet usage statistics, Korea's wood pellet self-sufficiency rates from 2014 to 2018 were only 5.0%, 5.3%, 3.0%, 3.8%, and 5.9%, respectively.
data.target_sentence: Korea has relied on imports for most of the wood pellets until recently, and according to the statistics on the use of wood pellets from the Korea Forest Service, from 2014 to 2018, the self-sufficiency rate of wood pellets in Korea was only 5.0%, 5.3%, 3.0%, 3.8%, and 5.9%, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 이처럼 국내산 목재 펠릿의 공급량이 크게 적은 원인으로 펠릿 생산용 목재원료에 대한 대량 확보의 어려움을 지적하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As such, it was pointed out that it was difficult to secure a large amount of wood raw materials for pellet production as the cause of the very small supply of domestic wood pellets.
data.target_sentence: As such, it was pointed out that it is difficult to secure a large amount of wood raw materials for pellet production due to the very small supply of wood pellets in Korea.

data.source_sentence: 또한, 국내에서 펠릿 제조를 위한 주요 수종으로 낙엽송 등이 사용되고 있으나, 이에 대한 원료 확보의 어려움으로 국내산 목재 펠릿 생산단가의 상승과 함께 순차적으로 판매가의 상승도 목재 펠릿의 수입량을 크게 증가시킨 하나의 요인으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, deciduous pine is used as a major species for pellet manufacturing in Korea, but due to difficulty in securing raw materials, the increase in the production cost of domestic wood pellets and the sequential increase in sales prices are considered to be one of the factors that greatly increased the import volume of wood pellets.
data.target_sentence: In addition, larch is used as a major species for pellet production in Korea. However, due to difficulties in securing raw materials for this, the increase in the unit price of domestic wood pellet production and the sequential increase in selling price are also considered to be one of the factors that greatly increased the amount of wood pellet imports.

data.source_sentence: 따라서 목재 펠릿의 원료로 저렴하게 대량으로 확보할 수 있는 국내 수종에 관한 다양한 연구가 수행되어야 할 것으로 생각한다.
data.mt_sentence: Therefore, I think that various studies on domestic tree species that can be obtained in large quantities at low cost as a raw material for wood pellets should be conducted.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, I think that various studies on domestic tree species that can be obtained in large quantities at low cost as a raw material for wood pellets should be conducted.

data.source_sentence: 참나무류, 소나무, 리기다소나무는 국내에서 안정적인 연료 확보가 가능하나, 까다로운 성형조건으로 이를 이용하여 제조한 목재 펠릿의 품질이 낮은 것으로 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Although it is possible to secure stable fuel in Korea for oak trees, pine trees, and Rigida pines, it has been reported that the quality of wood pellets manufactured using them is low due to difficult molding conditions.
data.target_sentence: Although oak, pine, and Rigida pine can secure stable fuel in Korea, there is a report that wood pellets manufactured using them are of low quality due to difficult molding conditions.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같은 문제점을 해결하기 위하여 첨가제로서 율피차 부산물과 피마자유를 사용하여 품질이 향상된 리기다소나무 및 신갈나무 펠릿을 제조함으로서 안정적인 원료 확보와 함께 국내산 목재 펠릿의 생산량을 증가시키는 방안을 검토하게 되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to solve this problem, a method of increasing the production of domestic wood pellets while securing stable raw materials by manufacturing improved quality Rigida pine and Japanese oak pellets using yulpicha by-product and castor oil as additives was reviewed.
data.target_sentence: In order to solve this problem, a method of increasing domestic wood pellet production while securing stable raw materials by manufacturing improved quality Rigida pine and oak pellets using yulpi tea by-product and castor oil as additives was reviewed.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 첨가제의 사용 목적은 내구성을 포함한 목재 펠릿의 품질 향상을 위하여 사용되는데 저렴한 첨가제의 안정적인 확보가 이루어진다면 이의 사용으로 인한 연료적 특성의 향상이 가능할 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, the purpose of using an additive is to improve the quality of wood pellets including durability, and if an inexpensive additive is stably ensured, it is determined that fuel characteristics may be improved by using the additive.
data.target_sentence: In general, the purpose of using additives is to improve the quality of wood pellets including durability, and if an inexpensive additive is stably ensured, it is determined that fuel characteristics may be improved by using the additive.

data.source_sentence: 따라서 리기다소나무와 신갈나무 목분에 첨가제로서 율피차 부산물과 피마자유를 사용한 후, 피스톤 및 평다이 성형기를 이용하여 다양한 조건에서 펠릿으로 제조하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Therefore, after using Yulpicha by-products and castor oil as additives for the wood of Rigida pine and Mongolian oak, it was manufactured into pellets under various conditions using pistons and flat die molding machines.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, yulpicha by-product and castor oil were used as additives in the wood of Rigida pine and oak, and then pellets were manufactured under various conditions using a piston and a flat die machine.

data.source_sentence: 이렇게 제조한 리기다소나무 및 신갈나무 펠릿의 연료적 특성 측정결과를 통하여 최적의 펠릿 성형조건을 제시하기 위하여 본 연구를 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study was conducted to present optimal pellet molding conditions through the fuel characteristics measurement results of the thus prepared Ligida pine and Mongolian oak pellets.
data.target_sentence: This study was conducted to suggest optimal pellet forming conditions through the results of measurement of fuel properties of Rigida pine and Mongolian oak pellets prepared in this way.

data.source_sentence: 이 목분은 각 원목을 5 mm 및 7 mm 폭의 초경날이 부착된 초프밀로 파쇄한 후, 건조한 것으로 리기다소나무와 신갈나무 목분의 함수율은 각각 6.1%와 13.1%로 측정되었다.
data.mt_sentence: After crushing each wood with choppmills with 5 mm and 7 mm wide hard-diameter blades, the moisture content of the wood of Rigida pine and Mongolian oak was measured to be 6.1% and 13.1%, respectively.
data.target_sentence: The moisture content of Rigida pine and oak wood was measured to be 6.1% and 13.1%, respectively, as a result of crushing each wood with a chop mill with a 5 mm and 7 mm wide hard blade.

data.source_sentence: 이 목분을 4 mesh 표준체로 선별하여 펠릿 제조용 원료로 사용하였으며, 펠릿 제조에 앞서 각 목분의 함수율을 조습과 건조를 통하여 10% 및 12%로 조절하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This wood was selected as a 4 mesh standard and used as a raw material for pellet production, and the moisture content of each wood was adjusted to 10% and 12% through humidity and drying before pellet production.
data.target_sentence: This wood was selected as a 4-mesh standard and used as a raw material for pellet production, and the moisture content of each wood was adjusted to 10% and 12% through humidity and drying before pellet production.

data.source_sentence: 피마자유의 경우, 일반적으로 피마자 종자 내에서약 45% 함유된 것을 압착법으로 채유하여 얻는다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of castor oil, about 45% of the castor seeds are generally obtained by extracting them by a pressing method.
data.target_sentence: In the case of castor oil, about 45% of the castor oil is obtained by extraction using the compression method.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 이와 같은 방법으로 채유한 인도산 피마자유를 BBB에서 리터당 600원에 구입하여 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, Indian castor oil extracted in this way was purchased from BBB at 600 won per liter and used.
data.target_sentence: In this study, Indian castor oil extracted in this way was purchased from BBB at 600 won per liter and used.

data.source_sentence: 피스톤식 펠릿 성형기를 이용한 펠릿 제조는 첨가제의 종류와 사용량, 목분의 함수율에 따른 품질 측정값의 오차를 최소화하기 위하여 목분과 바인더의 총 무게를 1.2 g으로 조절하여 성형기 투입구에 주입하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the production of pellets using a piston-type pellet molding machine, the total weight of wood flour and binder was adjusted to 1.2 g in order to minimize the error in quality measurement values depending on the type and amount of additives used, and the moisture content of wood flour, and it was injected into the inlet of the molding machine.
data.target_sentence: The total weight of wood flour and binder was adjusted to 1.2 g in order to minimize the error in quality measurement values depending on the type, amount, and moisture of additives used in pellet manufacturing using a piston-type pellet molding machine. The wood flour content was measured and injected into the injection port of the molding machine.

data.source_sentence: 파일럿 규모의 평다이 펠릿 성형기를 이용한 펠릿 제조를 위하여 먼저 사용된 첨가제의 양은 목분의 전건무게를 기준으로 2 wt%로 조절하였으며, 이를 평다이 펠릿 성형기에 넣고 펠릿을 제조하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For pellet production using a pilot-scale flat-die pellet molding machine, the amount of additive first used was adjusted to 2 wt% based on the total dry weight of the wood flour, and this was put into a flat-die pellet molding machine to prepare pellets.
data.target_sentence: The amount of additives used first for pellet production using a pilot-scale flat die pellet molding machine was adjusted to 2 wt% based on the dry weight of wood flour, and it was put into the flat die pellet molding machine to prepare pellets.

data.source_sentence: 펠릿성형기는 다이 내에서 192개 홀의 길이/직경(L/D)비를 5.0으로 그리고 원료 투입량은 72 kg/h로 맞추었다.
data.mt_sentence: The pellet molding machine adjusted the length/diameter (L/D) ratio of 192 holes in the die to 5.0 and the input amount of raw materials to 72 kg/h.
data.target_sentence: The pellet molding machine had a length/diameter (L/D) ratio of 192 holes in the die of 5.0 and a raw material input amount of 72 kg/h.

data.source_sentence: 각 펠릿성형기에서 제조된 펠릿은 실험실 내에서 최소 24시간의 자연건조를 한 후, 국립산림과학원 고시 “목재 펠릿 품질규격”에 기술된 방법에 따라 함수율, 발열량, 회분 함량, 내구성, 겉보기밀도를 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After natural drying for at least 24 hours in the laboratory, pellets manufactured in each pellet molding machine were measured in terms of moisture content, heat generation, ash content, durability, and apparent density according to the method described in the National Institute of Forestry.
data.target_sentence: After drying the pellets prepared in each pellet molding machine in a laboratory for at least 24 hours, moisture content, calorific value, ash content, durability, and apparent density were measured according to the method described by the National Institute of Forest Science.

data.source_sentence: 한편 제조된 목재 펠릿의 내습성을 조사하기 위하여 무게가 측정된 펠릿을 25℃와 90%의 상대습도가 유지되는 항온항습기에 넣고, 3시간 후에 꺼내어 무게를 측정하였으며, 항온항습 전후의 펠릿 무게를 이용하여 내습성을 구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to investigate the moisture resistance of the manufactured wood pellets, the weighed pellets were put in a constant-temperature and humidifier maintained at 25°C and 90% relative humidity, taken out after 3 hours, and weighed using the weight of the pellets before and after constant-temperature and humidity.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, in order to investigate the moisture resistance of the manufactured wood pellets, the weighted pellets are placed in a thermo-hygrostat maintained at 25° C. and 90% relative humidity. And, after 3 hours, the weight was measured, and the moisture resistance was obtained using the weight of the pellet before and after constant temperature and humidity.

data.source_sentence: 모든 품질 항목의 측정값은 3회 반복의 평균값으로 표시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The measured values of all quality items were expressed as the average value of three repetitions.
data.target_sentence: The measured values of all quality items were expressed as the average value of three repetitions.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 펠릿 제조를 위하여 주원료로 사용된 리기다소나무(이하 PCP)와 신갈나무(이하 MOK)는 각각 0.4%와 0.9%의 회분을 함유한 것으로 측정되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, it was measured that the Rigida pine (PCP) and the Mongolian oak (MOK) used as the main raw materials for pellet production contained 0.4% and 0.9% ash, respectively.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the ash content of Rigida pine (PCP) and oak (MOK), the main raw materials for pellet production, was measured to be 0.4% and 0.9%, respectively.

data.source_sentence: MOK는 박피의 어려움으로 목분 내에 많은 양의 나무껍질이 존재하는 것을 육안으로 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: MOK visually confirmed that a large amount of bark was present in the wood powder due to the difficulty of peeling.
data.target_sentence: MOK visually confirmed that a large amount of bark was present in the wood flour due to the difficulty of exfoliation.

data.source_sentence: MOK의 높은 회분함량은 나무껍질에서 기인한 것으로 생각한다.
data.mt_sentence: The high ash content of MOK is thought to be attributed to the bark.
data.target_sentence: The high ash content of MOK is thought to be attributed to the bark.

data.source_sentence: CSO의 높은 발열량은 많은 양의 지방/오일의 함유에서 비롯된 결과라 생각한다.
data.mt_sentence: The high calorific value of CSO is thought to be the result of the high amount of fat/oil.
data.target_sentence: The high calorific value of CSO is thought to be the result of a large amount of fat/oil.

data.source_sentence: CSO와 함께 제조한 MOK 펠릿의 발열량증가는 저발열량 MOK 목분에 고발열량의 CSO를 첨가함으로서 나타난 결과라 생각한다.
data.mt_sentence: The increase in calorific value of MOK pellets prepared with CSO is thought to be the result of adding high calorific value of CSO to low calorific value MOK wood flour.
data.target_sentence: The increase in calorific value of MOK pellets prepared from CSO is considered to be the result of adding CSO of high calorific value to MOK wood flour with low calorific value.

data.source_sentence: MOK 목분과 CSO로 제조한 펠릿의 발열량을 제외하고, 첨가제의 사용에 의한 영향은 없었는데 이는 첨가제의 사용량이 목분의 전건중량 기준 2 wt%를 첨가한 관계로 나타난 결과라 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: Except for the calorific value of pellets made with MOK wood flour and CSO, there was no effect by the use of additives, which is considered to be the result of the relationship between the amount of additives added by 2 wt% based on the total dry weight of the wood flour.
data.target_sentence: Except for the calorific value of the pellets prepared with MOK wood flour and CSO, there was no effect by the use of additives. This is considered to be the result of the addition of 2 wt% based on the dry weight of the wood flour for the amount of additive used.

data.source_sentence: 반면, 12%의 목분 함수율에서 제조한 PCP 펠릿의 내구성은 첨가제의 사용에 따른 영향은 없었으나, MOK 펠릿에서는 첨가제의 사용이 내구성 증가에 긍정적인 영향을 미쳤다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, the durability of PCP pellets prepared at a moisture content of 12% wood flour was not affected by the use of additives, but in MOK pellets, the use of additives had a positive effect on durability increase.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, the durability of PCP pellets prepared from 12% water content wood flour was not affected by the use of additives, but in MOK pellets, the use of additives had a positive effect on durability increase.

data.source_sentence: 이 조건에서 제조한 펠릿은 국립산림과학원 목재 펠릿 품질규격 주거용∙소규모상업용 A1 기준을 모두 만족하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The pellets manufactured under this condition met both the residential and small-scale commercial A1 standards for wood pellet quality at the National Institute of Forest Science.
data.target_sentence: Pellets manufactured under these conditions met both residential and small commercial A1 standards for wood pellet quality from the National Academy of Forestry and Science.

data.source_sentence: 율피차 부산물의 입도 크기의 영향CSW의 입도 크기가 PCP 및 MOK 펠릿의 함수율 및 내구성에 미치는 영향을 분석하였으며, 그 결과는 Fig. 2와 같다.

data.source_sentence: 펠릿 함수율의 경우, 2 wt%의 첨가량에서는 첨가제의 사용 없이 제조한 펠릿과 차이가 없었으나, 4 wt%까지 첨가량을 증가시켰을 때 감소하는 경향을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of the pellet moisture content, the addition amount of 2 wt% did not differ from the pellets prepared without the use of additives, but showed a tendency to decrease when the addition amount was increased to 4 wt%.

data.source_sentence: CSO를 첨가제로 사용하여 제조한 펠릿의 함수율 및 내구성에 첨가량이 미치는 영향을 분석한 결과는 Fig. 4와 같다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure shows the results of analyzing the effect of the addition amount on the moisture content and durability of pellets manufactured using CSO as an additive. It is equal to four.

data.source_sentence: 10%의 MOK 목분 함수율에서 CSO의 첨가량이 2 wt%인 경우를 제외하고 모든 펠릿 함수율은 CSO의 첨가량 증가와 함께 감소하는 경향을 보였다.

data.source_sentence: 이는 상기에서 언급한 바와 같이 소수성 성질을 가진 CSO의 첨가량 증가가 함수율 감소에 영향을 미친 것으로 생각한다.
data.mt_sentence: As mentioned above, it is considered that the increase in the amount of CSO having hydrophobic properties affected the decrease in water content.
data.target_sentence: As described above, it is determined that the increase in the content of CSO having hydrophobicity has an effect on the decrease in the moisture content.

data.source_sentence: 목분의 함수율에서 첨가량 2 wt%로 제조한 펠릿의 낮은 함수율은 실험적 오차에서 기인한 것으로 추정된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is estimated that the low moisture content of the pellets prepared with an addition amount of 2 wt% in the moisture content of wood flour is due to an experimental error.
