data.source_sentence: 내구성의 경우, PCP 펠릿은 CSO의 첨가량 증가에 영향을 받지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of durability, the PCP pellets were not affected by the increase in the amount of CSO added.
data.target_sentence: In the case of durability, PCP pellets were not affected by the increase in the amount of CSO added.

data.source_sentence: MOK 펠릿의 내구성은 2 wt% CSO 첨가량의 경우 10% 목분 함수율에서 감소, 12% 목분 함수율에서 증가하였으나, 4 wt% 첨가량에서는 반대로 각각 증가 및 감소하는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: The durability of MOK pellets decreased at 10% wood flour moisture content and increased at 12% wood flour moisture content in the case of 2 wt% CSO added, but increased and decreased, respectively, at 4 wt% added amount.
data.target_sentence: The durability of MOK pellets decreased at 10% wood flour moisture content and increased at 12% wood flour moisture content when CSO 2wt% was added, but increased and decreased when 4wt% was added, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같은 결과는 MOK 펠릿의 내구성에 첨가제로서 CSO의 첨가량과 MOK 목분의 함수율 간에 상호작용이 있는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: These results indicate that there is an interaction between the amount of CSO added as an additive to the durability of MOK pellets and the moisture content of MOK wood flour.
data.target_sentence: These results indicate that there is an interaction between the amount of CSO added as an additive to the durability of MOK pellets and the moisture content of MOK wood flour.

data.source_sentence: 평다이 펠릿 성형기로 제조한 펠릿의 연료적
data.mt_sentence: Fuel volume of pellets produced by flat-die pelletizing machine
data.target_sentence: Amount of fuel in pellets produced in a flat die pelletizing machine

data.source_sentence: 파일럿 규모의 평다이 펠릿성형기를 이용하여 PCP 또는 MOK 목분에 첨가제로 CSW 및 CSO를 목분의 전건무게를 기준으로 2 wt% 첨가하여 펠릿을 제조하였으며, 이렇게 제조한 펠릿의 연료적 특성 측정결과는 Table 1과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: A pilot-scale flat die pellet molding machine was used to prepare pellets by adding 2 wt% of CSW and CSO as additives to PCP or MOK wood based on the total weight of wood, and the fuel characteristics of the pellets thus prepared are as shown in Table 1.
data.target_sentence: Pellets were prepared by adding 2 wt% of CSW and CSO as additives based on the dry weight of wood flour to PCP or MOK wood flour using a pilot-scale flat die pelletizing machine. Table 1 shows the fuel characteristics measurement results of the pellets prepared in this way.

data.source_sentence: 본연구에서 평다이 펠릿 성형기로 제조한 모든 펠릿의 함수율은 수종, 목분 함수율 그리고 첨가제의 사용 여부와 상관없이 모두 국립산림과학원 목재펠릿 주거용･소규모 상업용A1 기준을 만족하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the moisture content of all pellets manufactured by the flat die pellet molding machine met the criteria for wood pellet residential and small-scale commercial A1 of the National Institute of Forest Science regardless of tree species, wood moisture content, and additive use.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the moisture content of all pellets manufactured by the flat pellet molding machine satisfies the A1 standard for residential and small-scale commercial wood pellets of the National Academy of Forest Sciences, regardless of the species, wood moisture content, and whether additives are used.

data.source_sentence: 내구성의 경우, PCP 목분으로 제조한 펠릿에서는 전반적으로 첨가제의 사용과 함께 증가하는 경향을 보였으며, 특히 10%의 PCP 목분 함수율에서 CSW를 첨가하여 제조한 펠릿은 국립산림과학원 목재 펠릿 주거용･소규모 상업용 A1 기준을 만족하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In terms of durability, pellets manufactured from PCP wood tended to increase with the use of additives, especially pellets manufactured by adding CSW at a 10% PCP wood moisture content met the criteria for residential and small-scale commercial A1.
data.target_sentence: In terms of durability, the pellets made of PCP wood showed a tendency to increase with the use of additives. In particular, the pellets prepared by adding CSW to PCP wood moisture content of 10% met the A1 standard for residential and small-scale commercial use of the National Institute of Forest Science.

data.source_sentence: MOK 펠릿의 내구성은 10% 목분 함수율에서 첨가제의 사용에 따라 감소하거나 차이가 없었으나, 12% 목분 함수율에서는 증가하는 경향을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: The durability of MOK pellets did not decrease or differ according to the use of additives at 10% wood flour moisture content, but showed a tendency to increase at 12% wood flour moisture content.
data.target_sentence: The durability of MOK pellets did not decrease or differ according to the use of additives at a moisture content of 10% of wood flour, but showed a tendency to increase at a moisture content of 12% of wood flour.

data.source_sentence: 이 결과로부터 MOK 목분을 이용한 펠릿 제조시목분의 함수율을 12%로 조절하는 것이 필요할 것으로 생각 한편 PCP 펠릿의 겉보기밀도는 10%의 목분 함수율에서 첨가제의 사용으로 증가하거나 차이가 없었으나, 12%의 목분 함수율에서 크게 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: From this result, it is considered necessary to adjust the moisture content of wood to 12% when manufacturing pellets using MOK wood, while the apparent density of PCP pellets increased or did not differ from 10% moisture content using additives, but decreased significantly from 12% wood content.
data.target_sentence: From this result, it is judged that it is necessary to control the moisture content of the wood to 12% when using MOK wood to manufacture pellets, whereas the apparent density of PCP pellets increases or does not differ from the moisture content of 10% using additives, but decreased significantly from 12% wood content.

data.source_sentence: 이 결과는 PCP목분에 함유 추출물 성분이 목분 내의 수분 증발에 부정적인 영향을 미쳐 파열현상이 발생하였고, 결과적으로 압밀화 정도가 감소하여 나타난 결과라 생각한다.
data.mt_sentence: This result is thought to be the result of the fact that the extract component contained in the PCP wood flour had a negative effect on the evaporation of water in the wood flour, causing the rupture phenomenon, and consequently the degree of compaction decreased.
data.target_sentence: This is thought to be the result of the decrease in compaction due to the fact that the extract component contained in the PCP wood flour has a negative effect on the evaporation of water in the wood flour, causing a rupture phenomenon.

data.source_sentence: 이 추론은 12%의 목분 함수율에서 제조한 PCP 펠릿의 높은 함수율에서 추정한 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: This inference is based on the high moisture content of PCP pellets prepared at a moisture content of 12% wood flour.
data.target_sentence: This reasoning is based on the high moisture content of PCP pellets prepared at a moisture content of 12% wood flour.

data.source_sentence: MOK 펠릿의 겉보기밀도는 10%목분 함수율에서 첨가제의 사용과 함께 감소하였으나, 12%의 목분 함수율에서는 증가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The apparent density of MOK pellets decreased with the use of additives at 10% wood flour moisture content, but increased at 12% wood flour moisture content.
data.target_sentence: The apparent density of the MOK pellets decreased with the use of additives at 10% wood flour moisture content but increased at 12% wood flour moisture content.

data.source_sentence: 결과는 MOK의 비중이 높아 펠릿 성형과정에서 목분의 충분한 압밀화를 위하여 일정 수준 이상의 수분 첨가가 필요하다는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result, the specific gravity of MOK is high, which means that a certain level of moisture is required for sufficient compaction of wood flour in the pellet forming process.
data.target_sentence: As a result, the specific gravity of MOK is high, so a certain level of moisture is required for sufficient compaction of wood flour during the pellet forming process.

data.source_sentence: 첨가제로 CSW만을 사용하여 제조한 펠릿을 항온항습기(상대습도 90%, 온도 25℃)에 3시간 동안 보관한 후, 측정한 무게는 8.2%가 증가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After storing the pellets prepared using only CSW as an additive in a constant temperature and humidity (relative humidity 90% and temperature 25°C) for 3 hours, the measured weight increased by 8.2%.
data.target_sentence: After storing the pellets prepared using only CSW as an additive at constant temperature and humidity (90% relative humidity, 25°C) for 3 hours, the measured weight increased by 8.2%.

data.source_sentence: 이처럼 8 wt%의 CSO 첨가량에서 내습성이 감소하는 이유는 CSO에 존재하는 친수성의 hydroxyl기에 수 분이 결합하여 발생한 것이라 추정된다.
data.mt_sentence: The reason for the decrease in moisture resistance at the addition amount of 8 wt% CSO is estimated to be due to the binding of moisture to the hydrophilic hydroxyl group present in CSO.

data.source_sentence: 한편, 각 조건에서 제조한 펠릿의 연료적 특성(함수율, 겉보기 밀도, 회분 함량, 발열량 등)은 큰 변화가 없었다.
data.mt_sentence: Meanwhile, there was no significant change in the fuel characteristics (water content, apparent density, ash content, heat generation amount, etc.) of the pellets prepared under each condition.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, there was no significant change in fuel properties (moisture content, apparent density, ash, calorific value, etc.) of the pellets manufactured under each condition.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 PCP 및 MOK 목분을 이용한 펠릿 제조에 있어 첨가제로서 사용한 CSW와 CSO가 펠릿의 연료적 특성에 미치는 영향을 조사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study investigated the effects of CSW and CSO used as additives on the fuel properties of pellets in the manufacture of pellets using PCP and MOK wood flour.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the effects of CSW and CSO, which are used as additives, on the fuel properties of pellets in the production of pellets using PCP and MOK wood flour were investigated.

data.source_sentence: CSO를 첨가제로 사용한 MOK 펠릿 제조시 목분의 함수율은 12% 그리고 CSO 첨가량은 2 wt%로 조절하는 것이 목재 펠릿의 가정/소규모 상업용 A1 내구성 기준(≧97.5%)을 만족하는 최적의 제조조건이라 생각한다.
data.mt_sentence: When manufacturing MOK pellets using CSO as additives, adjusting the moisture content of wood to 12% and CSO addition to 2% by weight is the optimal manufacturing condition that meets the A1 durability standard (97.5%) for home/small-scale commercial use of wood pellets.
data.target_sentence: When manufacturing MOK pellets using CSO as an additive, the moisture content of wood flour was adjusted to 12% and the amount of CSO added was adjusted to 2 wt%. We believe that this is the optimal manufacturing condition that satisfies the A1 durability standard (≧97.5%) for home/small commercial use of wood pellets.

data.source_sentence: 평다이 펠릿성형기로 제조한 펠릿의 경우, 20 mesh 크기의 CSW를 첨가제로 사용하고, PCP 및 MOK목분의 함수율을 각각 10% 및 12%로 조절하는 것이 펠릿의 연료적 특성과 경제적인 측면을 고려하여 최적의 펠릿 제조조건이라 생각한다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of pellets manufactured by a flat die pelletizing machine, it is necessary to use CSW of 20 mesh size as an additive, and to adjust the moisture content of PCP and MOK wood flour to 10% and 12%, respectively, considering the fuel properties and economical aspects of pellets. Therefore, it is considered to be the optimal pellet manufacturing condition.
data.target_sentence: In the case of pellets produced by a flat die pelletizing machine, CSW of 20 mesh size is used as an additive. In addition, adjusting the moisture content of PCP and MOK wood flour to 10% and 12%, respectively, is considered to be the optimal pellet manufacturing condition in consideration of the fuel characteristics and economic aspects of the pellets.

data.source_sentence: 음식물류 폐기물의 자원화 과정에서 발생는 탈리액인음폐수는 음식물류 폐기물의 자원화를 위해 전처리 과정에서 탈수 또는 염분 희석을 위한 세척 등 때문에 발생하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the process of recycling food waste, wastewater that is talized liquid is generated due to dehydration or washing for salt dilution in the pretreatment process for recycling of food waste.
data.target_sentence: In the food waste recycling process, food waste leachate is generated by dehydration or washing for salt dilution in the pretreatment process for food waste recycling.

data.source_sentence: 음폐수에 대한 정의는 음식물류 폐기물 처리 과정에서 발생는 탈리액으로 단순하게 정의할 수 있지만 각 공정별로 음폐수의 발생을 고려하여 정의 및 범위를 설정할 필요가 있을 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: Although the definition of food wastewater can be simply defined as eliminative liquid generated in the process of food waste treatment, it is judged that it is necessary to set the definition and scope in consideration of the occurrence of food wastewater for each process.
data.target_sentence: The definition of food waste can be simply defined as food waste leachate generated during the food waste treatment process, but it is judged that it is necessary to determine the definition and scope in consideration of the generation of food wastewater for each process.

data.source_sentence: 탈리액은 전처리시설인 탈수 및 세척과정에서 발생하는 폐수를 말한다.
data.mt_sentence: The talismant refers to wastewater generated during the dehydration and washing process, which is a pre-treatment facility.
data.target_sentence: Food waste leachate refers to wastewater generated during the dehydration and washing process and is a pre-treatment facility.

data.source_sentence: 이처럼 음식물류 폐기물 처리시설에서는 처리공정 내에서 침출되거나, 떨어져 나가는 폐수, 분해되지 않은 고농도의 폐수 또는 사료화 공정의 하부 침출수 및 응축수 등의 폐수가 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: As such, in the food waste treatment facility, wastewater such as wastewater that is leached or dripped off within the treatment process, high-concentration wastewater that has not been decomposed, or lower leachate and condensate from the feed process is generated.
data.target_sentence: As described above, food waste treatment facilities generate wastewater such as wastewater that is leached or dripped in the treatment process, high-concentration wastewater that has not been decomposed, and low-leachate and condensate that are generated during the supply process.

data.source_sentence: 음폐수에 대한 정의 및 범위를 재설정하면 ‘음폐수’라 함은 ‘음식물류 폐기물 전처리 과정에서 침출, 떨어져 나가는 폐수 및 자원화 시설 본 처리과정에서 침출, 증발, 분해에 의하여 발생되는 폐수’라고 정의 내릴 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: If the definition and scope of food wastewater are reset, 'food wastewater' can be defined as 'wastewater that is leached out during the pre-treatment process of food and logistics waste and wastewater generated by leaching, evaporation, and decomposition during the main treatment process of a recycling facility'. have.
data.target_sentence: If the definition and scope of food waste are reset, 'food wastewater' can be defined as 'wastewater leached from the pretreatment process of food and logistics waste and wastewater generated from leaching, evaporation, and decomposition in the main treatment process of a recycling facility'.

data.source_sentence: 이는 민간시설에서 발생하는 음폐수를 포함한 총 음폐수 발생량으로 계산하면 30% 정도가 바이오 가스화로 처리된다고 볼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: If this is calculated as the total amount of food wastewater including food wastewater generated by private facilities, it can be seen that about 30% is treated by biogasification.
data.target_sentence: If this is calculated as the total amount of food wastewater including food wastewater generated from private facilities, it can be seen that about 30% is biogasified.

data.source_sentence: 우리나라에 보급된 혐기성 소화방식은 대부분 습식소화방식이며,바이오가스화는 혐기성 소화를 통하여 폐기물 및 폐수로부터 메탄가스를 회수하는 메탄 소화가 주요하였지만, 최근 들어 유기물의 메탄가스로의 전환을 부분적으로 차단하여 부가가치가 높은 수소를 생산하는 공정 연구가 활발히 진행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Most of the anaerobic digestion methods distributed in Korea are wet digestion methods, and biogasification mainly consists of methane digestion that recovers methane gas from waste and wastewater through anaerobic digestion, but recently, the conversion of organic matter to methane gas has been partially blocked and added value Process research for producing high hydrogen is being actively conducted.
data.target_sentence: Most of the anaerobic digestion methods used in Korea are wet digestion, and biogasification is mainly methane digestion, which recovers methane gas from waste and wastewater through anaerobic digestion. However, in recent years, research on a process for producing hydrogen with high added value by partially blocking the conversion of organic matter into methane gas has been actively conducted.

data.source_sentence: 본 실험에 사용된 음폐수는 D시 환경사업소 자원화 시설에서 채취하여 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The wastewater used in this experiment was collected and used at the resource recycling facility of the D city environmental office.
data.target_sentence: The wastewater used in this experiment was collected and used at the resource recycling facility of the Environmental Office of D city.

data.source_sentence: 실험 장치는 수소 발효 운전을 위한 파이롯트 규모로 임펠러 방식의 교반설비가 설치된 원통형이며 총 용적은 1.4m3(유효용적 1 m3)이고, 가온 부분에 있어서는 온수를 반응기 재킷에 순환시켜 중온 조건 35℃를 유지하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The experimental device was a cylindrical type with an impeller-type stirring facility installed on the scale of a pyrolysis operation, and the total volume was 1.4 m3 (effective 1 m3), and hot water was circulated to the reactor jacket in the heating part to maintain the medium temperature condition of 35°C.
data.target_sentence: The experimental device is a pilot scale for hydrogen fermentation operation, and is a cylindrical shape equipped with an impeller-type agitation facility, and has a total volume of 1.4m3 (effective volume 1m3). And, in the warming part, hot water was circulated through the reactor jacket to maintain a medium temperature condition of 35°C.

data.mt_sentence: Machine learning-based RNN algorithms are evaluated to be suitable for dealing with time series data as they can train weights for all variables.
data.target_sentence: RNN algorithms based on machine learning can train weights for all variables, which is evaluated as suitable for processing time series data.

data.source_sentence: 하지만 RNN은 데이터의 양이 방대하면 과거의 데이터 정보가 소실되어 학습을 통해 가중치를 결정하는 과정에서 영향력이 없어지는 장기 의존성 문제가 나타날 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: However, RNNs may exhibit long-term dependence problems, where, when the amount of data is vast, past data information is lost, which becomes ineffective in the process of determining weights through learning.
data.target_sentence: However, RNNs lose historical data information when the amount of data is huge, which can represent an inefficient long-term dependency problem in determining weights through training.

data.source_sentence: LSTM을 이용한 예측 알고리즘은 이러한 문제를 완화하기 위해 산업계에서 활용되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: A prediction algorithm using LSTM has been utilized in the industry to alleviate this problem.
data.target_sentence: To solve this problem, a prediction algorithm using LSTM is being used in the industry.

data.source_sentence: 기존에 선행된 연구는 데이터보다 모델의 구성에 집중하여 예측 시스템을 구축하는 데 중점을 두는 경향이 많았으며, 시계열 데이터는 풍속과 발전량의 데이터를 이용하여 진행되는 경우가 많았다.
data.mt_sentence: Previous studies have tended to focus on building a prediction system by focusing on model composition rather than data, and time series data were often conducted using data of wind speed and power generation.
data.target_sentence: Existing studies tended to focus on building a prediction system by focusing on model composition rather than data, and time series data often utilized wind speed and power generation data.

data.source_sentence: 방법은 불규칙한 풍속을 뒷받침하는 데이터가 부족하여 모델을 수정하여 예측 정확도를 높이기에 어려움이 존재할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The method may have difficulties in improving the prediction accuracy by modifying the model due to the lack of data to support the irregular wind speed.
data.target_sentence: This method lacks data to support irregular wind speeds, which can make it difficult to modify the model to improve prediction accuracy.

data.source_sentence: 데이터의 전처리 및 데이터마이닝을 하여 모델에 적용하는것이 중요하다고 평가되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It is evaluated that it is important to apply data pre-processing and data mining to the model.
data.target_sentence: It is evaluated that it is important to apply data preprocessing and data mining to the model.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 풍력발전량을 예측하여 신재생에너지원의 이용률을 높이기 위해 기계 학습 그리고 데이터마이닝을 적용한 풍력발전 예측 시스템을 제안하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, we propose a wind power generation prediction system that applies machine learning and data mining to predict wind power generation and increase the utilization rate of new and renewable energy sources.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, we propose a wind power generation prediction system that predicts wind power generation by applying machine learning and data mining and increases the utilization of new and renewable energy sources.

data.source_sentence: 데이터셋은 모델에 적합하게 적용 할 수 있도록 전처리를 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The dataset was pre-processed so that it could be applied appropriately to the model.
data.target_sentence: The dataset has been preprocessed so that it can be applied appropriately to the model.

data.mt_sentence: When constructing a prediction system, building a model is also important, but preprocessing the data is evaluated as important.
data.target_sentence: When building a prediction system, building a model is important, but data preprocessing is also important.

data.mt_sentence: Time series data are predicted using LSTM, and a CNN-LSTM prediction system is constructed.
data.target_sentence: The time series data are predicted using LSTM and construct a CNN-LSTM prediction system.

data.source_sentence: 시계열 데이터를 사용하여 예측 시스템을 구성할 때 데이 터의 전처리를 통해 모델에 입력하여 출력에 부정적인 영향을 미치지 않도록 하는 것이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: When constructing a prediction system using time series data, it is important to input it into the model through preprocessing of the data so that it does not negatively affect the output.
data.target_sentence: When building a prediction system using time series data, it is important to input the data into the model through preprocessing so as not to negatively affect the output.

data.source_sentence: 데이터 전처리를 함으로써 불완전한 데이터를 처리하는 과정을 거친 후 정규화를 적용, 예측 시스템에 입력하는 과정이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: After processing incomplete data by preprocessing data, it is necessary to apply normalization and input it into the prediction system.
data.target_sentence: After processing the incomplete data by preprocessing the data, we need to apply normalization and input it into the prediction system.

data.source_sentence: 정규화는 입력으로 사용되는 변수 간 스케일 차이를 조정하여 개별 데이터의 크기를 모두 똑같은 단위로 변경하는 것을 의미한다.

data.target_sentence: Normalization refers to changing the size of individual data in equal units by adjusting the scale difference between variables used as inputs.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 풍력발전기에서 측정한 실측데이터와 풍력발전기가 위치한 지역 인근의 기상청 환경 변수를 입력으로 하였고 전처리를 통해 정규화를 진행하며 CNN 과정을 거친다.

data.target_sentence: In this paper, the measured data measured by the wind turbine and the environmental variables of the Korea Meteorological Administration around the area where the wind turbine is located are input, pre-processed and normalized, and then subjected to the CNN process.

data.source_sentence: LSTM을 활용해 학습시킨 뒤 예측을 진행하고 검증 및 시각화를 진행한다.
data.mt_sentence: After learning using LSTM, prediction, validation and visualization are performed.
data.target_sentence: Use LSTM to train, then predict, validate, and visualize.

data.source_sentence: 시계열 데이터 중 패턴에서 벗어난 값을 이상치(Outlier)라 정의한다.
data.mt_sentence: A value that deviates from a pattern among time series data is defined as an outlier.
data.target_sentence: A value that deviates from the pattern among time series data is defined as an outlier.

data.source_sentence: 해당 시계열 데이터는 두산중공업의 3 MW급TC-II, TC-S 모델의 풍력발전기를 기준으로 하고 있어 3MW를 초과하는 값과 0 W 미만의 값을 이상치로 정의하고 해당 데이터를 각각 3 MW와 0 MW로 고정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The time series data are based on wind power generators of Doosan Heavy Industries & Construction's 3MW class TC-II and TC-S models, so values exceeding 3MW and less than 0W were defined as abnormal values, and the data were fixed at 3MW and 0MW, respectively.
data.target_sentence: For time series data, based on the wind power generators of Doosan Heavy Industries & Construction's 3MW class TC-II and TC-S models, more than 3MW and less than 0W were defined as abnormal values, and 3MW and 0MW were fixed, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 서남해실증단지 풍력발전기를 통해 측정한 10월 1일부터 10월 21일까지의 원천 데이터를 Fig. 2에 나타내었으며, 도출된 이 상치에 대한 부분을 확인할 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 해당 논문에서는 변수와 풍력발전기의 출력 값에 대한 상관관계 분석을 통해 변수를 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, variables were set through correlation analysis between variables and the output value of the wind power generator.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, variables were set through correlation analysis between variables and the output value of wind power generators.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 Seaborn 라이브러리를 활용한 데이터 히트맵을 통해 상관관계 분석을 진행하였으며, 풍력발전기를 통해 측정한 변수 5개와 환경 변수 3개를 더하여 출력변수(Output)를 제외한 총 8개의 변수가 출력값을 산정하는데 적합한 것으로 판단되었다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper analyzed the correlation through the data heat map using the Seaborn library, and it was determined that a total of 8 variables, excluding the output, were suitable to calculate the power value by adding 5 variables and 3 environmental variables measured through the wind power generator.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, correlation was analyzed through a data heat map using the Seaborn library, and by adding 5 variables measured through wind power and 3 environmental variables, a total of 8 variables excluding the output value were judged to be suitable for calculating the power value generator.

data.source_sentence: 피치 각도에 대한 상관계수가 음수를 이루고 있으며 이는 선형적인 관계지만 반비례를 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: The correlation coefficient for the pitch angle is negative, and this is a linear relationship, but it means inversely proportional.
data.target_sentence: The correlation coefficient for the pitch angle is negative, meaning that it is a linear relationship but inversely proportional.

data.source_sentence: 피치 각도가 향상할 경우, 풍력발전기의 출력은 줄어든다는 것을 파악할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When the pitch angle is improved, it can be seen that the output of the wind turbine is reduced.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that when the pitch angle is improved, the output of the wind turbine is reduced.

data.source_sentence: 히트맵을 사용하여 변수들의 상관관계를 분석할 수 있으므로 추가적인 변수를 사용할 때 결과에 미치는 영향에 대한 분석이 가능하여 추후, 예측 정확도를 높이기 위한 데이터셋을 구성할 때 중요할 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: Since it is possible to analyze the correlation of variables using a heat map, it is possible to analyze the effect on the result when using additional variables, which is considered important when composing a data set to improve prediction accuracy in the future.

data.target_sentence: In the CNN layer, the filter performs a convolution operation and extracts the maximum value through the MaxPooling layer to obtain the spatial characteristics of the data.

data.source_sentence: 따라서 복잡한 데이터셋을 효과적으로 구성할 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 차원을 변환시킨 데이터를 LSTM에 적용함으로서 데이터의 특징을 추출하고 시간적 추세를 반영한 CNN-LSTM 모델을 구축하였으며 Fig. 4와 같다.
data.mt_sentence: By applying the dimensionally transformed data to the LSTM, a CNN-LSTM model that extracts the data characteristics and reflects the temporal trend was constructed. same as 4

data.mt_sentence: LSTM, which has been widely used recently, is a type of RNN and has the ability to perform appropriate learning when using time series data with a long period.
data.target_sentence: LSTM, which has been widely used recently, is a kind of RNN and has the ability to perform appropriate learning when using long-term time series data.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서 제안하는 예측 시스템의 알고리즘은 Fig. 6과 같다.

data.target_sentence: Figure 6 shows the algorithm of the prediction system proposed in this paper.

data.source_sentence: 시계열 데이터의 특성을 고려하여 시간의 흐름에 따른 정확도를 향상시키기 위해 CNN-LSTM 모델에서 Moving Window 알고리즘을 적용하였다.

data.target_sentence: Regression index evaluation is an index for calculating errors in the learning process by using a loss function when learning using training data and modifying the model in a direction in which learning errors are minimized.

data.source_sentence: 결과를 도출하였을 때 실제 데이터와 예측 데이터 간의 오차를 비교하는 방법이다.

data.source_sentence: 전북 부안군 위도 및 고창군 해역의 서남해 실증단지에 있는 풍력발전기 20기 중 두산중공업 TC-S 모델 1기에 대한 시뮬레이션을 진행하였다.

data.target_sentence: A simulation was performed on one Doosan Heavy Industries & Construction TC-S out of 20 wind power generators located in the demonstration complex in the southwest coast of Wido and Gochang-gun, Buan-gun, Jeollabuk-do.

data.source_sentence: 예측 정확도를 높이는 방안으로, 기상청에서 해당 풍력발전기 인근의 기상 데이터를 추가하여 데이터 보완을 수행하였다.

data.target_sentence: There are 8 items in the dataset with 10-minute data.

data.mt_sentence: Batch Size is a variable that divides the number due to the limitation of data learning, and since there are 144 pieces of data for 10 minutes per day, it was selected as follows to increase the accuracy of daily prediction.

data.source_sentence: 시뮬레이션 결과 WAPE 기준으로 사례 1은 약 10.23%, 사례 2는 4.64%, 사례 3은 0.33%로 본 논문에서 제시한 방법이 가장 오차율이 감소함을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the simulation, based on WAPE, case 1 was about 10.23%, case 2 was 4.64%, and case 3 was 0.33%, confirming that the method presented in this paper reduced the error rate the most.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the simulation, based on WAPE, Case 1 was about 10.23%, Case 2 was 4.64%, and Case 3 was 0.33%, confirming that the method presented in this paper reduced the error rate the most.

data.source_sentence: 이를 통해 본 논문에서 제안한 기법을 활용할 경우 상대적으로 적은 오차가 발생함을 검증하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this, it was verified that relatively small errors occur when the technique proposed in this paper is used.
data.target_sentence: Through this, it was confirmed that a relatively small error occurs when the method proposed in this paper is used.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 기계 학습 기반 풍력발전 예측 시스템의 입력값과 모델에 따른 정확도 비교를 위해 시뮬레이션을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, simulation was conducted to compare the accuracy of the input value and model of the machine learning-based wind power generation prediction system.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, simulation was performed to compare the accuracy of the model with the input value of the machine learning-based wind power generation prediction system.

data.source_sentence: 제안한 예측 모델의 신뢰성을 확인하고자 세가지 연구 사례의 결과 값으로 비교하였으며 실제 발전량과의 정확도 비교를 하기 위해 평가지표를 작성하여 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to confirm the reliability of the proposed prediction model, it was compared with the results of the three research cases, and an evaluation index was prepared and confirmed to compare the accuracy with the actual power generation.
data.target_sentence: To confirm the reliability of the proposed prediction model, the results of three research cases were compared, and an evaluation index was prepared and confirmed to compare the actual power generation and accuracy.

data.source_sentence: 시뮬레이션 결과 연구 사례 3인 환경변수를 고려하고 CNN을 통해 데이터마이닝을 진행하였을 때 오차가 감소함을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the simulation, it was confirmed that the error decreased when the environment variable, which is the study case 3, was considered and data mining was performed through CNN.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the simulation, it was confirmed that the error was reduced when the environment variable, which is the study case 3, was considered and data mining was performed through CNN.

data.source_sentence: 신재생에너지 보급률 확대로 불규칙한 에너지공급이 확대되고, 수요･공급제어에 예측 시스템 고도화가 요구되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The irregular energy supply is expanding due to the increased penetration of new and renewable energy, and the advancement of the forecasting system is required for supply and demand control.
data.target_sentence: The irregular energy supply is expanding due to the expansion of new and renewable energy supply, and the advancement of the forecasting system for supply and demand management is required.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서 제안한 예측기법은 전력계통에 투입되는 풍력발전을 안정적으로 예측하는 데 활용할 수 있으며, 풍력발전의 일반적인 제어관리시스템 구조에 적용할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The prediction method proposed in this paper can be used to reliably predict the wind power input to the power system, and can be applied to the structure of a general control and management system of wind power generation.
data.target_sentence: The prediction method proposed in this paper can be used to reliably predict the wind power input to the power system, and can be applied to the structure of the general control and management system of wind power generation.

data.source_sentence: 대규모 풍력발전은 출력제한 과정에 예측 시스템 응용이 일반화되고 있으며, 제안된 방식의 예측 정확도 향상으로 비용의 경감이 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of large-scale wind power generation, the application of the prediction system to the output limiting process is becoming common, and the cost can be reduced by improving the prediction accuracy of the proposed method.
data.target_sentence: In the case of large-scale wind power generation, it is becoming common to apply the prediction system to the output limiting process, and the cost can be reduced by improving the prediction accuracy of the proposed method.

data.source_sentence: 향후, 예측의 신뢰성과 정확성을 향상하기 위해, 각 입력변수의 의미, 입력변수 간 상관관계, 다중공선성 등을 고려하여 최적화를 진행할 계획이다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to improve the reliability and accuracy of predictions in the future, optimization is planned in consideration of the meaning of each input variable, the correlation between input variables, and multicollinearity.
data.target_sentence: In order to increase the reliability and accuracy of future prediction, optimization is planned considering the meaning of each input variable, correlation between input variables, and multicollinearity.

data.source_sentence: 마지막으로, 시계열 예측에서 필수적인 3가지 요소인 추세, 계절성, 주기성의 분석의 중요성의 영향력이 커지는 추세이다.
data.mt_sentence: Finally, the influence of the importance of analysis of trend, seasonality, and periodicity, which are the three essential factors in time series prediction, is increasing.
data.target_sentence: Lastly, the three major factors of time series forecasting are trend, seasonality, and periodicity analysis.

data.source_sentence: 특히, 풍력 터빈의 일시적 점검 및 통신오류로 인한 입력 데이터를 고려하고 이상치 데이터 수정 및 보완하여 예측의 정확도 향상을 위한 개선이 요구된다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, it is required to improve the accuracy of prediction by considering the temporary inspection of wind turbines and input data due to communication errors, and correcting and supplementing the outlier data.
data.target_sentence: In particular, it is required to improve the accuracy of prediction by correcting and supplementing the outlier data in consideration of the input data due to the temporary inspection of the wind turbine and communication error.

data.source_sentence: 에너지 분야의 국가연구개발 투자는 지속적으로 확대되어 왔으며, 2022년도 에너지 R&D 예산은 1조 2,460억원으로 5년 전보다 61% 증가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: National R&D investment in the energy sector has been continuously expanding, and the energy R&D budget for 2022 is KRW 1.246 trillion, an increase of 61% from five years ago.
data.target_sentence: National R&D investment in the energy sector continues to expand, and the energy R&D budget in 2022 is KRW 1.246 trillion, a 61% increase compared to five years ago.

data.source_sentence: 특히, 신재생에너지분야의 정부 R&D 투자는 2022년 기준 3,935억원으로 5년전과 비교하여 89% 증가하여 에너지 전체 평균을 크게 웃다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, government R&D investment in the field of new and renewable energy is 393.5 billion won in 2022, an increase of 89% compared to five years ago, greatly exceeding the overall energy average.
data.target_sentence: In particular, the government's R&D investment in the new and renewable energy sector in 2022 was 393.5 billion won, an increase of 89% from five years ago, significantly exceeding the overall energy average.

data.source_sentence: 국가연구개발 투자 효과의 관점에서 기존 연구는 예산, 체제(Regime), 성과 등에 대한 적정성 또는 유효성을 논하는 연구로 나눠 볼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In terms of the effect of national R&D investment, existing research can be divided into research that discusses the adequacy or effectiveness of budget, regime, and performance.
data.target_sentence: In terms of the effect of national R&D investment, existing studies can be divided into studies that discuss the adequacy or effectiveness of budget, system, and performance.

data.source_sentence: 자료포락분석법(Data Envelopment Analysis)을 이용하여 정부 R&D 예산의 투입과 특허, 논문, 사업화 실적 등의 산출물 간의 유효성을 규명하는 연구가 상당수 선행되었는데, 사업의 목적과 성과 지표 간의 유효성을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: A number of studies have been conducted to investigate the effectiveness of government R&D budget input and outputs such as patents, thesis, and commercialization performance using Data Envelopment Analysis, and it was possible to confirm the effectiveness between the purpose of the project and performance indicators.
data.target_sentence: Many studies have been conducted to investigate the effectiveness of government R&D budget input and output such as patents, thesis, and commercialization performance using Data Envelopment Analysis, and the effectiveness between the project purpose and performance indicators has been confirmed.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 R&D 투자로 발생하는 직접적인 성능개선 효과를 경제적 가치로 산출하여 허용 가능한 R&D 투자비용과 투자 효과를 산정하는 사례연구를 실시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, a case study was conducted to calculate the allowable R&D investment cost and investment effect by calculating the direct performance improvement effect resulting from the R&D investment as an economic value.
data.target_sentence: In this study, a case study was conducted to calculate the allowable R&D investment cost and investment effect by calculating the direct performance improvement effect of R&D investment as an economic value.

data.source_sentence: 본 사례연구에서 고려하는 시스템 구성은 Fig. 1과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The system configuration considered in this case study is shown in Fig. 1.
data.target_sentence: The system configuration considered in this case study is shown in Figure 1.

data.source_sentence: 한전으로부터 수전되는 전기, 전기냉동기, 냉각탑으로 구성되는 기존 구조에서, 본 연구결과품인 삼중 열병합시스템이 결합하는 구조이다.
data.mt_sentence: In the existing structure consisting of electricity received from KEPCO, an electric refrigerator, and a cooling tower, it is a structure in which the triple cogeneration system, the result of this study, is combined.
data.target_sentence: It is a structure in which the triple heat and power generation system, the result of this study, is combined with the existing structure consisting of electric power supplied from KEPCO, an electric refrigerator, and a cooling tower.

data.source_sentence: 삼중 열병합시스템은 수소를 연료로 사용하는 고온 PEMFC 시스템과 흡수식냉동기를 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: The triple cogeneration system refers to a high-temperature PEMFC system that uses hydrogen as fuel and an absorption chiller.
data.target_sentence: A triple cogeneration system refers to a high-temperature PEMFC system that uses hydrogen as fuel and an absorption chiller.

data.source_sentence: 즉, 고온 PEMFC 시스템으로부터 전기와 열이 생산되어 이 중 전기는 데이터센터의 전기 부하로 사용되며, 열은 흡수식냉동기의 열원으로 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: That is, electricity and heat are produced from the high-temperature PEMFC system, and among them, electricity is used as an electrical load in the data center, and heat is used as a heat source for the absorption chiller.
data.target_sentence: That is, the high-temperature PEMFC system produces electricity and heat, of which electricity is used as an electrical load in the data center and heat is used as a heat source for the absorption cooler.

data.source_sentence: 전기 냉방기와 흡수식냉동기에서 생산되는 약 7℃의 냉수는 공기 순환을 통해 데이터센터 실내를 냉각하는데 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: Chilled water at about 7°C produced by electric air conditioners and absorption chillers is used to cool the data center room through air circulation.
data.target_sentence: Approximately 7°C coolant produced by electric air conditioners and absorption chillers is used to cool the data center rooms through air circulation.

data.source_sentence: 냉각탑은 흡수식 냉동기와 수냉식 전기 냉방기에 사용되는 냉각수의 냉각에 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: Cooling towers are used to cool the cooling water used in absorption chillers and water-cooled electric chillers.
data.target_sentence: Cooling towers are used to cool the cooling water used in absorption chillers and water-cooled electric chillers.

data.source_sentence: 목적 함수는 삼중열병합시스템의 고정비와 변동비의 합으로 정의되며 다음 식과 같이 표현된다.
data.mt_sentence: The objective function is defined as the sum of the fixed and variable costs of the triple heat and power system and is expressed as the following equation.
data.target_sentence: The objective function is defined as the sum of the fixed cost and variable cost of the triple cogeneration system and is expressed by the following equation.

data.source_sentence: 이론적 수소발생량은 1 mol의 포도당으로부터 12 mol의 수소가 생성된다.
data.mt_sentence: The theoretical amount of hydrogen evolution is 12 mol of hydrogen from 1 mol of glucose.
data.target_sentence: The theoretical amount of hydrogen evolution is 12 moles of hydrogen in 1 mole of glucose.
